atk-s0508a1:14: Therehi bhāsitā gāthā, therīhi ca nirāmisā.
atk-s0508a1:33_0: Kā panetā theragāthā therīgāthā ca, kathañca pavattāti, kāmañcāyamattho gāthāsu vuttoyeva
atk-s0508a1:33_1: pākaṭakaraṇatthaṃ pana punapi vuccate – tattha theragāthā tāva subhūtittherādīhi
atk-s0508a1:33_2: bhāsitā. Yā hi te attanā yathādhigataṃ maggaphalasukhaṃ paccavekkhitvā kāci udānavasena,
atk-s0508a1:33_3: kāci attano samāpattivihārapaccavekkhaṇavasena, kāci pucchāvasena, kāci parinibbānasamaye
atk-s0508a1:33_4: sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvavibhāvanavasena abhāsiṃsu, tā sabbā saṅgītikāle ekajjhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:33_5: katvā “theragāthā”icceva dhammasaṅgāhakehi saṅgītā. Therīgāthā pana theriyo uddissa desitā.
atk-s0508a1:34_0: Tā pana vinayapiṭakaṃ, suttantapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakanti tīsu piṭakesu suttantapiṭakapariyāpannā.
atk-s0508a1:34_1: Dīghanikāyo, majjhimanikāyo, saṃyuttanikāyo, aṅguttaranikāyo, khuddakanikāyoti pañcasu
atk-s0508a1:34_2: nikāyesu khuddakanikāyapariyāpannā, suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthā, udānaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:34_3: itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallanti navasu sāsanaṅgesu gāthaṅgasaṅgahaṃ gatā.
atk-s0508a1:37: Evaṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena paṭiññātesu caturāsītiyā dhammakkhandhasahassesu katipayadhammakkhandhasaṅgahaṃ gatā.
atk-s0508a1:38_0: Tattha theragāthā tāva nipātato ekanipāto ekuttaravasena yāva cuddasanipātāti cuddasanipāto
atk-s0508a1:38_1: soḷasanipāto vīsatinipāto tiṃsanipāto cattālīsanipāto paññāsanipāto saṭṭhinipāto
atk-s0508a1:38_2: sattatinipātoti ekavīsatinipātasaṅgahā. Nipātanaṃ nikkhipananti nipāto. Eko ekeko
atk-s0508a1:38_3: gāthānaṃ nipāto nikkhepo etthāti ekanipāto. Iminā nayena sesesupi attho veditabbo.
atk-s0508a1:39: Tattha ekanipāte dvādasa vaggā. Ekekasmiṃ vagge dasa dasa katvā vīsuttarasataṃ therā, tattikā eva gāthā. Vuttañhi –
atk-s0508a1:42_0: Dukanipāte ekūnapaññāsa therā, aṭṭhanavuti gāthā; tikanipāte soḷasa therā, aṭṭhacattālīsa
atk-s0508a1:42_1: gāthā; catukkanipāte terasa therā, dvepaññāsa gāthā; pañcakanipāte dvādasa therā,
atk-s0508a1:42_2: saṭṭhi gāthā; chakkanipāte cuddasa therā, caturāsīti gāthā; sattakanipāte pañca therā,
atk-s0508a1:42_3: pañcatiṃsa gāthā; aṭṭhakanipāte tayo therā, catuvīsati gāthā; navakanipāte eko thero,
atk-s0508a1:42_4: nava gāthā; dasanipāte satta therā, sattati gāthā; ekādasanipāte eko thero, ekādasa
atk-s0508a1:42_5: gāthā; dvādasanipāte dve therā, catuvīsati gāthā; terasanipāte eko thero, terasa
atk-s0508a1:42_6: gāthā; cuddasanipāte dve therā, aṭṭhavīsati gāthā; pannarasanipāto natthi, soḷasanipāte
atk-s0508a1:42_7: dve therā, dvattiṃsa gāthā; vīsatinipāte dasa therā, pañcacattālīsādhikāni dve gāthāsatāni;
atk-s0508a1:42_8: tiṃsanipāte tayo therā, sataṃ pañca ca gāthā; cattālīsanipāte eko thero, dvecattālīsa
atk-s0508a1:42_9: gāthā; paññāsanipāte eko thero, pañcapaññāsa gāthā; saṭṭhinipāte eko thero, aṭṭhasaṭṭhi
atk-s0508a1:42_10: gāthā; sattatinipāte eko thero, ekasattati gāthā. Sampiṇḍetvā pana dvesatāni catusaṭṭhi
atk-s0508a1:42_11: ca therā, sahassaṃ tīṇi satāni saṭṭhi ca gāthāti. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0508a1:43: “Sahassaṃ honti tā gāthā, tīṇi saṭṭhi satāni ca;
atk-s0508a1:44: Therā ca dve satā saṭṭhi, cattāro ca pakāsitā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:45_0: Therīgāthā pana ekanipāto ekuttaravasena yāva navanipātāti navanipāto ekādasanipāto,
atk-s0508a1:45_1: dvādasanipāto, soḷasanipāto, vīsatinipāto, tiṃsanipāto, cattālīsanipāto, mahānipātoti
atk-s0508a1:45_2: soḷasanipātasaṅgahā. Tattha ekanipāte aṭṭhārasa theriyo, aṭṭhāraseva gāthā; dukanipāte
atk-s0508a1:45_3: dasa theriyo, vīsati gāthā; tikanipāte aṭṭha theriyo, catuvīsati gāthā; catukkanipāte
atk-s0508a1:45_4: ekā therī, catasso gāthā; pañcakanipāte dvādasa theriyo saṭṭhi gāthā; chakkanipāte
atk-s0508a1:45_5: aṭṭha theriyo aṭṭhacattālīsa gāthā; sattanipāte tisso theriyo, ekavīsati gāthā; aṭṭha
atk-s0508a1:45_6: nipātato paṭṭhāya yāva soḷasanipātā ekekā theriyo taṃtaṃnipātaparimāṇā gāthā; vīsatinipāte
atk-s0508a1:45_7: pañca theriyo, aṭṭhārasasatagāthā; tiṃsanipāte ekā therī, catuttiṃsa gāthā; cattālīsanipāte
atk-s0508a1:45_8: ekā therī, aṭṭhacattālīsa gāthā; mahānipātepi ekā therī, pañcasattati gāthā. Evamettha
atk-s0508a1:47: Evaṃ paricchinnaparimāṇāsu panetāsu theragāthā ādi. Tatthāpi –
atk-s0508a1:50_0: Ayaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle āyasmatā ānandena tesaṃ therānaṃ thomanatthaṃ bhāsitā
atk-s0508a1:50_1: gāthā ādi. Tattha sīhānanti sīhasaddo “sīho, bhikkhave, migarājā”tiādīsu migarāje
atk-s0508a1:50_2: āgato. “Atha kho sīho senāpati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī”tiādīsu paññattiyaṃ. “Sīhoti
atk-s0508a1:50_3: kho, bhikkhave, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”tiādīsu tathāgate.
atk-s0508a1:50_4: Tattha yathā tathāgate sadisakappanāya āgato, evaṃ idhāpi sadisakappanāvaseneva veditabbo,
atk-s0508a1:50_5: tasmā sīhānaṃvāti sīhānaṃ iva. Sandhivasena saralopo “evaṃsa te”tiādīsu viya. Tattha
atk-s0508a1:50_6: ivāti nipātapadaṃ. Suṇāthāti ākhyātapadaṃ. Itarāni nāmapadāni. Sīhānaṃvāti ca sambandhe
atk-s0508a1:50_7: sāmivacanaṃ. Kāmañcettha sambandhī sarūpato na vutto, atthato pana vuttova hoti.
atk-s0508a1:50_8: Yathā hi “oṭṭhasseva mukhaṃ etassā”ti vutte oṭṭhassa mukhaṃ viya mukhaṃ etassāti
atk-s0508a1:50_9: ayamattho vutto eva hoti, evamidhāpi “sīhānaṃvā”ti vutte sīhānaṃ nādo viyāti ayamattho
atk-s0508a1:50_10: vutto eva hoti. Tattha mukhasaddasannidhānaṃ hotīti ce, idhāpi “nadantāna”nti padasannidhānato,
atk-s0508a1:50_11: tasmā sīhānaṃvāti nidassanavacanaṃ. Nadantānanti tassa nidassitabbena sambandhadassanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:50_12: Dāṭhīnanti tabbisesanaṃ. Girigabbhareti tassa pavattiṭṭhānadassanaṃ. Suṇāthāti savane
atk-s0508a1:50_13: niyojanaṃ. Bhāvitattānanti sotabbassa pabhavadassanaṃ. Gāthāti sotabbavatthudassanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:50_14: Atthupanāyikāti tabbisesanaṃ. Kāmañcettha “sīhānaṃ nadantānaṃ dāṭhīna”nti pulliṅgavasena
atk-s0508a1:50_15: āgataṃ, liṅgaṃ pana parivattetvā “sīhīna”ntiādinā itthiliṅgavasenāpi attho veditabbo.
atk-s0508a1:50_16: Ekasesavasena vā sīhā ca sīhiyo ca sīhā, tesaṃ sīhānantiādinā sādhāraṇā hetā tisso
atk-s0508a1:51_0: Tattha sahanato hananato ca sīho. Yathā hi sīhassa migarañño balavisesayogato sarabhamigamattavaravāraṇāditopi
atk-s0508a1:51_1: parissayo nāma natthi, vātātapādiparissayampi so sahatiyeva, gocarāya pakkamantopi
atk-s0508a1:51_2: tejussadatāya mattagandhahatthivanamahiṃsādike samāgantvā abhīrū achambhī abhibhavati,
atk-s0508a1:51_3: abhibhavanto ca te aññadatthu hantvā tattha mudumaṃsāni bhakkhayitvā sukheneva viharati,
atk-s0508a1:51_4: evametepi mahātherā ariyabalavisesayogena sabbesampi parissayānaṃ sahanato, rāgādisaṃkilesabalassa
atk-s0508a1:51_5: abhibhavitvā hananato pajahanato tejussadabhāvena kutocipi abhīrū achambhī jhānādisukhena
atk-s0508a1:51_6: viharantīti sahanato hananato ca sīhā viyāti sīhā. Saddatthato pana yathā kantanatthena
atk-s0508a1:51_7: ādiantavipallāsato takkaṃ vuccati, evaṃ hiṃsanaṭṭhena sīho veditabbo. Tathā sahanaṭṭhena.
atk-s0508a1:51_8: Pisodarādipakkhepena niruttinayena pana vuccamāne vattabbameva natthi.
atk-s0508a1:52_0: Atha vā yathā migarājā kesarasīho attano tejussadatāya ekacārī viharati, na kañci
atk-s0508a1:52_1: sahāyaṃ paccāsīsati, evametepi tejussadatāya vivekābhiratiyā ca ekacārinoti ekacariyaṭṭhenapi
atk-s0508a1:52_2: sīhā viyāti sīhā, tenāha – bhagavā “sīhaṃvekacaraṃ nāga”nti.
atk-s0508a1:53: Atha vā asantāsanajavaparakkamādivisesayogato sīhā viyāti sīhā, ete mahātherā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0508a1:54: “Dveme, bhikkhave, asaniyā phalantiyā na santasanti, katameva dve? Bhikkhu ca khīṇāsavo sīho ca migarājā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:55_0: Javopi sīhassa aññehi asādhāraṇo, tathā parakkamo. Tathā hi so usabhasatampi laṅghitvā
atk-s0508a1:55_1: vanamahiṃsādīsu nipatati, potakopi samāno pabhinnamadānampi mattavaravāraṇānaṃ paṭimānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:55_2: bhinditvā dantakaḷīraṃva khādati. Etesaṃ pana ariyamaggajavo iddhijavo ca aññehi
atk-s0508a1:55_3: asādhāraṇo, sammappadhānaparakkamo ca niratisayo. Tasmā sīhānaṃvāti sīhasadisānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:55_4: viya. Sīhassa cettha hīnūpamatā daṭṭhabbā, accantavisiṭṭhassa sahanādiatthassa theresveva labbhanato.
atk-s0508a1:56_0: Nadantānanti gajjantānaṃ. Gocaraparakkamatuṭṭhivelādīsu hi yathā sīhā attano āsayato
atk-s0508a1:56_1: nikkhamitvā vijambhitvā sīhanādaṃ abhītanādaṃ nadanti, evaṃ etepi visayajjhattapaccavekkhaṇaudānādikālesu
atk-s0508a1:56_2: imaṃ abhītanādaṃ nadiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ – “sīhānaṃva nadantāna”nti. Dāṭhīnanti dāṭhāvantānaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:56_3: Pasaṭṭhadāṭhīnaṃ, atisayadāṭhānanti vā attho. Yathā hi sīhā ativiya daḷhānaṃ tikkhānañca
atk-s0508a1:56_4: catunnaṃ dāṭhānaṃ balena paṭipakkhaṃ abhibhavitvā attano manorathaṃ matthakaṃ pūrenti,
atk-s0508a1:56_5: evametepi catunnaṃ ariyamaggadāṭhānaṃ balena anādimati saṃsāre anabhibhūtapubbapaṭipakkhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:56_6: abhibhavitvā attano manorathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpesuṃ. Idhāpi dāṭhā viyāti dāṭhāti sadisakappanāvaseneva attho veditabbo.
atk-s0508a1:57_0: Girigabbhareti pabbataguhāyaṃ, samīpatthe bhummavacanaṃ. “Girigavhare”ti keci paṭhanti.
atk-s0508a1:57_1: Pabbatesu vanagahane vanasaṇḍeti attho. Idaṃ pana nesaṃ virocanaṭṭhānadassanañceva
atk-s0508a1:57_2: sīhanādassa yogyabhūmidassanañca. Nadantānaṃ girigabbhareti yojanā. Yathā hi sīhā
atk-s0508a1:57_3: yebhuyyena girigabbhare aññehi durāsadatāya janavivitte vasantā attano dassanena
atk-s0508a1:57_4: uppajjanakassa khuddakamigasantāsassa pariharaṇatthaṃ gocaragamane sīhanādaṃ nadanti,
atk-s0508a1:57_5: evametepi aññehi durāsadagirigabbharasadiseva suññāgārevasantā guṇehi khuddakānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:57_7: nadiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ “sīhānaṃva nadantānaṃ, dāṭhīnaṃ girigabbhare”ti.
atk-s0508a1:58_0: Suṇāthāti savanāṇattikavacanaṃ, tena vakkhamānānaṃ gāthānaṃ sannipatitāya parisāya
atk-s0508a1:58_1: sotukāmataṃ uppādento savane ādaraṃ janeti, ussāhaṃ samuṭṭhāpento gāravaṃ bahumānañca
atk-s0508a1:58_2: upaṭṭhapeti. Atha vā “sīhāna”ntiādīnaṃ padānaṃ sadisakappanāya vinā mukhyavaseneva
atk-s0508a1:58_3: attho veditabbo. Tasmā daḷhatikkhabhāvena pasaṭṭhātisayadāṭhatāya dāṭhīnaṃ girigabbhare
atk-s0508a1:58_4: nadantānaṃ sīhagajjitaṃ gajjantānaṃ sīhānaṃ migarājūnaṃ viya tesaṃ abhītanādasadisā
atk-s0508a1:58_5: gāthā suṇāthāti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “yathā sīhanādaṃ nadantānaṃ sīhānaṃ migarājūnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:58_6: kutocipi bhayābhāvato so abhītanādo tadaññamigasantāsakaro, evaṃ bhāvitattānaṃ appamattānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:58_7: therānaṃ sīhanādasadisiyo sabbaso bhayahetūnaṃ suppahīnattā abhītanādabhūtā, pamattajanasantāsakarā gāthā suṇāthā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:59_0: Bhāvitattānanti bhāvitacittānaṃ. Cittañhi “attā hi kira duddamo yo ve ṭhitatto tasaraṃva
atk-s0508a1:59_1: ujjū”ti ca “attasammāpaṇidhī”ti ca evamādīsu attāti vuccati, tasmā adhicittānuyogena
atk-s0508a1:59_3: attho. Atha vā bhāvitattānanti bhāvitasabhāvānaṃ, sabhāvabhūtasīlādibhāvitānanti
atk-s0508a1:59_4: attho. Gīyatīti gāthā, anuṭṭhubhādivasena isīhi pavattitaṃ catuppadaṃ chappadaṃ vā
atk-s0508a1:59_5: vacanaṃ. Aññesampi taṃsadisatāya tathā vuccanti. Attatthādibhede atthe upanenti tesu
atk-s0508a1:60_0: Atha vā bhāvitattānanti bhāvitattābhāvānaṃ, attabhāvo hi āhito ahaṃ māno etthāti
atk-s0508a1:60_1: “attā”ti vuccati, so ca tehi appamādabhāvanāya anavajjabhāvanāya bhāvito sammadeva
atk-s0508a1:60_2: guṇagandhaṃ gāhāpito. Tena tesaṃ kāyabhāvanā sīlabhāvanā cittabhāvanā paññābhāvanāti
atk-s0508a1:60_3: catunnampi bhāvanānaṃ paripuṇṇabhāvaṃ dasseti. “Bhāvanā”ti ca sambodhipaṭipadā idhādhippetā.
atk-s0508a1:60_4: Yāyaṃ saccasambodhi atthi, sā duvidhā abhisamayato tadatthato ca. Sambodhi pana tividhā
atk-s0508a1:60_5: sammāsambodhi paccekasambodhi sāvakasambodhīti. Tattha sammā sāmaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:60_6: bujjhanato bodhanato ca sammāsambodhi. Sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ maggañāṇaṃ maggañāṇapadaṭṭhānañca
atk-s0508a1:61: “Buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto balesu ca vasībhāva”nti.
atk-s0508a1:62_0: Bodhaneyyabodhanattho hi balesu vasībhāvo. Paccekaṃ sayameva bodhīti paccekasambodhi,
atk-s0508a1:62_1: ananubuddho sayambhūñāṇena saccābhisamayoti attho. Sammāsambuddhānañhi sayambhūñāṇatāya
atk-s0508a1:62_2: sayameva pavattamānopi saccābhisamayo sānubuddho aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ saccābhisamayassa
atk-s0508a1:62_3: hetubhāvato. Imesaṃ pana so ekassāpi sattassa saccābhisamayahetu na hoti. Satthu
atk-s0508a1:62_4: dhammadesanāya savanante jātāti sāvakā. Sāvakānaṃ saccābhisamayo sāvakasambodhi.
atk-s0508a1:62_5: Tividhāpesā tiṇṇaṃ bodhisattānaṃ yathāsakaṃ āgamanīyapaṭipadāya matthakappattiyā
atk-s0508a1:62_7: itarābhisamayānaṃ tadavinābhāvato. Na hi sacchikiriyābhisamayena vinā bhāvanābhisamayo
atk-s0508a1:62_8: sambhavati, sati ca bhāvanābhisamaye pahānābhisamayo pariññābhisamayo ca siddhoyeva hotīti.
atk-s0508a1:63_0: Yadā hi mahābodhisatto paripūritabodhisambhāro carimabhave katapubbakicco bodhimaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0508a1:63_1: āruyha – “na tāvimaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmi, yāva na me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccissatī”ti
atk-s0508a1:63_2: paṭiññaṃ katvā aparājitapallaṅke nisinno asampattāya eva sañjhāvelāya mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā
atk-s0508a1:63_3: purimayāme pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena anekākāravokāre pubbe nivutthakkhandhe anussaritvā
atk-s0508a1:63_5: “kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno jāyati ca jīyati ca mīyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca,
atk-s0508a1:63_6: atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ nappajānāti jarāmaraṇassā”tiādinā jarāmaraṇato
atk-s0508a1:63_7: paṭṭhāya paṭiccasamuppādamukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisitvā mahāgahanaṃ chindituṃ nisadasilāyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:63_8: pharasuṃ nisento viya kilesagahanaṃ chindituṃ lokanātho ñāṇapharasuṃ tejento buddhabhāvāya
atk-s0508a1:63_9: hetusampattiyā paripākaṃ gatattā sabbaññutaññāṇādhigamāya vipassanaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpento
atk-s0508a1:63_10: antarantarā nānāsamāpattiyo samāpajjitvā yathāvavatthāpite nāmarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā
atk-s0508a1:63_12: sammasanavāraṃ vitthāretvā tattha mahāvajirañāṇasaṅkhāte vipassanāñāṇe tikkhe sūre
atk-s0508a1:63_13: pasanne vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvena pavattamāne yadā taṃ maggena ghaṭeti, tadā maggapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0508a1:63_14: diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ khepento aggamaggakkhaṇe sammāsambodhiṃ adhigacchati nāma,
atk-s0508a1:63_15: aggaphalakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya adhigato nāma. Sammāsambuddhabhāvato dasabalacatuvesārajjādayopi
atk-s0508a1:63_16: tassa tadā hatthagatāyeva hontīti ayaṃ tāva abhisamayato sammāsambodhipaṭipadā. Tadatthato
atk-s0508a1:63_17: pana mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya yāva tusitabhavane nibbatti, etthantare pavattaṃ bodhisambhārasambharaṇaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:63_18: Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbākārasampannaṃ cariyāpiṭakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vitthārato vuttamevāti
atk-s0508a1:64_1: tādise kāle carimattabhāve ṭhitā ñāṇassa paripākagatabhāvena upaṭṭhitaṃ saṃveganimittaṃ
atk-s0508a1:64_2: gahetvā savisesaṃ bhavādīsu ādīnavaṃ disvā sayambhūñāṇena pavatti pavattihetuṃ nivatti
atk-s0508a1:64_3: nivattihetuñca paricchinditvā “so ‘idaṃ dukkha’nti yoniso manasi karotī”tiādinā āgatanayena
atk-s0508a1:64_4: catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ paribrūhentā attano abhinīhārānurūpaṃ saṅkhāre parimaddantā
atk-s0508a1:64_5: anukkamena vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā aggamaggaṃ adhigacchantā paccekasambodhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:64_6: abhisambujjhanti nāma, aggaphalakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya paccekasambuddhā nāma hutvā sadevakassa
atk-s0508a1:65_0: Sāvakā pana satthu sabrahmacārino vā catusaccakammaṭṭhānakathaṃ sutvā tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0508a1:65_1: khaṇe kālantare vā tajjaṃ paṭipattiṃ anutiṭṭhantā ghaṭentā vāyamantā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā,
atk-s0508a1:65_2: yadi vā paṭipadāya vaḍḍhantiyā, saccāni paṭivijjhantā attano abhinīhārānurūpasiddhiaggasāvakabhūmiyā
atk-s0508a1:65_3: vā kevalaṃ vā aggamaggakkhaṇe sāvakasambodhiṃ adhigacchanti nāma. Tato paraṃ sāvakabuddhā
atk-s0508a1:65_4: nāma honti sadevake loke aggadakkhiṇeyyā. Evaṃ tāva abhisamayato paccekasambodhi
atk-s0508a1:66_0: Tadatthato pana yathā mahābodhisattānaṃ heṭṭhimaparicchedena cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0508a1:66_2: aṭṭha asaṅkhyeyyāni kappānaṃ satasahassañca, uparimaparicchedena soḷasa asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0508a1:66_3: kappānaṃ satasahassañca ete ca bhedā paññādhikasaddhādhikavīriyādhikavasena veditabbā.
atk-s0508a1:66_4: Paññādhikānañhi saddhā mandā hoti paññā tikkhā, tato ca upāyakosallassa visadanipuṇabhāvena
atk-s0508a1:66_5: nacirasseva pāramiyo pāripūriṃ gacchanti. Saddhādhikānaṃ paññā majjhimā hotīti tesaṃ
atk-s0508a1:66_6: nātisīghaṃ nātisaṇikaṃ pāramiyo pāripūriṃ gacchanti. Vīriyādhikānaṃ pana paññā mandā
atk-s0508a1:66_7: hotīti tesaṃ cireneva pāramiyo pāripūriṃ gacchanti. Na evaṃ paccekabodhisattānaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:66_8: Tesañhi satipi paññādhikabhāve dve asaṅkhyeyyāni kappānaṃ satasahassañca bodhisambhārasambharaṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:66_9: icchitabbaṃ, na tato oraṃ. Saddhādhikavīriyādhikāpi vuttaparicchedato paraṃ katipaye
atk-s0508a1:66_10: eva kappe atikkamitvā paccekasambodhiṃ abhisambujjhanti, na tatiyaṃ asaṅkhyeyyanti.
atk-s0508a1:66_11: Sāvakabodhisattānaṃ pana yesaṃ aggasāvakabhāvāya abhinīhāro, tesaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:66_12: kappānaṃ satasahassañca sambhārasambharaṇaṃ icchitabbaṃ. Yesaṃ mahāsāvakabhāvāya,
atk-s0508a1:66_13: tesaṃ kappānaṃ satasahassameva, tathā buddhassa mātāpitūnaṃ upaṭṭhākassa puttassa ca. Tattha yathā –
atk-s0508a1:70_0: Evaṃ vutte aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā katapaṇidhānānaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ mahābhinīhārato
atk-s0508a1:70_1: pabhuti savisesaṃ dānādīsu yuttappayuttānaṃ divase divase vessantaradānasadisaṃ mahādānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:70_3: asampatvā antarā eva buddhabhāvappatti nāma natthi. Kasmā? Ñāṇassa aparipaccanato.
atk-s0508a1:70_4: Paricchinnakāle nipphāditaṃ viya hi sassaṃ buddhañāṇaṃ yathāparicchinnakālavaseneva
atk-s0508a1:70_5: vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjantaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhantaṃ paripākaṃ gacchatīti evaṃ –
atk-s0508a1:73_0: Ime pañca dhamme samodhānetvā katābhinīhārānaṃ paccekabodhisattānaṃ “adhikāro chandatā”ti
atk-s0508a1:73_1: dvaṅgasamannāgatāya patthanāya vasena katapaṇidhānānaṃ sāvakabodhisattānañca tattha
atk-s0508a1:73_2: tattha vuttakālaparicchedaṃ asampatvā antarā eva paccekasambodhiyā yathāvuttasāvakasambodhiyā
atk-s0508a1:73_3: ca adhigamo natthi. Kasmā? Ñāṇassa aparipaccanato. Imesampi hi yathā mahābodhisattānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:73_4: dānādipāramīhi paribrūhitā paññāpāramī anukkamena gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī paripākaṃ gacchantī
atk-s0508a1:73_5: buddhañāṇaṃ paripūreti, evaṃ dānādīhi paribrūhitā anupubbena yathārahaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī
atk-s0508a1:73_6: paripākaṃ gacchantī paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ sāvakabodhiñāṇañca paripūreti. Dānaparicayena
atk-s0508a1:73_7: hete tattha tattha bhave alobhajjhāsayatāya sabbattha asaṅgamānasā anapekkhacittā
atk-s0508a1:73_9: indriyesu guttadvārā bhojane mattaññuno hutvā jāgariyānuyogena cittaṃ samādahanti,
atk-s0508a1:74_0: Evaṃ pana paṭipajjantānaṃ adhikārasampattiyā appakasireneva aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañcābhiññā
atk-s0508a1:74_1: chaḷabhiññā adhiṭṭhānabhūtā pubbabhāgavipassanā ca hatthagatāyeva honti. Vīriyādayo
atk-s0508a1:74_2: pana tadantogadhā eva. Yañhi paccekabodhiyā sāvakabodhiyā vā atthāya dānādipuññasambharaṇe
atk-s0508a1:74_3: abbhussahanaṃ, idaṃ vīriyaṃ. Yaṃ tadanuparodhassa sahanaṃ, ayaṃ khanti. Yaṃ dānasīlādisamādānāvisaṃvādanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:74_4: idaṃ saccaṃ. Sabbatthameva acalasamādhānādhiṭṭhānaṃ, idaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Yā dānasīlādīnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:74_5: pavattiṭṭhānabhūtesu sattesu hitesitā, ayaṃ mettā. Yaṃ sattānaṃ katavippakāresu ajjhupekkhanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:74_6: ayaṃ upekkhāti. Evaṃ dānasīlabhāvanāsu sīlasamādhipaññāsu ca sijjhamānāsu vīriyādayo
atk-s0508a1:74_7: siddhā eva honti. Sāyeva paccekabodhiatthāya sāvakabodhiatthāya ca dānādipaṭipadā
atk-s0508a1:74_8: tesaṃ bodhisattānaṃ santānassa bhāvanato paribhāvanato bhāvanā nāma. Visesato dānasīlādīhi
atk-s0508a1:74_9: svābhisaṅkhate santāne pavattā samathavipassanāpaṭipadā, yato te bodhisattā pubbayogāvacarasamudāgamasampannā
atk-s0508a1:75_0: “Pañcime, ānanda, ānisaṃsā pubbayogāvacare. Katame pañca? Idhānanda, pubbayogāvacaro
atk-s0508a1:75_1: diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacca aññaṃ ārādheti, no ce diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacca aññaṃ ārādheti,
atk-s0508a1:75_2: atha maraṇakāle aññaṃ ārādheti, atha devaputto samāno aññaṃ ārādheti, atha buddhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:75_3: sammukhībhāve khippābhiñño hoti, atha pacchime kāle paccekasambuddho hotī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:76_2: bhāvitattā nāma. Tesu idha buddhasāvakā adhippetā.
atk-s0508a1:77_0: Ettha ca “sīhānaṃvā”ti iminā therānaṃ sīhasamānavuttitādassanena attano paṭipakkhehi
atk-s0508a1:77_1: anabhibhavanīyataṃ, te ca abhibhuyya pavattiṃ dasseti. “Sīhānaṃva nadantānaṃ…pe…
atk-s0508a1:77_2: gāthā”ti iminā theragāthānaṃ sīhanādasadisatādassanena tāsaṃ paravādehi anabhibhavanīyataṃ,
atk-s0508a1:77_3: te ca abhibhavitvā pavattiṃ dasseti. “Bhāvitattāna”nti iminā tadubhayassa kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:77_4: vibhāveti. Bhāvitattabhāvena therā idha sīhasadisā vuttā, tesañca gāthā sīhanādasadisiyo.
atk-s0508a1:77_5: “Atthūpanāyikā”ti iminā abhibhavane payojanaṃ dasseti. Tattha therānaṃ paṭipakkho
atk-s0508a1:77_6: nāma saṃkilesadhammo, tadabhibhavo tadaṅgivikkhambhanappahānehi saddhiṃ samucchedappahānaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:77_7: Tasmiṃ sati paṭipassaddhīppahānaṃ nissaraṇappahānañca siddhameva hoti, yato te bhāvitattāti
atk-s0508a1:77_8: vuccanti. Maggakkhaṇe hi ariyā appamādabhāvanaṃ bhāventi nāma, aggaphalakkhaṇato
atk-s0508a1:78_0: Tesu tadaṅgappahānena nesaṃ sīlasampadā dassitā, vikkhambhanappahānena samādhisampadā,
atk-s0508a1:78_1: samucchedappahānena paññāsampadā, itarena tāsaṃ phalaṃ dassitaṃ. Sīlena ca tesaṃ
atk-s0508a1:78_2: paṭipattiyā ādikalyāṇatā dassitā, “ko cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ? Sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ”,
atk-s0508a1:78_3: “sīle patiṭṭhāya”, “sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”nti ca vacanato sīlaṃ paṭipattiyā ādikalyāṇaṃva
atk-s0508a1:78_5: “kusalassa upasampadā”ti ca vacanato samādhipaṭipattiyā majjhekalyāṇova, iddhividhādiguṇāvahattā.
atk-s0508a1:78_7: ca vacanato paññā paṭipattiyā pariyosānaṃva, paññuttarato kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ sāva
atk-s0508a1:82_0: Tathā sīlasampadāya tevijjabhāvo dassito. Sīlasampattiñhi nissāya tisso vijjā pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0508a1:82_1: Samādhisampadāya chaḷabhiññābhāvo. Samādhisampattiñhi nissāya chaḷabhiññā pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0508a1:82_2: Paññāsampadāya pabhinnapaṭisambhidābhāvo. Paññāsampadañhi nissāya catasso paṭisambhidā
atk-s0508a1:82_3: pāpuṇanti. Iminā tesaṃ therānaṃ keci tevijjā, keci chaḷabhiññā, keci paṭisambhidāpattāti
atk-s0508a1:83_0: Tathā sīlasampadāya tesaṃ kāmasukhānuyogasaṅkhātassa antassa parivajjanaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:83_2: sevanaṃ dasseti. Tathā sīlasampadāya tesaṃ vītikkamappahānaṃ kilesānaṃ dasseti. Samādhisampadāya
atk-s0508a1:83_3: pariyuṭṭhānappahānaṃ, paññāsampadāya anusayappahānaṃ dasseti. Sīlasampadāya vā duccaritasaṃkilesavisodhanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:83_5: dasseti. Tadaṅgappahānena vā nesaṃ apāyasamatikkamo dassito. Vikkhambhanappahānena
atk-s0508a1:84_0: “Bhāvitattāna”nti vā ettha sīlabhāvanā, cittabhāvanā paññābhāvanāti tisso bhāvanā
atk-s0508a1:84_1: veditabbā kāyabhāvanāya tadantogadhattā. Sīlabhāvanā ca paṭipattiyā ādīti sabbaṃ
atk-s0508a1:84_2: purimasadisaṃ. Yathā pana sīhanādaṃ pare migagaṇā na sahanti, kuto abhibhave, aññadatthu
atk-s0508a1:84_3: sīhanādova te abhibhavati evameva aññatitthiyavādā therānaṃ vāde na sahanti, kuto
atk-s0508a1:84_4: abhibhave, aññadatthu theravādāva te abhibhavanti. Taṃ kissa hetu? “Sabbe saṅkhārā
atk-s0508a1:84_5: aniccā, sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā, sabbe dhammā anattā”ti “nibbānadhātū”ti ca pavattanato.
atk-s0508a1:84_6: Na hi dhammato sakkā kenaci aññathā kātuṃ appaṭivattanīyato. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:84_7: taṃ parato āvibhavissati. Evamettha saṅkhepeneva paṭhamagāthāya atthavibhāvanā veditabbā.
atk-s0508a1:85_0: Dutiyagāthāyaṃ pana ayaṃ sambandhadassanamukhena atthavibhāvanā. Tattha yesaṃ therānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:85_1: gāthā sāvetukāmo, te sādhāraṇavasena nāmato gottato guṇato ca kittetuṃ “yathānāmā”tiādi
atk-s0508a1:85_2: vuttaṃ. Asādhāraṇato pana tattha tattha gāthāsveva āvibhavissati. Tattha yathānāmāti
atk-s0508a1:85_3: yaṃyaṃnāmā, subhūti mahākoṭṭhikotiādinā nayena nāmadheyyena paññātāti attho. Yathāgottāti
atk-s0508a1:85_4: yaṃyaṃgottā, gotamo kassapotiādinā nayena kulapadesena yāya yāya jātiyā paññātāti
atk-s0508a1:85_6: yathānurūpaṃ samāpattivihārino hutvā vihariṃsūti attho. Atha vā yathādhammavihārinoti
atk-s0508a1:85_7: yathādhammā vihārino ca, yādisasīlādidhammā dibbavihārādīsu abhiṇhaso viharamānā
atk-s0508a1:85_8: yādisavihārā cāti attho. Yathādhimuttāti yādisaadhimuttikā saddhādhimuttipaññādhimuttīsu
atk-s0508a1:85_9: yaṃyaṃadhimuttikā suññatamukhādīsu vā yathā yathā nibbānaṃ adhimuttāti yathādhimuttā.
atk-s0508a1:85_10: “Nibbānaṃ adhimuttānaṃ, atthaṃ gacchanti āsavā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Ubhayañcetaṃ pubbabhāgavasena
atk-s0508a1:85_11: veditabbaṃ. Arahattappattito pubbeyeva hi yathāvuttamadhimuccanaṃ, na parato. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0508a1:86: “Assaddho akataññū ca, sandhicchedo ca yo naro”tiādi..
atk-s0508a1:87_1: Sappaññāti tihetukapaṭisandhipaññāya pārihārikapaññāya bhāvanāpaññāya cāti tividhāyapi
atk-s0508a1:87_2: paññāya paññavanto. Vihariṃsūti tāya eva sappaññatāya yathāladdhena phāsuvihāreneva
atk-s0508a1:87_3: vasiṃsu. Atanditāti analasā, attahitapaṭipattiyaṃ yathābalaṃ parahitapaṭipattiyañca
atk-s0508a1:88_0: Ettha ca pana nāmagottaggahaṇena tesaṃ therānaṃ pakāsapaññātabhāvaṃ dasseti. Dhammavihāraggahaṇena
atk-s0508a1:88_1: sīlasampadaṃ samādhisampadañca dasseti. “Yathādhimuttā sappaññā”ti iminā paññāsampadaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:88_5: “atanditā”ti iminā evaṃ attahitasampattiyaṃ ṭhitānaṃ parahitapaṭipattiṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:89_0: Atha vā “yathānāmā”ti idaṃ tesaṃ therānaṃ garūhi gahitanāmadheyyadassanaṃ samaññāmattakittanato.
atk-s0508a1:89_1: “Yathāgottā”ti idaṃ kulaputtabhāvadassanaṃ kulāpadesa kittanato. Tena nesaṃ saddhāpabbajitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:89_5: “Yathānāmā”ti vā iminā tesaṃ pakāsananāmataṃyeva dasseti. “Yathāgottā”ti pana iminā
atk-s0508a1:89_6: pacchimacakkadvayasampattiṃ dasseti. Na hi sammāappaṇihitattano pubbe ca akatapuññassa
atk-s0508a1:89_8: iminā tesaṃ purimacakkadvayasampattiṃ dasseti. Na hi appatirūpe dese vasato sappurisūpanissayarahitassa
atk-s0508a1:89_9: ca tādisā guṇavisesā sambhavanti. “Yathādhimuttā”ti iminā saddhammasavanasampadāsamāyogaṃ
atk-s0508a1:89_10: dasseti. Na hi paratoghosena vinā sāvakānaṃ saccasampaṭivedho sambhavati. “Sappaññā
atk-s0508a1:89_11: atanditā”ti iminā yathāvuttassa guṇavisesassa abyabhicārihetuṃ dasseti ñāyārambhadassanato.
atk-s0508a1:90_0: Aparo nayo – “yathāgottā”ti ettha gottakittanena tesaṃ therānaṃ yonisomanasikārasampadaṃ
atk-s0508a1:90_2: ettha dhammavihāraggahaṇena saddhammasavanasampadaṃ dasseti saddhammasavanena vinā
atk-s0508a1:90_4: “Sappaññā”ti iminā sabbattha sampajānakāritaṃ. “Atanditā”ti iminā vuttanayena attahitasampattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:90_5: paripūretvā ṭhitānaṃ paresaṃ hitasukhāvahāya paṭipattiyaṃ akilāsubhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:90_6: Tathā “yathāgottā”ti iminā nesaṃ saraṇagamanasampadā dassitā saddhānusārīgottakittanato.
atk-s0508a1:90_8: sappaññā”ti iminā paññakkhandhādayo. Saraṇagamanañca sāvakaguṇānaṃ ādi, samādhi majjhe,
atk-s0508a1:90_9: paññā pariyosānanti ādimajjhapariyosānadassanena sabbepi sāvakaguṇā dassitā honti.
atk-s0508a1:91_0: Īdisī pana guṇavibhūti yāya sammāpaṭipattiyā tehi adhigatā, taṃ dassetuṃ “tattha
atk-s0508a1:91_1: tattha vipassitvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tesu tesu araññarukkhamūlapabbatādīsu
atk-s0508a1:91_2: vivittasenāsanesu. Tattha tatthāti vā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ udānādikāle. Vipassitvāti sampassitvā.
atk-s0508a1:91_5: matthakaṃ pāpanavasena vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā phusitvāti patvā sacchikatvā. Accutaṃ
atk-s0508a1:91_6: padanti nibbānaṃ. Tañhi sayaṃ acavanadhammattā adhigatānaṃ accutihetubhāvato ca natthi
atk-s0508a1:91_7: ettha cutīti “accutaṃ”. Saṅkhatadhammehi asammissabhāvatāya tadatthikehi paṭipajjitabbatāya
atk-s0508a1:91_8: ca “pada”nti ca vuccati. Katantanti katassa antaṃ. Yo hi tehi adhigato ariyamaggo,
atk-s0508a1:91_9: so attano paccayehi uppāditattā kato nāma. Tassa pana pariyosānabhūtaṃ phalaṃ katantoti
atk-s0508a1:91_10: adhippetaṃ. Taṃ katantaṃ aggaphalaṃ. Atha vā paccayehi katattā nipphāditattā katā
atk-s0508a1:91_11: nāma saṅkhatadhammā, tannissaraṇabhāvato katanto nibbānaṃ. Taṃ katantaṃ. Paccavekkhantāti
atk-s0508a1:91_12: “adhigataṃ vata mayā ariyamaggādhigamena idaṃ ariyaphalaṃ, adhigatā asaṅkhatā dhātū”ti
atk-s0508a1:91_13: ariyaphalanibbānāni vimuttiñāṇadassanena paṭipattiṃ avekkhamānā. Atha vā saccasampaṭivedhavasena
atk-s0508a1:91_14: yaṃ ariyena karaṇīyaṃ pariññādisoḷasavidhaṃ kiccaṃ aggaphale ṭhitena nipphāditattā
atk-s0508a1:91_15: pariyosāpitattā kataṃ nāma, evaṃ kataṃ taṃ paccavekkhantā. Etena pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:91_16: dassitaṃ. Purimanayena pana itarapaccavekkhaṇānīti ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇāni dassitāni honti.
atk-s0508a1:92_0: Imamatthanti ettha imanti sakalo theratherīgāthānaṃ attho attano itaresañca tattha
atk-s0508a1:92_1: sannipatitānaṃ dhammasaṅgāhakamahātherānaṃ buddhiyaṃ viparivattamānatāya āsanno paccakkhoti
atk-s0508a1:92_2: ca katvā vuttaṃ. Atthanti “channā me kuṭikā”tiādīhi gāthāhi vuccamānaṃ attūpanāyikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:92_4: kathesuṃ, taṃdīpaniyo idāni mayā vuccamānā tesaṃ bhāvitattānaṃ gāthā attūpanāyikā
atk-s0508a1:92_5: suṇāthāti yojanā. Te ca mahātherā evaṃ kathentā attano sammāpaṭipattipakāsanīhi gāthāhi
atk-s0508a1:92_6: sāsanassa ekantaniyyānikavibhāvanena parepi tattha sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ niyojentīti
atk-s0508a1:92_7: etamatthaṃ dīpeti āyasmā dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko, tathā dīpento ca imāhi gāthāhi tesaṃ
atk-s0508a1:92_8: thomanaṃ tāsañca tesaṃ vacanassa nidānabhāvena ṭhapanaṃ ṭhānagatamevāti dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:97_0: Idāni channā me kuṭikātiādinayappavattānaṃ theragāthānaṃ atthavaṇṇanā hoti. Sā panāyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:97_1: atthavaṇṇanā yasmā tāsaṃ tāsaṃ gāthānaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ pakāsetvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti
atk-s0508a1:97_2: suviññeyyā ca. Tasmā tattha tattha aṭṭhuppattiṃ pakāsetvā atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāmāti.
atk-s0508a1:98_0: Tattha channā me kuṭikātigāthāya kā uppatti? Vuccate – ito kira kappasatasahassamatthake
atk-s0508a1:98_1: anuppanneyeva padumuttare bhagavati lokanāthe haṃsavatīnāmake nagare aññatarassa
atk-s0508a1:98_2: brāhmaṇamahāsālassa eko putto uppajji. Tassa “nandamāṇavo”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto
atk-s0508a1:98_3: tayo vede uggaṇhitvā tattha sāraṃ apassanto attano parivārabhūtehi catucattālīsāya
atk-s0508a1:98_4: māṇavakasahassehi saddhiṃ pabbatapāde isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca
atk-s0508a1:98_5: ca abhiññāyo nibbattesi. Antevāsikānampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi. Tepi na cireneva jhānalābhino ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:99_0: Tena ca samayena padumuttaro bhagavā loke uppajjitvā haṃsavatīnagaraṃ upanissāya
atk-s0508a1:99_1: viharanto ekadivasaṃ paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento nandatāpasassa antevāsikajaṭilānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:99_2: arahattūpanissayaṃ nandatāpasassa ca dvīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa sāvakaṭṭhānantarassa
atk-s0508a1:99_3: patthanaṃ disvā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā pubbaṇhasamaye pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0508a1:99_4: aññaṃ kañci anāmantetvā sīho viya ekacaro nandatāpasassa antevāsikesu phalāphalatthāya
atk-s0508a1:99_5: gatesu “buddhabhāvaṃ me jānātū”ti passantasseva nandatāpasassa ākāsato otaritvā pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:99_6: patiṭṭhāsi. Nandatāpaso buddhānubhāvañceva lakkhaṇapāripūriñca disvā lakkhaṇamante
atk-s0508a1:99_7: sammasitvā “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato nāma agāraṃ ajjhāvasanto rājā hoti cakkavattī,
atk-s0508a1:99_8: pabbajanto loke vivaṭacchado sabbaññū buddho hoti. Ayaṃ purisājānīyo nissaṃsayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:99_9: buddhoti ñatvā paccuggamanaṃ katvā, pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, āsanaṃ paññāpetvā,
atk-s0508a1:99_10: adāsi. Nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane. Nandatāpasopi attano anucchavikaṃ āsanaṃ gahetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:100_0: Tasmiṃ samaye catucattālīsasahassajaṭilā paṇītapaṇītāni ojavantāni phalāphalāni gahetvā
atk-s0508a1:100_1: ācariyassa santikaṃ sampattā buddhānañceva ācariyassa ca nisinnāsanaṃ olokentā āhaṃsu
atk-s0508a1:100_2: – “ācariya, mayaṃ ‘imasmiṃ loke tumhehi mahantataro natthī’ti vicarāma, ayaṃ pana
atk-s0508a1:100_3: puriso tumhehi mahantataro maññe”ti. Nandatāpaso, “tātā, kiṃ vadetha, sāsapena saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:100_4: aṭṭhasaṭṭhisatasahassayojanubbedhaṃ sineruṃ upametuṃ icchatha, sabbaññubuddhena saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:100_5: mā maṃ upamitthā”ti āha. Atha te tāpasā “sace ayaṃ orako abhavissa, na amhākaṃ ācariyo
atk-s0508a1:100_6: evaṃ upamaṃ āhareyya, yāva mahā vatāyaṃ purisājānīyo”ti pādesu nipatitvā sirasā vandiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:100_7: Atha te ācariyo āha – “tātā, amhākaṃ buddhānaṃ anucchaviko deyyadhammo natthi, bhagavā
atk-s0508a1:100_8: ca bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ idhāgato, tasmā mayaṃ yathābalaṃ deyyadhammaṃ dassāma, tumhe
atk-s0508a1:100_9: yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ phalāphalaṃ ānītaṃ, taṃ taṃ āharathā”ti vatvā āharāpetvā hatthe dhovitvā
atk-s0508a1:100_10: sayaṃ tathāgatassa patte patiṭṭhāpesi. Satthārā phalāphale paṭiggahitamatte devatā
atk-s0508a1:100_11: dibbojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu. Tāpaso udakampi sayameva parissāvetvā adāsi. Tato bhojanakiccaṃ
atk-s0508a1:100_12: niṭṭhāpetvā nisinne satthari sabbe antevāsike pakkositvā satthu santike sāraṇīyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:100_13: kathaṃ kathento nisīdi. Satthā “bhikkhusaṅgho āgacchatū”ti cintesi. Bhikkhū satthu
atk-s0508a1:100_14: cittaṃ ñatvā satasahassamattā khīṇāsavā āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:101_0: Nandatāpaso antevāsike āmantesi – “tātā, buddhānaṃ nisinnāsanampi nīcaṃ, samaṇasatasahassassapi
atk-s0508a1:101_1: āsanaṃ natthi, tumhehi ajja uḷāraṃ bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca sakkāraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0508a1:101_2: pabbatapādato vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni āharathā”ti. Acinteyyattā iddhivisayassa
atk-s0508a1:101_3: muhutteneva vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni āharitvā buddhānaṃ yojanappamāṇaṃ pupphāsanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:101_4: paññāpesuṃ. Aggasāvakānaṃ tigāvutaṃ, sesabhikkhūnaṃ aḍḍhayojanikādibhedaṃ, saṅghanavakassa
atk-s0508a1:101_5: usabhamattaṃ ahosi. Evaṃ paññattesu āsanesu nandatāpaso tathāgatassa purato añjaliṃ
atk-s0508a1:101_6: paggayha ṭhito, “bhante, mayhaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya imaṃ pupphāsanaṃ abhiruhathā”ti
atk-s0508a1:101_7: āha. Nisīdi bhagavā pupphāsane. Evaṃ nisinne satthari satthu ākāraṃ ñatvā bhikkhū
atk-s0508a1:101_8: attano attano pattāsane nisīdiṃsu. Nandatāpaso mahantaṃ pupphachattaṃ gahetvā tathāgatassa
atk-s0508a1:101_9: matthake dhārento aṭṭhāsi. Satthā “tāpasānaṃ ayaṃ sakkāro mahapphalo hotū”ti nirodhasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:101_10: samāpajji. Satthu samāpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhikkhūpi samāpajjiṃsu. Tathāgate sattāhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:101_11: nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā nisinne antevāsikā bhikkhācārakāle sampatte vanamūlaphalāphalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:101_12: paribhuñjitvā sesakāle buddhānaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha tiṭṭhanti. Nandatāpaso pana bhikkhācārampi
atk-s0508a1:101_13: agantvā pupphachattaṃ dhārento sattāhaṃ pītisukheneva vītināmeti.
atk-s0508a1:102_0: Satthā nirodhato vuṭṭhāya araṇavihāriaṅgena dakkhiṇeyyaṅgena cāti dvīhi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ
atk-s0508a1:102_1: ekaṃ sāvakaṃ “isigaṇassa pupphāsanānumodanaṃ karohī”ti āṇāpesi. So cakkavattirañño
atk-s0508a1:102_2: santikā paṭiladdhamahālābho mahāyodho viya tuṭṭhamānaso attano visaye ṭhatvā tepiṭakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:102_3: buddhavacanaṃ sammasitvā anumodanaṃ akāsi. Tassa desanāvasāne satthā sayaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:102_4: desesi. Desanāpariyosāne sabbe catucattālīsasahassatāpasā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Satthā
atk-s0508a1:102_5: “etha, bhikkhavo”ti hatthaṃ pasāresi. Tesaṃ tāvadeva kesamassu antaradhāyi. Aṭṭha
atk-s0508a1:102_6: parikkhārā kāye paṭimukkāva ahesuṃ saṭṭhivassattherā viya satthāraṃ parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:102_7: Nandatāpaso pana vikkhittacittatāya visesaṃ nādhigacchi. Tassa kira araṇavihārittherassa
atk-s0508a1:102_8: santike dhammaṃ sotuṃ āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya “aho vatāhampi anāgate uppajjanakabuddhassa
atk-s0508a1:102_9: sāsane iminā sāvakena laddhadhuraṃ labheyya”nti cittaṃ udapādi. So tena parivitakkena
atk-s0508a1:102_10: maggaphalapaṭivedhaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi. Tathāgataṃ pana vanditvā sammukhe ṭhatvā āha
atk-s0508a1:102_11: – “bhante, yena bhikkhunā isigaṇassa pupphāsanānumodanā katā, ko nāmāyaṃ tumhākaṃ
atk-s0508a1:102_12: sāsane”ti. “Araṇavihāriaṅge dakkhiṇeyyaaṅge ca etadaggaṃ patto eso bhikkhū”ti. “Bhante,
atk-s0508a1:102_13: yvāyaṃ mayā sattāhaṃ pupphachattaṃ dhārentena sakkāro kato, tena adhikārena na aññaṃ
atk-s0508a1:102_14: sampattiṃ patthemi, anāgate pana ekassa buddhassa sāsane ayaṃ thero viya dvīhaṅgehi
atk-s0508a1:103_0: Satthā “samijjhissati nu, kho imassa tāpasassa patthanā”ti anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ pesetvā
atk-s0508a1:103_1: olokento kappasatasahassaṃ atikkamitvā samijjhanakabhāvaṃ disvā nandatāpasaṃ āha
atk-s0508a1:103_2: – “na te ayaṃ patthanā moghā bhavissati, anāgate kappasatasahassaṃ atikkamitvā gotamo
atk-s0508a1:103_3: nāma buddho uppajjissati, tassa santike samijjhissatī”ti vatvā dhammakathaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0508a1:103_4: bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto ākāsaṃ pakkhandi. Nandatāpaso yāva cakkhupathasamatikkamā satthāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:103_5: bhikkhusaṅghañca uddissa añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi. So aparabhāge kālena kālaṃ satthāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:103_6: upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ suṇi. Aparihīnajjhānova kālaṅkatvā brahmaloke nibbatto. Tato
atk-s0508a1:103_7: pana cuto aparānipi pañca jātisatāni pabbajitvā āraññako ahosi. Kassapasammāsambuddhakālepi
atk-s0508a1:103_8: pabbajitvā āraññako hutvā gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūresi. Etaṃ kira vattaṃ aparipūretvā
atk-s0508a1:103_9: mahāsāvakabhāvaṃ pāpuṇantā nāma natthi. Gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pana āgamaṭṭhakathāsu
atk-s0508a1:103_10: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. So vīsativassasahassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā kālaṅkatvā
atk-s0508a1:108: “Phalaṃ mūlañca paṇṇañca, na bhuñjāmi ahaṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:115: Muyhase mohanīye ca, nikkhamassu vanā tuvaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:117: Mā kho visuddhaṃ dūsesi, nikkhamassu vanā tuvaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:119: Ubhopi mā virādhesi, nikkhamassu vanā tuvaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:121: Neva gāme araññe vā, na hi taṃ kaṭṭhasammataṃ.
atk-s0508a1:122: “Chavālātūpamo tvaṃ si, na gihī nāpi saññato;
atk-s0508a1:123: Ubhato muttako ajja, nikkhamassu vanā tuvaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:124: “Siyā nu kho tava etaṃ, ko pajānāti te idaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:129: Saṃvāsaṃ alabhanto hi, kathaṃ jīvihisi tuvaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:131: Balī nāgo upagantvā, yūthā nīharate gajaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:132: “Yūthā vinissaṭo santo, sukhaṃ sātaṃ na vindati;
atk-s0508a1:135: Tehi tvaṃ nissaṭo santo, sukhaṃ sātaṃ na lacchasi.
atk-s0508a1:139: Tathā sīlavīhino tvaṃ, na jhāyissasi katthaci.
atk-s0508a1:141: Mattikaṃ pettikañcāpi, natthi te nihitaṃ dhanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:143: Evaṃ jīvihisi gehe, sādhu te taṃ na ruccati.
atk-s0508a1:157: Maṇi yathā jotiraso, ākāse caṅkamī tadā.
atk-s0508a1:161: Devo nu kho ayaṃ satto, udāhu manujo ayaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:162: “Na me suto vā diṭṭho vā, mahiyā ediso naro;
atk-s0508a1:163: Api mantapadaṃ atthi, ayaṃ satthā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:183: Bhoge te ūnatā natthi, buddhānussatiyā phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:185: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:189: Subhūti nāma nāmena, hessasi satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a1:203: Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, buddhānussatiyā phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:208: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā subhūtitthero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
atk-s0508a1:209_0: Evaṃ pana so tāvatiṃsabhavane aparāparaṃ uppajjanavasena dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0508a1:209_1: tato cuto manussaloke anekasatakkhattuṃ cakkavattirājā ca padesarājā ca hutvā uḷāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:209_2: manussasampattiṃ anubhavitvā atha amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṃ sumanaseṭṭhissa
atk-s0508a1:209_3: gehe anāthapiṇḍikassa kaniṭṭho hutvā nibbatti “subhūtī”tissa nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:210_0: Tena ca samayena amhākaṃ bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattavaradhammacakko anupubbena
atk-s0508a1:210_1: rājagahaṃ gantvā tattha veḷuvanapaṭiggahaṇādinā lokānuggahaṃ karonto rājagahaṃ upanissāya
atk-s0508a1:210_2: sītavane viharati. Tadā anāthapiṇḍiko seṭṭhi sāvatthiyaṃ uṭṭhānakabhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0508a1:210_3: attano sahāyassa rājagahaseṭṭhino gharaṃ gato buddhuppādaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ sītavane
atk-s0508a1:210_4: viharantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya satthāraṃ sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0508a1:210_5: āgamanatthāya yācitvā tato pañcacattālīsayojane magge yojane yojane satasahassapariccāgena
atk-s0508a1:210_6: vihāre patiṭṭhāpetvā sāvatthiyaṃ rājamānena aṭṭhakarīsappamāṇaṃ jetassa rājakumārassa
atk-s0508a1:210_7: uyyānabhūmiṃ koṭisanthārena kiṇitvā tattha bhagavato vihāraṃ kāretvā adāsi. Vihārapariggahaṇadivase
atk-s0508a1:210_8: ayaṃ subhūtikuṭumbiko anāthapiṇḍikaseṭṭhinā saddhiṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto saddhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:210_9: paṭilabhitvā pabbaji. So upasampajjitvā dve mātikā paguṇā katvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā
atk-s0508a1:210_10: araññe samaṇadhammaṃ karonto mettājhānapādakaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:210_11: So dhammaṃ desento yasmā satthārā desitaniyāmena anodissakaṃ katvā dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0508a1:210_12: Tasmā araṇavihārīnaṃ aggo nāma jāto. Piṇḍāya caranto ghare ghare mettājhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0508a1:210_13: vuṭṭhāya bhikkhaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti “evaṃ dāyakānaṃ mahapphalaṃ bhavissatī”ti. Tasmā dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:210_14: aggo nāma jāto. Tenāha bhagavā – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:210_15: araṇavihārīnaṃ yadidaṃ subhūti, dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ yadidaṃ subhūtī”ti. Evamayaṃ mahāthero
atk-s0508a1:210_16: arahatte patiṭṭhāya attanā pūritapāramīnaṃ phalassa matthakaṃ patvā loke abhiññāto
atk-s0508a1:210_17: abhilakkhito hutvā bahujanahitāya janapadacārikaṃ caranto anupubbena rājagahaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a1:211_0: Rājā bimbisāro therassa āgamanaṃ sutvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā “idheva, bhante, vasathā”ti
atk-s0508a1:211_1: vatvā “nivāsanaṭṭhānaṃ karissāmī”ti pakkanto vissari. Thero senāsanaṃ alabhanto abbhokāse
atk-s0508a1:211_2: vītināmesi. Therassa ānubhāvena devo na vassati. Manussā avuṭṭhitāya upaddutā rañño
atk-s0508a1:211_3: nivesanadvāre ukkuṭṭhimakaṃsu. Rājā “kena nu kho kāraṇena devo na vassatī”ti vīmaṃsanto
atk-s0508a1:211_4: “therassa abbhokāsavāsena maññe na vassatī”ti cintetvā tassa paṇṇakuṭiṃ kārāpetvā
atk-s0508a1:211_5: “imissā, bhante, paṇṇakuṭiyā vasathā”ti vatvā vanditvā pakkāmi. Thero kuṭikaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0508a1:211_6: tiṇasanthārake pallaṅkena nisīdi. Tadā pana devo thokaṃ thokaṃ phusāyati, na sammā
atk-s0508a1:211_7: dhāraṃ anuppavecchati. Atha thero lokassa avuṭṭhikabhayaṃ visamitukāmo attano ajjhattikabāhiravatthukassa
atk-s0508a1:213: “Channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā, vassa deva yathāsukhaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:214: Cittaṃ me susamāhitaṃ vimuttaṃ, ātāpī viharāmi vassa devā”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:216_0: Tattha channa-saddo tāva “channā sā kumārikā imassa kumārakassa” “nacchannaṃ nappatirūpa”ntiādīsu
atk-s0508a1:216_1: patirūpe āgato. “Channaṃ tveva, phagguṇa, phassāyatanāna”ntiādīsu vacanavisiṭṭhe
atk-s0508a1:216_3: nacchannopi karissāmī”tiādīsu nivāsanapārupane “āyasmā channo anācāraṃ ācaratī”tiādīsu
atk-s0508a1:216_4: paññattiyaṃ. “Sabbacchannaṃ sabbaparicchannaṃ, channā kuṭi āhito ginī”ti ca ādīsu
atk-s0508a1:216_5: tiṇādīhi chādane. Idhāpi tiṇādīhi chādaneyeva daṭṭhabbo, tasmā tiṇena vā paṇṇena
atk-s0508a1:216_6: vā channā yathā na vassati vassodakapatanaṃ na hoti na ovassati, evaṃ sammadeva chāditāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:217_0: Me-saddo “kicchena me adhigataṃ, halaṃ dāni pakāsitu”ntiādīsu karaṇe āgato, mayāti
atk-s0508a1:217_1: attho. “Tassa me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu sampadāne, mayhanti
atk-s0508a1:217_2: attho. “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato”ādīsu
atk-s0508a1:217_3: sāmiatthe āgato. Idhāpi sāmiatthe eva daṭṭhabbo, mamāti attho. Kiñcāpi khīṇāsavānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:217_4: mamāyitabbaṃ nāma kiñci natthi lokadhammehi anupalittabhāvato, lokasamaññāvasena
atk-s0508a1:217_5: pana tesampi “ahaṃ mamā”ti vohāramattaṃ hoti. Tenāha bhagavā – “kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā
atk-s0508a1:218: Kuṭikāti pana mātukucchipi karajakāyopi tiṇādicchadano patissayopi vuccati. Tathā hi –
atk-s0508a1:220: Putte santānake brūsi, taṇhā me brūsi bandhana”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:224_0: Ādīsu kesādisamūhabhūto karajakāyo. “Kassapassa bhagavato bhagini kuṭi ovassati”
atk-s0508a1:224_1: “kuṭi nāma ullittā vā hoti avalittā vā”tiādīsu tiṇachadanapatissayo. Idhāpi so eva
atk-s0508a1:224_2: veditabbo paṇṇasālāya adhippetattā. Kuṭi eva hi kuṭikā, apākaṭakuṭi “kuṭikā”ti vuttā.
atk-s0508a1:225_0: Sukha-saddo pana “vipiṭṭhikatvāna sukhaṃ dukhañca, pubbeva ca somanassadomanassa”ntiādīsu
atk-s0508a1:225_1: sukhavedanāyaṃ āgato. “Sukho buddhānamuppādo, sukhā saddhammadesanā”tiādīsu sukhamūle.
atk-s0508a1:225_3: ca, kho, mahāli, rūpaṃ sukhaṃ sukhānupatitaṃ sukhāvakkanta”ntiādīsu sukhārammaṇe,
atk-s0508a1:225_5: paramaṃ sukha”ntiādīsu nibbāne. “Yāvañcidaṃ, bhikkhave, na sukaraṃ akkhānena pāpuṇituṃ
atk-s0508a1:225_6: yāva sukhā saggā”tiādīsu sukhappaccayaṭṭhāne. “Sovaggikaṃ sukhavipākaṃ saggasaṃvattanika”ntiādīsu
atk-s0508a1:225_7: iṭṭhe, piyamanāpeti attho. Idhāpi iṭṭhe sukhappaccaye vā daṭṭhabbo. Sā hi kuṭi anto
atk-s0508a1:225_8: bahi ca manāpabhāvena sampāditā nivāsanaphāsutāya “sukhā”ti vuttā. Tathā nātisītanātiuṇhatāya
atk-s0508a1:226_0: Nivātāti avātā, phusitaggaḷapihitavātapānattā vātaparissayarahitāti attho. Idaṃ tassā
atk-s0508a1:226_1: kuṭikā sukhabhāvavibhāvanaṃ. Savāte hi senāsane utusappāyo na labbhati, nivāte so
atk-s0508a1:226_2: labbhatīti. Vassāti pavassa sammā dhāraṃ anuppaveccha. Devāti ayaṃ deva-saddo “imāni
atk-s0508a1:226_3: te, deva, caturāsīti nagarasahassāni kusavatīrājadhānippamukhāni, ettha, deva, chandaṃ
atk-s0508a1:226_4: janehi jīvite apekkha”ntiādīsu sammutideve khattiye āgato. “Cātumahārājikā devā vaṇṇavanto
atk-s0508a1:226_6: visuddhidevesu. Visuddhidevānañhi bhagavato atidevabhāve vutte itaresaṃ vutto eva
atk-s0508a1:226_7: hoti. “Viddhe vigatavalāhake deve”tiādīsu ākāse. “Devo ca kālena kālaṃ na sammā dhāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:226_8: anuppavecchatī”tiādīsu meghe pajjunne vā. Idhāpi meghe pajjunne vā daṭṭhabbo. Vassāti
atk-s0508a1:226_9: hi te āṇāpento thero ālapati. Yathāsukhanti yathāruciṃ. Tava vassanena mayhaṃ bāhiro
atk-s0508a1:226_10: parissayo natthi, tasmā yathākāmaṃ vassāti vassūpajīvisatte anuggaṇhanto vadati.
atk-s0508a1:227_0: Idāni abbhantare parissayābhāvaṃ dassento “citta”ntiādimāha. Tattha cittaṃ me susamāhitanti
atk-s0508a1:227_1: mama cittaṃ suṭṭhu ativiya sammā sammadeva ekaggabhāvena ārammaṇe ṭhapitaṃ. Tañca
atk-s0508a1:227_2: kho na nīvaraṇādivikkhambhanamattena; api ca kho vimuttaṃ orambhāgiyauddhaṃbhāgiyasaṅgahehi
atk-s0508a1:227_3: sabbasaṃyojanehi sabbakilesadhammato ca visesena vimuttaṃ, samucchedappahānavasena
atk-s0508a1:227_4: paṭipassaddhippahānavasena te pajahitvā ṭhitanti attho. Ātāpīti vīriyavā. Phalasamāpattiatthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:227_6: dibbavihārādīhi attabhāvaṃ pavattemi, na pana kilesappahānatthaṃ, pahātabbasseva
atk-s0508a1:227_7: abhāvatoti adhippāyo. “Yathā pana bāhiraparissayābhāvena, deva, mayā tvaṃ vassane
atk-s0508a1:227_8: niyojito, evaṃ abbhantaraparissayābhāvenapī”ti dassento punapi “vassa, devā”ti āha.
atk-s0508a1:228_0: Aparo nayo channāti chāditā pihitā. Kuṭikāti attabhāvo. So hi “anekāvayavassa samudāyassa
atk-s0508a1:228_1: avijjānīvaraṇassa, bhikkhave, puggalassa taṇhāsaṃyuttassa ayañceva kāyo samudāgato,
atk-s0508a1:228_2: bahiddhā ca nāmarūpa”ntiādīsu kāyoti āgato. “Siñca, bhikkhu, imaṃ nāvaṃ, sittā te
atk-s0508a1:228_3: lahumessatī”tiādīsu nāvāti āgato. “Gahakāraka diṭṭhosi, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhata”nti
atk-s0508a1:228_4: ca ādīsu gahanti āgato. “Satto guhāyaṃ bahunābhichanno, tiṭṭhaṃ naro mohanasmiṃ pagāḷho”tiādīsu
atk-s0508a1:228_5: guhāti āgato. “Nelaṅgo setapacchādo, ekāro vattatī ratho”tiādīsu rathoti āgato. “Puna
atk-s0508a1:228_6: gehaṃ na kāhasī”tiādīsu gehanti āgato. “Vivaṭā kuṭi nibbuto ginī”tiādīsu kuṭīti āgato.
atk-s0508a1:228_7: Tasmā idhāpi so “kuṭikā”ti vutto. Attabhāvo hi kaṭṭhādīni paṭicca labbhamānā gehanāmikā
atk-s0508a1:228_8: kuṭikā viya aṭṭhiādisaññite pathavīdhātuādike phassādike ca paṭicca labbhamāno “kuṭikā”ti
atk-s0508a1:232_0: Sā panesā attabhāvakuṭikā therassa tiṇṇaṃ channaṃ aṭṭhannañca asaṃvaradvārānaṃ vasena
atk-s0508a1:232_1: samati vijjhanakassa rāgādiavassutassa paññāya saṃvutattā sammadeva pihitattā “channā”ti
atk-s0508a1:232_2: vuttā. Tenāha bhagavā – “sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmi, paññāyete pidhīyare”ti. Vuttanayena
atk-s0508a1:232_3: channattā eva kilesadukkhābhāvato nirāmisasukhasamaṅgitāya ca sukhā sukhappattā,
atk-s0508a1:232_4: tato eva ca nivātā nihatamānamadathambhasārambhatāya nivātavuttikā. Ayañca nayo “mayhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:232_5: na saṃkilesadhammānaṃ saṃvaraṇamattena siddho, atha kho aggamaggasamādhinā suṭṭhu
atk-s0508a1:232_6: samāhitacittatāya ceva aggamaggapaññāya sabbasaṃyojanehi vippamuttacittatāya cā”ti
atk-s0508a1:232_7: dassento āha “cittaṃ me susamāhitaṃ vimutta”nti. Evaṃbhūto ca “idānāhaṃ katakaraṇīyo”ti
atk-s0508a1:232_8: na appossukko homi, atha kho ātāpī viharāmi, sadevakassa lokassa hitasukhūpasaṃhāre
atk-s0508a1:232_9: ussāhajāto bhikkhācārakālepi anugharaṃ brahmavihāreneva viharāmi. Tasmā tvampi, deva,
atk-s0508a1:232_10: pajjunna mayhaṃ piyaṃ kātukāmatāyapi vassūpajīvīnaṃ sattānaṃ anukampāyapi vassa sammā
atk-s0508a1:233_0: Ettha ca thero “channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā”ti iminā lokiyalokuttarabhedaṃ attano
atk-s0508a1:233_1: adhisīlasikkhaṃ dasseti. “Cittaṃ me susamāhita”nti iminā adhicittasikkhaṃ. “Vimutta”nti
atk-s0508a1:233_2: iminā adhipaññāsikkhaṃ. “Ātāpī viharāmī”ti iminā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ. Atha vā
atk-s0508a1:233_3: “channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā”ti iminā animittavihāraṃ dasseti kilesavassapidhānamukhena
atk-s0508a1:233_5: “Vimutta”nti iminā suññatavihāraṃ. “Ātāpī viharāmī”ti iminā tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vihārānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:233_6: adhigamūpāyaṃ. Paṭhamena vā dosappahānaṃ, dutiyena rāgappahānaṃ, tatiyena mohappahānaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:233_7: Tathā dutiyena paṭhamadutiyehi vā dhammavihārasampattiyo dasseti. Tatiyena vimuttisampattiyo.
atk-s0508a1:233_8: “Ātāpī viharāmī”ti iminā parahitapaṭipattiyaṃ atanditabhāvaṃ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:234_0: Evaṃ “yathānāmā”ti gāthāya vuttānaṃ dhammavihārādīnaṃ imāya gāthāya dassitattā tattha
atk-s0508a1:234_1: adassitesu nāmagottesu nāmaṃ dassetuṃ “itthaṃ suda”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Ye hi therā nāmamattena
atk-s0508a1:234_2: pākaṭā, te nāmena, ye gottamattena pākaṭā, te gottena, ye ubhayathā pākaṭā, te ubhayenapi
atk-s0508a1:234_3: dassissa”nti. Ayaṃ pana thero nāmena abhilakkhito, na tathā gottenāti “itthaṃ sudaṃ
atk-s0508a1:234_4: āyasmā subhūtī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha itthanti idaṃ pakāraṃ, iminā ākārenāti attho. Sudanti
atk-s0508a1:234_5: su idaṃ, sandhivasena ikāralopo. Sūti ca nipātamattaṃ, idaṃ gāthanti yojanā. Āyasmāti
atk-s0508a1:234_6: piyavacanametaṃ garugāravasappatissavacanametaṃ. Subhūtīti nāmakittanaṃ. So hi sarīrasampattiyāpi
atk-s0508a1:234_7: dassanīyo pāsādiko, guṇasampattiyāpi. Iti sundarāya sarīrāvayavavibhūtiyā sīlasampattiyādivibhūtiyā
atk-s0508a1:234_8: ca samannāgatattā subhūtīti paññāyittha sīlasārādithiraguṇayogato thero. Abhāsitthāti
atk-s0508a1:234_9: kathesi. Kasmā panete mahātherā attano guṇe pakāsentīti? Iminā dīghena addhunā anadhigatapubbaṃ
atk-s0508a1:234_10: paramagambhīraṃ ativiya santaṃ paṇītaṃ attanā adhigataṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0508a1:234_12: ariyā attano guṇe pakāsenti, yathā taṃ lokanātho bodhaneyyaajjhāsayavasena “dasabalasamannāgato,
atk-s0508a1:234_13: bhikkhave, tathāgato catuvesārajjavisārado”tiādinā attano guṇe pakāseti, evamayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:238_0: Upasantoti āyasmato mahākoṭṭhikattherassa gāthā. Tassa kā uppatti? Ayampi thero padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:238_1: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:238_2: accayena kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekadivasaṃ padumuttarassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:238_3: dhammadesanākāle haṃsavatīnagaravāsike gandhamālādihatthe yena buddho yena dhammo
atk-s0508a1:238_4: yena saṅgho, tanninne tappoṇe tappabbhāre gacchante disvā mahājanena saddhiṃ upagato
atk-s0508a1:238_5: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “ayaṃ kira
atk-s0508a1:238_6: imasmiṃ sāsane paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ aggo, aho vatāhampi ekassa buddhassa sāsane ayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:238_7: viya paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti cintetvā satthu desanāpariyosāne vuṭṭhitāya
atk-s0508a1:238_8: parisāya bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante, sve mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti nimantesi.
atk-s0508a1:238_9: Satthā adhivāsesi. So bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā sakanivesanaṃ gantvā
atk-s0508a1:238_10: sabbarattiṃ buddhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa ca nisajjaṭṭhānaṃ gandhadāmamālādāmādīhi alaṅkaritvā
atk-s0508a1:238_11: paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā tassā rattiyā accayena sake nivesane
atk-s0508a1:238_13: gandhasālibhojanaṃ bhojetvā bhattakiccapariyosāne cintesi – “mahantaṃ, kho, ahaṃ
atk-s0508a1:238_14: ṭhānantaraṃ patthemi na kho pana mayhaṃ yuttaṃ ekadivasameva dānaṃ datvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ
atk-s0508a1:238_15: patthetuṃ, anupaṭipāṭiyā satta divase dānaṃ datvā patthessāmī”ti. So teneva niyāmena
atk-s0508a1:238_16: satta divase mahādānāni datvā bhattakiccapariyosāne dussakoṭṭhāgāraṃ vivarāpetvā
atk-s0508a1:238_17: uttamaṃ ticīvarappahonakaṃ sukhumavatthaṃ buddhassa pādamūle ṭhapetvā bhikkhusatasahassassa
atk-s0508a1:238_18: ca ticīvaraṃ datvā tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante, yo so bhikkhu tumhehi ito sattamadivasamatthake
atk-s0508a1:238_19: etadagge ṭhapito, ahampi so bhikkhu viya anāgate uppajjanakabuddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:238_20: paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti vatvā satthu pādamūle nipajjitvā patthanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:238_21: akāsi. Satthā tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “anāgate ito kappasatasahassamatthake
atk-s0508a1:238_22: gotamo nāma buddho loke uppajjissati, tassa sāsane tava patthanā samijjhissatī”ti
atk-s0508a1:250: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:254: Atthe dhamme nirutte ca, paṭibhāne ca kovidaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:258: Nipacca pādamūlamhi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthayiṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:266: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:268: Koṭṭhiko nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a1:269: “Taṃ sutvā mudito hutvā, yāvajīvaṃ tadā jinaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:276: Sabbattha sukhito āsiṃ, tassa kammassa vāhasā.
atk-s0508a1:278: Aññaṃ gatiṃ na gacchāmi, suciṇṇassa idaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:280: Nīce kule na jāyāmi, suciṇṇassa idaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:284: Yadā me pitaraṃ buddho, vinayī sabbasuddhiyā.
atk-s0508a1:290: Pabhinnā tena lokaggo, etadagge ṭhapesi maṃ.
atk-s0508a1:295: “Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
atk-s0508a1:296: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:299_0: Evaṃ so tattha tattha bhave puññañāṇasambhāraṃ sambharanto aparāparaṃ devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:299_1: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti. Koṭṭhikotissa
atk-s0508a1:299_2: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā brāhmaṇasippe nipphattiṃ gato ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:299_3: satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā upasampannakālato
atk-s0508a1:299_4: paṭṭhāya vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā paṭisambhidāsu
atk-s0508a1:299_5: ciṇṇavasī hutvā abhiññāte abhiññāte mahāthere upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchantopi dasabalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:299_6: upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchantopi paṭisambhidāsuyeva pañhaṃ pucchi. Evamayaṃ thero
atk-s0508a1:299_7: tattha katādhikāratāya ciṇṇavasībhāvena ca paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ aggo jāto. Atha naṃ
atk-s0508a1:299_8: satthā mahāvedallasuttaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi
atk-s0508a1:299_9: – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākoṭṭhiko”ti.
atk-s0508a1:299_10: So aparena samayena vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedento udānavasena –
atk-s0508a1:303: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā mahākoṭṭhikatthero gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:304_0: Tattha upasantoti manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ upasamanena nibbisevanabhāvakaraṇena
atk-s0508a1:304_1: upasanto. Uparatoti sabbasmā pāpakaraṇato orato virato. Mantabhāṇīti mantā vuccati
atk-s0508a1:304_2: paññā, tāya pana upaparikkhitvā bhaṇatīti mantabhāṇī, kālavādīādibhāvaṃ avissajjentoyeva
atk-s0508a1:304_3: bhaṇatīti attho. Mantabhaṇanavasena vā bhaṇatīti mantabhāṇī, dubbhāsitato vinā attano
atk-s0508a1:304_4: bhāsanavasena caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ subhāsitaṃyeva bhaṇatīti attho. Jātiādivasena
atk-s0508a1:304_5: attano anukkaṃsanato na uddhatoti anuddhato atha vā tiṇṇaṃ kāyaduccaritānaṃ vūpasamanena
atk-s0508a1:304_6: tato paṭiviratiyā upasanto, tiṇṇaṃ manoduccaritānaṃ uparamaṇena pajahanena uparato,
atk-s0508a1:304_7: catunnaṃ vacīduccaritānaṃ appavattiyā parimitabhāṇitāya mantabhāṇī, tividhaduccaritanimittauppajjanakassa
atk-s0508a1:304_8: uddhaccassa abhāvato anuddhato. Evaṃ pana tividhaduccaritappahānena suddhe sīle patiṭṭhito,
atk-s0508a1:304_9: uddhaccappahānena samāhito, tameva samādhiṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0508a1:304_10: maggapaṭipāṭiyā dhunāti pāpake dhamme lāmakaṭṭhena pāpake sabbepi saṃkilesadhamme
atk-s0508a1:304_11: niddhunāti, samucchedavasena pajahati. Yathā kiṃ? Dumapattaṃva māluto, yathā nāma
atk-s0508a1:304_12: dumassa rukkhassa pattaṃ paṇḍupalāsaṃ māluto vāto dhunāti, bandhanato viyojento nīharati,
atk-s0508a1:304_13: evaṃ yathāvuttapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhito pāpadhamme attano santānato nīharati, evamayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:305_0: Ettha ca kāyavacīduccaritappahānavacanena payogasuddhiṃ dasseti, manoduccaritappahānavacanena
atk-s0508a1:305_2: tadekaṭṭhatāya nīvaraṇappahānaṃ dasseti. Tesu payogasuddhiyā sīlasampatti vibhāvitā,
atk-s0508a1:305_4: “dhunāti pāpake dhamme”ti iminā paññābhāvanā vibhāvitā hoti. Evaṃ adhisīlasikkhādayo
atk-s0508a1:305_5: tisso sikkhā, tividhakalyāṇaṃ sāsanaṃ, tadaṅgappahānādīni tīṇi pahānāni, antadvayaparivajjanena
atk-s0508a1:305_6: saddhiṃ majjhimāya paṭipattiyā paṭipajjanaṃ, apāyabhavādīnaṃ samatikkamanūpāyo ca
atk-s0508a1:305_7: yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yojetabbā. Iminā nayena sesagāthāsupi yathārahaṃ atthayojanā
atk-s0508a1:305_8: veditabbā. Atthamattameva pana tattha tattha apubbaṃ vaṇṇayissāma. “Itthaṃ sudaṃ
atk-s0508a1:305_9: āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko”ti idaṃ pūjāvacanaṃ, yathā taṃ mahāmoggallānoti.
atk-s0508a1:308_0: Paññaṃ imaṃ passāti āyasmato kaṅkhārevatassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi thero padumuttarabhagavato
atk-s0508a1:308_1: kāle haṃsavatīnagare brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatto. Ekadivasaṃ buddhānaṃ dhammadesanākāle
atk-s0508a1:308_2: heṭṭhā vuttanayena mahājanena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:308_3: suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ jhānābhiratānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi
atk-s0508a1:308_4: anāgate evarūpena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā desanāvasāne satthāraṃ nimantetvā
atk-s0508a1:308_5: heṭṭhā vuttanayena mahāsakkāraṃ katvā bhagavantaṃ āha – “bhante, ahaṃ iminā adhikārakammena
atk-s0508a1:308_6: aññaṃ sampattiṃ na patthemi, yathā pana so bhikkhu tumhehi ito sattamadivasamatthake
atk-s0508a1:308_7: jhāyīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito, evaṃ ahampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane jhāyīnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:308_8: aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanamakāsi. Satthā anāgataṃ oloketvā nipphajjanabhāvaṃ disvā
atk-s0508a1:308_9: “anāgate kappasatasahassāvasāne gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati, tassa sāsane tvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:309_0: So yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ
atk-s0508a1:309_1: bhagavato kāle sāvatthinagare mahābhogakule nibbatto pacchābhattaṃ dhammassavanatthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:309_2: gacchantena mahājanena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dasabalassa dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0508a1:309_3: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā upasampadaṃ labhitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā jhānaparikammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:309_4: karonto jhānalābhī hutvā jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. So yebhuyyena dasabalena
atk-s0508a1:309_5: samāpajjitabbasamāpattiṃ samāpajjanto ahorattaṃ jhānesu ciṇṇavasī ahosi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0508a1:309_6: satthā “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ yadidaṃ kaṅkhārevato”ti
atk-s0508a1:309_7: jhāyīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Vuttampi cetaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:323: Mudito hohi tvaṃ brahme, lacchase taṃ manorathaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:325: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:327: Revato nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a1:330: “Pacchime ca bhave dāni, jātohaṃ koliye pure;
atk-s0508a1:334: “Kaṅkhā me bahulā āsi, kappākappe tahiṃ tahiṃ;
atk-s0508a1:335: Sabbaṃ taṃ vinayī buddho, desetvā dhammamuttamaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:337: Viharāmi tadā buddho, maṃ disvā etadabravi.
atk-s0508a1:338: “Yā kāci kaṅkhā idha vā huraṃ vā, savediyā vā paravediyā vā;
atk-s0508a1:339: Ye jhāyino tā pajahanti sabbā, ātāpino brahmacariyaṃ carantā.
atk-s0508a1:340: “Satasahasse kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha;
atk-s0508a1:346: “Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
atk-s0508a1:347: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:350_0: Tathā katakicco panāyaṃ mahāthero pubbe dīgharattaṃ attano kaṅkhāpakatacittataṃ idāni
atk-s0508a1:350_1: sabbaso vigatakaṅkhatañca paccavekkhitvā “aho nūna mayhaṃ satthuno desanānubhāvo,
atk-s0508a1:350_2: tenetarahi evaṃ vigatakaṅkho ajjhattaṃ vūpasantacitto jāto”ti sañjātabahumāno bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:350_3: paññaṃ pasaṃsanto “paññaṃ imaṃ passā”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:351_0: 3. Tattha paññanti pakāre jānāti, pakārehi ñāpetīti ca paññā. Veneyyānaṃ āsayānusayacariyādhimuttiādippakāre
atk-s0508a1:351_1: dhammānaṃ kusalādike khandhādike ca desetabbappakāre jānāti, yathāsabhāvato paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0508a1:351_2: tehi ca pakārehi ñāpetīti attho. Satthu desanāñāṇañhi idhādhippetaṃ, tenāha “ima”nti.
atk-s0508a1:351_3: Tañhi attani siddhena desanābalena nayaggāhato paccakkhaṃ viya upaṭṭhitaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0508a1:351_4: “ima”nti vuttaṃ. Yadaggena vā satthu desanāñāṇaṃ sāvakehi nayato gayhati, tadaggena
atk-s0508a1:351_5: attano visaye paṭivedhañāṇampi nayato gayhateva. Tenāha āyasmā dhammasenāpati – “apica
atk-s0508a1:351_6: me, bhante, dhammanvayo vidito”ti. Passāti vimhayappatto aniyamato ālapati attanoyeva
atk-s0508a1:351_7: vā cittaṃ, yathāha bhagavā udānento – “lokamimaṃ passa; puthū avijjāya paretaṃ bhūtaṃ
atk-s0508a1:351_8: bhūtarataṃ bhavā aparimutta”nti. Tathāgatānanti tathā āgamanādiatthena tathāgatānaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:351_9: Tathā āgatoti hi tathāgato, tathā gatoti tathāgato, tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato,
atk-s0508a1:351_10: tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato, tathadassitāya tathāgato, tathavāditāya
atk-s0508a1:351_11: tathāgato, tathākāritāya tathāgato, abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgatoti evaṃ aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi
atk-s0508a1:351_12: bhagavā tathāgato. Tathāya āgatoti tathāgato, tathāya gatoti tathāgato, tathalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:351_13: gatoti tathāgato, tathāni āgatoti tathāgato, tathāvidhoti tathāgato, tathā pavattitoti
atk-s0508a1:351_14: tathāgato, tathehi āgatoti tathāgato, tathā gatabhāvena tathāgatoti evampi aṭṭhahi
atk-s0508a1:351_15: kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgatoti ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana paramatthadīpaniyā
atk-s0508a1:352_0: Idāni tassā paññāya asādhāraṇavisesaṃ dassetuṃ “aggi yathā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yathā aggīti
atk-s0508a1:352_1: upamāvacanaṃ. Yathāti tassa upamābhāvadassanaṃ. Pajjalitoti upameyyena sambandhadassanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:352_2: Nisītheti kiccakaraṇakāladassanaṃ. Ayañhettha attho – yathā nāma nisīthe rattiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:352_3: caturaṅgasamannāgate andhakāre vattamāne unnate ṭhāne pajjalito aggi tasmiṃ padese
atk-s0508a1:352_4: tayagataṃ vidhamantaṃ tiṭṭhati, evameva tathāgatānaṃ imaṃ desanāñāṇasaṅkhātaṃ sabbaso
atk-s0508a1:352_5: veneyyānaṃ saṃsayatamaṃ vidhamantaṃ paññaṃ passāti. Yato desanāvilāsena sattānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:352_6: ñāṇamayaṃ ālokaṃ dentīti ālokadā. Paññāmayameva cakkhuṃ dadantīti cakkhudadā. Tadubhayampi
atk-s0508a1:352_7: kaṅkhāvinayapadaṭṭhānameva katvā dassento “ye āgatānaṃ vinayanti kaṅkha”nti āha,
atk-s0508a1:352_8: ye tathāgatā attano santikaṃ āgatānaṃ upagatānaṃ veneyyānaṃ “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”ntiādinayappavattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:352_10: kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchaṃ vinayanti desanānubhāvena anavasesato vidhamanti viddhaṃsenti.
atk-s0508a1:352_11: Vinayakukkuccasaṅkhātā pana kaṅkhā tabbinayeneva vinītā hontīti.
atk-s0508a1:353_0: Aparo nayo – yathā aggi nisīthe rattibhāge pajjalito paṭutarajālo samujjalaṃ uccāsane
atk-s0508a1:353_1: ṭhitānaṃ obhāsadānamattena andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā samavisamaṃ vibhāvento ālokadado
atk-s0508a1:353_2: hoti. Accāsanne pana ṭhitānaṃ taṃ supākaṭaṃ karonto cakkhukiccakaraṇato cakkhudado
atk-s0508a1:353_3: nāma hoti, evameva tathāgato attano dhammakāyassa dūre ṭhitānaṃ akatādhikārānaṃ paññāpajjotena
atk-s0508a1:353_4: mohandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā kāyavisamādisamavisamaṃ vibhāvento ālokadā bhavanti, āsanne
atk-s0508a1:353_5: ṭhitānaṃ pana katādhikārānaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ uppādento cakkhudadā bhavanti. Ye evaṃbhūtā
atk-s0508a1:353_6: attano vacīgocaraṃ āgatānaṃ mādisānampi kaṅkhābahulānaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vinayanti ariyamaggasamuppādanena
atk-s0508a1:353_7: vidhamanti, tesaṃ tathāgatānaṃ paññaṃ ñāṇātisayaṃ passāti yojanā. Evamayaṃ therassa
atk-s0508a1:353_8: attano kaṅkhāvitaraṇappakāsanena aññābyākaraṇagāthāpi hoti. Ayañhi thero puthujjanakāle
atk-s0508a1:353_9: kappiyepi kukkuccako hutvā kaṅkhābahulatāya “kaṅkhārevato”ti paññāto, pacchā khīṇāsavakālepi
atk-s0508a1:353_10: tatheva voharayittha. Tenāha – “itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā kaṅkhārevato gāthaṃ abhāsitthā”ti. Taṃ vuttatthameva.
atk-s0508a1:356_0: Sabbhireva samāsethāti āyasmato puṇṇattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:356_1: dasabalassa uppattito puretarameva haṃsavatīnagare brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatto
atk-s0508a1:356_2: anukkamena viññutaṃ patto satthari loke uppajjante ekadivasaṃ buddhānaṃ dhammadesanākāle
atk-s0508a1:356_3: heṭṭhā vuttanayena mahājanena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante nisīditvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:356_4: suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ dhammakathikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi
atk-s0508a1:356_5: anāgate evarūpena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā desanāvasāne vuṭṭhitāya parisāya satthāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:356_6: upasaṅkamitvā nimantetvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva mahāsakkāraṃ katvā bhagavantaṃ evamāha
atk-s0508a1:356_7: – “bhante, ahaṃ iminā adhikārakammena nāññaṃ sampattiṃ patthemi. Yathā pana so bhikkhu
atk-s0508a1:356_8: ito sattamadivasamatthake dhammakathikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito, evaṃ ahampi anāgate
atk-s0508a1:356_9: ekassa buddhassa sāsane dhammakathikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:356_10: Satthā anāgataṃ oloketvā tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “anāgate kappasatasahassamatthake
atk-s0508a1:356_11: gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati, tassa sāsane tvaṃ pabbajitvā dhammakathikānaṃ aggo
atk-s0508a1:357_0: So tattha yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇadhammaṃ katvā tato cuto kappasatasahassaṃ puññañāṇasambhāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:357_1: sambharanto devamanussesu saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle kapilavatthunagarassa
atk-s0508a1:357_3: bhāgineyyo hutvā nibbatti. Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase “puṇṇo”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So satthari
atk-s0508a1:357_4: abhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattavaradhammacakke anupubbena rājagahaṃ gantvā taṃ upanissāya
atk-s0508a1:357_5: viharante aññāsikoṇḍaññattherassa santike pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado sabbaṃ pubbakiccaṃ
atk-s0508a1:357_6: katvā padhānamanuyuñjanto pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvāva “dasabalassa santikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:357_7: gamissāmī”ti mātulattherena saddhiṃ satthu santikaṃ agantvā kapilavatthusāmantāyeva
atk-s0508a1:357_8: ohīyitvā yonisomanasikāre kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:365: Sabbe sissā attamanā, sutvāna mama bhāsato.
atk-s0508a1:373_0: Tassa pana puṇṇattherassa santike pabbajitā kulaputtā pañcasatā ahesuṃ. Thero sayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:373_1: dasakathāvatthulābhitāya tepi dasahi kathāvatthūhi ovadi. Te tassa ovāde ṭhatvā sabbeva
atk-s0508a1:373_2: arahattaṃ pattā. Te attano pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakappattaṃ ñatvā upajjhāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a1:373_3: āhaṃsu – “bhante, amhākaṃ kiccaṃ matthakappattaṃ, dasannañcamha kathāvatthūnaṃ lābhino,
atk-s0508a1:373_4: samayo, dāni no dasabalaṃ passitu”nti. Thero tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā cintesi – “mama
atk-s0508a1:373_5: dasakathāvatthulābhitaṃ satthā jānāti ahaṃ dhammaṃ desento dasa kathāvatthūni amuñcitvāva
atk-s0508a1:373_6: desemi, mayi gacchante sabbepime bhikkhū maṃ parivāretvā gacchissanti, evaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya
atk-s0508a1:373_7: gantvā pana ayuttaṃ mayhaṃ dasabalaṃ passituṃ, ime tāva gantvā passantū”ti te bhikkhū
atk-s0508a1:373_8: āha – “āvuso, tumhe purato gantvā tathāgataṃ passatha, mama vacanena cassa pāde vandatha,
atk-s0508a1:373_9: ahampi tumhākaṃ gatamaggenāgamissāmī”ti. Te therā sabbepi dasabalassa jātibhūmiraṭṭhavāsino
atk-s0508a1:373_10: sabbe khīṇāsavā sabbe dasakathāvatthulābhino attano upajjhāyassa ovādaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0508a1:373_11: theraṃ vanditvā anupubbena cārikaṃ carantā saṭṭhiyojanamaggaṃ atikkamma rājagahe
atk-s0508a1:373_12: veḷuvanamahāvihāraṃ gantvā dasabalassa pāde vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:374_0: Āciṇṇaṃ kho panetaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisammoditunti
atk-s0508a1:374_1: bhagavā tehi saddhiṃ – “kacci, bhikkhave, khamanīya”ntiādinā nayena madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:374_2: katvā “kuto ca tumhe, bhikkhave, āgacchathā”ti pucchi. Atha tehi “jātibhūmito”ti
atk-s0508a1:374_3: vutte “ko nu kho, bhikkhave, jātibhūmiyaṃ jātibhūmakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:374_4: evaṃ sambhāvito ‘attanā ca appiccho appicchakathañca bhikkhūnaṃ kattā”’ti dasakathāvatthulābhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:374_5: bhikkhuṃ pucchi. Tepi “puṇṇo nāma, bhante, āyasmā mantāṇiputto”ti ārocayiṃsu. Taṃ
atk-s0508a1:374_6: kathaṃ sutvā āyasmā sāriputto therassa dassanakāmo ahosi. Atha satthā rājagahato
atk-s0508a1:374_7: sāvatthiṃ agamāsi. Puṇṇattheropi dasabalassa tattha āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā – “satthāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:374_8: passissāmī”ti gantvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃyeva tathāgataṃ sampāpuṇi. Satthā tassa dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:374_9: desesi. Thero dhammaṃ sutvā dasabalaṃ vanditvā paṭisallānatthāya andhavanaṃ gantvā
atk-s0508a1:375_0: Sāriputtattheropi tassāgamanaṃ sutvā sīsānulokiko gantvā okāsaṃ sallakkhetvā taṃ
atk-s0508a1:375_1: rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ upasaṅkamitvā therena saddhiṃ sammoditvā, taṃ sattavisuddhikkamaṃ
atk-s0508a1:375_2: pucchi. Theropissa pucchitapucchitaṃ byākaronto rathavinītūpamāya cittaṃ ārādhesi,
atk-s0508a1:375_3: te aññamaññassa subhāsitaṃ samanumodiṃsu. Atha satthā aparabhāge bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe
atk-s0508a1:375_4: nisinno theraṃ “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:375_5: yadidaṃ puṇṇo”ti dhammakathikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. So ekadivasaṃ attano vimuttisampattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:375_6: paccavekkhitvā “satthāraṃ nissāya ahañceva aññe ca bahū sattā saṃsāradukkhato vippamuttā,
atk-s0508a1:375_7: bahūpakārā vata sappurisasaṃsevā”ti pītisomanassajāto udānavasena pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:376_0: 4. Tattha sabbhirevāti sappurisehi eva. Santoti panettha buddhādayo ariyā adhippetā.
atk-s0508a1:376_1: Te hi anavasesato asataṃ dhammaṃ pahāya saddhamme ukkaṃsagatattā sātisayaṃ pasaṃsiyattā
atk-s0508a1:376_2: ca visesato “santo sappurisā”ti ca vuccanti. Samāsethāti samaṃ āsetha saha vaseyya.
atk-s0508a1:376_3: Te payirupāsanto tesaṃ sussūsanto diṭṭhānugatiñca āpajjanto samānavāso bhaveyyāti
atk-s0508a1:376_4: attho. Paṇḍitehatthadassibhīti tesaṃ thomanā. Paṇḍā vuccati paññā, sā imesaṃ sañjātāti
atk-s0508a1:376_5: paṇḍitā. Tato eva attatthādibhedaṃ atthaṃ aviparītato passantīti atthadassino. Tehi
atk-s0508a1:376_6: paṇḍitehi atthadassībhi samāsetha. Kasmāti ce? Yasmā te santo paṇḍitā, te vā sammā
atk-s0508a1:376_7: sevantā ekantahitabhāvato maggañāṇādīheva araṇīyato atthaṃ, mahāguṇatāya santatāya
atk-s0508a1:376_8: ca mahantaṃ, agādhabhāvato gambhīrañāṇagocarato ca gambhīraṃ, hīnacchandādīhi daṭṭhuṃ
atk-s0508a1:376_9: asakkuṇeyyattā itarehi ca kicchena daṭṭhabbattā duddasaṃ, duddasattā saṇhanipuṇasabhāvattā
atk-s0508a1:376_10: nipuṇañāṇagocarato ca nipuṇaṃ, nipuṇattā evaṃ sukhumasabhāvatāya aṇuṃ nibbānaṃ, aviparītaṭṭhena
atk-s0508a1:376_11: vā paramatthasabhāvattā atthaṃ, ariyabhāvakarattā mahattanimittatāya mahantaṃ, anuttānasabhāvatāya
atk-s0508a1:376_12: gambhīraṃ, dukkhena daṭṭhabbaṃ na sukhena daṭṭhuṃ sakkāti duddasaṃ, gambhīrattā duddasaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:376_13: duddasattā gambhīranti catusaccaṃ, visesato nipuṇaṃ aṇuṃ, nirodhasaccanti evametaṃ
atk-s0508a1:376_14: catusaccaṃ dhīrā samadhigacchanti dhitisampannatāya dhīrā catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:376_15: ussukkāpetvā sammadeva adhigacchanti. Appamattāti sabbattha satiavippavāsena appamādapaṭipattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:376_16: pūrentā. Vicakkhaṇāti vipassanābhāvanāya chekā kusalā. Tasmā sabbhireva samāsethāti
atk-s0508a1:376_17: yojanā. Paṇḍitehatthadassibhīti vā etaṃ nissakkavacanaṃ. Yasmā paṇḍitehi atthadassībhi
atk-s0508a1:376_18: samudāyabhūtehi dhīrā appamattā vicakkhaṇā mahantādivisesavantaṃ atthaṃ samadhigacchanti,
atk-s0508a1:376_19: tasmā tādisehi sabbhireva samāsethāti sambandho. Evamesā therassa paṭivedhadīpanena
atk-s0508a1:379_0: Yo duddamiyoti āyasmato dabbattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi padumuttarabuddhakāle
atk-s0508a1:379_1: haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:379_2: suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ senāsanapaññāpakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:379_3: katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā satthārā byākato yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:379_4: saṃsaritvā kassapadasabalassa sāsanosakkanakāle pabbaji. Tadā tena saddhiṃ apare
atk-s0508a1:379_5: cha janāti satta bhikkhū ekacittā hutvā aññe sāsane agāravaṃ karonte disvā – “idha
atk-s0508a1:379_6: kiṃ karoma ekamante samaṇadhammaṃ katvā dukkhassantaṃ karissāmā”ti nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0508a1:379_7: uccaṃ pabbatasikharaṃ āruhitvā, “attano cittabalaṃ jānantā nisseṇiṃ nipātentu, jīvite
atk-s0508a1:379_8: sālayā otarantu, mā pacchānutappino ahuvatthā”ti vatvā sabbe ekacittā hutvā nisseṇiṃ
atk-s0508a1:379_9: pātetvā – “appamattā hotha, āvuso”ti aññamaññaṃ ovaditvā cittarucikesu ṭhānesu nisīditvā
atk-s0508a1:380_0: Tatreko thero pañcame divase arahattaṃ patvā, “mama kiccaṃ nipphannaṃ, ahaṃ imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:380_1: ṭhāne kiṃ karissāmi”ti iddhiyā uttarakuruto piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā, “āvuso, imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0508a1:380_2: paribhuñjatha, bhikkhācārakiccaṃ mamāyattaṃ hotu, tumhe attano kammaṃ karothā”ti
atk-s0508a1:380_3: āha. “Kiṃ nu kho mayaṃ, āvuso, nisseṇiṃ pātentā evaṃ avocumha – ‘yo paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:380_4: sacchikaroti, so bhikkhaṃ āharatu, tenābhataṃ sesā paribhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karissantī”’ti.
atk-s0508a1:380_5: “Natthi, āvuso”ti. Tumhe attano pubbahetunā labhittha, mayampi sakkontā vaṭṭassantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:380_6: karissāma, gacchatha tumheti. Thero te saññāpetuṃ asakkonto phāsukaṭṭhāne piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0508a1:380_7: paribhuñjitvā gato. Aparo thero sattame divase anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā tato cuto suddhāvāsabrahmaloke
atk-s0508a1:380_8: nibbatto. Itare therā tato cutā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā tesu tesu
atk-s0508a1:380_9: kulesu nibbattā. Eko gandhāraraṭṭhe takkasilānagare rājagehe nibbatto, eko majjhantikaraṭṭhe
atk-s0508a1:380_10: paribbājikāya kucchimhi nibbatto, eko bāhiyaraṭṭhe kuṭumbiyagehe nibbatto, eko bhikkhunupassaye jāto.
atk-s0508a1:381_0: Ayaṃ pana dabbatthero mallaraṭṭhe anupiyanagare ekassa mallarañño gehe paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:381_1: gaṇhi. Tassa mātā upavijaññā kālamakāsi, matasarīraṃ susānaṃ netvā dārucitakaṃ āropetvā
atk-s0508a1:381_2: aggiṃ adaṃsu. Tassā aggivegasantattaṃ udarapaṭalaṃ dvedhā ahosi. Dārako attano puññabalena
atk-s0508a1:381_3: uppatitvā ekasmiṃ dabbatthambhe nipati. Taṃ dārakaṃ gahetvā ayyikāya adaṃsu. Sā tassa
atk-s0508a1:381_4: nāmaṃ gaṇhantī dabbatthambhe patitvā laddhajīvitattā “dabbo”tissa nāmaṃ akāsi. Tassa
atk-s0508a1:381_5: ca sattavassikakāle satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro mallaraṭṭhe cārikaṃ caramāno anupiyambavane
atk-s0508a1:381_6: viharati. Dabbakumāro satthāraṃ disvā dassaneneva pasīditvā pabbajitukāmo hutvā “ahaṃ
atk-s0508a1:381_7: dasabalassa santike pabbajissāmī”ti ayyikaṃ āpucchi. Sā “sādhu, tātā”ti dabbakumāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:381_8: ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā, “bhante, imaṃ kumāraṃ pabbājethā”ti āha. Satthā aññatarassa
atk-s0508a1:381_9: bhikkhuno saññaṃ adāsi – “bhikkhu imaṃ dārakaṃ pabbājehī”ti. So thero satthu vacanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:381_10: sutvā dabbakumāraṃ pabbājento tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi. Pubbahetusampanno
atk-s0508a1:381_11: katābhinīhāro satto paṭhamakesavaṭṭiyā voropanakkhaṇe sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi,
atk-s0508a1:381_12: dutiyāya kesavaṭṭiyā oropiyamānāya sakadāgāmiphale, tatiyāya anāgāmiphale, sabbakesānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:381_13: pana oropanañca arahattaphalasacchikiriyā ca apacchā apure ahosi. Satthā mallaraṭṭhe
atk-s0508a1:381_14: yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā rājagahaṃ gantvā veḷuvane vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0508a1:382_0: Tatrāyasmā dabbo mallaputto rahogato attano kiccanipphattiṃ oloketvā saṅghassa veyyāvaccakaraṇe
atk-s0508a1:382_1: kāyaṃ yojetukāmo cintesi – “yaṃnūnāhaṃ saṅghassa senāsanañca paññāpeyyaṃ bhattāni
atk-s0508a1:382_2: ca uddiseyya”nti. So satthu santikaṃ gantvā attano parivitakkaṃ ārocesi. Satthā tassa
atk-s0508a1:382_3: sādhukāraṃ datvā senāsanapaññāpakattañca bhattuddesakattañca sampaṭicchi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0508a1:382_4: “ayaṃ dabbo daharova samāno mahante ṭhāne ṭhito”ti sattavassikakāleyeva upasampādesi.
atk-s0508a1:382_5: Thero upasampannakālato paṭṭhāya rājagahaṃ upanissāya viharantānaṃ sabbabhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:382_6: senāsanāni ca paññāpeti, bhikkhañca uddisati. Tassa senāsanapaññāpakabhāvo sabbadisāsu
atk-s0508a1:382_7: pākaṭo ahosi – “dabbo kira mallaputto sabhāgasabhāgānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ekaṭṭhāne senāsanāni
atk-s0508a1:382_8: paññāpeti, āsannepi dūrepi senāsanaṃ paññāpeti, gantuṃ asakkonte iddhiyā netī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:383_0: Atha naṃ bhikkhū kālepi vikālepi – “amhākaṃ, āvuso, jīvakambavane senāsanaṃ paññāpehi,
atk-s0508a1:383_1: amhākaṃ maddakucchismiṃ migadāye”ti evaṃ senāsanaṃ uddisāpetvā tassa iddhiṃ passantā
atk-s0508a1:383_2: gacchanti. Sopi iddhiyā manomaye kāye abhisaṅkharitvā ekekassa therassa ekekaṃ attanā
atk-s0508a1:383_3: sadisaṃ bhikkhuṃ datvā aṅguliyā jalamānāya purato gantvā “ayaṃ mañco idaṃ pīṭha”ntiādīni
atk-s0508a1:383_4: vatvā senāsanaṃ paññāpetvā puna attano vasanaṭṭhānameva āgacchati. Ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-s0508a1:383_5: vitthārato panidaṃ vatthu pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva. Satthā idameva kāraṇaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:383_6: katvā aparabhāge ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno theraṃ senāsanapaññāpakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi
atk-s0508a1:383_7: – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanapaññāpakānaṃ yadidaṃ dabbo
atk-s0508a1:395: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:407: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:415: Sabbattha sukhito āsiṃ, tassa kammassa vāhasā.
atk-s0508a1:423: Kassapo nāma gottena, uppajji vadataṃ varo.
atk-s0508a1:429: Na suṇissāma saddhammaṃ, aho no appapuññatā.
atk-s0508a1:431: Sāgaro ca sasokova, vinadī karuṇaṃ giraṃ.
atk-s0508a1:435: Sadhūmā jālavaṭṭā ca, raviṃsu karuṇaṃ migā.
atk-s0508a1:437: Saṃviggā bhikkhavo satta, cintayimha mayaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a1:445: Tasmā payogo kattabbo, yāva ṭhāti mune mataṃ.
atk-s0508a1:449: Ahañca pakkusāti ca, sabhiyo bāhiyo tathā.
atk-s0508a1:453: Mātā matā citāruḷhā, tato nippatito ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:461: Jino tasmiṃ guṇe tuṭṭho, etadagge ṭhapesi maṃ.
atk-s0508a1:465: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:467_0: Evaṃbhūtaṃ pana taṃ yena pubbe ekassa khīṇāsavattherassa anuddhaṃsanavasena katena
atk-s0508a1:467_1: pāpakammena bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye pacci, tāya eva kammapilotikāya codiyamānā
atk-s0508a1:467_2: mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū “iminā mayaṃ kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino antare paribheditā”ti
atk-s0508a1:467_3: duggahitagāhino amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsesuṃ. Tasmiñca adhikaraṇe
atk-s0508a1:467_4: saṅghena sativinayena vūpasamite ayaṃ thero lokānukampāya attano guṇe vibhāvento
atk-s0508a1:468_0: 5. Tattha yoti aniyamitaniddeso, tassa “so”ti iminā niyamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ubhayenapi
atk-s0508a1:468_1: aññaṃ viya katvā attānameva vadati. Duddamiyoti duddamo, dametuṃ asakkuṇeyyo. Idañca
atk-s0508a1:468_2: attano puthujjanakāle diṭṭhigatānaṃ visūkāyikānaṃ kilesānaṃ madālepacittassa vipphanditaṃ
atk-s0508a1:468_3: indriyānaṃ avūpasamanañca cintetvā vadati. Damenāti uttamena aggamaggadamena, tena
atk-s0508a1:468_4: hi danto puna dametabbatābhāvato “danto”ti vattabbataṃ arahati, na aññena. Atha vā
atk-s0508a1:468_5: damenāti damakena purisadammasārathinā damito. Dabboti drabyo, bhabboti attho. Tenāha
atk-s0508a1:468_6: bhagavā imameva theraṃ sandhāya – “na kho, dabba, dabbā evaṃ nibbeṭhentī”ti. Santusitoti
atk-s0508a1:468_8: Vitiṇṇakaṅkhoti soḷasavatthukāya aṭṭhavatthukāya ca kaṅkhāya paṭhamamaggeneva samugghāṭitattā
atk-s0508a1:468_9: vigatakaṅkho. Vijitāvīti purisājānīyena vijetabbassa sabbassapi saṃkilesapakkhassa
