atk-s0508a1:932_2: Theropi sakapitarā pesitaṃ gāthaṃ aṅkusaṃ katvā ghaṭento vāyamanto arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:932_3: Aññaṃ byākarontopi pitupūjanatthaṃ “kacci no vatthapasuto”ti tameva gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:933_0: 28. Tattha kaccīti pucchāyaṃ nipāto. Noti paṭisedhe. Vatthapasutoti vatthe pasuto
atk-s0508a1:933_2: adhippetattā. “Kacci na vatthapasuto”tipi pāṭho, so evattho. Bhūsanāratoti attabhāvavibhūsanāya
atk-s0508a1:933_3: rato abhirato, yathekacce pabbajitvāpi capalā kāyadaḷhibahulā cīvarādiparikkhārassa
atk-s0508a1:933_4: attano sarīrassa ca maṇḍanavibhūsanaṭṭhānāya yuttā honti. Kimeva parikkhārapasuto
atk-s0508a1:933_5: bhūsanārato ca nāhosīti ayamettha padadvayassāpi attho. Sīlamayaṃ gandhanti akhaṇḍādibhāvāpādanena
atk-s0508a1:933_6: suparisuddhassa catubbidhassapi sīlassa vasena yvāyaṃ “yo ca sīlavataṃ pajāti na
atk-s0508a1:933_7: itarā dussīlapajā, dussīlattāyeva dussilyamayaṃ duggandhaṃ vāyati, evaṃ tvaṃ duggandhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:933_8: avāyitvā kacci sīlamayaṃ gandhaṃ vāyasīti attho. Atha vā netarā pajāti na itarā dussīlapajā,
atk-s0508a1:933_9: taṃ kacci na hoti, yato sīlamayaṃ gandhaṃ vāyasīti byatirekena sīlagandhavāyanameva vibhāveti.
atk-s0508a1:936_0: Samunnamayamattānanti āyasmato hāritattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:936_1: katādhikāro hutvā tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññasambhāraṃ upacinanto ito ekatiṃse
atk-s0508a1:936_2: kappe sudassanaṃ nāma paccekasambuddhaṃ disvā pasannamānaso kuṭajapupphehi pūjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:936_3: katvā tena puññakammena sugatīsuyeva parivattento imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthinagare
atk-s0508a1:936_4: brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti. Hāritotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. Tassa vayappattassa mātāpitaro
atk-s0508a1:936_5: kularūpādīhi anucchavikaṃ kumārikaṃ brāhmaṇadhītaraṃ ānesuṃ. So tāya saddhiṃ bhogasukhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:936_6: anubhavanto ekadivasaṃ attano tassā ca rūpasampattiṃ oloketvā dhammatāya codiyamāno
atk-s0508a1:936_7: “īdisaṃ nāma rūpaṃ nacirasseva jarāya maccunā ca abhippamaddīyatī”ti saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0508a1:936_8: Katipayadivasātikkameneva cassa bhariyaṃ kaṇhasappo ḍaṃsitvā māresi. So tena bhiyyosomattāya
atk-s0508a1:936_9: sañjātasaṃvego satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā gharabandhane chinditvā pabbaji.
atk-s0508a1:936_10: Tassa ca cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā viharantassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ na sampajjati,
atk-s0508a1:936_11: cittaṃ ujugataṃ na hoti. So gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho aññataraṃ usukāraṃ usudaṇḍaṃ yante
atk-s0508a1:936_12: pakkhipitvā ujuṃ karontaṃ disvā “ime acetanampi nāma ujuṃ karonti, kasmā ahaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0508a1:936_13: ujuṃ na karissāmī”ti cintetvā tatova paṭinivattitvā divāṭṭhāne nisinno vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:936_14: ārabhi. Athassa bhagavā upari ākāse nisīditvā ovādaṃ dento “samunnamayamattāna”nti
atk-s0508a1:936_15: gāthaṃ abhāsi. Ayameva thero attānaṃ paraṃ viya ovadanto abhāsīti ca vadanti.
atk-s0508a1:937_0: 29. Tattha samunnamayanti sammā unnamento, samāpattivasena kosajjapakkhe patituṃ
atk-s0508a1:937_1: adatvā tato uddharanto vīriyasamataṃ yojentoti attho. Attānanti cittaṃ, atha vā samunnamayāti
atk-s0508a1:937_2: kosajjapakkhato samunnamehi. Ma-kāro padasandhikaro. Hīnavīriyatāya tava cittaṃ kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ
atk-s0508a1:937_3: nappaṭipajjati ce, taṃ vīriyārambhavasena sammā unnamehi, anonataṃ anapanataṃ karohīti
atk-s0508a1:937_4: adhippāyo. Evaṃ pana karonto usukārova tejanaṃ. Cittaṃ ujuṃ karitvāna, avijjaṃ bhinda
atk-s0508a1:937_5: hāritāti. Yathā nāma usukāro kaṇḍaṃ īsakampi onataṃ apanatañca vijjhanto lakkhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:937_6: bhindanatthaṃ ujuṃ karoti, evaṃ kosajjapātato arakkhaṇena onataṃ uddhaccapātato arakkhaṇena
atk-s0508a1:937_7: apanataṃ vijjhanto appanāpattiyā cittaṃ ujuṃ karitvāna samāhitacitto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā
atk-s0508a1:937_8: sīghaṃ aggamaggañāṇena avijjaṃ bhinda padālehīti. Taṃ sutvā thero vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0508a1:937_9: nacireneva arahā ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:947: Arahattaṃ pana patvā aññaṃ byākarontopi tameva gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:950_0: Ābādhe me samuppanneti āyasmato uttiyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:950_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito catunavute kappe
atk-s0508a1:950_2: siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle candabhāgāya nadiyā mahārūpo susumāro hutvā nibbatto.
atk-s0508a1:950_3: So pāraṃ gantuṃ nadiyā tīraṃ upagataṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannacitto pāraṃ netukāmo
atk-s0508a1:950_4: tīrasamīpe nipajji. Bhagavā tassa anukampāya piṭṭhiyaṃ pāde ṭhapesi. So haṭṭho udaggo
atk-s0508a1:950_5: pītivegena diguṇussāho hutvā sotaṃ chindanto sīghena javena bhagavantaṃ paratīraṃ
atk-s0508a1:950_6: nesi. Bhagavā tassa cittappasādaṃ oloketvā “ayaṃ ito cuto devaloke nibbattitvā tato
atk-s0508a1:950_7: paṭṭhāya sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto ito catunavute kappe amataṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:951_0: So tathā sugatīsuyeva paribbhamanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0508a1:951_1: putto hutvā nibbatti uttiyo nāma nāmena. So vayappatto “amataṃ pariyesissāmī”ti paribbājako
atk-s0508a1:951_2: hutvā vicaranto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā sāsane pabbajitvāpi
atk-s0508a1:951_3: sīlādīnaṃ avisodhitattā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto aññe bhikkhū visesaṃ nibbattetvā
atk-s0508a1:951_4: aññaṃ byākaronte disvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā saṅkhepeneva ovādaṃ yāci. Satthāpi
atk-s0508a1:951_5: tassa “tasmātiha tvaṃ, uttiya, ādimeva visodhehī”tiādinā saṅkhepeneva ovādaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:951_6: So tassa ovāde ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ ārabhi. Tassa āraddhavipassanassa ābādho uppajji.
atk-s0508a1:951_7: Uppanne pana ābādhe sañjātasaṃvego vīriyārambhavatthuṃ katvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto
atk-s0508a1:951_8: vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:973: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano sammā paṭipattiyā paripuṇṇākāravibhāvanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto “ābādhe me samuppanne”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:974_0: 30. Tattha ābādhe me samuppanneti sarīrassa ābādhanato “ābādho”ti laddhanāme visabhāgadhātukkhobhahetuke
atk-s0508a1:974_1: roge mayhaṃ sañjāte. Sati me udapajjathāti “uppanno kho me ābādho, ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ
atk-s0508a1:974_2: vijjati, yadidaṃ ābādho vaḍḍheyya. Yāva panāyaṃ ābādho na vaḍḍhati, handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:974_3: ārabhāmi ‘appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā”’ti
atk-s0508a1:974_4: vīriyārambhavatthubhūtā sati tasseva ābādhassa vasena dukkhāya vedanāya pīḷiyamānassa
atk-s0508a1:974_5: mayhaṃ udapādi. Tenāha “ābodho me samuppanno, kālo me nappamajjitu”nti. Evaṃ uppannañhi
atk-s0508a1:974_6: satiṃ aṅkusaṃ katvā ayaṃ thero arahattaṃ pattoti.
atk-s0508a1:979_0: Phuṭṭho ḍaṃsehīti āyasmato gahvaratīriyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:979_1: katādhikāro ito ekatiṃse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle migaluddo hutvā araññe vicaranto
atk-s0508a1:979_2: addasa sikhiṃ bhagavantaṃ aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle devanāgayakkhānaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:979_3: disvā pana pasannamānaso “dhammo esa vuccatī”ti sare nimittaṃ aggahesi. So tena cittappasādena
atk-s0508a1:979_4: devaloke uppanno puna aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:979_5: brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā “aggidatto”ti laddhanāmo vayappatto bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:979_6: disvā sañjātappasādo sāsane pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gahvaratīre nāma araññaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a1:979_7: vasati. Tenassa gahvaratīrayoti samaññā ahosi. So vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:985: Tattha cittaṃ pasādetvā, uttariṃ duttaraṃ bhavaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:989_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā sāvatthiyaṃ agamāsi. Tassa āgatabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:989_1: sutvā ñātakā upagantvā mahādānaṃ pavattesuṃ. So katipayadivase vasitvā araññameva
atk-s0508a1:989_2: gantukāmo ahosi. Taṃ ñātakā, “bhante, araññaṃ nāma ḍaṃsamakasādivasena bahuparissayaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:989_3: idheva vasathā”ti āhaṃsu. Taṃ sutvā thero “araññavāsoyeva mayhaṃ ruccatī”ti vivekābhiratikittanamukhena
atk-s0508a1:990_0: 31. Tattha phuṭṭho ḍaṃsehi makasehīti ḍaṃsanasīlatāya “ḍaṃsā”ti laddhanāmāhi andhakamakkhikāhi,
atk-s0508a1:990_1: makasanaññitehi ca sūcimukhapāṇehi phussito daṭṭhoti attho. Araññasminti “pañcadhanusatikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:990_3: mahāvane araññāniyaṃ. Nāgo saṅgāmasīsevāti saṅgāmāvacaro hatthināgo viya saṅgāmamuddhani
atk-s0508a1:990_4: parasenāsampahāraṃ. “Araññavāso nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇito thomito”ti ussāhajāto sato
atk-s0508a1:990_5: satimā hutvā tatra tasmiṃ araññe, tasmiṃ vā ḍaṃsādisamphasse upaṭṭhite adhivāsaye
atk-s0508a1:990_6: adhivāseyya saheyya, “ḍaṃsādayo maṃ ābādhentī”ti araññavāsaṃ na jaheyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:993_0: Ajaraṃ jīramānenāti āyasmato suppiyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:993_1: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññāyatane vasanto
atk-s0508a1:993_2: tattha bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso phalāphalaṃ adāsi, tathā bhikkhusaṅghassa.
atk-s0508a1:993_3: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa kāle khattiyakule
atk-s0508a1:993_4: nibbattitvā anukkamena viññutaṃ patto kalyāṇamittasannissayena laddhasaṃvego sāsane
atk-s0508a1:993_5: pabbajitvā bahussuto ahosi. Jātimadena sutamadena ca attānaṃ ukkaṃsento pare ca vambhento
atk-s0508a1:993_6: vihāsi. So imasmiṃ buddhuppāde tassa kammassa nissandena sāvatthiyaṃ paribhūtarūpe
atk-s0508a1:993_7: susānagopakakule nibbatti. Suppiyotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. Atha viññutaṃ patto attano sahāyabhūtaṃ
atk-s0508a1:993_8: sopākattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaṃvego pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:994_0: 32. Tattha ajaranti jarārahitaṃ, nibbānaṃ sandhāyāha. Tañhi ajātattā natthi ettha
atk-s0508a1:994_1: jarā, etasmiṃ vā adhigate puggalassa sā natthīti jarābhāvahetutopi ajaraṃ nāma. Jīramānenāti
atk-s0508a1:994_2: jīrantena, khaṇe khaṇe jaraṃ pāpuṇantena. Tappamānenāti santappamānena, rāgādīhi
atk-s0508a1:994_3: ekādasahi aggīhi dayhamānena. Nibbutinti yathāvuttasantāpābhāvato nibbutasabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:994_4: nibbānaṃ. Nimiyanti parivatteyyaṃ cetāpeyyaṃ. Paramaṃ santinti anavasesakilesābhisaṅkhārapariḷāhavūpasamadhammatāya
atk-s0508a1:994_5: uttamaṃ santiṃ. Catūhi yogehi ananubandhattā yogakkhemaṃ. Attano uttaritarassa kassaci
atk-s0508a1:994_6: abhāvato anuttaraṃ. Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho – khaṇe khaṇe jarāya abhibhuyyamānattā
atk-s0508a1:994_7: jīramānena, tathā rāgaggiādīhi santappamānena gato evaṃ aniccena dukkhena asārena
atk-s0508a1:994_8: sabbathāpi anupasantasabhāvena saupaddavena, tappaṭipakkhabhāvato ajaraṃ paramupasamabhūtaṃ
atk-s0508a1:994_9: kenaci anupaddutaṃ anuttaraṃ nibbānaṃ nimiyaṃ parivatteyyaṃ “mahā vata me lābho mahā
atk-s0508a1:994_10: udayo hatthagato”ti. Yathā hi manussā yaṃ kiñci bhaṇḍaṃ parivattentā nirapekkhā gayhamānena
atk-s0508a1:994_11: sambahumānā honti, evamayaṃ thero pahitatto viharanto attano kāye ca jīvite ca nirapekkhataṃ,
atk-s0508a1:994_12: nibbānaṃ paṭipesitattañca pakāsento “nimiyaṃ paramaṃ santiṃ, yogakkhemaṃ anuttara”nti
atk-s0508a1:994_13: vatvā tameva paṭipattiṃ paribrūhayanto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1008: Paribhutte ca saṅghamhi, puññaṃ tava bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:1014: Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, phaladānassidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1020: Kumbhaṇḍā garuḷā cāpi, pāricariyaṃ upenti me.
atk-s0508a1:1021: “Kummā soṇā madhukārā, ḍaṃsā ca makasā ubho;
atk-s0508a1:1024: Tepi maṃ saraṇaṃ yanti, phaladānassidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1030: Sabbe maṃ saraṇaṃ yanti, phaladānassidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1044: Arahattaṃ pana patvāpi tameva gāthaṃ aññābyākaraṇavasena abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1047_0: Yathāpi ekaputtasminti āyasmato sopākattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:1047_1: katādhikāro hutvā tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto kakusandhassa
atk-s0508a1:1047_2: bhagavato kāle aññatarassa kuṭumbikassa putto hutvā nibbatto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:1047_3: disvā pasannacitto bījapūraphalāni satthu upanesi. Paṭiggahesi bhagavā anukampaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1047_4: upādāya. So bhikkhusaṅghe ca abhippasanno salākabhattaṃ paṭṭhapetvā saṅghuddesavasena
atk-s0508a1:1047_5: tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ khīrabhattaṃ adāsi. So tehi puññakammehi aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1047_6: devamanussesu sampattiṃ anubhavanto ekadā manussayoniyaṃ nibbatto ekassa paccekabuddhassa
atk-s0508a1:1047_7: khīrabhattaṃ adāsi. Evaṃ tattha tattha puññāni katvā sugatīsu eva paribbhamanto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1047_8: buddhuppāde purimakammanissandena sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarāya duggatitthiyā kucchimhi
atk-s0508a1:1047_9: paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Tassa mātā dasa māse kucchinā pariharitvā paripakke gabbhe vijāyanakāle
atk-s0508a1:1047_10: vijāyituṃ asakkontī mucchaṃ āpajjitvā bahuvelaṃ matā viya nipajji. Taṃ ñātakā “matā”ti
atk-s0508a1:1047_11: saññāya susānaṃ netvā citakaṃ āropetvā devatānubhāvena vātavuṭṭhiyā uṭṭhitāya aggiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1047_12: adatvā pakkamiṃsu. Dārako pacchimabhāvikattā devatānubhāvena mātukucchito arogo nikkhami.
atk-s0508a1:1047_13: Mātā pana kālamakāsi. Devatā taṃ gahetvā manussarūpena susānagopakassa gehe ṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a1:1047_14: katipayakālaṃ patirūpena āhārena posesi. Tato paraṃ susānagopako ca naṃ attano puttaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1047_15: katvā vaḍḍheti. So tathā vaḍḍhento tassa puttena supiyena nāma dārakena saddhiṃ kīḷanto
atk-s0508a1:1047_16: vicarati. Tassa susāne jātasaṃvaḍḍhabhāvato sopākoti samaññā ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:1048_0: Athekadivasaṃ sattavassikaṃ taṃ bhagavā paccūsavelāya ñāṇajālaṃ pattharitvā veneyyabandhave
atk-s0508a1:1048_1: oloketvā ñāṇajalantogadhaṃ disvā susānaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Dārako pubbahetunā codiyamāno
atk-s0508a1:1048_2: pasannamānaso satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Satthā tassa dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0508a1:1048_3: So dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā “pitarā anuññātosī”ti vutto pitaraṃ satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1048_4: nesi. Tassa pitā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā “bhante, imaṃ dārakaṃ pabbājethā”ti
atk-s0508a1:1048_5: anujāni. Satthā taṃ pabbājetvā mettābhāvanāya niyojesi. So mettākammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0508a1:1048_6: susāne viharanto ca cirasseva mettājhānaṃ nibbattetvā jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1048_7: vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1058: Arahā hutvā pana aññesaṃ sosānikabhikkhūnaṃ mettābhāvanāvidhiṃ dassento “yathāpi ekaputtasmi”nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1059_0: 33. Tattha yathāti opammatthe nipāto. Ekaputtasminti punāti ca kulavaṃsaṃ tāyati
atk-s0508a1:1059_1: cāti putto, atrajādibhedo putto. Eko putto ekaputto, tasmiṃ ekaputtasmiṃ. Visaye
atk-s0508a1:1059_2: cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Piyasminti piyāyitabbatāya ceva ekaputtatāya ca rūpasīlācārādīhi
atk-s0508a1:1059_3: ca pemakaraṇaṭṭhānabhūte. Kusalīti kusalaṃ vuccati khemaṃ sotthibhāvo, taṃ labhitabbaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1059_4: etassa atthīti kusalī, sattānaṃ hitesī mettajjhāsayo. Sabbesu pāṇesūti sabbesu sattesu.
atk-s0508a1:1059_5: Sabbatthāti sabbāsu disāsu sabbesu vā bhavādīsu, sabbāsu vā avatthāsu. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1059_6: hoti – yathā ekaputtake piye manāpe mātāpitā kusalī ekantahitesī bhaveyya, evaṃ puratthimādibhedāsu
atk-s0508a1:1059_7: sabbāsu disāsu, kāmabhavādibhedesu sabbesu bhavesu daharādibhedāsu sabbāsu avatthāsu
atk-s0508a1:1059_8: ca ṭhitesu sabbesu sattesu ekantahitesitāya kusalī bhaveyya, “mitto udāsīno pañcatthiko”ti
atk-s0508a1:1059_9: sīmaṃ akatvā sīmāsambhedavasena sabbattha ekarasaṃ mettaṃ bhāveyyāti. Imaṃ pana gāthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1059_10: vatvā “sace tumhe āyasmanto evaṃ mettābhāvanaṃ anuyuñjeyyātha, ye te bhagavatā ‘sukhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1059_11: supatī’tiādinā ekādasa mettānisaṃsā vuttā, ekaṃsena tesaṃ bhāgino bhavathā”ti ovādamadāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1062_0: Anāsannavarāti āyasmato posiyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:1062_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ bahuṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā sugatīsu eva
atk-s0508a1:1062_2: saṃsaranto ito dvenavute kappe tissassa bhagavato kāle migaluddo hutvā araññe vicarati.
atk-s0508a1:1062_3: Atha bhagavā tassa anuggahaṃ kātuṃ araññaṃ gantvā tassa cakkhupathe attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0508a1:1062_4: So bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannacitto āvudhaṃ nikkhipitvā upasaṅkamitvā añjaliṃ paggayha
atk-s0508a1:1062_5: aṭṭhāsi. Bhagavā nisīditukāmataṃ dassesi. So tāvadeva tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā same bhūmibhāge
atk-s0508a1:1062_6: sakkaccaṃ santharitvā adāsi. Nisīdi tattha bhagavā anukampaṃ upādāya. Nisinne pana
atk-s0508a1:1062_7: bhagavati anappakaṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedento bhagavantaṃ vanditvā sayampi ekamantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1062_8: nisīdi. Atha bhagavā “ettakaṃ vaṭṭati imassa kusalabīja”nti uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:1062_9: Acirapakkante bhagavati taṃ sīho migarājā ghātesi. So kālaṅkato devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:1062_10: “So kira bhagavati anupagacchante sīhena ghātito niraye nibbattissatī”ti taṃ disvā
atk-s0508a1:1063_0: So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato devalokato cavitvā sugatīsuyeva parivattento imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1063_1: buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhino putto saṅgāmajitattherassa
atk-s0508a1:1063_2: kaniṭṭhabhātā hutvā nibbatti. Posiyotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto dārapariggahaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1063_3: katvā ekaṃ puttaṃ labhitvā antimabhavikatāya dhammatāya codiyamāno jātiādiṃ paṭicca
atk-s0508a1:1063_4: uppannasaṃvego pabbajitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā vūpakaṭṭho hutvā catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1063_5: anuyuñjanto nacirasseva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1071: Sohena pothito, santo tattha kālaṅkato ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1083_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā bhagavantaṃ vandituṃ sāvatthiṃ āgato ñātiṃ anukampāya ñātigehaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1083_1: agamāsi. Tattha naṃ purāṇadutiyikā vanditvā āsanadānādinā paṭhamaṃ upāsikā viya vattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1083_2: dassetvā therassa ajjhāsayaṃ ajānantī pacchā itthikuttādīhi palobhetukāmā ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:1083_3: Thero “aho andhabālā mādisepi nāma evaṃ paṭipajjatī”ti cintetvā kiñci avatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0508a1:1083_4: araññameva gato. Taṃ āraññakā bhikkhū “kiṃ, āvuso, atilahuṃ, nivattosi, ñātakehi
atk-s0508a1:1083_5: na diṭṭhosī”ti pucchiṃsu. Thero tattha pavattiṃ ācikkhanto “anāsannavarā etā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1084_0: 34. Tattha anāsannavarāti etā itthiyo na āsannā anupagatā, dūre eva vā ṭhitā hutvā
atk-s0508a1:1084_1: varā purisassa seṭṭhā hitāvahā, tañca kho niccameva sabbakālameva, na rattimeva,
atk-s0508a1:1084_2: na divāpi, na rahovelāyapi. Vijānatāti vijānantena. “Anāsannaparā”tipi pāḷi, so evattho.
atk-s0508a1:1084_4: anupasaṅkamanto varā seṭṭhā, na anatthāvahā, te pana upasaṅkamantā diṭṭhadhammikaṃyeva
atk-s0508a1:1084_5: anatthaṃ kareyyuṃ. Itthiyo pana upasaṅkamitvā diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikaṃ vimokkhanissitampi
atk-s0508a1:1084_6: atthaṃ vināsetvā mahantaṃ anatthaṃ āpādenti, tasmā anāsannavarā etā niccameva vijānatāti.
atk-s0508a1:1084_7: Idāni tamatthaṃ attūpanāyikaṃ katvā dassento “gāmā”tiādimāha. Tattha gāmāti gāmaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1084_8: Upayogatthe hi etaṃ nissakkavacanaṃ. Araññamāgammāti araññato āgantvā. Ma-kāro padasandhikaro,
atk-s0508a1:1084_9: nissakke cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Tatoti mañcakato. Anāmantetvāti anālapitvā purāṇadutiyikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1084_10: “appamattā hohī”ti ettakampi avatvā. Posiyoti attānameva paraṃ viya vadati. Ye pana
atk-s0508a1:1084_11: “pakkāmi”nti paṭhanti, tesaṃ ahaṃ posiyo pakkāminti yojanā. Ye pana “sā itthī theraṃ
atk-s0508a1:1084_12: gharaṃ upagataṃ bhojetvā palobhetukāmā jātā, taṃ disvā thero tāvadeva gehato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0508a1:1084_13: vihāraṃ gantvā attano vasanaṭṭhāne mañcake nisīdi. Sāpi kho itthī pacchābhattaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattā
atk-s0508a1:1084_14: vihāre therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ upasaṅkami. Taṃ disvā thero kiñci avatvā uṭṭhāya divāṭṭhānameva
atk-s0508a1:1084_15: gato”ti vadanti, tesaṃ “gāmā araññamāgammā”ti gāthāpadassa attho yathārutavaseneva
atk-s0508a1:1087_0: Sukhaṃ sukhatthoti āyasmato sāmaññakānittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:1087_1: katādhikāro hutvā tattha tattha bhave kusalaṃ upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa
atk-s0508a1:1087_2: bhagavato kāle manussayoniyaṃ nibbatto vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso ekaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1087_3: mañcaṃ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde aññatarassa
atk-s0508a1:1087_4: paribbājakassa putto hutvā nibbatti. Sāmaññakānītissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So viññutaṃ patto
atk-s0508a1:1087_5: satthu yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā pasannamānaso sāsane pabbajitvā cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1087_6: gahetvā jhānaṃ nibbattetvā jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1089: Ekaṃ mañcaṃ mayā dinnaṃ, pasannena sapāṇinā.
atk-s0508a1:1095_0: Therassa pana gihisahāyako kātiyāno nāma paribbājako buddhuppādato paṭṭhāya titthiyānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1095_1: hatalābhasakkāratāya ghāsacchādanamattampi alabhanto ājīvakāpakato theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a1:1095_2: “tumhe sākiyaputtiyā nāma mahālābhaggayasaggappattā sukhena jīvatha, mayaṃ pana dukkhitā
atk-s0508a1:1095_3: kicchajīvikā, kathaṃ nu kho paṭipajjamānassa diṭṭhadhammikañceva samparāyikañca sukhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1095_4: sampajjatī”ti pucchi. Athassa thero “nippariyāyato sukhaṃ nāma lokuttarasukhameva,
atk-s0508a1:1095_5: tañca tadanurūpaṃ paṭipattiṃ paṭipajjantassevā”ti attanā tassa adhigatabhāvaṃ pariyāyena
atk-s0508a1:1095_6: vibhāvento “sukhaṃ sukhattho labhate tadācara”nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1096_0: 35. Tattha sukhanti nirāmisaṃ sukhaṃ idhādhippetaṃ. Tañca phalasamāpatti ceva nibbānañca.
atk-s0508a1:1096_1: Tathā hi “ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko” “nibbānaṃ paramaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1096_2: sukha”nti ca vuttaṃ. Sukhatthoti sukhappayojano, yathāvuttena sukhena atthiko. Labhateti
atk-s0508a1:1096_3: pāpuṇāti, atthikassevedaṃ sukhaṃ, na itarassa. Ko pana atthikoti āha “tadācara”nti
atk-s0508a1:1096_4: tadatthaṃ ācaranto, yāya paṭipattiyā taṃ paṭipattiṃ paṭipajjantoti attho. Na kevalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1096_5: tadācaraṃ sukhameva labhate, atha kho kittiñca pappoti “itipi sīlavā suparisuddhakāyavacīkammanto
atk-s0508a1:1096_6: suparisuddhājīvo jhāyī jhānayutto”tiādinā kittiṃ parammukhā patthaṭayasataṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0508a1:1096_7: Yasassa vaḍḍhatīti sammukhe guṇābhitthavasaṅkhāto parivārasampadāsaṅkhāto ca yaso
atk-s0508a1:1096_8: assa paribrūhati. Idāni “tadācara”nti sāmaññato vuttamatthaṃ sarūpato dassento –
atk-s0508a1:1096_9: “yo ariyamaṭṭhaṅgikamañjasaṃ ujuṃ, bhāveti maggaṃ amatassa pattiyā”ti āha. Tassattho
atk-s0508a1:1096_10: yo puggalo kilesehi ārakattā parisuddhaṭṭhena paṭipajjantānaṃ ariyabhāvakaraṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0508a1:1096_12: akuṭilaṭṭhena añjasaṃ, kāyavaṅkādippahānato ujuṃ, nibbānatthikehi magganiyaṭṭhena
atk-s0508a1:1096_13: kilese mārento gamanaṭṭhena ca “magga”nti laddhanāmaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1096_14: amatassa asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā pattiyā adhigamāya bhāveti attano santāne uppādeti vaḍḍheti
atk-s0508a1:1096_15: ca, so nippariyāyena “sukhattho tadācara”nti vuccati, tasmā yathāvuttaṃ sukhaṃ labhati.
atk-s0508a1:1096_16: Taṃ sutvā paribbājako pasannamānaso pabbajitvā sammā paṭipajjanto nacirasseva vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1096_17: vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Idameva therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:1099_0: Sādhu sutanti āyasmato kumāputtattherassa gāthā. Kā uppati? So kira purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:1099_1: katādhikāro ito ekanavute kappe ajinacammavasano tāpaso hutvā bandhumatīnagare rājuyyāne
atk-s0508a1:1099_2: vasanto vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannamānaso pādabbhañjanatelaṃ adāsi. So
atk-s0508a1:1099_3: tena puññakammena devaloke nibbatto. Tato paṭṭhāya sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1099_4: buddhuppāde avantiraṭṭhe veḷukaṇṭakanagare gahapatikule nibbatto. “Nando”tissa nāmaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1099_5: akaṃsu. Mātā panassa kumā nāma, tena kumāputtoti paññāyittha. So āyasmato sāriputtassa
atk-s0508a1:1099_6: santike dhammaṃ sutvā laddhappasādo pabbajitvā katapubbakicco pariyantapabbatapasse
atk-s0508a1:1099_7: samaṇadhammaṃ karonto visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1099_8: sutvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā sappāyaṭṭhāne vasanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1103: Padhānaṃ pahitattaṃ taṃ, jhāyiṃ jhānarataṃ vasiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1109: Arahattaṃ pana patvā araññe kāyadaḷhibahule bhikkhū, disvā te ovadanto sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ pakāsento “sādhu sutaṃ sādhu caritaka”nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1110_0: 36. Tattha sādhūti sundaraṃ. Sutanti savanaṃ. Tañca kho vivaṭṭūpanissitaṃ visesato
atk-s0508a1:1110_2: tadeva appicchatādicaritaṃ ciṇṇaṃ, sādhucaritameva hi “caritaka”nti vuttaṃ. Padadvayenāpi
atk-s0508a1:1110_3: bāhusaccaṃ tadanurūpaṃ paṭipattiñca “sundara”nti dasseti. Sadāti sabbakāle navakamajjhimatherakāle,
atk-s0508a1:1110_4: sabbesu vā iriyāpathakkhaṇesu. Aniketavihāroti kilesānaṃ nivāsanaṭṭhānaṭṭhena pañcakāmaguṇā
atk-s0508a1:1110_5: niketā nāma, lokiyā vā chaḷārammaṇadhammā. Yathāha – “rūpanimittaniketavisāravinibandhā
atk-s0508a1:1110_6: kho, gahapati, ‘niketasārī’ti vuccatī”tiādi. Tesaṃ niketānaṃ pahānatthāya paṭipadā
atk-s0508a1:1110_7: aniketavihāro. Atthapucchananti taṃ ājānitukāmassa kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthapabhedassa
atk-s0508a1:1110_8: pucchanaṃ, kusalādibhedassa vā atthassa sabhāvadhammassa “kiṃ, bhante, kusalaṃ, kiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1110_9: akusalaṃ, kiṃ sāvajjaṃ, kiṃ anavajja”ntiādinā pucchanaṃ atthapucchanaṃ. Padakkhiṇakammanti
atk-s0508a1:1110_10: taṃ pana pucchitvā padakkhiṇaggāhibhāvena tassa ovāde adhiṭṭhānaṃ sammāpaṭipatti.
atk-s0508a1:1110_11: Idhāpi “sādhū”ti padaṃ ānetvā yojetabbaṃ. Etaṃ sāmaññanti “sādhu suta”ntiādinā vuttaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1110_12: yaṃ sutaṃ, yañca caritaṃ, yo ca aniketavihāro, yañca atthapucchanaṃ, yañca padakkhiṇakammaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1110_13: etaṃ sāmaññaṃ eso samaṇabhāvo. Yasmā imāya eva paṭipadāya samaṇabhāvo, na aññathā,
atk-s0508a1:1110_14: tasmā “sāmañña”nti nippariyāyato maggaphalassa adhivacanaṃ. Tassa vā pana ayaṃ apaṇṇakapaṭipadā,
atk-s0508a1:1110_15: taṃ panetaṃ sāmaññaṃ yādisassa sambhavāti, taṃ dassetuṃ “akiñcanassā”ti vuttaṃ. Apariggāhakassa,
atk-s0508a1:1113_0: Nānājanapadaṃ yantīti āyasmato kumāputtasahāyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira
atk-s0508a1:1113_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto ito
atk-s0508a1:1113_2: catunavute kappe siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto
atk-s0508a1:1113_3: araññaṃ pavisitvā bahuṃ rukkhadaṇḍaṃ chinditvā kattarayaṭṭhiṃ katvā saṅghassa adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1113_4: Aññañca yathāvibhavaṃ puññaṃ katvā devesu nibbattitvā tato paṭṭhāya sugatīsuyeva
atk-s0508a1:1113_5: parivattento imasmiṃ buddhuppāde veḷukaṇṭakanagare iddhe kule nibbatti. Sudantotissa
atk-s0508a1:1113_6: nāmaṃ ahosi. “Vāsulo”ti keci vadanti. So kumāputtassa piyasahāyo hutvā vicaranto
atk-s0508a1:1113_7: “kumāputto pabbajito”ti sutvā “na hi nūna so orako dhammavinayo, yattha kumāputto
atk-s0508a1:1113_8: pabbajito”ti tadanubandhena sayampi pabbajitukāmo hutvā satthu santikaṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0508a1:1113_9: Tassa satthā dhammaṃ desesi. So bhiyyosomattāya pabbajjāya sañjātachando pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:1113_10: kumāputteneva saddhiṃ pariyantapabbate bhāvanānuyutto viharati. Tena ca samayena
atk-s0508a1:1113_11: sambahulā bhikkhū nānājanapadesu janapadacārikaṃ carantāpi gacchantāpi āgacchantāpi
atk-s0508a1:1113_12: taṃ ṭhānaṃ upagacchanti. Tena tattha kolāhalaṃ hoti. Taṃ disvā sudantatthero “ime
atk-s0508a1:1113_13: bhikkhū niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā janapadavitakkaṃ anuvattentā cittasamādhiṃ virādhentī”ti
atk-s0508a1:1113_14: saṃvegajāto tameva saṃvegaṃ attano cittadamanassa aṅkusaṃ karonto “nānājanapadaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1114_0: 37. Tattha nānājanapadanti visuṃ visuṃ nānāvidhaṃ janapadaṃ, kāsikosalādianekaraṭṭhanti
atk-s0508a1:1114_1: attho. Yantīti gacchanti. Vicarantāti “asuko janapado subhikkho sulabhapiṇḍo, asuko
atk-s0508a1:1114_2: khemo arogo”tiādivitakkavasena janapadacārikaṃ carantā. Asaññatāti tasseva janapadavitakkassa
atk-s0508a1:1114_3: appahīnatāya cittena asaṃyatā. Samādhiñca virādhentīti sabbassapi uttarimanussadhammassa
atk-s0508a1:1114_4: mūlabhūtaṃ upacārappanābhedaṃ samādhiñca nāma virādhenti. Ca-saddo sambhāvane. Desantaracaraṇena
atk-s0508a1:1114_5: jhāyituṃ okāsābhāvena anadhigataṃ samādhiṃ nādhigacchantā, adhigatañca vasībhāvānāpādanena
atk-s0508a1:1114_6: jīrantā vīrādhenti nāma. Kiṃsu raṭṭhacariyā karissatīti sūti nipātamattaṃ. “Evaṃbhūtānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1114_7: raṭṭhacariyā janapadacārikā kiṃ karissati, kiṃ nāma atthaṃ sādhessati, niratthakāvā”ti
atk-s0508a1:1114_8: garahanto vadati. Tasmāti yasmā īdisī desantaracariyā bhikkhussa na atthāvahā, api
atk-s0508a1:1114_9: ca kho anatthāvahā sampattīnaṃ virādhanato, tasmā. Vineyya sārambhanti vasanapadese
atk-s0508a1:1114_10: arativasena uppannaṃ sārambhaṃ cittasaṃkilesaṃ tadanurūpena paṭisaṅkhānena vinetvā
atk-s0508a1:1114_11: vūpasametvā. Jhāyeyyāti ārammaṇūpanijjhānena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena cāti duvidhenapi
atk-s0508a1:1114_12: jhānena jhāyeyya. Apurakkhatoti micchāvitakkehi taṇhādīhi vā na purakkhatoti tesaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1114_13: vasaṃ anupagacchanto kammaṭṭhānameva manasi kareyyāti attho. Evaṃ pana vatvā thero
atk-s0508a1:1114_14: tameva saṃvegaṃ aṅkusaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1122_0: Yaṃ panatthaṃ aṅkusaṃ katvā ayaṃ thero arahattaṃ patto, tamevatthaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a1:1122_1: arahattaṃ pattopi “nānājanapadaṃ yanti”ti idameva gāthaṃ abhāsi. Tasmā tadevassa
atk-s0508a1:1125_0: Yo iddhiyā sarabhunti āyasmato gavampatittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:1125_1: katādhikāro ito ekatiṃse kappe sikhiṃ bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannamānaso pupphehi
atk-s0508a1:1125_2: pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke uppanno aparāparaṃ puññāni karonto koṇāgamanassa
atk-s0508a1:1125_3: bhagavato cetiye chattañca vedikañca kāresi. Kassapassa pana bhagavato kāle aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1125_4: kulagehe nibbatto. Tasmiñca kule bahuṃ gomaṇḍalaṃ ahosi. Taṃ gopālakā rakkhanti.
atk-s0508a1:1125_5: Ayaṃ tattha antarantarā yuttappayuttaṃ vicārento vicarati. So ekaṃ khīṇāsavattheraṃ
atk-s0508a1:1125_6: gāme piṇḍāya caritvā bahigāme devasikaṃ ekasmiṃ padese bhattakiccaṃ karontaṃ disvā
atk-s0508a1:1125_7: “ayyo sūriyātapena kilamissatī”ti cintetvā cattāro sirīsadaṇḍe ussāpetvā tesaṃ upari
atk-s0508a1:1125_8: sirīsasākhāyo ṭhapetvā sākhāmaṇḍapaṃ katvā adāsi. “Maṇḍapassa samīpe sirīsarukkhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1125_9: ropesī”ti ca vadanti. Tassa anukampāya devasikaṃ thero tattha nisīdi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:1125_10: tato cavitvā cātumahārājikesu nibbatti. Tassa purimakammasaṃsūcakaṃ vimānadvāre mahantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1125_11: sirīsavanaṃ nibbatti vaṇṇagandhasampannehi aññehi pupphehi sabbakāle upasobhayamānaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1125_12: tena taṃ vimānaṃ “serīsaka”nti paññāyittha. So devaputto ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devesu
atk-s0508a1:1125_13: ca manussesu ca saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde yasattherassa catūsu gihisahāyesu
atk-s0508a1:1125_14: gavampati nāma hutvā āyasmato yasassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā attano sahāyehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1125_15: bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi. Satthā tassa dhammaṃ desesi. So desanāvasāne sahāyehi
atk-s0508a1:1125_16: saddhiṃ arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1133_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā thero vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedento sākete viharati añjanavane.
atk-s0508a1:1133_1: Tena ca samayena bhagavā mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ sāketaṃ gantvā añjanavane
atk-s0508a1:1133_2: vihāsi. Senāsanaṃ nappahosi. Sambahulā bhikkhū vihārasāmantā sarabhuyā nadiyā vālikāpuḷine
atk-s0508a1:1133_3: sayiṃsu. Atha aḍḍharattasamaye nadiyā udakoghe āgacchante sāmaṇerādayo uccāsaddamahāsaddā
atk-s0508a1:1133_4: ahesuṃ. Bhagavā taṃ ñatvā āyasmantaṃ gavampatiṃ āṇāpesi – “gaccha, gavampati, jaloghaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1133_5: vikkhambhetvā bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ karohī”ti. Thero “sādhu, bhante”ti iddhibalena
atk-s0508a1:1133_6: nadīsotaṃ vikkhambhi, taṃ dūratova pabbatakūṭaṃ viya aṭṭhāsi. Tato paṭṭhāya therassa
atk-s0508a1:1133_7: ānubhāvo loke pākaṭo ahosi. Athekadivasaṃ satthā mahatiyā devaparisāya majjhe nisīditvā
atk-s0508a1:1133_8: dhammaṃ desentaṃ theraṃ disvā lokānukampāya tassa guṇānaṃ vibhāvanatthaṃ taṃ pasaṃsanto
atk-s0508a1:1134_0: 38. Tattha iddhiyāti adhiṭṭhāniddhiyā. Sarabhunti evaṃnāmikaṃ nadiṃ, yaṃ loke “sarabhu”nti
atk-s0508a1:1134_1: vadanti. Aṭṭhapesīti sandituṃ adento sotaṃ nivattetvā pabbatakūṭaṃ viya mahantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1134_2: jalarāsiṃ katvā ṭhapesi. Asitoti nasito, taṇhādiṭṭhinissayarahito, bandhanasaṅkhātānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1134_3: vā sabbasaṃyojanānaṃ samucchinnattā kenacipi bandhanena abaddho, tato eva ejānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1134_4: kilesānaṃ abhāvato anejo so, gavampati, taṃ sabbasaṅgātigataṃ tādisaṃ sabbepi rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhisaṅge
atk-s0508a1:1134_5: atikkamitvā ṭhitattā sabbasaṅgātigataṃ, asekkhamunibhāvato mahāmuniṃ, tato eva kāmakammabhavādibhedassa
atk-s0508a1:1134_6: sakalassapi bhavassa pāraṃ nibbānaṃ gatattā bhavassa pāraguṃ. Devā namassantīti devāpi
atk-s0508a1:1135: Gāthāpariyosāne mahato janakāyassa dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Thero aññaṃ byākaronto “satthāraṃ pūjessāmī”ti imameva gāthaṃ abhāsīti.
atk-s0508a1:1138_0: Sattiyā viya omaṭṭhoti āyasmato tissattherassa gāthā. Kā uppati? Ayampi kira purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:1138_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto tissassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:1138_2: bodhiyā mūle purāṇapaṇṇāni nīharitvā sodhesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:1138_3: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare bhagavato pitucchāputto hutvā nibbatti
atk-s0508a1:1138_4: tisso nāma nāmena. So bhagavantaṃ anupabbajitvā upasampanno hutvā araññāyatane viharanto
atk-s0508a1:1138_5: jātiṃ paṭicca mānaṃ karonto kodhūpāyāsabahulo ca ujjhānabahulo ca hutvā vicarati,
atk-s0508a1:1138_6: samaṇadhamme ussukkaṃ na karoti. Atha naṃ satthā ekadivasaṃ divāṭṭhāne vivaṭamukhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1138_7: niddāyantaṃ dibbacakkhunā olokento sāvatthito ākāsena gantvā tassa upari ākāseyeva
atk-s0508a1:1138_8: ṭhatvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā tenobhāsena paṭibuddhassa satiṃ uppādetvā ovādaṃ dento “sattiyā
atk-s0508a1:1139_0: 39. Tattha sattiyāti desanāsīsametaṃ, ekatodhārādinā satthenāti attho. Omaṭṭhoti
atk-s0508a1:1139_1: pahato. Cattāro hi pahārā omaṭṭho ummaṭṭho maṭṭho vimaṭṭhoti. Tattha upari ṭhatvā
atk-s0508a1:1139_2: adhomukhaṃ dinnapahāro omaṭṭho nāma, heṭṭhā ṭhatvā uddhammukhaṃ dinnapahāro ummaṭṭho
atk-s0508a1:1139_3: nāma, aggaḷasūci viya vinivijjhitvā gato maṭṭho nāma, seso sabbopi vimaṭṭho nāma.
atk-s0508a1:1139_4: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne omaṭṭho gahito. So hi sabbadāruṇo duruddharaṇasallo duttikiccho
atk-s0508a1:1139_5: antodoso antopubbalohitova hoti, pubbalohitaṃ anikkhamitvā vaṇamukhaṃ pariyonandhitvā
atk-s0508a1:1139_6: tiṭṭhati. Pubbalohitaṃ nīharitukāmehi mañcena saddhiṃ bandhitvā adhosiro kātabbo
atk-s0508a1:1139_7: hoti, maraṇaṃ vā maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ pāpuṇanti. Ḍayhamāneti agginā jhāyamāne.
atk-s0508a1:1139_8: Matthaketi sīse. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā sattiyā omaṭṭho puriso sallubbāhanavaṇatikicchanānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1139_9: atthāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati tādisaṃ payogaṃ karoti parakkamati, yathā ca ḍayhamāne matthake
atk-s0508a1:1139_10: ādittasīso puriso tassa nibbāpanatthaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhati tādisaṃ payogaṃ karoti, evamevaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1139_11: bhikkhu, kāmarāgappahānāya sato appamatto ativiya ussāhajāto hutvā vihareyyāti.
atk-s0508a1:1140_0: Evaṃ bhagavā tassa therassa kodhūpāyāsavūpasamāya ovādaṃ dento tadekaṭṭhatāya kāmarāgappahānasīsena
atk-s0508a1:1140_1: desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. Thero imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā saṃviggahadayo vipassanāya yuttappayutto
atk-s0508a1:1140_2: vihāsi. Tassa ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā satthā saṃyuttake tissattherasuttaṃ desesi. So desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0508a1:1142: Avasāne ca nibbānaṃ, sivaṃ patto anuttaraṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1144: Yo puññaṃ pasavī poso, tassa kiṃ nāma dullabhaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1150: Arahattaṃ pana patvā thero aññaṃ byākaronto satthāraṃ pūjetuṃ tameva gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1153_0: Sattiyā viya omaṭṭhoti āyasmato vaḍḍhamānattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi kira
atk-s0508a1:1153_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro ito dvenavute kappe tissassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:1153_2: viññutaṃ patto tissaṃ bhagavantaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso suparipakkāni
atk-s0508a1:1153_3: vaṇṭato muttāni ambaphalāni adāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1153_4: puññakammāni upacinanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ licchavirājakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:1153_5: vaḍḍhamānotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto saddho pasanno dāyako dānarato kārako
atk-s0508a1:1153_6: saṅghupaṭṭhāko hutvā tathārūpe aparādhe satthārā pattanikkujjanakamme kārāpite aggiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1153_7: akkanto viya saṅghaṃ khamāpetvā kammaṃ paṭippassambhetvā sañjātasaṃvego pabbaji,
atk-s0508a1:1153_8: pabbajitvā pana thinamiddhābhibhūto vihāsi. Taṃ satthā saṃvejento “sattiyā viya omaṭṭho”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1154_0: 40. Tattha bhavarāgappahānāyāti bhavarāgassa rūparāgassa arūparāgassa ca pajahanatthāya.
atk-s0508a1:1154_1: Yadipi ajjhattasaṃyojanāni appahāya bahiddhasaṃyojanānaṃ pahānaṃ nāma natthi, nānantarikabhāvato
atk-s0508a1:1154_3: hoti. Yasmā vā samucchinnorambhāgiyasaṃyojanānampi kesañci ariyānaṃ uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni
atk-s0508a1:1154_4: duppaheyyāni honti, tasmā suppaheyyato duppaheyyameva dassento bhagavā bhavarāgappahānasīsena
atk-s0508a1:1154_5: sabbassāpi uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanassa pahānamāha. Therassa eva vā ajjhāsayavasenevaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1159_0: Vivaramanupatanti vijjutāti āyasmato sirivaḍḍhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Sopi
atk-s0508a1:1159_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto ito
atk-s0508a1:1159_2: ekanavute kappe vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto vipassiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1159_3: bhagavantaṃ passitvā kiṅkaṇipupphehi pūjaṃ katvā tena puññakammena devaloke nibbatto
atk-s0508a1:1159_4: aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe vibhavasampannassa
atk-s0508a1:1159_5: brāhmaṇassa gehe nibbatti, sirivaḍḍhotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto bimbisārasamāgame
atk-s0508a1:1159_6: satthari saddhamme ca uppannappasādo hetusampannatāya pabbaji. Pabbajitvā ca katapubbakicco
atk-s0508a1:1159_7: vebhārapaṇḍavapabbatānaṃ avidūre aññatarasmiṃ araññāyatane pabbataguhāyaṃ kammaṭṭhānamanuyutto
atk-s0508a1:1159_8: viharati. Tasmiñca samaye mahā akālamegho uṭṭhahi. Vijjullatā pabbatavivaraṃ pavisantiyo
atk-s0508a1:1159_9: viya vicaranti. Therassa ghammapariḷāhābhibhūtassa sāragabbhehi meghavātehi ghammapariḷāho
atk-s0508a1:1159_10: vūpasami. Utusappāyalābhena cittaṃ ekaggaṃ ahosi. Samāhitacitto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā
atk-s0508a1:1169: Arahattaṃ pana patvā aññāpadesena attasannissayaṃ udānaṃ udānento “vivaramanupatanti vijjutā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1170_0: 41. Tattha vivaranti antarā vemajjhaṃ. Anupatantīti anulakkhaṇe patanti pavattanti,
atk-s0508a1:1170_1: vijjotantīti attho. Vijjotanameva hi vijjullatānaṃ pavatti nāma. Anu-saddayogena
atk-s0508a1:1170_2: cettha upayogavacanaṃ, yathā “rukkhamanuvijjotantī”ti. Vijjutāti sateratā. Vebhārassa
atk-s0508a1:1170_3: ca paṇḍavassa cāti vebhārapabbatassa ca paṇḍavapabbatassa ca vivaramanupatantīti
atk-s0508a1:1170_4: yojanā. Nagavivaragatoti nagavivaraṃ pabbataguhaṃ upagato. Jhāyatīti ārammaṇūpanijjhānena
atk-s0508a1:1170_5: lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena ca jhāyati, samathavipassanaṃ ussukkāpento bhāveti. Putto appaṭimassa
atk-s0508a1:1170_6: tādinoti sīlakkhandhādidhammakāyasampattiyā rūpakāyasampattiyā ca anupamassa upamārahitassa
atk-s0508a1:1170_7: iṭṭhāniṭṭhādīsu tādilakkhaṇasampattiyā tādino buddhassa bhagavato orasaputto. Puttavacaneneva
atk-s0508a1:1170_8: cettha therena satthu anujātabhāvadīpanena aññā byākatāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1173_0: Cāle upacāleti āyasmato khadiravaniyarevatattherassa gāthā. Kā uppati? Ayaṃ kira
atk-s0508a1:1173_1: padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare titthanāvikakule nibbattitvā mahāgaṅgāya
atk-s0508a1:1173_2: payāgatitthe titthanāvākammaṃ karonto ekadivasaṃ sasāvakasaṅghaṃ bhagavantaṃ gaṅgātīraṃ
atk-s0508a1:1173_3: upagataṃ disvā pasannamānaso nāvāsaṅghāṭaṃ yojetvā mahantena pūjāsakkārena paratīraṃ
atk-s0508a1:1173_4: pāpetvā aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ satthārā āraññakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapiyamānaṃ disvā tadatthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1173_5: patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahādānaṃ pavattesi. Bhagavā
atk-s0508a1:1173_6: ca tassa patthanāya avajjhabhāvaṃ byākāsi. So tato paṭṭhāya tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1173_7: kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe nālakagāme
atk-s0508a1:1173_8: rūpasāriyā brāhmaṇiyā kucchismiṃ nibbatti. Taṃ vayappattaṃ mātāpitaro gharabandhanena
atk-s0508a1:1173_9: bandhitukāmā jātā. So sāriputtattherassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā “mayhaṃ jeṭṭhabhātā
atk-s0508a1:1173_10: ayyo upatisso imaṃ vibhavaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbajito, tena vantaṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ kathāhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1173_11: pacchā gilissāmī”ti jātasaṃvego pāsaṃ anupagacchanakamigo viya ñātake vañcetvā hetusampattiyā
atk-s0508a1:1173_12: codiyamāno bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā dhammasenāpatino kaniṭṭhabhāvaṃ nivedetvā attano
atk-s0508a1:1173_13: pabbajjāya chandaṃ ārocesi. Bhikkhū taṃ pabbājetvā paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ upasampādetvā
atk-s0508a1:1173_14: kammaṭṭhāne niyojesuṃ. So kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā khadiravanaṃ pavisitvā, “arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1173_15: patvā bhagavantaṃ dhammasenāpatiñca passissāmī”ti ghaṭento vāyamanto ñāṇassa paripākagatattā
atk-s0508a1:1173_16: nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1175: Kutitthe nāviko āsiṃ, orime ca tariṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1181: Vārimajjhe ṭhito satthā, imā gāthā abhāsatha.
atk-s0508a1:1191: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:1200: “Satasahasse kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha;
atk-s0508a1:1205_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā thero satthāraṃ dhammasenāpatiñca vandituṃ senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā
atk-s0508a1:1205_1: pattacīvaramādāya anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanaṃ pavisitvā satthāraṃ dhammasenāpatiñca
atk-s0508a1:1205_2: vanditvā katipāhaṃ jetavane vihāsi. Atha naṃ satthā ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno āraññakānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1205_3: bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1205_4: āraññakānaṃ yadidaṃ revato khadiravaniyo”ti. So aparabhāge attano jātagāmaṃ gantvā
atk-s0508a1:1205_5: “cālā, upacālā, sīsūpacālā”ti tissannaṃ bhaginīnaṃ putte “cālā, upacālā, sīsūpacālā”ti
atk-s0508a1:1205_6: tayo bhāgineyye ānetvā pabbājetvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojesi. Te kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuttā
atk-s0508a1:1205_7: viharanti. Tasmiñca samaye therassa kocideva ābādho uppanno. Taṃ sutvā sāriputtatthero
atk-s0508a1:1205_9: dhammasenāpatiṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā tesaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ satuppādanavasena ovadanto
atk-s0508a1:1206_0: 42. Tattha cāle upacāle sīsūpacāleti tesaṃ ālapanaṃ. “Cālā, upacālā, sīsūpacālā”ti
atk-s0508a1:1206_1: hi itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmā te tayo dārakā pabbajitāpi tathā voharīyanti. “‘Cālī,
atk-s0508a1:1206_2: upacālī, sīsūpacālī’ti tesaṃ nāma”nti ca vadanti. Yadatthaṃ “cālā”tiādinā āmantanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1206_3: kataṃ, taṃ dassento “patissatā nu kho viharathā”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇamāha “āgato
atk-s0508a1:1206_4: vo vālaṃ viya vedhī”ti. Patissatāti patissatikā. Khoti avadhāraṇe. Āgatoti āgacchi.
atk-s0508a1:1206_5: Voti tumhākaṃ. Vālaṃ viya vedhīti vālavedhī viya, ayañhettha saṅkhepattho – tikkhajavananibbedhikapaññatāya
atk-s0508a1:1206_6: vālavedhirūpo satthukappo tumhākaṃ mātulatthero āgato, tasmā samaṇasaññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a1:1206_7: satisampajaññayuttā eva hutvā viharatha, “yathādhigate vihāre appamattā bhavathā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1207_0: Taṃ sutvā te sāmaṇerā dhammasenāpatissa paccuggamanādivattaṃ katvā ubhinnaṃ mātulattherānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1207_1: paṭisanthāravelāyaṃ nātidūre samādhiṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdiṃsu. Dhammasenāpati revatattherena
atk-s0508a1:1207_2: saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā te sāmaṇere upasaṅkami, te tathākālaparicchedassa
atk-s0508a1:1207_3: katattā there upasaṅkamante eva uṭṭhahitvā vanditvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Thero “katarakataravihārena
atk-s0508a1:1207_4: viharathā”ti pucchitvā tehi “imāya imāyā”ti vutte “dārakepi nāma evaṃ vinento mayhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1207_5: bhātiko paccapādi vata dhammassa anudhamma”nti theraṃ pasaṃsanto pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:1210_0: Sumuttikoti āyasmato sumaṅgalattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro
atk-s0508a1:1210_1: tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a1:1210_2: rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti. So ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ nhāyitvā ekacīvaraṃ ṭhitaṃ disvā
atk-s0508a1:1210_3: somanassappatto hutvā apphoṭesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1210_4: buddhuppāde sāvatthiyā avidūre aññatarasmiṃ gāmake tādisena kammanissandena daliddakule
atk-s0508a1:1210_5: nibbatti. Tassa sumaṅgaloti nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto khujjakāsitanaṅgalakuddālaparikkhāro
atk-s0508a1:1210_6: hutvā kasiyā jīvati. So ekadivasaṃ raññā pasenadikosalena bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0508a1:1210_7: ca mahādāne pavattiyamāne dānopakaraṇāni gahetvā āgacchantehi manussehi saddhiṃ dadhighaṭaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1210_8: gahetvā āgato bhikkhūnaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ disvā “ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sukhumavatthasunivatthā
atk-s0508a1:1210_9: subhojanāni bhuñjitvā nivātesu senāsanesu viharanti, yaṃnūnāhampi pabbajeyya”nti
atk-s0508a1:1210_10: cintetvā, aññataraṃ mahātheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano pabbajjādhippāyaṃ nivedesi. So
atk-s0508a1:1210_11: taṃ karuṇāyanto pabbājetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi. So araññe viharanto ekavihāre nibbinno
atk-s0508a1:1210_12: ukkaṇṭhito hutvā, vibbhamitukāmo ñātigāmaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge kacchaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0508a1:1210_13: khettaṃ kasante kiliṭṭhavatthanivatthe samantato rajokiṇṇasarīre vātātapena phussante
atk-s0508a1:1210_14: kassake disvā, “mahantaṃ vatime sattā jīvikanimittaṃ dukkhaṃ paccanubhontī”ti saṃvegaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1210_15: paṭilabhi. Ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā yathāgahitaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ upaṭṭhāsi. So aññataraṃ
atk-s0508a1:1210_16: rukkhamūlaṃ upagantvā vivekaṃ labhitvā yoniso manasikaronto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0508a1:1210_17: maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1216: Haṭṭho haṭṭhena cittena, apphoṭesiṃ ahaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a1:1220: Sabbe satte abhibhomi, vipulo hoti me yaso.
atk-s0508a1:1222: Attānaṃ tosayitvāna, pare tosesi tvaṃ muni.
atk-s0508a1:1228: Arahattaṃ pana patvā sampattiṃ attano dukkhavimuttiñca kittanavasena udānaṃ udānento “sumuttiko”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a1:1229_0: 43. Tattha sumuttikoti sundarā accantikatāya apunabbhavikā mutti etassāti sumuttiko.
atk-s0508a1:1229_1: Tassa pana vimuttiyā pāsaṃsiyatāya acchariyatāya ca apphoṭento āha “sumuttiko”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1229_2: Puna tattha vimuttiyaṃ attano pasādassa daḷhabhāvaṃ dassento “sāhu sumuttikomhī”ti
atk-s0508a1:1229_3: āha. “Sādhu suṭṭhu muttiko vatamhī”ti attho. “Kuto panāyaṃ sumuttikatā”ti? Kāmañcāyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1229_4: thero sabbasmāpi vaṭṭadukkhato suvimutto, attano pana tāva upaṭṭhitaṃ ativiya aniṭṭhabhūtaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1229_5: dukkhaṃ dassento “tīhi khujjakehī”tiādimāha. Tattha khujjakehīti khujjasabhāvehi,
atk-s0508a1:1229_6: khujjākārehi vā. Nissakkavacanañcetaṃ muttasaddāpekkhāya. Kassako hi akhujjopi samāno
atk-s0508a1:1229_7: tīsu ṭhānesu attānaṃ khujjaṃ katvā dasseti lāyane kasane kuddālakamme ca. Yo hi pana
atk-s0508a1:1229_8: kassako lāyanādīni karoti, tānipi asitādīni kuṭilākārato khujjakānīti vuttaṃ “tīhi khujjakehī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1230_0: Idāni tāni sarūpato dassento “asitāsu mayā, naṅgalāsu mayā, khuddakuddālāsu mayā”ti
atk-s0508a1:1230_1: āha. Tattha asitāsu mayāti lavittehi mayā muttanti attho. Nissakke cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1230_2: Sesesupi eseva nayo. Apare pana “asitāsu mayāti lavittehi karaṇabhūtehi mayā khujjita”nti
atk-s0508a1:1230_3: vadanti. Tesaṃ matena karaṇatthe hetumhi vā bhummavacanaṃ. “Naṅgalāsū”ti liṅgavipallāsaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1230_4: katvā vuttaṃ, naṅgalehi kasirehīti attho. Attanā vaḷañjitakuddālassa sabhāvato vaḷañjanena
atk-s0508a1:1230_6: atikhiṇakhaṇittesūti attho. Idhamevāti ma-kāro padasandhikaro. Atha vāpīti vā-saddo
atk-s0508a1:1230_7: nipātamattaṃ. Gāmake ṭhitattā tāni asitādīni kiñcāpi idheva mama samīpeyeva, tathāpi
atk-s0508a1:1230_8: alameva hotīti attho. Turitavasena cetaṃ āmeḍitavacanaṃ. Jhāyāti phalasamāpattijjhānavasena
atk-s0508a1:1230_9: diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ dibbavihārādivasena ca jhāya. Sumaṅgalāti attānaṃ ālapati.
atk-s0508a1:1230_10: Jhāne pana ādaradassanatthaṃ āmeḍitaṃ kataṃ. Appamatto viharāti satipaññāvepullappattiyā
atk-s0508a1:1230_11: sabbatthakameva appamattosi tvaṃ, tasmā idāni sukhaṃ vihara, sumaṅgala. Keci pana
atk-s0508a1:1230_12: “arahattaṃ appatvā eva vipassanāya vīthipaṭipannāya sāsane sañjātābhiratiyā yathānubhūtaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1230_13: gharāvāsadukkhaṃ jigucchanto thero imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā pacchā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0508a1:1230_14: arahattaṃ pāpuṇī”ti vadanti. Tesaṃ matena “jhāya appamatto viharā”ti padānaṃ attho
atk-s0508a1:1233_0: Mataṃ vā amma rodantīti āyasmato sānuttherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Sopi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:1233_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito catunavute
atk-s0508a1:1233_2: kappe siddhatthassa bhagavato hatthapādadhovanamukhavikkhālanānaṃ atthāya udakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1233_3: upanesi. Satthā hi bhojanakāle hatthapāde dhovitukāmo ahosi. So satthu ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā
atk-s0508a1:1233_4: udakaṃ upanesi. Bhagavā hatthapāde dhovitvā bhuñjitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:1233_5: So tampi ñatvā mukhodakaṃ upanesi. Satthā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā mukhadhovanakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0508a1:1233_6: Evaṃ bhagavā anukampaṃ upādāya tena karīyamānaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ sādiyi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:1233_7: devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:1233_8: sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa upāsakassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Tasmiṃ gabbhagateyeva
atk-s0508a1:1233_9: pitā pavāsaṃ gato, upāsikā dasamāsaccayena puttaṃ vijāyitvā sānūtissa nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1233_10: Tasmiṃ anukkamena vaḍḍhante sattavassikaṃyeva naṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike pabbājesi, “evamayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1233_11: anantarāyo vaḍḍhitvā accantasukhabhāgī bhavissatī”ti. “So sānusāmaṇero”ti paññāto
atk-s0508a1:1233_12: paññavā vattasampanno bahussuto dhammakathiko sattesu mettajjhāsayo hutvā devamanussānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1233_13: piyo ahosi manāpoti sabbaṃ sānusutte āgatanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1234_0: Tassa atītajātiyaṃ mātā yakkhayoniyaṃ nibbatti. Taṃ yakkhā “sānuttherassa ayaṃ mātā”ti
atk-s0508a1:1234_1: garucittikārabahulā hutvā mānenti. Evaṃ gacchante kāle puthujjanabhāvassa ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1234_2: vibhāventaṃ viya ekadivasaṃ sānussa yoniso manasikārābhāvā ayoniso ummujjantassa
atk-s0508a1:1234_3: vibbhamitukāmatācittaṃ uppajji. Taṃ tassa yakkhinimātā ñatvā manussamātuyā ārocesi
atk-s0508a1:1234_4: – “tava putto, sānu, ‘vibbhamissāmī’ti cittaṃ uppādesi, tasmā tvaṃ –
atk-s0508a1:1236: Mākāsi pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, āvi vā yadi vā raho.
atk-s0508a1:1237: “Sace tvaṃ pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, karissasi karosi vā;
atk-s0508a1:1238: Na te dukkhā pamutyatthi, uppaccāpi palāyato”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:1239_0: Evaṃ bhaṇāhī”ti. Evañca pana vatvā yakkhinimātā tatthevantaradhāyi. Manussamātā pana
atk-s0508a1:1239_1: taṃ sutvā paridevasokasamāpannā cetodukkhasamappitā ahosi. Atha sānusāmaṇero pubbaṇhasamayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1239_2: nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya mātu santikaṃ upagato mātaraṃ rodamānaṃ disvā “amma,
atk-s0508a1:1239_3: kiṃ nissāya rodasī”ti vatvā “taṃ nissāyā”ti ca vutto mātu “mataṃ vā, amma, rodanti,
atk-s0508a1:1239_4: yo vā jīvaṃ na dissatī”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1240_0: 44. Tassattho – “amma, rodantā nāma ñātakā mittā vā attano ñātakaṃ mittaṃ vā mataṃ
atk-s0508a1:1240_1: uddissa rodanti paralokaṃ gatattā, yo vā ñātako mitto vā jīvaṃ jīvanto desantaraṃ
atk-s0508a1:1240_2: pakkantatāya ca na dissati, taṃ vā uddissa rodanti, ubhayampetaṃ mayi na vijjati,
atk-s0508a1:1240_3: evaṃ sante jīvantaṃ dharamānaṃ maṃ purato ṭhitaṃ passantī; kasmā, amma, rodasi?Maṃ
atk-s0508a1:1241: Taṃ sutvā tassa mātā “maraṇañhetaṃ, bhikkhave, yo sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattatī”ti suttapadānusārena uppabbajanaṃ ariyassa vinaye maraṇanti dassentī –
atk-s0508a1:1242: “Mataṃ vā putta rodanti, yo vā jīvaṃ na dissati;
atk-s0508a1:1243: Yo ca kāme cajitvāna, punarāgacchate idha.
atk-s0508a1:1244: “Taṃ vāpi putta rodanti, puna jīvaṃ mato hi so;
atk-s0508a1:1247_0: Tattha kāme cajitvānāti nekkhammajjhāsayena vatthukāme pahāya, tañca kilesakāmassa
atk-s0508a1:1247_1: tadaṅgappahānavasena veditabbaṃ. Pabbajjā hettha kāmapariccāgo adhippeto. Punarāgacchate
atk-s0508a1:1247_2: idhāti idha gehe punadeva āgacchati, hīnāyāvattanaṃ sandhāya vadati. Taṃ vāpīti yo
atk-s0508a1:1247_3: pabbajitvā vibbhamati, taṃ vāpi puggalaṃ mataṃ viyamādisiyo rodanti. Kasmāti ce?
atk-s0508a1:1247_4: Puna jīvaṃ mato hi soti vibbhamanato pacchā yo jīvanto, so guṇamaraṇena atthato matoyeva.
atk-s0508a1:1247_5: Idānissa savisesasaṃvegaṃ janetuṃ “kukkuḷā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tassattho – “ahorattaṃ ādittaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1247_6: viya hutvā ḍahanaṭṭhena kukkuḷanirayasadisattā kukkuḷā gihibhāvā anukampantiyā mayā
atk-s0508a1:1247_7: ubbhato uddhato, tāta sānu, kukkuḷaṃ patituṃ icchasi patitukāmosī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1248: Taṃ sutvā sānusāmaṇero saṃvegajāto hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1258: Arahattaṃ pana patvā thero imissā gāthāya vasena “mayhaṃ vipassanārambho arahattappatti ca jātā”ti udānavasena tameva gāthaṃ paccudāhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1261_0: Yathāpi bhaddo ājaññoti āyasmato ramaṇīyavihārittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Sopi
atk-s0508a1:1261_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha puññāni upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1261_2: bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā koraṇḍapupphehi pūjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1261_3: akāsi. So tena puññakammena devesu nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:1261_4: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe aññatarassa seṭṭhissa putto hutvā nibbatto
atk-s0508a1:1261_5: yobbanamadena kāmesu mucchaṃ āpanno viharati. So ekadivasaṃ aññataraṃ pāradārikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1261_6: rājapurisehi vividhā kammakāraṇā karīyamānaṃ disvā saṃvegajāto satthu santike dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1261_7: sutvā pabbaji. Pabbajito ca rāgacaritatāya niccakālaṃ susammaṭṭhaṃ pariveṇaṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1261_8: pānīyaparibhojanīyaṃ supaññataṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ katvā viharati. Tena so ramaṇīyavihārītveva paññāyittha.
atk-s0508a1:1262_0: So rāgussannatāya ayoniso manasi karitvā sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiāpattiṃ āpajjitvā,
atk-s0508a1:1262_1: “dhiratthu, maṃ evaṃbhūto saddhādeyyaṃ bhuñjeyya”nti vippaṭisārī hutvā “vibbhamissāmī”ti
atk-s0508a1:1262_2: gacchanto antarāmagge rukkhamūle nisīdi, tena ca maggena sakaṭesu gacchantesu eko
atk-s0508a1:1262_3: sakaṭayutto goṇo parissamanto visamaṭṭhāne khalitvā pati, taṃ sākaṭikā yugato muñcitvā
atk-s0508a1:1262_4: tiṇodakaṃ datvā parissamaṃ vinodetvā punapi dhure yojetvā agamaṃsu. Thero taṃ disvā
atk-s0508a1:1262_5: – “yathāyaṃ goṇo sakiṃ khalitvāpi uṭṭhāya sakiṃ dhuraṃ vahati, evaṃ mayāpi kilesavasena
atk-s0508a1:1262_6: sakiṃ khalitenāpi vuṭṭhāya samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti yoniso ummujjanto nivattitvā
atk-s0508a1:1262_7: upālittherassa attano pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā tena vuttavidhinā āpattito vuṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0508a1:1262_8: sīlaṃ pākatikaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1272: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhaṃ anubhavanto attano pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyā saddhiṃ ariyadhammādhigamanadīpaniṃ “yathāpi bhaddo ājañño, khalitvā patitiṭṭhatī”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1273_0: 45. Tattha khalitvāti pakkhalitvā. Patitiṭṭhatīti patiṭṭhahati, punadeva yathāṭhāne
atk-s0508a1:1273_1: tiṭṭhati. Evanti yathā bhaddo usabhājānīyo bhāraṃ vahanto parissamappatto visamaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1273_2: āgamma ekavāraṃ pakkhalitvā patito na tattakena dhuraṃ chaḍḍeti, thāmajavaparakkamasampannatāya
atk-s0508a1:1273_3: pana khalitvāpi patitiṭṭhati, attano sabhāveneva ṭhatvā bhāraṃ vahati, evaṃ kilesaparissamappatto
atk-s0508a1:1273_4: kiriyāparādhena khalitvā taṃ khalitaṃ thāmavīriyasampattitāya paṭipākatikaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a1:1273_5: maggasammādiṭṭhiyā dassanasampannaṃ, tato eva sammāsambuddhassa savanante ariyāya
atk-s0508a1:1273_6: jātiyā jātatāya sāvakaṃ, tassa ure vāyāmajanitābhijātitāya orasaṃ puttaṃ bhaddājānīyasadisakiccatāya
atk-s0508a1:1273_7: ājānīyanti ca maṃ dhāretha upadhārethāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:1276_0: Saddhāyāhaṃ pabbajitoti āyasmato samiddhittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:1276_1: kattādhikāro tattha tattha puññāni upacinanto ito catunavute kappe siddhatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1276_2: passitvā pasannamānaso savaṇṭāni pupphāni kaṇṇikabaddhāni gahetvā pūjesi. So tena
atk-s0508a1:1276_3: puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva parivattento
atk-s0508a1:1276_4: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe kulagehe nibbatti. Tassa jātakālato paṭṭhāya taṃ kulaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1276_5: dhanadhaññādīhi vaḍḍhi, attabhāvo cassa abhirūpo dassanīyo guṇavā iti vibhavasamiddhiyā
atk-s0508a1:1276_6: ca guṇasamiddhiyā ca samiddhītveva paññāyittha. So bimbisārasamāgame buddhānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1276_7: disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā bhāvanāya yuttappayutto viharanto bhagavati tapodārāme
atk-s0508a1:1276_8: viharante ekadivasaṃ evaṃ cintesi – “lābhā vata me satthā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho,
atk-s0508a1:1276_9: svākkhāte cāhaṃ dhammavinaye pabbajito, sabrahmacārī ca me sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1276_10: Tassevaṃ cintentassa uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ udapādi. Taṃ asahanto māro pāpimā therassa
atk-s0508a1:1276_11: avidūre mahantaṃ bheravasaddamakāsi, pathaviyā undriyanakālo viya ahosi. Thero bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:1276_12: tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Bhagavā “māro tuyhaṃ vicakkhukammāya ceteti, gaccha, bhikkhu tattha
atk-s0508a1:1276_13: acintetvā viharāhī”ti āha. Thero tattha gantvā viharanto nacirasseva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā
atk-s0508a1:1286_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā tattheva viharantassa therassa khīṇāsavabhāvaṃ ajānanto purimanayeneva
atk-s0508a1:1286_1: māro mahantaṃ bheravasaddaṃ akāsi. Taṃ sutvā thero abhīto acchambhī “tādisānaṃ mārānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1286_2: satampi sahassampi mayhaṃ lomampi na kampetī”ti aññaṃ byākaronto “saddhāyāhaṃ pabbajito”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1287_0: 46. Tattha saddhāyāti dhammacchandasamuṭṭhānāya kammaphalasaddhāya ceva ratanattayasaddhāya
atk-s0508a1:1287_1: ca. Ahanti attānaṃ niddisati. Pabbajitoti upagato. Agārasmāti gehato gharāvāsato
atk-s0508a1:1287_2: vā. Anagāriyanti pabbajjaṃ, sā hi yaṃkiñci kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ ‘agārassa hita’nti
atk-s0508a1:1287_3: agāriyaṃ nāma, tadabhāvato “anagāriyā”ti vuccati. Sati paññā ca me vuḍḍhāti saraṇalakkhaṇā
atk-s0508a1:1287_4: sati, pajānanalakkhaṇā paññāti ime dhammā vipassanākkhaṇato paṭṭhāya maggapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0508a1:1287_5: yāva arahattā me vuḍḍhā vaḍḍhitā, na dāni vaḍḍhetabbā atthi satipaññā vepullappattāti
atk-s0508a1:1287_6: dasseti. Cittañca susamāhitanti aṭṭhasamāpattivasena ceva lokuttarasamādhivasena
atk-s0508a1:1287_7: ca cittaṃ me suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ, na dāni tassa samādhātabbaṃ atthi, samādhi vepullappattoti
atk-s0508a1:1287_8: dasseti. Tasmā kāmaṃ karassu rūpānīti pāpima maṃ uddissa yāni kānici vippakārāni
atk-s0508a1:1287_9: yathāruciṃ karohi, tehi pana neva maṃ byādhayissasi mama sarīrakampanamattampi kātuṃ
atk-s0508a1:1287_10: na sakkhissasi, kuto cittaññathattaṃ? Tasmā tava kiriyā appaṭicchitapahenakaṃ viya
atk-s0508a1:1287_11: na kiñci atthaṃ sodheti, kevalaṃ tava cittavighātamattaphalāti thero māraṃ tajjesi.
atk-s0508a1:1287_12: Taṃ sutvā māro “jānāti maṃ samaṇo”ti tatthevantaradhāyi.
atk-s0508a1:1290_0: Namo te buddha vīratthūti āyasmato ujjayattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:1290_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto ito dvānavute kappe tissaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1290_2: passitvā pasannamānaso kaṇikārapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke
atk-s0508a1:1290_3: nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:1290_4: rājagahe aññatarassa sottiyabrāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, ujjayotissa nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:1290_5: So vayappatto tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū hutvā tattha sāraṃ apassanto upanissayasampattiyā
atk-s0508a1:1290_6: codiyamāno veḷuvanaṃ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:1290_7: cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe viharanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:1298: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā bhagavato thomanākārena aññaṃ byākaronto “namo te buddha vīratthū”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1299_0: 47. Tattha namoti paṇāmakittanaṃ. Teti paṇāmakiriyāya sampadānakittanaṃ, tuyhanti
atk-s0508a1:1299_1: attho. Buddha vīrāti ca bhagavato ālapanaṃ. Bhagavā hi yathā abhiññeyyādibhedassa
atk-s0508a1:1299_2: atthassa abhiññeyyādibhedena sayambhūñāṇena anavasesato buddhattā “buddho”ti vuccati.
atk-s0508a1:1299_3: Evaṃ pañcannampi mārānaṃ abhippamaddanavasena padahantena mahatā vīriyena samannāgatattā
atk-s0508a1:1299_4: “vīro”ti vuccati. Atthūti hotu, tassa “namo”ti iminā sambandho. Vippamuttosi sabbadhīti
atk-s0508a1:1299_5: sabbehi kilesehi sabbasmiñca saṅkhāragate vippamutto visaṃyutto asi bhavasi, na tayā
atk-s0508a1:1299_6: kiñci avippamuttaṃ nāma atthi, yatohaṃ tuyhāpadāne viharaṃ, viharāmi anāsavoti tuyhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1299_7: tava apadāne ovāde gatamagge paṭipatticariyāya viharaṃ yathāsatti yathābalaṃ paṭipajjanto
atk-s0508a1:1299_8: kāmāsavādīnaṃ catunnampi āsavānaṃ suppahīnattā anāsavo viharāmi, tādisassa namo te buddha-vīratthūti.
atk-s0508a1:1302_0: Yato ahanti āyasmato sañjayattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro
atk-s0508a1:1302_1: tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle mahati
atk-s0508a1:1302_2: pūge saṃkittivasena vatthuṃ saṅgharitvā ratanattayaṃ uddissa puññaṃ karonto sayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1302_3: daliddo hutvā nesaṃ gaṇādīnaṃ puññakiriyāya byāvaṭo ahosi. Kālena kālaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1302_4: upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā pasannamānaso bhikkhūnañca taṃ taṃ veyyāvaccaṃ akāsi. So tena
atk-s0508a1:1302_5: puññakammena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1302_6: buddhuppāde rājagahe vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti sañjayo
atk-s0508a1:1302_7: nāma nāmena, so vayappatto brahmāyupokkharasātiādike abhiññāte brāhmaṇe sāsane abhippasanne
atk-s0508a1:1302_8: disvā sañjātappasādo satthāraṃ upasaṅkami. Tassa satthā dhammaṃ desesi. So dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1302_9: sutvā sotāpanno ahosi. Aparabhāge pabbaji. Pabbajanto ca khuraggeyeva chaḷabhiñño
atk-s0508a1:1309: “Ito ca aṭṭhame kappe, rājā āsiṃ sucintito;
atk-s0508a1:1312: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā aññaṃ byākaronto “yato ahaṃ pabbajito”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1313_0: 48. Tattha yato ahaṃ pabbajitoti yato pabhuti yato paṭṭhāya ahaṃ pabbajito. Pabbajitakālato
atk-s0508a1:1313_1: paṭṭhāya nābhijānāmi saṅkappaṃ, anariyaṃ dosasaṃhitanti rāgādidosasaṃhitaṃ tato eva
atk-s0508a1:1313_2: anariyaṃ nihīnaṃ, ariyehi vā anaraṇīyatāya anariyehi araṇīyatāya ca anariyaṃ pāpakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1313_4: uppāditaṃ nābhijānāmīti, “khuraggeyeva mayā arahattaṃ patta”nti aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1316_0: Cihacihābhinaditeti āyasmato rāmaṇeyyakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:1316_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:1316_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1316_3: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsu eva parivattento
atk-s0508a1:1316_4: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ ibbhakule nibbattitvā vayappatto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe
atk-s0508a1:1316_5: sañjātappasādo pabbajitvā cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe viharati. Tassa
atk-s0508a1:1316_6: attano sampattiyā pabbajitasāruppāya ca paṭipattiyā pāsādikabhāvato rāmaṇeyyakotveva
atk-s0508a1:1316_7: samaññā ahosi. Athekadivasaṃ māro theraṃ bhiṃsāpetukāmo bheravasaddaṃ akāsi. Taṃ
atk-s0508a1:1316_8: sutvā thero thirapakatitāya tena asantasanto “māro aya”nti ñatvā tattha anādaraṃ
atk-s0508a1:1317_1: laddhanāmānaṃ vaṭṭakānaṃ abhinādanimittaṃ, viravahetūti attho. Sippikābhirutehi cāti
atk-s0508a1:1317_2: sippikā vuccanti devakā paranāmakā gelaññena chātakisadārakākārā sākhāmigā. “Mahākalandakā”ti
atk-s0508a1:1317_3: keci, sippikānaṃ abhirutehi mahāviravehi, hetumhi cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ, taṃ hetūti
atk-s0508a1:1317_4: attho. Na me taṃ phandati cittanti mama cittaṃ na phandati na cavati. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1317_5: hoti – imasmiṃ araññe viravahetu sippikābhirutahetu viya, pāpima, tava vissarakaraṇahetu
atk-s0508a1:1317_6: mama cittaṃ kammaṭṭhānato na paripatatīti. Tattha kāraṇamāha “ekattaniratañhi me”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1317_7: Hi-saddo hetu attho, yasmā mama cittaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya ekatte ekībhāve, bahiddhā
atk-s0508a1:1317_8: vā vikkhepaṃ pahāya ekatte ekaggatāya, ekatte ekasabhāve vā nibbāne nirataṃ abhirataṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1317_9: tasmā kammaṭṭhānato na phandati na cavatīti, imaṃ kira gāthaṃ vadanto eva thero vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1317_10: vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1330_0: Dharaṇī ca siñcati vāti āyasmato vimalattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Sopi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:1330_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:1330_2: kāle saṅkhadhamanakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto tasmiṃ sippe nipphattiṃ gato ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1330_3: vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannamānaso saṅkhadhamanena pūjaṃ katvā tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a1:1330_4: kālena kālaṃ satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1330_5: puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle “anāgate me vimalo
atk-s0508a1:1330_6: visuddho kāyo hotū”ti bodhirukkhaṃ gandhodakehi nhāpesi, cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇesu
atk-s0508a1:1330_7: āsanāni dhovāpesi, bhikkhūnampi kiliṭṭhe samaṇaparikkhāre dhovāpesi.
atk-s0508a1:1331_0: So tato cavitvā devesu ca manussesu ca parivattento imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe
atk-s0508a1:1331_1: ibbhakule nibbatti. Tassa mātukucchiyaṃ vasantassa nikkhamantassa ca kāyo pittasemhādīhi
atk-s0508a1:1331_2: asaṃkiliṭṭho padumapalāse udakabindu viya alaggo pacchimabhavikabodhisattassa viya
atk-s0508a1:1331_3: suvisuddho ahosi, tenassa vimalotveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto rājagahappavesane
atk-s0508a1:1331_4: buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā kosalaraṭṭhe
atk-s0508a1:1331_5: pabbataguhāyaṃ viharati. Athekadivasaṃ cātuddīpikamahāmegho sakalaṃ cakkavāḷagabbhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1331_6: pattharitvā pāvassi. Vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyimhi buddhānaṃ cakkavattīnañca dharamānakāle eva
atk-s0508a1:1331_7: kira evaṃ vassati. Ghammapariḷāhavūpasamato utusappāyalābhena therassa cittaṃ samāhitaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1331_8: ahosi ekaggaṃ. So samāhitacitto tāvadeva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0508a1:1341: Arahattaṃ pana patvā katakiccatāya tuṭṭhamānaso udānaṃ udānento “dharaṇī ca siñcati vāti māluto”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1342_0: 50. Tattha dharaṇīti pathavī, sā hi sakalaṃ dharādharaṃ dhāretīti “dharaṇī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0508a1:1342_1: Siñcatīti samantato nabhaṃ pūretvā abhippavassato mahāmeghassa vuṭṭhidhārāhi siñcati.
atk-s0508a1:1342_2: Vāti mālutoti udakaphusitasammissatāya sītalo vāto vāyati. Vijjutā carati nabheti
atk-s0508a1:1342_3: tattha tattha gajjatā gaḷagaḷāyatā mahāmeghato niccharantiyo sateratā ākāse ito cito
atk-s0508a1:1342_4: ca vicaranti. Upasamanti vitakkāti utusappāyasiddhena samathavipassanādhigamena pubbabhāge
atk-s0508a1:1342_5: tadaṅgādivasena vūpasantā hutvā kāmavitakkādayo sabbepi nava mahāvitakkā ariyamaggādhigamena
atk-s0508a1:1342_6: upasamanti. Anavasesato samucchijjantīti. Vattamānasamīpatāya ariyamaggakkhaṇaṃ vattamānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1342_7: katvā vadati. Atītatthe vā etaṃ paccuppannavacanaṃ. Cittaṃ susamāhitaṃ mamāti tato
atk-s0508a1:1342_8: eva lokuttarasamādhinā mama cittaṃ suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ, na dāni tassa samādhāne kiñci
atk-s0508a1:1347_0: Vassati devotiādikā catasso – godhiko, subāhu, valliyo, uttiyoti imesaṃ catunnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1347_1: therānaṃ gāthā. Kā uppatti? Imepi purimabuddhesu katādhikārā tattha tattha bhave
atk-s0508a1:1347_2: puññāni upacinantā ito catunavute kappe siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:1347_3: viññutaṃ patvā aññamaññaṃ sahāyā hutvā vicariṃsu. Tesu eko siddhatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1347_4: piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ adāsi. Dutiyo pasannacitto hutvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0508a1:1347_5: vanditvā añjaliṃ paggaṇhi. Tatiyo pasannacitto ekena pupphahatthena bhagavantaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0508a1:1347_6: Catuttho sumanapupphehi pūjamakāsi. Evaṃ te satthari cittaṃ pasādetvā pasutena tena
atk-s0508a1:1347_7: puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā puna aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:1347_8: kassapassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā sahāyakā hutvā sāsane pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1347_9: katvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle pāvāyaṃ catunnaṃ mallarājānaṃ puttā hutvā nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:1347_10: Tesaṃ godhiko, subāhu, valliyo, uttiyoti nāmāni akaṃsu. Aññamaññaṃ piyasahāyā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1347_11: Te kenacideva karaṇīyena kapilavatthuṃ agamaṃsu. Tasmiñca samaye satthā kapilavatthuṃ
atk-s0508a1:1347_12: gantvā nigrodhārāme vasanto yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā suddhodanappamukhe sakyarājāno
atk-s0508a1:1347_13: damesi. Tadā tepi cattāro mallarājaputtā pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā laddhappasādā pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:1347_14: vipassanākammaṃ karontā nacirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1353: Uḷārā vitti me jātā, buddhe ādiccabandhune.
atk-s0508a1:1394_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā ime cattāropi therā loke pākaṭā paññātā rājarājamahāmattehi
atk-s0508a1:1394_1: sakkatā garukatā hutvā araññe saheva viharanti. Athekadā rājā bimbisāro te cattāro
atk-s0508a1:1394_2: there rājagahaṃ upagate upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā temāsaṃ vassāvāsatthāya nimantetvā
atk-s0508a1:1394_3: tesaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ kuṭikāyo kāretvā satisammosena na chādesi. Therā acchannāsu kuṭikāsu
atk-s0508a1:1394_4: viharanti. Vassakāle devo na vassati. Rājā “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇaṃ devo na vassatī”ti
atk-s0508a1:1394_5: cintento, taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā, tā kuṭikāyo chādāpetvā, mattikākammaṃ cittakammañca
atk-s0508a1:1394_6: kārāpetvā, kuṭikāmahaṃ karonto mahato bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ adāsi. Therā rañño anukampāya
atk-s0508a1:1394_7: kuṭikāyo pavisitvā mettāsamāpattiyo samāpajjiṃsu. Athuttarapācīnadisato mahāmegho
atk-s0508a1:1394_8: uṭṭhahitvā therānaṃ samāpattito vuṭṭhānakkhaṇeyeva vassituṃ ārabhi. Tesu godhikatthero
atk-s0508a1:1396: “Vassati devo yathā sugītaṃ, channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā;
atk-s0508a1:1397: Cittaṃ susamāhitañca mayhaṃ, atha ce patthayasi pavassa devā”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:1399_0: Tattha vassatīti siñcati vuṭṭhidhāraṃ pavecchati. Devoti megho. Yathā sugītanti sundaragītaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1399_1: viya gajjantoti adhippāyo. Megho hi vassanakāle satapaṭalasahassapaṭalo uṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0508a1:1399_2: thanayanto vijjutā nicchārentova sobhati, na kevalo. Tasmā siniddhamadhuragambhīranigghoso
atk-s0508a1:1399_3: vassati devoti dasseti. Tena saddato anupapīḷitaṃ āha “channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1399_4: Yathā na devo vassati, evaṃ tiṇādīhi chāditā ayaṃ me kuṭikā, tena vuṭṭhivassena anupapīḷitaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1399_5: āha. Paribhogasukhassa utusappāyautusukhassa ca sabbhāvato sukhā. Phusitaggaḷapihitavātapānatāhi
atk-s0508a1:1399_6: vātaparissayarahitā. Ubhayenapi āvāsasappāyavasena anupapīḷitaṃ āha. Cittaṃ susamāhitañca
atk-s0508a1:1399_7: mayhanti cittañca mama suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ anuttarasamādhinā nibbānārammaṇe suṭṭhu appitaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1399_8: etena abbhantaraparissayābhāvato appossukkataṃ dasseti. Atha ce patthayasīti atha
atk-s0508a1:1399_9: idāni patthayasi ce, yadi icchasi. Pavassāti siñca udakaṃ pagghara vuṭṭhidhāraṃ paveccha.
atk-s0508a1:1402_0: 52. Itarehi vuttagāthāsu tatiyapade eva viseso. Tattha subāhunā vuttagāthāyaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1402_1: susamāhitañca kāyeti mama cittaṃ karajakāye kāyagatāsatibhāvanāvasena suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1402_2: sammadeva appitaṃ. Ayañhi thero kāyagatāsatibhāvanāvasena paṭiladdhajhānaṃ pādakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1402_3: katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Taṃ sandhāyāha “cittaṃ susamāhitañca kāye”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1405_0: 53. Valliyattheragāthāyaṃ tassaṃ viharāmi appamattoti tassaṃ kuṭikāyaṃ appamādapaṭipattiyā
atk-s0508a1:1405_1: matthakaṃ pāpitattā appamatto ariyavihārūpasaṃhitena dibbavihārādisaṃhitena ca iriyāpathavihārena
atk-s0508a1:1408: 54. Uttiyattherena vuttagāthāyaṃ adutiyoti asahāyo, kilesasaṅgaṇikāya gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya ca virahitoti attho.
atk-s0508a1:1412_0: Āsandiṃ kuṭikaṃ katvāti āyasmato añjanavaniyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira
atk-s0508a1:1412_1: padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle sudassano nāma mālākāro hutvā sumanapupphehi bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1412_2: pūjetvā aññampi tattha tattha bahuṃ puññaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa
atk-s0508a1:1412_3: bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi. Atha imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1412_4: vajjirājakule nibbattitvā tassa vayappattakāle vajjiraṭṭhe avuṭṭhibhayaṃ byādhibhayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1412_5: amanussabhayanti tīṇi bhayāni uppajjiṃsu. Taṃ sabbaṃ ratanasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena
atk-s0508a1:1412_6: veditabbaṃ. Bhagavati pana vesāliṃ paviṭṭhe bhayesu ca vūpasantesu satthu dhammadesanāya
atk-s0508a1:1412_7: sambahulānaṃ devamanussānaṃ dhammābhisamaye ca jāte ayaṃ rājakumāro buddhānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1412_8: disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji. Yathā cāyaṃ evaṃ anantaraṃ vuccamānā cattāropi janā.
atk-s0508a1:1412_9: Tepi hi imassa sahāyabhūtā licchavirājakumārā evaṃ imināva nīhārena pabbajiṃsu. Kassapasambuddhakālepi
atk-s0508a1:1412_10: sahāyā hutvā iminā saheva pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ akaṃsu, padumuttarassapi bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:1412_11: pādamūle kusalabījaropanādiṃ akaṃsūti. Tatthāyaṃ katapubbakicco sākete añjanavane
atk-s0508a1:1412_12: susānaṭṭhāne vasanto upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya manussehi chaḍḍitaṃ jiṇṇakaṃ āsandiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1412_13: labhitvā taṃ catūsu pāsāṇesu ṭhapetvā upari tiriyañca tiṇādīhi chādetvā dvāraṃ yojetvā
atk-s0508a1:1412_14: vassaṃ upagato. Paṭhamamāseyeva ghaṭento vāyamanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1422: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedento samāpattito vuṭṭhāya yathāladdhaṃ sampattiṃ paccavekkhitvā pītivegena udānento “āsandiṃ kuṭikaṃ katvā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1423_0: 55. Tattha āsandiṃ kuṭikaṃ katvāti āsandī nāma dīghapādakaṃ caturassapīṭhaṃ, āyataṃ
atk-s0508a1:1423_1: caturassampi atthiyeva, yattha nisīditumeva sakkā, na nipajjituṃ taṃ āsandiṃ kuṭikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1423_2: katvā vāsatthāya heṭṭhā vuttanayena kuṭikaṃ katvā yathā tattha nisinnassa utuparissayābhāvena
atk-s0508a1:1423_3: sukhena samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ sakkā, evaṃ kuṭikaṃ katvā. Etena paramukkaṃsagataṃ senāsane
atk-s0508a1:1423_4: attano appicchataṃ santuṭṭhiñca dasseti. Vuttampi cetaṃ dhammasenāpatinā –
atk-s0508a1:1426_0: Apare “āsandikuṭika”nti pāṭhaṃ vatvā “āsandippamāṇaṃ kuṭikaṃ katvā”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0508a1:1426_1: Aññe pana “āsananisajjādigate manusse uddissa mañcakassa upari katakuṭikā āsandī
atk-s0508a1:1426_2: nāma, taṃ āsandiṃ kuṭikaṃ katvā”ti atthaṃ vadanti. Oggayhāti ogāhetvā anupavisitvā.
atk-s0508a1:1426_3: Añjanaṃ vananti evaṃnāmakaṃ vanaṃ, añjanavaṇṇapupphabhāvato hi añjanā vuccanti valliyo,
atk-s0508a1:1426_4: tabbahulatāya taṃ vanaṃ “añjanavana”nti nāmaṃ labhi. Apare pana “añjanā nāma mahāgacchā”ti
atk-s0508a1:1426_5: vadanti, taṃ añjanavanaṃ oggayha āsandikaṃ kuṭikaṃ katvā tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ
atk-s0508a1:1426_6: buddhassa sāsananti viharatā mayāti vacanaseseneva yojanā. Idameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0508a1:1429_0: Ko kuṭikāyanti āyasmato kuṭivihārittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:1429_1: bhagavato ākāsena gacchantassa “udakadānaṃ dassāmī”ti sītalaṃ udakaṃ gahetvā pītisomanassajāto
atk-s0508a1:1429_2: uddhammukho hutvā ukkhipi. Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā pasādasaṃvaḍḍhanatthaṃ ākāse
atk-s0508a1:1429_3: ṭhitova sampaṭicchi. So tena anappakaṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedesi. Sesaṃ añjanavaniyattherassa
atk-s0508a1:1429_4: vatthumhi vuttasadisameva. Ayaṃ pana viseso – ayaṃ kira vuttanayena pabbajitvā katapubbakicco
atk-s0508a1:1429_5: vipassanaṃ anuyuñjanto sāyaṃ khettasamīpena gacchanto deve phusāyante khettapālakassa
atk-s0508a1:1429_6: puññaṃ tiṇakuṭiṃ disvā pavisitvā tattha tiṇasanthārake nisīdi. Nisinnamattova utusappāyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1429_7: labhitvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1443_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā there tattha nisinne khettapālako āgantvā “ko kuṭikāya”nti āha.
atk-s0508a1:1443_1: Taṃ sutvā thero “bhikkhu kuṭikāya”ntiādimāha. Tayidaṃ khettapālassa therassa ca vacanaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā –
atk-s0508a1:1446: Evaṃ jānāhi āvuso, amoghā te kuṭikā katā”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:1448_0: Tattha ko kuṭikāyanti, “imissaṃ kuṭikāyaṃ ko nisinno”ti khettapālassa pucchāvacanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1448_1: Tassa bhikkhu kuṭikāyanti therassa paṭivacanadānaṃ. Atha naṃ attano anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvato
atk-s0508a1:1448_2: taṃ kuṭiparibhogaṃ anumodāpetvā uḷāraṃ tameva puññaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ “vītarāgo”tiādi
atk-s0508a1:1448_3: vuttaṃ. Tassattho – eko bhinnakileso bhikkhu te kuṭikāyaṃ nisinno, tato eva so aggamaggena
atk-s0508a1:1448_4: sabbaso samucchinnarāgatāya vītarāgo anuttarasamādhinā nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā suṭṭhu
atk-s0508a1:1448_5: samāhitacittatāya susamāhitacitto, imañca atthaṃ, āvuso khettapāla, yathāhaṃ vadāmi,
atk-s0508a1:1448_6: evaṃ jānāhi saddaha adhimuccassu. Amoghā te kuṭikā katā tayā katā kuṭikā amoghā avañjhā
atk-s0508a1:1448_7: saphalā saudrayā, yasmā arahatā khīṇāsavena paribhuttā. Sace tvaṃ anumodasi, taṃ
atk-s0508a1:1449_0: Taṃ sutvā khettapālo “lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata me, yassa me kuṭikāyaṃ ediso
atk-s0508a1:1449_1: ayyo pavisitvā nisīdatī”ti pasannacitto anumodanto aṭṭhāsi. Imaṃ pana tesaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1449_2: bhagavā dibbāya sotadhātuyā sutvā anumodanañcassa ñatvā tambhāviniṃ sampattiṃ vibhāvento
atk-s0508a1:1455: Kuṭikāyaṃ laddhavisesattā pana therassa tato pabhuti kuṭivihārītveva samaññā udapādi. Ayameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇagāthāpi ahosīti.
atk-s0508a1:1458_0: Ayamāhu purāṇiyāti āyasmato kuṭivihārittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:1458_1: bhagavato pasannamānaso pariḷāhakāle naḷavilīvehi viracitaṃ bījaniṃ adāsi. Taṃ satthā
atk-s0508a1:1458_2: anumodanagāthāya sampahaṃsesi. Sesaṃ yadettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ añjanavaniyattheravatthumhi
atk-s0508a1:1458_3: vuttasadisameva. Ayaṃ pana viseso – ayaṃ kira vuttanayena pabbajitvā aññatarāya purāṇakuṭikāya
atk-s0508a1:1458_4: viharanto samaṇadhammaṃ acintetvā, “ayaṃ kuṭikā jiṇṇā, aññaṃ kuṭikaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0508a1:1458_5: navakammavasena cittaṃ uppādesi. Tassa atthakāmā devatā saṃvegajananatthaṃ imaṃ uttānobhāsaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1459_0: 57. Tattha ayanti āsannapaccakkhavacanaṃ. Āhūti ahosīti attho. Gāthāsukhatthañhi
atk-s0508a1:1459_1: dīghaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Purāṇiyāti purātanī addhagatā. Aññaṃ patthayase navaṃ kuṭinti
atk-s0508a1:1459_2: imissā kuṭiyā purāṇabhāvena jiṇṇatāya ito aññaṃ idāni nibbattanīyatāya navaṃ kuṭiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1459_3: patthayase patthesi āsīsasi. Sabbena sabbaṃ pana āsaṃ kuṭiyā virājaya purāṇiyaṃ viya
atk-s0508a1:1459_4: navāyampi kuṭiyaṃ āsaṃ taṇhaṃ apekkhaṃ virājehi, sabbaso tattha virattacitto hohi.
atk-s0508a1:1459_5: Kasmā? Yasmā dukkhā bhikkhu puna navā nāma kuṭi bhikkhu puna idāni nibbattiyamānā
atk-s0508a1:1459_6: dukkhāvahattā dukkhā, tasmā aññaṃ navaṃ dukkhaṃ anuppādento yathānibbattāyaṃ purāṇiyaṃyeva
atk-s0508a1:1459_7: kuṭiyaṃ ṭhatvā attanā katabbaṃ karohīti. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – tvaṃ, bhikkhu, “ayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1459_8: purāṇī tiṇakuṭikā jiṇṇā”ti aññaṃ navaṃ tiṇakuṭikaṃ kātuṃ icchasi, na samaṇadhammaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1459_9: evaṃ icchanto pana bhāvanāya ananuyuñjanena punabbhavābhinibbattiyā anativattanato
atk-s0508a1:1459_10: āyatiṃ attabhāvakuṭimpi patthento kātuṃ icchantoyeva nāma hoti. Sā pana navā tiṇakuṭi
atk-s0508a1:1459_12: tasmā tiṇakuṭiyaṃ viya attabhāvakuṭiyaṃ āsaṃ apekkhaṃ virājaya sabbaso tattha virattacitto
