atk-s0508a1:1459_13: hohi, evaṃ te vaṭṭadukkhaṃ na bhavissatīti. Devatāya ca vacanaṃ sutvā thero saṃvegajāto
atk-s0508a1:1459_14: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto nacirasseva arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1466: “Yathā me kāyo nibbāti, pariḷāho na vijjati;
atk-s0508a1:1481_0: Arahatte pana patiṭṭhito “ayaṃ me arahattappattiyā aṅkusabhūtā”ti tameva gāthaṃ paccudāhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1481_1: Sāyeva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇagāthā ahosi. Kuṭiovādena laddhavisesattā cassa kuṭivihārītveva samaññā ahosīti.
atk-s0508a1:1484_0: Ramaṇīyā me kuṭikāti āyasmato ramaṇīyakuṭikattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Sopi kira
atk-s0508a1:1484_1: padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kusalabījaropanaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ito
atk-s0508a1:1484_2: aṭṭhārasakappasatamatthake atthadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1484_3: patto buddhārahaṃ āsanaṃ bhagavato adāsi. Pupphehi ca bhagavantaṃ pūjetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0508a1:1484_4: vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi. Sesaṃ añjanavaniyattherassa vatthumhi vuttasadisameva.
atk-s0508a1:1484_5: Ayaṃ pana viseso – ayaṃ kira vuttanayena pabbajitvā katapubbakicco vajjiraṭṭhe aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1484_6: gāmakāvāse kuṭikāyaṃ viharati, sā hoti kuṭikā abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā suparikammakatabhittibhūmikā
atk-s0508a1:1484_8: ca vattasampannatāya susammaṭṭhaṅgaṇatādinā bhiyyosomattāya ramaṇīyatarā hutvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0508a1:1484_9: So tattha viharanto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1496_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā there tattha viharante kuṭikāya ramaṇīyabhāvato vihārapekkhakā
atk-s0508a1:1496_1: manussā tato tato āgantvā kuṭiṃ passanti. Athekadivasaṃ katipayā dhuttajātikā itthiyo
atk-s0508a1:1496_2: tattha gatā kuṭikāya ramaṇīyabhāvaṃ disvā, “ettha vasanto ayaṃ samaṇo siyā amhehi
atk-s0508a1:1496_3: ākaḍḍhanīyahadayo”ti adhippāyena – “ramaṇīyaṃ vo, bhante, vasanaṭṭhānaṃ. Mayampi
atk-s0508a1:1496_4: ramaṇīyarūpā paṭhamayobbane ṭhitā”ti vatvā itthikuttādīni dassetuṃ ārabhiṃsu. Thero
atk-s0508a1:1496_5: attano vītarāgabhāvaṃ pakāsento “ramaṇīyā me kuṭikā, saddhādeyyā manoramā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1497_0: 58. Tattha ramaṇīyā me kuṭikāti “ramaṇīyā te, bhante, kuṭikā”ti yaṃ tumhehi vuttaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1497_1: taṃ saccaṃ. Ayaṃ mama vasanakuṭikā ramaṇīyā manuññarūpā, sā ca kho saddhādeyyā, “evarūpāya
atk-s0508a1:1497_2: manāpaṃ katvā pabbajitānaṃ dinnāya idaṃ nāma phalaṃ hotī”ti kammaphalāni saddahitvā
atk-s0508a1:1497_3: saddhāya dhammacchandena dātabbattā saddhādeyyā, na dhanena nibbattitā. Sayañca tathādinnāni
atk-s0508a1:1497_4: saddhādeyyāni passantānaṃ paribhuñjantānañca mano rametīti manoramā. Saddhādeyyattā
atk-s0508a1:1497_5: eva hi manoramā, saddhādīhi deyyadhammaṃ sakkaccaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā denti, saddhādeyyañca
atk-s0508a1:1497_6: paribhuñjantā sappurisā dāyakassa avisaṃvādanatthampi payogāsayasampannā honti, na
atk-s0508a1:1497_7: tumhehi cintitākārena payogāsayavipannāti adhippāyo. Na me attho kumārīhīti yasmā
atk-s0508a1:1497_8: sabbaso kāmehi vinivattitamānaso ahaṃ, tasmā na me attho kumārīhi. Kappiyakārakakammavasenapi
atk-s0508a1:1497_9: hi mādisānaṃ itthīhi payojanaṃ nāma natthi, pageva rāgavasena, tasmā na me attho
atk-s0508a1:1497_10: kumārīhīti. Kumāriggahaṇañcettha upalakkhaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Mādisassa nāma santike
atk-s0508a1:1497_11: evaṃ paṭipajjāhīti ayuttakārinīhi yāva aparaddhañca tumhehi samānajjhāsayānaṃ purato
atk-s0508a1:1497_12: ayaṃ kiriyā sobheyyāti dassento āha “yesaṃ attho tahiṃ gacchatha nāriyo”ti. Tattha
atk-s0508a1:1497_13: yesanti kāmesu avītarāgānaṃ. Atthoti payojanaṃ. Tahinti tattha tesaṃ santikaṃ. Nāriyoti
atk-s0508a1:1497_14: ālapanaṃ. Taṃ sutvā itthiyo maṅkubhūtā pattakkhandhā āgatamaggeneva gatā. Ettha ca
atk-s0508a1:1497_15: “na me attho kumārīhī”ti kāmehi anatthikabhāvavacaneneva therena arahattaṃ byākatanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1500_0: Saddhāyāhaṃ pabbajitoti āyasmato kosalavihārittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a1:1500_1: kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kusalabījaṃ ropetvā taṃ taṃ puññaṃ akāsi. Sesaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1500_2: añjanavaniyattheravatthusadisameva. Ayaṃ pana viseso – ayaṃ kira vuttanayena pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:1500_3: katapubbakicco kosalaraṭṭhe aññatarasmiṃ gāme ekaṃ upāsakakulaṃ nissāya araññe viharati,
atk-s0508a1:1500_4: taṃ so upāsako rukkhamūle vasantaṃ disvā kuṭikaṃ kāretvā adāsi. Thero kuṭikāyaṃ viharanto
atk-s0508a1:1500_5: āvāsasappāyena samādhānaṃ labhitvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1511: “Sakaṃ cittaṃ pasādetvā, biḷāliṃ me adā tuvaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:1518: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhappaṭisaṃvedanena uppannapītivegena udānento “saddhāyāhaṃ pabbajito”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1519_0: 59. Tattha saddhāyāti bhagavato vesāliṃ upagamane ānubhāvaṃ disvā, “ekantaniyyānikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1519_1: idaṃ sāsanaṃ, tasmā addhā imāya paṭipattiyā jarāmaraṇato muccissāmī”ti uppannasaddhāvasena
atk-s0508a1:1519_2: pabbajito pabbajjaṃ upagato. Araññe me kuṭikā katāti tassā pabbajjāya anurūpavasena
atk-s0508a1:1519_3: araññe vasato me kuṭikā katā, pabbajjānurūpaṃ āraññako hutvā vūpakaṭṭho viharāmīti
atk-s0508a1:1519_4: dasseti. Tenāha “appamatto ca ātāpī, sampajāno patissato”ti. Araññavāsaladdhena kāyavivekena
atk-s0508a1:1519_5: jāgariyaṃ anuyuñjanto tattha satiyā avippavāsena appamatto, āraddhavīriyatāya ātāpī,
atk-s0508a1:1519_7: accantameva sampajāno patissato viharāmīti attho. Appamattabhāvādikittane cassa idameva
atk-s0508a1:1519_8: aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosi kosalaraṭṭhe ciranivāsibhāvena pana kosalavihārīti samaññā jātāti.
atk-s0508a1:1522_0: Te me ijjhiṃsu saṅkappāti āyasmato sīvalittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:1522_1: bhagavato kāle heṭṭhā vuttanayena vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0508a1:1522_2: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ lābhīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi anāgate evarūpena
atk-s0508a1:1522_3: bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti dasabalaṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahādānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1522_4: datvā “bhagavā ahaṃ iminā adhikārakammena aññaṃ sampattiṃ na patthemi, anāgate pana
atk-s0508a1:1522_5: ekabuddhassa sāsane ahampi tumhehi so etadagge ṭhapitabhikkhu viya lābhīnaṃ aggo
atk-s0508a1:1522_6: bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi. Satthā anantarāyaṃ disvā – “ayaṃ te patthanā anāgate
atk-s0508a1:1522_7: gotamabuddhassa santike samijjhissatī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi. Sopi kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1522_8: kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto vipassībuddhakāle bandhumatīnagarato avidūre
atk-s0508a1:1522_9: ekasmiṃ gāmake paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Tasmiṃ samaye bandhumatīnagaravāsino raññā saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1522_10: sākacchitvā dasabalassa dānaṃ denti. Te ekadivasaṃ sabbeva ekato hutvā dānaṃ dentā
atk-s0508a1:1522_11: “kiṃ nu kho amhākaṃ dānamukhe natthī”ti madhuñca guḷadadhiñca na addasaṃsu. Te “yato
atk-s0508a1:1522_12: kutoci āharissāmā”ti janapadato nagarapavisanamagge purisaṃ ṭhapesuṃ. Tadā esa kulaputto
atk-s0508a1:1522_13: attano gāmato guḷadadhivārakaṃ gahetvā, “kiñcideva āharissāmī”ti nagaraṃ gacchanto,
atk-s0508a1:1522_14: “mukhaṃ dhovitvā dhotahatthapādo pavisissāmī”ti phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ olokento naṅgalasīsamattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1522_15: nimmakkhikaṃ daṇḍakamadhuṃ disvā “puññena me idaṃ uppanna”nti gahetvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0508a1:1522_16: Nāgarehi ṭhapitapuriso taṃ disvā, “bho purisa, kassimaṃ āharasī”ti pucchi. “Na kassaci,
atk-s0508a1:1522_17: sāmi, vikkiṇituṃ pana me idaṃ ābhata”nti. “Tena hi, bho, idaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ gahetvā etaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1522_18: madhuñca guḷadadhiñca dehī”ti. So cintesi – “idaṃ na bahumūlaṃ, ayañca ekappahāreneva
atk-s0508a1:1522_19: bahuṃ deti, vīmaṃsituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Tato naṃ “nāhaṃ ekena kahāpaṇena demī”ti āha.
atk-s0508a1:1522_20: “Yadi evaṃ dve gahetvā dehī”ti. “Dvīhipi na demī”ti. Etenupāyena vaḍḍhetvā sahassaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1523_0: So cintesi – “ativaḍḍhituṃ na vaṭṭati, hotu tāva iminā kattabbakiccaṃ pucchissāmī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1523_1: Atha naṃ āha – “idaṃ na bahuṃ agghanakaṃ, tvañca bahuṃ desi, kena kammena idaṃ gaṇhāsī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1523_2: “Idha, bho, nagaravāsino raññā saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhitvā vipassīdasabalassa dānaṃ dentā
atk-s0508a1:1523_3: idaṃ dvayaṃ dānamukhe apassantā pariyesanti, sace idaṃ dvayaṃ na labhissanti, nāgarānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1523_4: parājayo bhavissati, tasmā sahassaṃ katvā gaṇhāmī”ti. “Kiṃ panetaṃ nāgarānameva vaṭṭati,
atk-s0508a1:1523_5: aññesaṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti. “Yassa kassaci dātuṃ avāritameta”nti. “Atthi pana koci
atk-s0508a1:1523_6: nāgarānaṃ dāne ekadivasaṃ sahassaṃ dātā”ti? “Natthi, sammā”ti. “Imesaṃ pana dvinnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1523_7: sahassagghanakabhāvaṃ jānāsī”ti? “Āma, jānāmī”ti. “Tena hi gaccha, nāgarānaṃ ācikkha
atk-s0508a1:1523_8: ‘eko puriso imāni dve mūlena na deti sahattheneva dātukāmo, tumhe imesaṃ dvinnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1523_9: kāraṇā nibbitakkā hothā’ti, tvaṃ pana me imasmiṃ dānamukhe jeṭṭhakabhāvassa kāyasakkhī
atk-s0508a1:1523_10: hohī”ti. So paribbayatthaṃ gahitamāsakena pañcakaṭukaṃ gahetvā cuṇṇaṃ katvā dadhito
atk-s0508a1:1523_11: kañjiyaṃ gahetvā tattha madhupaṭalaṃ pīḷetvā pañcakaṭukacuṇṇena yojetvā ekasmiṃ paduminipatte
atk-s0508a1:1523_12: pakkhipitvā taṃ saṃvidahitvā ādāya dasabalassa avidūraṭṭhāne nisīdi mahājanena āhariyamānassa
atk-s0508a1:1523_13: sakkārassa avidūre attano pattavāraṃ olokayamāno, so okāsaṃ ñatvā satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1523_14: gantvā bhagavā ayaṃ uppannaduggatapaṇṇākāro, imaṃ me anukampaṃ paṭicca paṭiggaṇhathāti.
atk-s0508a1:1523_15: Satthā tassa anukampaṃ paṭicca catumahārājadattiyena selamayapattena taṃ paṭiggahetvā
atk-s0508a1:1523_16: yathā aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyā bhikkhusatasahassassa diyyamānaṃ na khīyati, evaṃ adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1523_17: So kulaputto niṭṭhitabhattakiccaṃ bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito āha – “diṭṭho
atk-s0508a1:1523_18: me, bhagavā, ajja bandhumatīnagaravāsikehi tumhākaṃ sakkāro āhariyamāno, ahampi imassa
atk-s0508a1:1523_19: kammassa nissandena nibbattanibbattabhave lābhaggayasaggappatto bhaveyya”nti. Satthā,
atk-s0508a1:1523_20: “evaṃ hotu, kulaputtā”ti vatvā tassa ca nagaravāsīnañca bhattānumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:1524_0: Sopi kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:1524_1: suppavāsāya rājadhītāya kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a1:1524_2: sāyaṃ pātañca paṇṇākārasatāni sakaṭenādāya suppavāsāya upanīyanti. Atha naṃ puññavīmaṃsanatthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1524_3: hatthena bījapacchiṃ phusāpenti. Ekekabījato salākasatampi salākasahassampi niggacchati.
atk-s0508a1:1524_4: Ekekakarīsakhette paṇṇāsampi saṭṭhipi sakaṭappamāṇāni uppajjanti. Koṭṭhe pūraṇakālepi
atk-s0508a1:1524_5: koṭṭhadvāraṃ hatthena phusāpenti. Rājadhītāya puññena gaṇhantānaṃ gahitagahitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1524_6: puna pūrati. Paripuṇṇabhattabhājanatopi “rājadhītāya puñña”nti vatvā yassa kassaci
atk-s0508a1:1524_7: dentānaṃ yāva na ukkaḍḍhanti, na tāva bhattaṃ khīyati, dārake kucchigateyeva sattavassāni atikkamiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:1525_0: Gabbhe pana paripakke sattāhaṃ mahādukkhaṃ anubhosi. Sā sāmikaṃ āmantetvā, “pure
atk-s0508a1:1525_1: maraṇā jīvamānāva dānaṃ dassāmī”ti satthu santikaṃ pesesi – “gaccha, imaṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1525_2: satthu ārocetvā satthāraṃ nimantehi, yañca satthā vadeti, taṃ sādhukaṃ upalakkhetvā
atk-s0508a1:1525_3: āgantvā mayhaṃ kathehī”ti. So gantvā tassā sāsanaṃ bhagavato ārocesi. Satthā, “sukhinī
atk-s0508a1:1525_4: hotu suppavāsā koliyadhītā arogā, arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyatū”ti āha. Rājā taṃ sutvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1525_5: abhivādetvā attano gāmābhimukho pāyāsi. Tassa pure āgamanāyeva suppavāsāya kucchito
atk-s0508a1:1525_6: dhamakaraṇā udakaṃ viya gabbho nikkhami, parivāretvā nisinnajano assumukhova hasituṃ
atk-s0508a1:1525_7: āraddho tuṭṭhapahaṭṭho mahājano rañño sāsanaṃ ārocetuṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1526_0: Rājā tesaṃ āgamanaṃ disvāva, “dasabalena kathitakathā nipphannā bhavissati maññe”ti
atk-s0508a1:1526_1: cintesi. So āgantvā satthu sāsanaṃ rājadhītāya ārocesi. Rājadhītā tayā nimantitaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1526_2: jīvitabhattameva maṅgalabhattaṃ bhavissati, gaccha sattāhaṃ dasabalaṃ nimantehīti.
atk-s0508a1:1526_3: Rājā tathā akāsi. Sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa mahādānaṃ pavattayiṃsu. Dārako
atk-s0508a1:1526_4: sabbesaṃ ñātīnaṃ santattaṃ cittaṃ nibbāpento jātoti sīvalidārakotvevassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:1526_5: So sattavassāni gabbhe vasitattā jātakālato paṭṭhāya sabbakammakkhamo ahosi. Dhammasenāpati
atk-s0508a1:1526_6: sāriputto sattame divase tena saddhiṃ kathāsallāpaṃ akāsi. Satthāpi dhammapade gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0508a1:1530_0: Atha naṃ thero evamāha – “kiṃ pana tayā evarūpaṃ dukkharāsiṃ anubhavitvā pabbajituṃ
atk-s0508a1:1530_1: na vaṭṭatī”ti? “Labhamāno pabbajeyyaṃ, bhante”ti. Suppavāsā naṃ dārakaṃ therena saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1530_2: kathentaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho me putto dhammasenāpatinā saddhiṃ kathetī”ti theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a1:1530_3: pucchi – “mayhaṃ putto tumhehi saddhiṃ kiṃ katheti, bhante”ti? “Attanā anubhūtaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1530_5: bhante, pabbājetha na”nti. Thero taṃ vihāraṃ netvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā
atk-s0508a1:1530_6: pabbājento “sīvali, na tuyhaṃ aññena ovādena kammaṃ atthi, tayā satta vassāni anubhūtadukkhameva
atk-s0508a1:1530_7: paccavekkhāhī”ti. “Bhante, pabbājanameva tumhākaṃ bhāro, yaṃ pana mayā kātuṃ sakkā,
atk-s0508a1:1530_8: tamahaṃ jānissāmī”ti. So pana paṭhamakesavaṭṭiyā ohāraṇakkhaṇeyeva sotāpattiphale
atk-s0508a1:1530_9: patiṭṭhāsi, dutiyāya ohāraṇakkhaṇe sakadāgāmiphale, tatiyāya anāgāmiphale sabbesaṃyeva
atk-s0508a1:1530_10: pana kesānaṃ oropanañca arahattasacchikiriyā ca apacchā apurimā ahosi. Tassa pabbajitadivasato
atk-s0508a1:1530_11: paṭṭhāya bhikkhusaṅghassa cattāro paccayā yāvaticchakaṃ uppajjanti. Evaṃ ettha vatthu samuṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1531_0: Aparabhāge satthā sāvatthiṃ agamāsi. Thero satthāraṃ abhivādetvā, “bhante, mayhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1531_1: puññaṃ vīmaṃsissāmi, pañca me bhikkhusatāni dethā”ti āha. “Gaṇha sīvalī”ti. So pañcasate
atk-s0508a1:1531_2: bhikkhū gahetvā himavantābhimukhaṃ gacchanto aṭavimaggaṃ gacchati, tassa paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1531_3: diṭṭhanigrodhe adhivatthā devatā sattadivasāni dānaṃ adāsi. Iti so –
atk-s0508a1:1536_0: Sabbaṭṭhānesu satta satta divasāneva dānaṃ adaṃsu. Gandhamādanapabbate pana nāgadattadevarājā
atk-s0508a1:1536_1: nāma sattasu divasesu ekadivase khīrapiṇḍapātaṃ adāsi, ekadivase sappipiṇḍapātaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1536_2: Bhikkhusaṅgho āha – “imassa devarañño neva dhenuyo duyhamānā paññāyanti, na dadhinimmathanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1536_3: kuto te devarāja idaṃ uppajjatī”ti. “Bhante kassapadasabalassa kāle khīrasalākabhattadānassetaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1536_4: phala”nti devarājā āha. Aparabhāge satthā khadiravaniyarevatassa paccuggamanaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1536_5: katvā theraṃ attano sāsane lābhaggayasaggappattānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a1:1537_0: Evaṃ lābhaggayasaggappattassa pana imassa therassa arahattappattiṃ ekacce ācariyā
atk-s0508a1:1537_1: evaṃ vadanti – “heṭṭhā vuttanayena dhammasenāpatinā ovāde dinne yaṃ mayā kātuṃ sakkā,
atk-s0508a1:1537_2: tamahaṃ jānissāmīti pabbajitvā vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā taṃ divasaṃyeva aññataraṃ
atk-s0508a1:1537_3: vivittaṃ kuṭikaṃ disvā taṃ pavisitvā mātukucchismiṃ satta vassāni attanā anubhūtaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1537_4: dukkhaṃ anussaritvā tadanusārena atītānāgate tassa avekkhantassa ādittā viya tayo
atk-s0508a1:1537_5: bhavā upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā vipassanāvīthiṃ otari, tāvadeva maggappaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0508a1:1537_6: sabbepi āsave khepento arahattaṃ pāpuṇī”ti. Ubhayathāpi therassa arahattappattiyeva
atk-s0508a1:1537_7: pakāsitā. Thero pana pabhinnapaṭisambhido chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1555: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedanena pītivegena udānento “te me ijjhiṃsu saṅkappā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1556_0: 60. Tattha te me ijjhiṃsu saṅkappā, yadattho pāvisiṃ kuṭiṃ, vijjāvimuttiṃ paccesanti
atk-s0508a1:1556_1: ye pubbe mayā kāmasaṅkappādīnaṃ samucchedakarā nekkhammasaṅkappādayo abhipatthitāyeva
atk-s0508a1:1556_2: “kadā nu khvāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharissāmi, yadariyā etarahi upasampajja
atk-s0508a1:1556_3: viharantī”ti, vimuttādhippāyasaññitā vimuttiṃ uddissa saṅkappā manorathā abhiṇhaso
atk-s0508a1:1556_4: appamattā yadattho yaṃpayojano yesaṃ nipphādanatthaṃ kuṭiṃ suññāgāraṃ vipassituṃ
atk-s0508a1:1556_5: pāvisiṃ tisso vijjā phalavimuttiñca paccesanto, gavesanto te me ijjhiṃsu te sabbeva
atk-s0508a1:1556_6: idāni mayhaṃ ijjhiṃsu samijjhiṃsu, nipphannakusalasaṅkappo paripuṇṇamanoratho jātoti
atk-s0508a1:1556_7: attho. Tesaṃ samiddhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “mānānusayamujjaha”nti vuttaṃ. Yasmā mānānusayamujjahaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1556_8: pajahiṃ samucchindiṃ, tasmā te me saṅkappā ijjhiṃsūti yojanā. Mānānusaye hi pahīne
atk-s0508a1:1556_9: appahīno nāma anusayo natthi, arahattañca adhigatameva hotīti mānānusayappahānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1561_0: Passati passoti āyasmato vappattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:1561_1: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto “asuko ca asuko
atk-s0508a1:1561_2: ca thero satthu paṭhamaṃ dhammapaṭiggāhakā ahesu”nti thomanaṃ sutvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a1:1561_3: patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi – “ahampi bhagavā anāgate tādisassa sammāsambuddhassa paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1561_4: dhammapaṭiggāhakānaṃ aññataro bhaveyya”nti, satthu santike saraṇagamanañca pavedesi.
atk-s0508a1:1561_5: So yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cuto devamanussesuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:1561_6: kapilavatthusmiṃ vāseṭṭhassa nāma brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, vappotissa nāmaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1561_7: ahosi. So asitena isinā “siddhatthakumāro sabbaññū bhavissatī”ti byākato koṇḍaññappamukhehi
atk-s0508a1:1561_8: brāhmaṇaputtehi saddhiṃ gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā “tasmiṃ sabbaññutaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1561_9: patte tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā amataṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti uruvelāyaṃ viharantaṃ mahāsattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1561_10: chabbassāni padhānaṃ padahantaṃ upaṭṭhahitvā oḷārikāhāraparibhogena nibbijjitvā isipatanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1561_11: gato. Abhisambujjhitvā satthārā sattasattāhāni vītināmetvā isipatanaṃ gantvā dhammacakke
atk-s0508a1:1561_12: pavattite pāṭipadadivase sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito pañcamiyaṃ pakkhassa aññāsikoṇḍaññādīhi
atk-s0508a1:1561_13: saddhiṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1573: Nibbāpetha sakaṃ cittaṃ, mā haññittho punappunaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1583_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attanā paṭiladdhasampattiṃ paccavekkhaṇamukhena satthu guṇamahantataṃ
atk-s0508a1:1583_1: paccavekkhitvā “īdisaṃ nāma satthāraṃ bāhulikādivādena samudācarimha. Aho puthujjanabhāvo
atk-s0508a1:1583_2: nāma andhakaraṇo acakkhukaraṇo ariyabhāvoyeva cakkhukaraṇo”ti dassento “passati passo”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1584_0: 61. Tattha passati passoti passati sammādiṭṭhiyā dhamme aviparītaṃ jānāti bujjhatīti
atk-s0508a1:1584_1: passo, dassanasampanno ariyo, so passantaṃ aviparītadassāviṃ “ayaṃ aviparītadassāvī”ti
atk-s0508a1:1584_2: passati paññācakkhunā dhammādhammaṃ yathāsabhāvato jānāti. Na kevalaṃ passantameva,
atk-s0508a1:1584_3: atha kho apassantañca passati, yo paññācakkhuvirahito dhamme yathāsabhāvato na passati,
atk-s0508a1:1584_4: tampi apassantaṃ puthujjanaṃ “andho vatāyaṃ bhavaṃ acakkhuko”ti attano paññācakkhunā
atk-s0508a1:1584_5: passati. Apassanto apassantaṃ, passantañca na passatīti apassanto paññācakkhurahito
atk-s0508a1:1584_6: andhabālo tādisaṃ andhabālaṃ ayaṃ dhammādhammaṃ yathāsabhāvato na passatīti yathā
atk-s0508a1:1584_7: apassantaṃ na passati na jānāti, evaṃ attano paññācakkhunā dhammādhammaṃ yathāsabhāvato
atk-s0508a1:1584_8: passantañca paṇḍitaṃ “ayaṃ evaṃvidho”ti na passati na jānāti, tasmā ahampi pubbe
atk-s0508a1:1584_9: dassanarahito sakalaṃ ñeyyaṃ hatthāmalakaṃ viya passantaṃ bhagavantaṃ apassantampi
atk-s0508a1:1584_10: pūraṇādiṃ yathāsabhāvato na passiṃ, idāni pana buddhānubhāvena sampanno ubhayepi
atk-s0508a1:1584_11: yathāsabhāvato passāmīti sevitabbāsevitabbesu attano aviparītapaṭipattiṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:1587_0: Ekakā mayaṃ araññeti āyasmato vajjiputtattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:1587_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito ekanavute
atk-s0508a1:1587_2: kappe vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ vipassiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1587_3: bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso nāgapupphakesarehi pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:1587_4: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde amaccakule nibbatti, vajjiputtotissa
atk-s0508a1:1587_5: nāmaṃ ahosi. So bhagavato vesāligamane buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:1587_6: katapubbakicco kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vesāliyā avidūre aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe viharati.
atk-s0508a1:1587_7: Tena ca samayena vesāliyaṃ ussavo ahosi. Tattha tattha naccagītavāditaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0508a1:1587_8: mahājano haṭṭhatuṭṭho ussavasampattiṃ paccanubhoti, taṃ sutvā so bhikkhu ayoniso
atk-s0508a1:1587_9: ummujjanto vivekaṃ vajjamāno kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā attano anabhiratiṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0508a1:1588: “Ekakā mayaṃ araññe viharāma, apaviddhaṃva vanasmiṃ dārukaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:1589: Etādisikāya rattiyā, ko su nāma amhehi pāpiyo”ti. – gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a1:1590_0: Taṃ sutvā vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā taṃ bhikkhuṃ anukampamānā “yadipi, tvaṃ bhikkhu,
atk-s0508a1:1590_1: araññavāsaṃ hīḷento vadasi, vivekakāmā pana viddasuno taṃ bahu maññantiyevā”ti imamatthaṃ dassentī –
atk-s0508a1:1591: “Ekako tvaṃ araññe viharasi, apaviddhaṃva vanasmiṃ dārukaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:1592: Tassa te bahukā pihayanti, nerayikā viya saggagāmina”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:1593_0: Gāthaṃ vatvā, “kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, bhikkhu, niyyānike sammāsambuddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:1593_1: aniyyānikaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakkessasī”ti santajjentī saṃvejesi. Evaṃ so bhikkhu tāya
atk-s0508a1:1593_2: devatāya saṃvejito kasābhihato viya bhadro assājānīyo vipassanāvīthiṃ otaritvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:1593_3: vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1603: Arahattaṃ pana patvā “ayaṃ me arahattappattiyā aṅkuso jāto”ti attano devatāya ca vuttanayaṃ saṃkaḍḍhitvā –
atk-s0508a1:1605: “Ekakā mayaṃ araññe viharāma, apaviddhaṃva vanasmiṃ dārukaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:1606: Tassa me bahukā pihayanti, nerayikā viya saggagāmina”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:1608_0: Tassattho – anapekkhabhāvena vane chaḍḍitadārukkhaṇḍaṃ viya yadipi mayaṃ ekakā ekākino
atk-s0508a1:1608_1: asahāyā imasmiṃ araññe viharāma, evaṃ viharato pana tassa me bahukā pihayanti maṃ
atk-s0508a1:1608_2: bahū atthakāmarūpā kulaputtā abhipatthenti, “aho vatassa mayampi vajjiputtatthero
atk-s0508a1:1608_3: viya gharabandhanaṃ pahāya araññe vihareyyāmā”ti. Yathā kiṃ? Nerayikā viya saggagāminaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1608_4: yathā nāma nerayikā attano pāpakammena niraye nibbattasattā saggagāmīnaṃ saggūpagāmīnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1608_5: pihayanti – “aho vata mayampi nirayadukkhaṃ pahāya saggasukhaṃ paccanubhaveyyāmā”ti
atk-s0508a1:1608_6: evaṃsampadamidanti attho. Ettha ca attani garubahuvacanappayogassa icchitabbattā
atk-s0508a1:1608_7: “ekakā mayaṃ viharāmā”ti puna tassa atthassa ekattaṃ sandhāya “tassa me”ti ekavacanappayogo
atk-s0508a1:1608_8: kato. “Tassa me”, “saggagāmina”nti ca ubhayampi ‘pihayantī’ti padaṃ apekkhitvā upayogatthe
atk-s0508a1:1608_9: sampadānaniddeso daṭṭhabbo. Taṃ abhipatthentīti ca tādise araññavāsādiguṇe abhipatthentā
atk-s0508a1:1608_10: nāma hontīti katvā vuttaṃ. Tassa meti vā tassa mama santike guṇeti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:1611_0: Cutā patantīti āyasmato pakkhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro
atk-s0508a1:1611_1: tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto ito ekanavute kappe yakkhasenāpati hutvā vipassiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1611_2: bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso dibbavatthena pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:1611_3: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sakkesu devadahanigame sākiyarājakule nibbatti, “sammodakumāro”tissa
atk-s0508a1:1611_4: nāmaṃ ahosi. Athassa daharakāle vātarogena pādā na vahiṃsu. So katipayaṃ kālaṃ pīṭhasappī
atk-s0508a1:1611_5: viya vicari. Tenassa pakkhoti samaññā jātā. Pacchā arogakālepi tatheva naṃ sañjānanti,
atk-s0508a1:1611_6: so bhagavato ñātisamāgame pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā katapubbakicco
atk-s0508a1:1611_7: kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe viharati. Athekadivasaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisituṃ gacchanto
atk-s0508a1:1611_8: antarāmagge aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi. Tasmiñca samaye aññataro kulalo maṃsapesiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1611_9: ādāya ākāsena gacchati, taṃ bahū kulalā anupatitvā pātesuṃ. Pātitaṃ maṃsapesiṃ eko
atk-s0508a1:1611_10: kulalo aggahesi. Taṃ añño acchinditvā gaṇhi, taṃ disvā thero “yathāyaṃ maṃsapesi,
atk-s0508a1:1611_11: evaṃ kāmā nāma bahusādhāraṇā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā”ti – kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme
atk-s0508a1:1611_12: ca ānisaṃsaṃ paccavekkhitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā “anicca”ntiādinā manasikaronto
atk-s0508a1:1611_13: piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco divāṭṭhāne nisīditvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1620: “Aho buddho aho dhammo, aho no satthu sampadā;
atk-s0508a1:1631: Arahattaṃ pana patvā yadeva saṃvegavatthuṃ aṅkusaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aññā adhigatā, tassa saṃkittanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto “cutā patantī”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1632_0: 63. Tattha cutāti bhaṭṭhā. Patantīti anupatanti. Patitāti cavanavasena bhūmiyaṃ patitā,
atk-s0508a1:1632_1: ākāse vā sampatanavasena patitā. Giddhāti gedhaṃ āpannā. Punarāgatāti punadeva upagatā.
atk-s0508a1:1632_2: Ca-saddo sabbattha yojetabbo. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – patanti anupatanti ca idha kulalā,
atk-s0508a1:1632_3: itarassa mukhato cutā ca maṃsapesi, cutā pana sā bhūmiyaṃ patitā ca, giddhā gedhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1632_4: āpannā sabbeva kulalā punarāgatā. Yathā cime kulalā, evaṃ saṃsāre paribbhamantā sattā
atk-s0508a1:1632_5: ye kusaladhammato cutā, te patanti nirayādīsu, evaṃ patitā ca, sampattibhave ṭhitā
atk-s0508a1:1632_6: tattha kāmasukhānuyogavasena kāmabhave rūpārūpabhavesu ca bhavanikantivasena giddhā
atk-s0508a1:1632_7: ca punarāgatā bhavato aparimuttattā tena tena bhavagāminā kammena taṃ taṃ bhavasaññitaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1632_8: dukkhaṃ āgatā eva, evaṃbhūtā ime sattā. Mayā pana kataṃ kiccaṃ pariññādibhedaṃ soḷasavidhampi
atk-s0508a1:1632_9: kiccaṃ kataṃ, na dāni taṃ kātabbaṃ atthi. Rataṃ rammaṃ ramitabbaṃ ariyehi sabbasaṅkhatavinissaṭaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1632_10: nibbānaṃ rataṃ abhirataṃ rammaṃ. Tena ca sukhenanvāgataṃ sukhaṃ phalasamāpattisukhena
atk-s0508a1:1632_11: anuāgataṃ upagataṃ accantasukhaṃ nibbānaṃ, sukhena vā sukhāpaṭipadābhūtena vipassanāsukhena
atk-s0508a1:1632_12: maggasukhena ca anvāgataṃ phalasukhaṃ nibbānasukhañcāti attho veditabbo.
atk-s0508a1:1635_0: Dumavhayāya uppannoti vimalakoṇḍaññattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:1635_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito ekanavute
atk-s0508a1:1635_2: kappe vipassissa bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1635_3: vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ mahatiyā parisāya parivutaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:1635_4: catūhi suvaṇṇapupphehi pūjesi. Bhagavā tassa pasādasaṃvaḍḍhanatthaṃ tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:1635_5: abhisaṅkhāresi, yathā suvaṇṇābhā sakalaṃ taṃ padesaṃ ottharati. Taṃ disvā bhiyyosomattāya
atk-s0508a1:1635_6: pasannamānaso hutvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā taṃ nimittaṃ gahetvā attano gehaṃ gantvā
atk-s0508a1:1635_7: buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ avijahanto kenaci rogena kālaṃ katvā tusitesu upapanno aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1635_8: puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājānaṃ bimbisāraṃ paṭicca
atk-s0508a1:1635_9: ambapāliyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Rājā hi bimbisāro taruṇakāle ambapāliyā rūpasampattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1635_10: sutvā sañjātābhilāso katipayamanussaparivāro aññātakavesena vesāliṃ gantvā ekarattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1635_11: tāya saṃvāsaṃ kappesi. Tadā ayaṃ tassā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. Sā ca gabbhassa
atk-s0508a1:1635_12: patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ tassa ārocesi. Rājāpi attānaṃ jānāpetvā dātabbayuttakaṃ datvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:1635_13: Sā gabbhassa paripākamanvāya puttaṃ vijāyi, “vimalo”tissa nāmaṃ ahosi, pacchā vimalakoṇḍaññoti
atk-s0508a1:1635_14: paññāyittha. So vayappatto bhagavato vesāligamane buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:1635_15: pabbajitvā katapubbakicco vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1641: Buddhābhā ca suvaṇṇābhā, āloko vipulo ahu.
atk-s0508a1:1653: Arahattaṃ pana patvā aññāpadesena aññaṃ byākaronto “dumavhayāyā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1654_0: 64. Tattha dumavhayāyāti dumena ambena avhātabbāya, ambapāliyāti attho. Ādhāre cetaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1654_1: bhummavacanaṃ. Uppannoti tassā kucchiyaṃ uppanno uppajjamāno ca. Jāto paṇḍaraketunāti
atk-s0508a1:1654_3: taṃ paṭicca nibbattoti attho. Uppannoti vā paṭhamābhinibbattidassanaṃ. Tato hi jātoti
atk-s0508a1:1654_4: abhijātidassanaṃ. Vijāyanakālato paṭṭhāya hi loke jātavohāro. Ettha ca “dumavhayāya
atk-s0508a1:1654_5: uppanno”ti iminā attukkaṃsanabhāvaṃ apaneti, anekapatiputtānampi visesādhigamasambhavañca
atk-s0508a1:1654_6: dīpeti. “Jāto paṇḍaraketunā”ti iminā viññātapitikadassanena paravambhanaṃ apaneti.
atk-s0508a1:1654_7: Ketuhāti mānappahāyī. Māno hi uṇṇatilakkhaṇattā ketu viyāti ketu. Tathā hi so “ketukamyatāpaccupaṭṭhāno”ti
atk-s0508a1:1654_8: vuccati. Ketunāyevāti paññāya eva. Paññā hi anavajjadhammesu accuggataṭṭhena mārasenappamaddanena
atk-s0508a1:1654_9: pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena ca ariyānaṃ dhajā nāma. Tenāha “dhammo hi isinaṃ dhajo”ti. Mahāketuṃ
atk-s0508a1:1654_10: padhaṃsayīti mahāvisayatāya mahantā, seyyamānajātimānādibhedato bahavo ca mānappakārā,
atk-s0508a1:1654_11: itare ca kilesadhammā samussitaṭṭhena ketu etassāti mahāketu māro pāpimā. Taṃ balavidhamanavisayātikkamanavasena
atk-s0508a1:1654_12: abhibhavi nibbisevanaṃ akāsīti. “Mahāketuṃ padhaṃsayī”ti attānaṃ paraṃ viya dassento
atk-s0508a1:1657_0: Ukkhepakatavacchassāti āyasmato ukkhepakatavacchattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Sopi
atk-s0508a1:1657_1: kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto
atk-s0508a1:1657_2: ito catunavute kappe siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto
atk-s0508a1:1657_3: satthāraṃ uddissa māḷaṃ karontassa pūgassa ekatthambhaṃ alabhantassa thambhaṃ datvā
atk-s0508a1:1657_4: sahāyakiccaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni
atk-s0508a1:1657_5: katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0508a1:1657_6: putto hutvā nibbatti, vacchotissa gottato āgatanāmaṃ. So satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a1:1657_7: paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kosalaraṭṭhe gāmakāvāse vasanto āgatāgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1657_8: santike dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti. “Ayaṃ vinayo idaṃ suttantaṃ ayaṃ abhidhammo”ti pana
atk-s0508a1:1657_9: paricchedaṃ na jānāti. Athekadivasaṃ āyasmantaṃ dhammasenāpatiṃ pucchitvā yathāparicchedaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1657_10: sabbaṃ sallakkhesi. Dhammasaṅgītiyā pubbepi piṭakādisamaññā pariyattisaddhamme vavatthitā
atk-s0508a1:1657_11: eva, yato bhikkhūnaṃ vinayadharādivohāro. So tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhanto paripucchanto
atk-s0508a1:1657_12: tattha vutte rūpārūpadhamme sallakkhetvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā sammasanto nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:1659: Saraṇaṃ gatā ca te buddhaṃ, saddahanti tathāgataṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1665: Māḷaṃ mayaṃ kattukāmā, ekatthambho na labbhati.
atk-s0508a1:1685_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā katakiccattā akilāsubhāve ṭhito attano santikaṃ upagatānaṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1685_1: anukampaṃ upādāya tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ vīmaṃsitvā dhammaṃ desesi. Desento ca ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1688: Taṃ bhāsati gahaṭṭhānaṃ, sunisinno uḷārapāmojjo”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:1689_0: Tattha ukkhepakatavacchassāti kataukkhepavacchassa, bhikkhuno santike visuṃ visuṃ
atk-s0508a1:1689_1: uggahitaṃ vinayapadesaṃ suttapadesaṃ abhidhammapadesañca yathāparicchedaṃ vinayasuttābhidhammānaṃyeva
atk-s0508a1:1689_2: upari khipitvā sajjhāyanavasena tattha tattheva pakkhipitvā ṭhitavacchenāti attho
atk-s0508a1:1689_3: karaṇatthe hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Saṅkalitaṃ bahūhi vassehīti bahukehi saṃvaccharehi
atk-s0508a1:1689_4: sampiṇḍanavasena hadaye ṭhapitaṃ. “Saṅkhalita”ntipi pāṭho, saṅkhalitaṃ viya kataṃ
atk-s0508a1:1689_5: ekābaddhavasena vācuggataṃ kataṃ. Yaṃ buddhavacananti vacanaseso. Tanti taṃ pariyattidhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1689_6: bhāsati katheti. Gahaṭṭhānanti tesaṃ yebhuyyatāya vuttaṃ. Sunisinnoti tasmiṃ dhamme
atk-s0508a1:1689_7: sammā niccalo nisinno, lābhasakkārādiṃ apaccāsīsanto kevalaṃ vimuttāyatanasīseyeva
atk-s0508a1:1689_8: ṭhatvā kathetīti attho. Tenāha “uḷārapāmojjo”ti phalasamāpattisukhavasena dhammadesanāvaseneva
atk-s0508a1:1690_0: “Yathā yathāvuso bhikkhu, yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ vitthārena paresaṃ deseti
atk-s0508a1:1690_1: tathā tathā so tasmiṃ dhamme labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ, labhati dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojja”ntiādi.
atk-s0508a1:1693_0: Anusāsi mahāvīroti āyasmato meghiyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:1693_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave kusalabījāni ropento ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa
atk-s0508a1:1693_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ pāpuṇi. Tasmiñca samaye vipassī bhagavā
atk-s0508a1:1693_3: buddhakiccassa pariyosānamāgamma āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajji. Tena pathavīkampādīsu uppannesu
atk-s0508a1:1693_4: mahājano bhītatasito ahosi. Atha naṃ vessavaṇo mahārājā tamatthaṃ vibhāvetvā samassāsesi.
atk-s0508a1:1693_5: Taṃ sutvā mahājano saṃvegappatto ahosi. Tatthāyaṃ kulaputto buddhānubhāvaṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a1:1693_6: satthari sañjātagāravabahumāno uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedesi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:1693_7: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ sākiyarājakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:1693_8: tassa meghiyoti nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto satthu santike pabbajitvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1693_9: upaṭṭhahanto bhagavati jālikāyaṃ viharante kimikālāya nadiyā tīre ramaṇīyaṃ ambavanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1693_10: disvā tattha viharitukāmo dve vāre bhagavatā vāretvā tatiyavāraṃ vissajjito tattha
atk-s0508a1:1693_11: gantvā micchāvitakkamakkhikāhi khajjamāno cittasamādhiṃ alabhitvā satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1693_12: gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Athassa bhagavā “aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā pañca
atk-s0508a1:1693_13: dhammā paripākāya saṃvattantī”tiādinā ovādaṃ adāsi. So tasmiṃ ovāde ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1693_14: vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1699: Uppādo nu kimatthāya, āloko vipulo ahu.
atk-s0508a1:1701: Pāṇabhūte bhayaṃ natthi, ekaggā hotha saṃvutā.
atk-s0508a1:1702: “Aho buddho aho dhammo, aho no satthu sampadā;
atk-s0508a1:1711: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthu sammukhā ovādaṃ labhitvā “mayā arahattaṃ adhigata”nti aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:1714: Tassāhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvāna, vihāsiṃ santike sato;
atk-s0508a1:1715: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:1716_0: Tattha anusāsīti “aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā pañca dhammā paripākāya saṃvattantī”tiādinā
atk-s0508a1:1716_1: ovadi anusiṭṭhiṃ adāsi. Mahāvīroti mahāvikkanto, vīriyapāramipāripūriyā caturaṅgasamannāgatavīriyādhiṭṭhānena
atk-s0508a1:1716_3: pāragūti sabbesañca ñeyyadhammānaṃ pāraṃ pariyantaṃ ñāṇagamanena gato adhigatoti
atk-s0508a1:1716_4: sabbadhammāna pāragū, sabbaññūti attho. Sabbesaṃ vā saṅkhatadhammānaṃ pārabhūtaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1716_5: nibbānaṃ sayambhūñāṇena gato adhigatoti sabbadhammāna pāragū. Tassāhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvānāti
atk-s0508a1:1716_6: tassa buddhassa bhagavato sāmukkaṃsikaṃ taṃ catusaccadhammaṃ suṇitvā. Vihāsiṃ santiketi
atk-s0508a1:1716_7: ambavane micchāvitakkehi upadduto cālikā vihāraṃ gantvā satthu samīpeyeva vihāsiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1716_8: Satoti satimā, samathavipassanābhāvanāya appamattoti attho. Ahanti idaṃ yathā “anusāsī”ti
atk-s0508a1:1716_9: ettha “ma”nti evaṃ “vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti ettha “mayā”ti pariṇāmetabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1716_10: “Kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti ca iminā yathāvuttaṃ vijjāttayānuppattimeva satthu ovādapaṭikaraṇabhāvadassanena
atk-s0508a1:1716_11: pariyāyantarena pakāseti. Sīlakkhandhādiparipūraṇameva hi satthu sāsanakāritā.
atk-s0508a1:1719_0: Kilesā jhāpitā mayhanti āyasmato ekadhammasavanīyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So
atk-s0508a1:1719_1: kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatto katipaye bhikkhū maggamūḷhe
atk-s0508a1:1719_2: mahāraññe vicarante disvā anukampamāno attano bhavanato otaritvā te samassāsetvā
atk-s0508a1:1719_3: bhojetvā yathādhippetaṭṭhānaṃ pāpesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:1719_4: kassape bhagavati loke uppajjitvā katabuddhakicce parinibbute tasmiṃ kāle bārāṇasirājā
atk-s0508a1:1719_5: kikī nāma ahosi. Tasmiṃ kālaṅkate tassa puthuvindarājā nāma putto āsi. Tassa putto
atk-s0508a1:1719_6: susāmo nāma. Tassa putto kikībrahmadatto nāma hutvā rajjaṃ kārento sāsane antarahite
atk-s0508a1:1719_7: dhammassavanaṃ alabhanto, “yo dhammaṃ deseti, tassa sahassaṃ dammī”ti ghosāpetvā
atk-s0508a1:1719_8: ekampi dhammakathikaṃ alabhanto, “mayhaṃ pitupitāmahādīnaṃ kāle dhammo saṃvattati,
atk-s0508a1:1719_9: dhammakathikā sulabhā ahesuṃ. Idāni pana catuppadikagāthāmattampi kathento dullabho.
atk-s0508a1:1719_10: Yāva dhammasaññā na vinassati, tāvadeva pabbajissāmī”ti rajjaṃ pahāya himavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1719_11: uddissa gacchantaṃ sakko devarājā āgantvā, “aniccā vata saṅkhārā”ti gāthāya dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1719_12: kathetvā nivattesi. So nivattitvā bahuṃ puññaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1719_13: buddhuppāde setabyanagare seṭṭhikule nibbattitvā vayappatto bhagavati setabyanagare
atk-s0508a1:1719_14: siṃsapāvane viharante satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Tassa satthā
atk-s0508a1:1719_15: ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā, “aniccā vata saṅkhārā”ti imāya gāthāya dhammaṃ desesi. Tassa
atk-s0508a1:1719_16: tattha katādhikāratāya so aniccasaññāya pākaṭataraṃ hutvā upaṭṭhitāya paṭiladdhasaṃvego
atk-s0508a1:1719_17: pabbajitvā dhammasammasanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā dukkhasaññaṃ anattasaññañca manasikaronto
atk-s0508a1:1719_18: vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1723: Tassa te munino puttā, vippanaṭṭhā mahāvane.
atk-s0508a1:1731: Tassa ekeneva dhammassavanena nipphannakiccattā ekadhammasavanīyotveva samaññā ahosi. So arahā hutvā aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:1734: Vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:1735_0: Tattha kilesāti yasmiṃ santāne uppannā, taṃ kilesenti vibādhenti upatāpenti vāti
atk-s0508a1:1735_1: kilesā, rāgādayo. Jhāpitāti indagginā viya rukkhagacchādayo ariyamaggañāṇagginā samūlaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1735_2: daḍḍhā. Mayhanti mayā, mama santāne vā. Bhavā sabbe samūhatāti kāmakammabhavādayo
atk-s0508a1:1735_3: sabbe bhavā samugghāṭitā kilesānaṃ jhāpitattā. Sati hi kilesavaṭṭe kammavaṭṭena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1735_4: Kammabhavānaṃ samūhatattā eva ca upapattibhavāpi samūhatā eva anuppattidhammatāya
atk-s0508a1:1738_0: Vuttalakkhaṇo saṃsāro visesato khīṇo, tasmā natthi dāni punabbhavo. Yasmā āyatiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1738_1: punabbhavo natthi, tasmā vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro. Tasmā ca punabbhavo natthi, yasmā
atk-s0508a1:1738_2: bhavā sabbe samūhatāti āvattetvā vattabbaṃ. Atha vā vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, tato eva
atk-s0508a1:1741_0: Adhicetaso appamajjatoti āyasmato ekudāniyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:1741_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto atthadassissa
atk-s0508a1:1741_2: bhagavato kāle yakkhasenāpati hutvā nibbatto satthari parinibbute, “alābhā vata me,
atk-s0508a1:1741_3: dulladdhaṃ vata me, yohaṃ satthudharamānakāle dānādipuññaṃ kātuṃ nālattha”nti paridevasokamāpanno
atk-s0508a1:1741_4: ahosi. Atha naṃ sāgaro nāma satthu sāvako sokaṃ vinodetvā satthu thūpapūjāyaṃ niyojesi.
atk-s0508a1:1741_5: So pañca vassāni thūpaṃ pūjetvā tato cuto tena puññena devamanussesu eva saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:1741_6: kassapassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto kālena kālaṃ satthu
atk-s0508a1:1741_7: santikaṃ upasaṅkami. Tasmiñca samaye satthā “adhicetaso”ti gāthāya sāvake abhiṇhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1741_8: ovadi. So taṃ sutvā saddhājāto pabbaji. Pabbajitvā ca pana tameva gāthaṃ punappunaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1741_9: parivatteti. So tattha vīsativassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ karonto ñāṇassa aparipakkattā
atk-s0508a1:1741_10: visesaṃ nibbattetu nāsakkhi. Tato pana cuto devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva
atk-s0508a1:1741_11: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā
atk-s0508a1:1741_12: nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā jetavanapaṭiggahaṇasamaye buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:1741_13: pabbajitvā katapubbakicco araññe viharanto satthu santikaṃ agamāsi. Tasmiñca samaye
atk-s0508a1:1741_14: satthā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ attano avidūre adhicittamanuyuttaṃ disvā “adhicetaso”ti
atk-s0508a1:1741_15: imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi. Taṃ sutvā ayaṃ cirakālaṃ bhāvanāya araññe viharantopi kālena
atk-s0508a1:1741_16: kālaṃ tameva gāthaṃ udāneti, tenassa ekudāniyoti samaññā udapādi. So athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1741_17: cittekaggataṃ labhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1743: Yakkhayoniṃ upapajjiṃ, yasaṃ patto cahaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a1:1745: Yaṃ me bhoge vijjamāne, parinibbāyi cakkhumā.
atk-s0508a1:1748: “Kiṃ nu socasi mā bhāyi, cara dhammaṃ sumedhasa;
atk-s0508a1:1761: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhena viharanto ekadivasaṃ āyasmatā dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena paṭibhānaṃ vīmaṃsituṃ, “āvuso, mayhaṃ dhammaṃ bhaṇāhī”ti ajjhiṭṭho cirakālaparicitattā –
atk-s0508a1:1764: Sokā na bhavanti tādino, upasantassa sadā satīmato”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:1766_0: Tattha adhicetasoti adhicittavato, sabbacittānaṃ adhikena arahattaphalacittena samannāgatassāti
atk-s0508a1:1766_1: attho. Appamajjatoti nappamajjato, appamādena anavajjadhammesu sātaccakiriyāya samannāgatassāti
atk-s0508a1:1766_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Muninoti “yo munāti ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatī”ti evaṃ ubhayalokamunanena
atk-s0508a1:1766_3: vā, monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ, tena arahattaphalapaññāsaṅkhātena monena samannāgatatāya
atk-s0508a1:1766_4: vā khīṇāsavo muni nāma, tassa munino. Monapathesu sikkhatoti arahattañāṇasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0508a1:1766_5: monassa pathesu upāyamaggesu sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammesu, tīsu vā sikkhāsu sikkhato.
atk-s0508a1:1766_6: Idañca pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. Pariniṭṭhitasikkho hi arahā, tasmā evaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1766_7: sikkhato, imāya sikkhāya munibhāvaṃ pattassa muninoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0508a1:1766_8: Yasmā cetadevaṃ tasmā heṭṭhimamaggaphalacittānaṃ vasena adhicetaso, catusaccasambodhipaṭipattiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1766_9: appamādavasena appamajjato, aggamaggañāṇasamannāgamena muninoti evametesaṃ padānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1766_10: attho yujjatiyeva. Atha vā “appamajjato sikkhato” padhānahetū akkhātāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0508a1:1766_11: Tasmā appamajjanahetu sikkhanahetu ca adhicetasoti attho.
atk-s0508a1:1767_0: Sokā na bhavanti tādinoti tādisassa khīṇāsavamunino abbhantare iṭṭhaviyogādivatthukā
atk-s0508a1:1767_1: sokā cittasantāpā na honti. Atha vā tādilakkhaṇappattassa asekkhamunino sokā na bhavantīti.
atk-s0508a1:1767_2: Upasantassāti rāgādīnaṃ accantūpasamena upasantassa. Sadā satīmatoti sativepullappattiyā
atk-s0508a1:1768_0: Ettha ca “adhicetaso”ti iminā adhicittasikkhā, “appamajjato”ti iminā adhisīlasikkhā,
atk-s0508a1:1768_1: “munino monapathesu sikkhato”ti etehi adhipaññāsikkhā. “Munino”ti vā etena adhipaññāsikkhā,
atk-s0508a1:1768_3: na bhavantī”tiādīhi sikkhāpāripūriyā ānisaṃsā pakāsitāti veditabbaṃ ayameva ca therassa
atk-s0508a1:1771_0: Sutvāna dhammaṃ mahato mahārasanti āyasmato channattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a1:1771_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto
atk-s0508a1:1771_2: siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ siddhatthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1771_3: bhagavantaṃ aññataraṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upagacchantaṃ disvā pasannacitto mudusamphassaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1771_4: paṇṇasantharaṃ santharitvā adāsi. Pupphehi ca samantato okiritvā pūjaṃ akāsi. So
atk-s0508a1:1771_5: tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā punapi aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva
atk-s0508a1:1771_6: saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle suddhodanamahārājassa gehe dāsiyā kucchimhi nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:1771_7: channotissa nāmaṃ ahosi, bodhisattena sahajāto. So satthu ñātisamāgame paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:1771_8: pabbajitvā bhagavati pemena, “amhākaṃ buddho, amhākaṃ dhammo”ti mamattaṃ uppādetvā
atk-s0508a1:1771_9: sinehaṃ chindituṃ asakkonto samaṇadhammaṃ akatvā satthari parinibbute satthārā āṇattavidhinā
atk-s0508a1:1771_10: katena brahmadaṇḍena santajjito saṃvegappatto hutvā sinehaṃ chinditvā vipassanto
atk-s0508a1:1771_11: nacireneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1781: Ito te pañcame kappe, uppajjiṃsu janādhipā.
atk-s0508a1:1783: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhasantappito pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānento –
atk-s0508a1:1788: So yogakkhemassa pathassa kovido”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:1789_0: Tattha sutvānāti suṇitvā, sotena gahetvā ohitasoto sotadvārānusārena upadhāretvā.
atk-s0508a1:1789_1: Dhammanti catusaccadhammaṃ. Mahatoti bhagavato. Bhagavā hi mahantehi uḷāratamehi
atk-s0508a1:1789_2: sīlādiguṇehi samannāgatattā, sadevakena lokena visesato mahanīyatāya ca “mahā”ti
atk-s0508a1:1789_3: vuccati, yā tassa mahāsamaṇoti samaññā jātā. Nissakkavacanañcetaṃ “mahato dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1789_4: sutvānā”ti. Mahārasanti vimuttirasassa dāyakattā uḷārarasaṃ. Sabbaññutaññāṇavarena
atk-s0508a1:1789_5: desitanti sabbaṃ jānātīti sabbaññū, tassa bhāvo sabbaññutā. Ñāṇameva varaṃ, ñāṇesu
atk-s0508a1:1789_6: vā varanti ñāṇavaraṃ, sabbaññutā ñāṇavaraṃ etassāti sabbaññutaññāṇavaro, bhagavā.
atk-s0508a1:1789_7: Tena sabbaññutaññāṇasaṅkhātaaggañāṇena vā karaṇabhūtena desitaṃ kathitaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1789_8: sutvānāti yojanā. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ paramatthadīpaniyaṃ itivuttakavaṇṇanāyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1789_9: vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Magganti aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ ariyamaggaṃ. Papajjinti paṭipajjiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1789_10: Amatassa pattiyāti nibbānassa adhigamāya upāyabhūtaṃ paṭipajjinti yojanā. Soti so
atk-s0508a1:1789_11: bhagavā. Yogakkhemassa pathassa kovidoti catūhi yogehi anupaddutassa nibbānassa yo
atk-s0508a1:1789_12: patho, tassa kovido tattha sukusalo. Ayañhettha attho – bhagavato catusaccadesanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1789_13: sutvā amatādhigamūpāyamaggaṃ ahaṃ paṭipajjiṃ paṭipajjanamaggaṃ mayā kataṃ, so eva
atk-s0508a1:1789_14: pana bhagavā sabbathā yogakkhemassa pathassa kovido, parasantāne vā paramanesu kusalo,
atk-s0508a1:1789_15: yassa saṃvidhānamāgamma ahampi maggaṃ paṭipajjinti. Ayameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇagāthā ahosīti.
atk-s0508a1:1792_0: Sīlamevāti āyasmato puṇṇattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro
atk-s0508a1:1792_1: tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe buddhasuññe
atk-s0508a1:1792_2: loke brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ gantvā kāmesu
atk-s0508a1:1792_3: ādīnavaṃ disvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantappadese paṇṇakuṭiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1792_4: katvā vāsaṃ kappesi. Tassa vasanaṭṭhānassa avidūre ekasmiṃ pabbhāre paccekabuddho
atk-s0508a1:1792_5: ābādhiko hutvā parinibbāyi, tassa parinibbānasamaye mahā āloko ahosi. Taṃ disvā so,
atk-s0508a1:1792_6: “kathaṃ nu kho ayaṃ āloko uppanno”ti vīmaṃsanavasena ito cito ca āhiṇḍanto pabbhāre
atk-s0508a1:1792_7: paccekasambuddhaṃ parinibbutaṃ disvā gandhadārūni saṃkaḍḍhitvā sarīraṃ jhāpetvā gandhodakena
atk-s0508a1:1792_8: upasiñci. Tattheko devaputto antalikkhe ṭhatvā evamāha – “sādhu, sādhu, sappurisa,
atk-s0508a1:1792_9: bahuṃ tayā puññaṃ pasavantena pūritaṃ sugatisaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ tena tvaṃ sugatīsuyeva
atk-s0508a1:1792_10: uppajjissasi, ‘puṇṇo’ti ca te nāmaṃ bhavissatī”ti. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:1792_11: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sunāparantajanapade suppārakapaṭṭane gahapatikule
atk-s0508a1:1792_12: nibbatti, puṇṇotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto vāṇijjavasena mahatā satthena saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1792_13: sāvatthiṃ gato. Tena ca samayena bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati. Atha so sāvatthivāsīhi
atk-s0508a1:1792_14: upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gato satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:1792_15: vattapaṭivattehi ācariyupajjhāye ārādhento vihāsi. So ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0508a1:1792_16: “sādhu maṃ, bhante bhagavā, saṃkhittena ovādena ovadatu, yamahaṃ sutvā sunāparantajanapade
atk-s0508a1:1792_17: vihareyya”nti āha. Tassa bhagavā, “santi kho, puṇṇa, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā”tiādinā
atk-s0508a1:1792_18: ovādaṃ datvā sīhanādaṃ nadāpetvā vissajjesi. So bhagavantaṃ vanditvā sunāparantajanapadaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1792_19: gantvā suppārakapaṭṭane viharanto samathavipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā tisso vijjā sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:1794: Ābādhiko ca so buddho, vasati pabbatantare.
atk-s0508a1:1798: Vāḷā ca kesarī sabbe, abhigajjiṃsu tāvade.
atk-s0508a1:1804: Citakaṃ sukataṃ katvā, sarīraṃ jhāpayiṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1808: Puṇṇako nāma nāmena, sadā hohi tuvaṃ mune.
atk-s0508a1:1820_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā thero bahū manusse sāsane abhippasādesi. Yato pañcasatamattā
atk-s0508a1:1820_1: purisā upāsakattaṃ pañcasatamattā ca itthiyo upāsikābhāvaṃ paṭivedesuṃ. So tattha
atk-s0508a1:1820_2: rattacandanena candanamāḷaṃ nāma gandhakuṭiṃ kārāpetvā, “satthā pañcahi bhikkhusatehi
atk-s0508a1:1820_3: saddhiṃ māḷaṃ paṭicchatū”ti bhagavantaṃ pupphadūtena nimantesi. Bhagavā ca iddhānubhāvena
atk-s0508a1:1820_4: tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ tattha gantvā candanamāḷaṃ paṭiggahetvā aruṇe anuṭṭhiteyeva
atk-s0508a1:1820_5: paccāgamāsi. Thero aparabhāge parinibbānasamaye aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:1823: Manussesu ca devesu, sīlapaññāṇato jaya”nti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:1824_0: Tattha sīlanti sīlanaṭṭhena sīlaṃ, patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena samādhānaṭṭhena cāti attho. Sīlañhi
atk-s0508a1:1824_1: sabbaguṇānaṃ patiṭṭhā, tenāha – “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño”ti. Samādahati ca taṃ
atk-s0508a1:1824_2: kāyavācāavippakiṇṇaṃ karotīti attho. Tayidaṃ sīlameva aggaṃ sabbaguṇānaṃ mūlabhāvato
atk-s0508a1:1824_3: pamukhabhāvato ca. Yathāha – “tasmātiha, tvaṃ bhikkhu, ādimeva visodhehi kusalesu
atk-s0508a1:1824_4: dhammesu. Ko cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ sīlañca suvisuddha”nti, “pātimokkhanti mukhametaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1824_5: pamukhameta”nti ca ādi. Idhāti nipātamattaṃ. Paññavāti ñāṇasampanno. So uttamo seṭṭho
atk-s0508a1:1824_6: pavaroti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya gāthāya paññāyayeva seṭṭhabhāvaṃ dasseti. Paññuttarā
atk-s0508a1:1824_7: hi kusalā dhammā. Idāni taṃ sīlapaññānaṃ aggaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ kāraṇato dasseti “manussesu
atk-s0508a1:1824_8: ca devesu, sīlapaññāṇato jaya”nti ca. Sīlapaññāṇahetu paṭipakkhajayo kāmakilesajayo hotīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:1829_0: Susukhumanipuṇatthadassināti āyasmato vacchapālattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a1:1829_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni ācinanto devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:1829_2: ito ekanavute kappe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ gantvā aggiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1829_3: paricaranto ekadivasaṃ mahatiyā kaṃsapātiyā pāyāsaṃ ādāya dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesanto
atk-s0508a1:1829_4: vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ ākāse caṅkamantaṃ disvā acchariyabbhutacittajāto bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1829_5: abhivādetvā dātukāmataṃ dassesi. Paṭiggahesi bhagavā anukampaṃ upādāya. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:1829_6: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0508a1:1829_7: putto hutvā nibbatti, vacchapālotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So bimbisārasamāgame uruvelakassapattherena

atk-s0508a1:1829_9: pabbajitvā sattāhapabbajito eva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1833: Āhutiṃ yiṭṭhukāmo so, upanesiṃ baliṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1847: Arahattaṃ pana patvā sukheneva attanā nibbānassa adhigatabhāvaṃ vibhāvento –
atk-s0508a1:1850: Saṃsevitavuddhasīlinā, nibbānaṃ na hi tena dullabha”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:1852_0: Tattha susukhumanipuṇatthadassināti ativiya duddasaṭṭhena sukhume, saṇhaṭṭhena nipuṇe
atk-s0508a1:1852_2: tena. Matikusalenāti matiyā paññāya kusalena chekena, “evaṃ pavattamānassa paññā
atk-s0508a1:1852_3: vaḍḍhati, evaṃ na vaḍḍhatī”ti dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgapaññāya uppādane kusalena.
atk-s0508a1:1852_4: Nivātavuttināti sabrahmacārīsu nivātanīcavattanasīlena, vuḍḍhesu navesu ca yathānurūpapaṭipattinā.
atk-s0508a1:1852_5: Saṃsevitavuddhasīlināti saṃsevitaṃ āciṇṇaṃ vuddhasīlaṃ saṃsevitavuddhasīlaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0508a1:1852_6: yassa atthi, tena saṃsevitavuddhasīlinā. Atha vā saṃsevitā upāsitā vuddhasīlino etenāti
atk-s0508a1:1852_7: saṃsevitavuddhasīlī, tena. Hītisaddo hetuattho. Yasmā yo nivātavutti saṃsevitavuddhasīlī
atk-s0508a1:1852_8: matikusalo susukhumanipuṇatthadassī ca, tasmā nibbānaṃ na tassa dullabhanti attho.
atk-s0508a1:1852_9: Nivātavuttitāya hi saṃsevitavuddhasīlitāya ca paṇḍitā taṃ ovaditabbaṃ anusāsitabbaṃ

atk-s0508a1:1852_11: vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva nibbānaṃ adhigacchatīti, ayameva ca therassa
atk-s0508a1:1855_0: Yathā kaḷīro susu vaḍḍhitaggoti āyasmato ātumattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Sopi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:1855_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ ācinanto ito ekanavute kappe
atk-s0508a1:1855_2: kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ antaravīthiyaṃ gacchantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1855_3: disvā pasannamānaso gandhodakena gandhacuṇṇena ca pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:1855_4: devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato sāsane
atk-s0508a1:1855_5: pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi, ñāṇassa pana aparipakkattā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0508a1:1855_6: Atha imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ seṭṭhiputto hutvā nibbatti, ātumotissa nāmaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1855_7: ahosi. Tassa vayappattassa mātā “puttassa me bhariyaṃ ānessāmā”ti ñātakehi sammantesi.
atk-s0508a1:1855_8: So taṃ upadhāretvā hetusampattiyā codiyamāno “kiṃ mayhaṃ gharāvāsena, idāneva pabbajissāmī”ti
atk-s0508a1:1855_9: bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā pabbaji. Pabbajitampi naṃ mātā uppabbājetukāmā nānānayehi
atk-s0508a1:1855_10: palobheti. So tassā avasaraṃ adatvā attano ajjhāsayaṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0508a1:1857: “Yathā kaḷīro susu vaḍḍhitaggo, dunnikkhamo hoti pasākhajāto;
atk-s0508a1:1858: Evaṃ ahaṃ bhariyāyānītāya, anumañña maṃ pabbajitomhi dānī”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:1860_0: Tattha kaḷīroti aṅkuro, idha pana vaṃsaṅkuro adhippeto. Susūti taruṇo. Vaḍḍhitaggoti
atk-s0508a1:1860_1: pavaḍḍhitasākho. Susuvaḍḍhitaggoti vā suṭṭhu vaḍḍhitasākho sañjātapattasākho. Dunnikkhamoti
atk-s0508a1:1860_2: veḷugumbato nikkhāmetuṃ nīharituṃ asakkuṇeyyo. Pasākhajātoti jātapasākho, sākhānampi
atk-s0508a1:1860_3: pabbe pabbe uppannaanusākho. Evaṃ ahaṃ bhariyāyānītāyāti yathā vaṃso vaḍḍhitaggo
atk-s0508a1:1860_4: vaṃsantaresu saṃsaṭṭha sākhāpasākho veḷugumbato dunnīharaṇīyo hoti, evaṃ ahampi bhariyāya
atk-s0508a1:1860_5: mayhaṃ ānītāya puttadhītādivasena vaḍḍhitaggo āsattivasena gharāvāsato dunnīharaṇīyo
atk-s0508a1:1860_6: bhaveyyaṃ. Yathā pana vaṃsakaḷīro asañjātasākhabandho veḷugumbato sunīharaṇīyova
atk-s0508a1:1860_7: hoti, evaṃ ahampi asañjātaputtadārādibandho sunīharaṇīyo homi, tasmā anānītāya eva
atk-s0508a1:1860_8: bhariyāya anumañña maṃ attanāva maṃ anujānāpetvā. Pabbajitomhi dānīti, “idāni pana
atk-s0508a1:1860_9: pabbajito amhi, sādhu suṭṭhū”ti attano nekkhammābhiratiṃ pakāsesi, atha vā “anumañña
atk-s0508a1:1860_10: maṃ pabbajitomhi dānī”ti mātu katheti. Ayañhettha attho – yadipi tāya pubbe nānumataṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1860_11: idāni pana pabbajito amhi, tasmā anumañña anujānāhi maṃ samaṇabhāveyeva ṭhātuṃ, nāhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1860_12: tayā nivattanīyoti. Evaṃ pana kathento yathāṭhitova vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0508a1:1860_13: kilese khepetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1864: Pabhā niddhāvate tassa, yathā ca sataraṃsino.
atk-s0508a1:1872: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā mātaraṃ āpucchitvā tassā pekkhantiyāyeva ākāsena pakkāmi. So arahattappattiyā uttarikālampi antarantarā tameva gāthaṃ paccudāhāsi.

atk-s0508a1:1876_0: Jiṇṇañca disvā dukhitañca byādhitanti āyasmato māṇavattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti?

atk-s0508a1:1876_3: abhijātiyā lakkhaṇāni pariggahetvā pubbanimittāni sāvetvā, “ekaṃsena ayaṃ buddho
atk-s0508a1:1876_4: bhavissatī”ti byākaritvā nānānayehi thometvā abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:1876_5: So tena puññakammena sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālassa

atk-s0508a1:1876_7: upanayanatthaṃ uyyānaṃ nīto antarāmagge jiṇṇāturamate disvā tesaṃ adiṭṭhapubbattā

atk-s0508a1:1876_9: vihāraṃ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ

atk-s0508a1:1924: Adhigatārahatto pana bhikkhūhi, “kena, tvaṃ āvuso, saṃvegena atidaharova samāno pabbajito”ti pucchito attano pabbajjānimittakittanāpadesena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:1926: “Jiṇṇañca disvā dukhitañca byādhitaṃ, matañca disvā gatamāyusaṅkhayaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:1927: Tato ahaṃ nikkhamitūna pabbajiṃ, pahāya kāmāni manoramānī”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:1929_0: Tattha jiṇṇanti jarāya abhibhūtaṃ, khaṇḍiccapāliccavalittacatādīhi samaṅgībhūtaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1929_1: Dukhitanti dukkhappattaṃ. Byādhitanti gilānaṃ. Ettha ca “byādhita”nti vuttepi dukkhappattabhāvo
atk-s0508a1:1929_2: siddho, “dukhita”nti vacanaṃ tassa bāḷhagilānabhāvaparidīpanatthaṃ. Matanti kālaṅkataṃ,
atk-s0508a1:1929_3: yasmā kālaṅkato āyuno khayaṃ vayaṃ bhedaṃ gato nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “gatamāyusaṅkhaya”nti.
atk-s0508a1:1929_4: Tasmā jiṇṇabyādhimatānaṃ diṭṭhattā, “ime jarādayo nāma na imesaṃyeva, atha kho sabbasādhāraṇā,
atk-s0508a1:1929_5: tasmā ahampi jarādike anativatto”ti saṃviggattā. Nikkhamitūnāti nikkhamitvā, ayameva
atk-s0508a1:1929_6: vā pāṭho. Pabbajjādhippāyena gharato niggantvā. Pabbajinti satthu sāsane pabbajaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1929_7: upagato. Pahāya kāmāni manoramānīti iṭṭhakantādibhāvato avītarāgānaṃ mano ramentīti
atk-s0508a1:1929_8: manorame vatthukāme pajahitvā, tappaṭibaddhassa chandarāgassa ariyamaggena samucchindanena
atk-s0508a1:1929_9: nirapekkhabhāvena chaḍḍetvāti attho. Kāmānaṃ pahānakittanamukhena cetaṃ therassa
atk-s0508a1:1929_10: aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosi. Māṇavakāle pabbajitattā imassa therassa māṇavotveva samaññā jātāti.
atk-s0508a1:1932_0: Kāmacchando ca byāpādoti āyasmato suyāmanattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:1932_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa
atk-s0508a1:1932_2: bhagavato kāle dhaññavatīnagare brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto brāhmaṇasippesu
atk-s0508a1:1932_3: nipphattiṃ patvā brāhmaṇamante vāceti. Tena ca samayena vipassī bhagavā mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0508a1:1932_4: saddhiṃ dhaññavatīnagaraṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho hoti. Taṃ disvā brāhmaṇo pasannacitto
atk-s0508a1:1932_5: attano gehaṃ netvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā tassūpari pupphasanthāraṃ santharitvā adāsi,
atk-s0508a1:1932_6: satthari tattha nisinne paṇītena āhārena santappesi, bhuttāviñca pupphagandhena pūjesi.
atk-s0508a1:1932_7: Satthā anumodanaṃ vatvā pakkāmi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1932_8: puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ aññatarassa
atk-s0508a1:1932_9: brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, suyāmanotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto tiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1932_10: vedānaṃ pāragū paramanissamayutto hutvā gehavāsīnaṃ kāmūpabhogaṃ jigucchitvā jhānaninno
atk-s0508a1:1932_11: bhagavato vesāligamane paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:1936: Mante ca sisse vācesiṃ, tiṇṇaṃ vedāna pāragū.
atk-s0508a1:1942: Santharitvāna taṃ pupphaṃ, abhinesiṃ sakaṃ gharaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1943: “Yaṃ me atthi sake gehe, āmisaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:1944: Tāhaṃ buddhassa pādāsiṃ, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi.
atk-s0508a1:1952: Arahattaṃ pana patvā nīvaraṇappahānakittanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:1955: Uddhaccaṃ vicikicchā ca, sabbasova na vijjatī”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:1956_0: Tattha kāmacchandoti kāmesu chando, kāmo ca so chando cātipi kāmacchando, kāmarāgo.
atk-s0508a1:1956_1: Idha pana sabbopi rāgo kāmacchando aggamaggavajjhassāpi adhippetattā, tenāha “sabbasova
atk-s0508a1:1956_2: na vijjatī”ti. Sabbepi hi tebhūmakadhammā kāmanīyaṭṭhena kāmā, tattha pavatto rāgo
atk-s0508a1:1956_3: kāmacchando, tenāha bhagavā – “āruppe kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1956_4: uddhaccanīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇaṃ uppajjatī”ti byāpajjati cittaṃ pūtibhāvaṃ gacchati
atk-s0508a1:1956_5: etenāti byāpādo, “anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādinayappavatto āghāto. Thinaṃ cittassa akalyatā
atk-s0508a1:1956_6: anussāhasaṃhananaṃ, middhaṃ kāyassa akalyatā asattivighāto, tadubhayampi thinañca
atk-s0508a1:1956_7: middhañca thinamiddhaṃ, kiccāhārapaṭipakkhānaṃ ekatāya ekaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Uddhatabhāvo
atk-s0508a1:1956_8: uddhaccaṃ, yena dhammena cittaṃ uddhataṃ hoti avūpasantaṃ, so cetaso vikkhepo uddhaccaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:1956_9: Uddhaccaggahaṇeneva cettha kiccāhārapaṭipakkhānaṃ samānatāya kukkuccampi gahitamevāti
atk-s0508a1:1956_10: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Taṃ pacchānutāpalakkhaṇaṃ. Yo hi katākatakusalākusalūpanissayo vippaṭisāro,
atk-s0508a1:1956_11: taṃ kukkuccaṃ. Vicikicchāti, “evaṃ nu kho na nu kho”ti saṃsayaṃ āpajjati, dhammasabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1956_12: vā vicinanto kicchati kilamati etāyāti vicikicchā, buddhādivatthuko saṃsayo. Sabbasoti
atk-s0508a1:1956_13: anavasesato. Na vijjatīti natthi, maggena samucchinnattā na upalabbhati. Idañca padadvayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1956_14: paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ ayañhettha yojanā – yassa bhikkhuno tena tena ariyamaggena samucchinnattā
atk-s0508a1:1956_15: kāmacchando ca byāpādo ca thinamiddhañca uddhaccakukkuccañca vicikicchā ca sabbasova
atk-s0508a1:1956_16: na vijjati, tassa na kiñci karaṇīyaṃ, katassa vā paticayoti aññāpadesena aññaṃ byākaroti.
atk-s0508a1:1956_17: Pañcasu hi nīvaraṇesu maggena samucchinnesu tadekaṭṭhatāya sabbepi kilesā samucchinnāyeva
atk-s0508a1:1956_18: honti. Tenāha – “sabbete bhagavanto pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese”ti.
atk-s0508a1:1959_0: Sādhu suvihitāna dassananti āyasmato susāradattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira
atk-s0508a1:1959_1: padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vijjāpadesu nipphattiṃ gantvā
atk-s0508a1:1959_2: kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantappadese

atk-s0508a1:1959_6: tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde dhammasenāpatino ñātibrāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a1:1959_7: nibbattitvā mandapaññattā susāradoti gahitanāmo aparabhāge dhammasenāpatissa santike

atk-s0508a1:1984_0: Dassanamūlakattā vā itaresaṃ dassanamevettha vuttaṃ, kaṅkhā chijjatītiādi tattha
atk-s0508a1:1984_1: kāraṇavacanaṃ. Tādisānañhi kalyāṇamittānaṃ dassane sati viññujātiko atthakāmo kulaputto
atk-s0508a1:1984_2: te upasaṅkamati payirupāsati “kiṃ, bhante, kusalaṃ, kiṃ akusala”ntiādinā pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0508a1:1984_3: Te cassa anekavihitesu kaṅkhāṭṭhānīyesu kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti, tena vuttaṃ “kaṅkhā
atk-s0508a1:1984_4: chijjatī”ti. Yasmā ca te dhammadesanāya tesaṃ kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodetvā pubbabhāge kammapathasammādiṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:1984_5: vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiñca uppādenti, tasmā tesaṃ buddhi vaḍḍhati. Yadā pana te vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1984_6: vaḍḍhetvā saccāni paṭivijjhanti, tadā soḷasavatthukā aṭṭhavatthukā ca vicikicchā
atk-s0508a1:1984_7: chijjati samucchijjati, nippariyāyena paññā buddhi vaḍḍhati. Bālyasamatikkamanato
atk-s0508a1:1984_8: te paṇḍitā honti. So tehi buddhiṃ vaḍḍheti, bālampi karonti paṇḍitanti. Tasmātiādi
atk-s0508a1:1984_9: nigamanaṃ, yasmā sādhūnaṃ dassanaṃ vuttanayena kaṅkhā chijjati buddhi vaḍḍhati, te
atk-s0508a1:1984_10: bālaṃ paṇḍitaṃ karonti, tasmā tena kāraṇena sādhu sundaraṃ sataṃ sappurisānaṃ ariyānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1984_11: samāgamo, tehi samodhānaṃ sammā vaḍḍhananti attho.
atk-s0508a1:1987_0: Uppatantesu nipateti āyasmato piyañjahattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Sopi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:1987_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito ekanavute
atk-s0508a1:1987_2: kappe vipassissa bhagavato kāle himavante rukkhadevatā hutvā pabbatantare vasanto
atk-s0508a1:1987_3: devatāsamāgamesu appānubhāvatāya parisapariyante ṭhatvā dhammaṃ sutvā satthari paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:1987_4: ekadivasaṃ suvisuddhaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ gaṅgāyaṃ pulinappadesaṃ disvā satthu guṇe anussari
atk-s0508a1:1987_5: – “itopi suvisuddhā satthu guṇā anantā aparimeyyā cā”ti, evaṃ so satthu guṇe ārabbha
atk-s0508a1:1987_6: cittaṃ pasādetvā tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:1987_7: licchavirājakule nibbattitvā vayappatto yuddhasoṇḍo aparājitasaṅgāmo amittānaṃ piyahānikaraṇena
atk-s0508a1:1987_8: piyañjahoti paññāyittha. So satthu vesāligamane paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā araññe
atk-s0508a1:1987_9: vasamāno vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:1993: Ñāṇena te samo natthi, yāvatā ñāṇamuttamaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2001: Arahattaṃ pana patvā “andhaputhujjanānaṃ paṭipattito vidhurā ariyānaṃ paṭipattī”ti imassa atthassa dassanavasena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:2004: Vase avasamānesu, ramamānesu no rame”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2005_0: Tattha uppatantesūti uṇṇamantesu, sattesu mānuddhaccathambhasārambhādīhi attukkaṃsanena
atk-s0508a1:2005_1: anupasantesu. Nipateti nameyya, tesaññeva pāpadhammānaṃ parivajjanena nivātavutti
atk-s0508a1:2005_2: bhaveyya. Nipatantesūti oṇamantesu, hīnādhimuttikatāya kosajjena ca guṇato nihīyamānesu.
atk-s0508a1:2005_3: Uppateti uṇṇameyya, paṇītādhimuttikatāya vīriyārambhena ca guṇato ussukkeyya. Atha
atk-s0508a1:2005_4: vā uppatantesūti uṭṭhahantesu, kilesesu pariyuṭṭhānavasena sīsaṃ ukkhipantesu. Nipateti
atk-s0508a1:2005_5: paṭisaṅkhānabalena yathā te na uppajjanti, tathā anurūpapaccavekkhaṇāya nipateyya,
atk-s0508a1:2005_6: vikkhambheyya ceva samucchindeyya ca. Nipatantesūti paripatantesu, ayonisomanasikāresu
atk-s0508a1:2005_7: vīriyapayogamandatāya vā yathāraddhesu samathavipassanādhammesu hāya mānesu. Uppateti
atk-s0508a1:2005_8: yonisomanasikārena vīriyārambhasampadāya ca te upaṭṭhāpeyya uppādeyya vaḍḍheyya ca.
atk-s0508a1:2005_9: Vase avasamānesūti sattesu maggabrahmacariyavāsaṃ ariyavāsañca avasantesu sayaṃ taṃ
atk-s0508a1:2005_10: vāsaṃ vaseyyāti, ariyesu vā kilesavāsaṃ dutiyakavāsaṃ avasantesu yena vāsena te avasamānā
atk-s0508a1:2005_11: nāma honti, sayaṃ tathā vase. Ramamānesu no rameti sattesu kāmaguṇaratiyā kilesaratiyā
atk-s0508a1:2005_12: ramantesu sayaṃ tathā no rame naṃ rameyya, ariyesu vā nirāmisāya jhānādiratiyā ramamānesu
atk-s0508a1:2005_13: sayampi tathā rame, tato aññathā pana kadācipi no rame nābhirameyya vāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:2008_0: Idaṃ pure cittamacāri cārikanti āyasmato hatthārohaputtattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti?
atk-s0508a1:2008_1: So kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto
atk-s0508a1:2008_2: vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:2008_3: bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ vihārato nikkhantaṃ disvā pasannacitto pupphehi pūjaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a1:2008_4: pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:2008_5: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ hatthārohakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto
atk-s0508a1:2008_6: hatthisippe nipphattiṃ agamāsi. So ekadivasaṃ hatthiṃ sikkhāpento nadītīraṃ gantvā
atk-s0508a1:2008_7: hetusampattiyā codiyamāno “kiṃ mayhaṃ iminā hatthidamanena, attānaṃ damanameva vara”nti
atk-s0508a1:2008_8: cintetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvāva cariyānukūlaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2008_9: kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto ciraparicayena kammaṭṭhānato bahiddhā
atk-s0508a1:2008_10: vidhāvantaṃ cittaṃ cheko hatthācariyo viya aṅkusena caṇḍamattavaravāraṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhānaaṅkusena
atk-s0508a1:2008_11: niggaṇhanto “idaṃ pure cittamacāri cārika”nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2009_0: 77. Tattha idanti vuccamānassa cittassa attapaccakkhatāya vuttaṃ. Pureti niggahakālato
atk-s0508a1:2009_1: pubbe. Acārīti vicari, anavaṭṭhitatāya nānārammaṇesu paribbhami. Cārikanti yathākāmacariyaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2009_2: Tenāha “yenicchakaṃ yatthakāmaṃ yathāsukha”nti. Tanti taṃ cittaṃ. Ajjāti etarahi.
atk-s0508a1:2009_3: Niggahessāmīti niggaṇhissāmi, nibbisevanaṃ karissāmi. Yonisoti upāyena. Yathā kiṃ?
atk-s0508a1:2009_4: Hatthippabhinnaṃ viya aṅkusaggaho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – idaṃ mama cittaṃ nāma ito pubbe
atk-s0508a1:2009_5: rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu yena yena ramituṃ icchati, tassa tassa vasena yenicchakaṃ, yattha
atk-s0508a1:2009_6: yattha cassa kāmo, tassa tassa vasena yatthakāmaṃ, yathā yathā vicarantassa sukhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2009_7: hoti, tatheva caraṇato yathāsukhaṃ dīgharattaṃ cārikaṃ acari, taṃ ajjapāhaṃ bhinnamadamattahatthiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2009_8: hatthācariyasaṅkhāto cheko aṅkusaggaho aṅkusena viya yonisomanasikārena niggahessāmi,
atk-s0508a1:2009_9: nāssa vītikkamituṃ dassāmīti. Evaṃ vadanto eva ca thero vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2015: Haṭṭho haṭṭhena cittena, puna vandiṃ tathāgataṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2024_0: Anekajātisaṃsāranti āyasmato meṇḍasirattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Sopi kira purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2024_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni karonto ito ekanavute
atk-s0508a1:2024_2: kappe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto kāme pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā mahatā
atk-s0508a1:2024_3: isigaṇena saddhiṃ himavante vasanto satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso isigaṇena padumāni
atk-s0508a1:2024_4: āharāpetvā satthu pupphapūjaṃ katvā sāvake appamādapaṭipattiyaṃ ovaditvā kālaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a1:2024_5: devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sākete gahapatikule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2024_6: tassa meṇḍasarikkhasīsatāya meṇḍasirotveva samaññā ahosi. So bhagavati sākete añjanavane
atk-s0508a1:2024_7: viharante satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samathavipassanāsu
atk-s0508a1:2024_8: kammaṃ karonto chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Teva vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2034: Mā kho tumhe pamajjittha, appamādo sukhāvaho.
atk-s0508a1:2045: Tassa me dukkhajātassa, dukkhakkhandho aparaddho”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2046_0: Tattha anekajātisaṃsāranti anekajātisatasahassasaṅkhyaṃ idaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ, addhuno
atk-s0508a1:2046_1: adhippetattā accantasaṃyogekavacanaṃ. Sandhāvissanti saṃsariṃ, aparāparaṃ cavanuppajjanavasena
atk-s0508a1:2046_2: paribbhamiṃ. Anibbisanti tassa nivattakañāṇaṃ avindanto alabhanto. Tassa meti evaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2046_3: saṃsarantassa me. Dukkhajātassāti jātiādivasena uppannadukkhassa, tissannaṃ vā dukkhatānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2046_5: Aparaddhoti arahattamaggappattito paṭṭhāya paribbhaṭṭho cuto na abhinibbattissati.
atk-s0508a1:2046_6: “Aparaṭṭho”ti vā pāṭho, apagatasamiddhito samucchinnakāraṇattā apagatoti attho. Idameva
atk-s0508a1:2049_0: Sabbo rāgo pahīno meti āyasmato rakkhitattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:2049_1: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2049_2: sutvā pasannamānaso desanāñāṇaṃ ārabbha thomanaṃ akāsi. Satthā tassa cittappasādaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2049_3: oloketvā “ayaṃ ito satasahassakappamatthake gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa rakkhito
atk-s0508a1:2049_4: nāma sāvako bhavissatī”ti byākāsi. So taṃ sutvā bhiyyosomattāya pasannamānaso aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2049_5: puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde devadahanigame sākiyarājakule
atk-s0508a1:2049_6: nibbatti, rakkhitotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So ye sākiyakoliyarājūhi bhagavato parivāratthāya
atk-s0508a1:2049_7: dinnā pañcasatarājakumārā pabbajitā, tesaṃ aññataro. Te pana rājakumārā na saṃvegena
atk-s0508a1:2049_8: pabbajitattā ukkaṇṭhābhibhūtā yadā satthārā kuṇāladahatīraṃ netvā kuṇālajātakadesanāya
atk-s0508a1:2049_9: itthīnaṃ dosavibhāvanena kāmesu ādīnavaṃ pakāsetvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojitā, tadā ayampi
atk-s0508a1:2049_10: kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2054: “Yathā samuddo udadhīnamaggo, nerū nagānaṃ pavaro siluccayo;
atk-s0508a1:2055: Tatheva ye cittavasena vattare, na buddhañāṇassa kalaṃ upenti te.
atk-s0508a1:2061: Sobhito nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a1:2065: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano pahīnakilese paccavekkhanto “sabbo rāgo”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2066_0: 79. Tattha “sabbo rāgo”ti kāmarāgādippabhedo sabbopi rāgo. Pahīnoti ariyamaggabhāvanāya
atk-s0508a1:2066_1: samucchedappahānavasena pahīno. Sabbo dosoti āghātavatthukādibhāvena anekabhedabhinno
atk-s0508a1:2066_2: sabbopi byāpādo. Samūhatoti maggena samugghāṭito. Sabbo me vigato mohoti “dukkhe
atk-s0508a1:2066_3: aññāṇa”ntiādinā vatthubhedena aṭṭhabhedo, saṃkilesavatthuvibhāgena anekavibhāgo sabbopi
atk-s0508a1:2066_4: moho maggena viddhaṃsitattā mayhaṃ vigato. Sītibhūtosmi nibbutoti evaṃ mūlakilesappahānena
atk-s0508a1:2066_6: sītibhāvaṃ patto, tato eva sabbaso kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto ahaṃ asmi bhavāmīti aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2069_0: Yaṃ mayā pakataṃ kammanti āyasmato uggattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2069_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto ito ekatiṃse kappe sikhissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:2069_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ sikhiṃ bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:2069_3: ketakapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2069_4: sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe ugganigame seṭṭhiputto hutvā
atk-s0508a1:2069_5: nibbatti, uggotvevassa nāmaṃ ahosi. So viññutaṃ patto bhagavati tasmiṃ nigame bhaddārāme
atk-s0508a1:2069_6: viharante vihāraṃ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:2069_7: vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2083: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano vaṭṭūpacchedadīpanena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:2085: “Yaṃ mayā pakataṃ kammaṃ, appaṃ vā yadi vā bahuṃ;
atk-s0508a1:2086: Sabbametaṃ parikkhīṇaṃ, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2087_0: Tattha yaṃ mayā pakataṃ kammanti yaṃ kammaṃ tīhi kammadvārehi, chahi uppattidvārehi,
atk-s0508a1:2087_1: aṭṭhahi asaṃvaradvārehi, aṭṭhahi ca saṃvaradvārehi pāpādivasena dānādivasena cāti
atk-s0508a1:2087_2: anekehi pakārehi anādimati saṃsāre yaṃ mayā kataṃ upacitaṃ abhinibbattitaṃ vipākakammaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2087_3: Appaṃ vā yadi vā bahunti tañca vatthucetanāpayogakilesādīnaṃ dubbalabhāvena appaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2087_4: vā, tesaṃ balavabhāvena abhiṇhapavattiyā ca bahuṃ vā. Sabbametaṃ parikkhīṇanti sabbameva
atk-s0508a1:2087_5: cetaṃ kammaṃ kammakkhayakarassa aggamaggassa adhigatattā parikkhayaṃ gataṃ, kilesavaṭṭappahānena
atk-s0508a1:2087_6: hi kammavaṭṭaṃ pahīnameva hoti vipākavaṭṭassa anuppādanato. Tenāha “natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti.
atk-s0508a1:2087_7: Āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti mayhaṃ natthīti attho. “Sabbampeta”ntipi pāṭho, sabbampi etanti padavibhāgo.
atk-s0508a1:2092_0: Yaṃ mayā pakataṃ pāpanti āyasmato samitiguttattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Sopi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2092_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:2092_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannacitto jātisumanapupphehi pūjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2092_3: akāsi. So tena puññakammena yattha yattha bhave nibbatti, tattha tattha kularūpaparivārasampadāya
atk-s0508a1:2092_4: aññe satte abhibhavitvā aṭṭhāsi. Ekasmiṃ pana attabhāve aññataraṃ paccekabuddhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2092_5: piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā “ayaṃ muṇḍako kuṭṭhī maññe, tenāyaṃ paṭicchādetvā vicaratī”ti
atk-s0508a1:2092_6: niṭṭhubhitvā pakkāmi. So tena kammena bahuṃ kālaṃ niraye paccitvā kassapassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:2092_7: kāle manussaloke nibbatto paribbājakapabbajjaṃ upagato ekaṃ sīlācārasampannaṃ upāsakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2092_8: disvā dosantaro hutvā, “kuṭṭharogī bhaveyyāsī”ti akkosi, nhānatitthe ca manussehi
atk-s0508a1:2092_9: ṭhapitāni nhānacuṇṇāni dūsesi. So tena kammena puna niraye nibbattitvā bahūni vassāni
atk-s0508a1:2092_10: dukkhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto
atk-s0508a1:2092_11: hutvā nibbatti, samitiguttotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2092_12: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā suvisuddhasīlo hutvā viharati. Tassa purimakammanissandena
atk-s0508a1:2092_13: kuṭṭharogo uppajji, tena tassa sarīrāvayavā yebhuyyena chinnabhinnā hutvā paggharanti.
atk-s0508a1:2092_14: So gilānasālāyaṃ vasati. Athekadivasaṃ dhammasenāpati gilānapucchaṃ gantvā tattha
atk-s0508a1:2092_15: tattha gilāne bhikkhū pucchanto taṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā “āvuso, yāvatā khandhappavatti
atk-s0508a1:2092_16: nāma, sabbaṃ dukkhameva vedanā. Khandhesu pana asantesuyeva natthi dukkha”nti vedanānupassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2092_17: kathetvā agamāsi. So therassa ovāde ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiññā sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2104: Na tā sakkonti kopetuṃ, jātipūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2110: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇena etarahi anubhuyyamānarogavasena purimajātīsu attanā kataṃ pāpakammaṃ anussaritvā tassa idāni sabbaso pahīnabhāvaṃ vibhāvento –
atk-s0508a1:2112: “Yaṃ mayā pakataṃ pāpaṃ, pubbe aññāsu jātisu;
atk-s0508a1:2113: Idheva taṃ vedanīyaṃ, vatthu aññaṃ na vijjatī”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2114_0: Tattha pāpanti akusalaṃ kammaṃ. Tañhi lāmakaṭṭhena pāpanti vuccati. Pubbeti purā.
atk-s0508a1:2114_1: Aññāsu jātisūti ito aññāsu jātīsu, aññesu attabhāvesu. Ayañhettha attho – yadipi
atk-s0508a1:2114_2: mayā imasmiṃ attabhāve na tādisaṃ pāpaṃ kataṃ atthi, idāni pana tassa sambhavoyeva
atk-s0508a1:2114_3: natthi. Yaṃ pana ito aññāsu jātīsu kataṃ atthi, idheva taṃ vedanīyaṃ, tañhi idheva
atk-s0508a1:2114_4: imasmiṃyeva attabhāve vedayitabbaṃ anubhavitabbaṃ phalaṃ, kasmā? Vatthu aññaṃ na
atk-s0508a1:2114_5: vijjatīti tassa kammassa vipaccanokāso añño khandhappabandho natthi, ime pana khandhā
atk-s0508a1:2114_6: sabbaso upādānānaṃ pahīnattā anupādāno viya jātavedo carimakacittanirodhena appaṭisandhikā
atk-s0508a1:2117_0: Yena yena subhikkhānīti āyasmato kassapattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:2117_1: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā tīsu vedesu aññesu ca brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2117_2: gato, so ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso sumanapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi. Karonto
atk-s0508a1:2117_3: ca satthu samantato upari ca pupphamuṭṭhiyo khipi. Buddhānubhāvena pupphāni pupphāsanākārena
atk-s0508a1:2117_4: sattāhaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. So taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā bhiyyosomattāya pasannamānaso ahosi. Aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2117_5: puññāni karonto kappasatasahassaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2117_6: aññatarassa udiccabrāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, kassapotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. Tassa
atk-s0508a1:2117_7: daharakāleyeva pitā kālamakāsi. Mātā taṃ paṭijaggati. So ekadivasaṃ jetavanaṃ gato
atk-s0508a1:2117_8: bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā hetusampannatāya tasmiṃyeva āsane sotāpanno hutvā mātu
atk-s0508a1:2117_9: santikaṃ gantvā anujānāpetvā pabbajito satthari vuṭṭhavasse pavāretvā janapadacārikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2117_10: pakkante sayampi satthārā saddhiṃ gantukāmo āpucchituṃ mātu santikaṃ agamāsi. Mātā
atk-s0508a1:2120: Tena puttaka gacchassu, mā sokāpahato bhavā”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2121_0: Tattha yena yenāti yattha yattha. Bhummatthe hi etaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ, yasmiṃ yasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2121_1: disābhāgeti attho. Subhikkhānīti sulabhapiṇḍāni, raṭṭhānīti adhippāyo. Sivānīti khemāni
atk-s0508a1:2121_2: arogāni. Abhayānīti corabhayādīhi nibbhayāni, rogadubbhikkhabhayāni pana “subhikkhāni,
atk-s0508a1:2121_3: sivānī”ti padadvayeneva gahitāni. Tenāti tattha, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāgeti attho.
atk-s0508a1:2121_4: Puttakāti anukampantī taṃ ālapati. Māti paṭisedhatthe nipāto sokāpahatoti vuttaguṇarahitāni
atk-s0508a1:2121_5: raṭṭhāni gantvā dubbhikkhabhayādijanitena sokena upahato mā bhava māhosīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:2121_6: Taṃ sutvā thero, “mama mātā mayhaṃ sokarahitaṭṭhānagamanaṃ āsīsati, handa mayaṃ sabbaso
atk-s0508a1:2121_7: accantameva sokarahitaṃ ṭhānaṃ pattuṃ yutta”nti ussāhajāto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a1:2121_8: nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2139: Arahattaṃ pana patvā “idameva mātu vacanaṃ arahattappattiyā aṅkusaṃ jāta”nti tameva gāthaṃ paccudāhāsi.
