atk-s0508a1:2142_0: Sīhappamatto viharāti āyasmato sīhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2142_1: katādhikāro ito aṭṭhārasakappasatamatthake atthadassissa bhagavato kāle candabhāgāya
atk-s0508a1:2142_2: nadiyā tīre kinnarayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā pupphabhakkho pupphanivasano hutvā viharanto
atk-s0508a1:2142_3: ākāsena gacchantaṃ atthadassiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannacitto pūjetukāmo añjaliṃ
atk-s0508a1:2142_4: paggayha aṭṭhāsi. Bhagavā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā ākāsato oruyha aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle
atk-s0508a1:2142_5: pallaṅkena nisīdi. Kinnaro candanasāraṃ ghaṃsitvā candanagandhena pupphehi ca pūjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2142_6: katvā vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:2142_7: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde mallarājakule nibbatti, tassa sīhoti nāmaṃ ahosi. So bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2142_8: disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2142_9: kathesi. So dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe
atk-s0508a1:2142_10: viharati. Tassa cittaṃ nānārammaṇe vidhāvati, ekaggaṃ na hoti, sakatthaṃ nipphādetuṃ
atk-s0508a1:2142_11: na sakkoti. Satthā taṃ disvā ākāse ṭhatvā –
atk-s0508a1:2145: Bhāvehi kusalaṃ dhammaṃ, jaha sīghaṃ samussaya”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:2146: Gāthāya ovadi. So gāthāvasāne vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2164_0: Yā pana bhagavatā ovādavasena vuttā “sīhappamatto”ti gāthā, tattha sīhāti tassa therassa
atk-s0508a1:2164_1: ālapanaṃ. Appamatto viharāti satiyā avippavāsena pamādavirahito sabbiriyāpathesu
atk-s0508a1:2164_2: satisampajaññayutto hutvā viharāhi. Idāni taṃ appamādavihāraṃ saha phalena saṅkhepato
atk-s0508a1:2164_4: nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetī”ti vuttanayena catusammappadhānavasena
atk-s0508a1:2164_5: atandito akusīto āraddhavīriyo kusalaṃ samathavipassanādhammañca lokuttaradhammañca
atk-s0508a1:2164_6: bhāvehi uppādehi vaḍḍhehi ca, evaṃ bhāvetvā ca jaha sīghaṃ samussayanti tava samussayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2164_7: attabhāvaṃ paṭhamaṃ tāva tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena sīghaṃ nacirasseva pajaha,
atk-s0508a1:2164_8: evaṃbhūto ca pacchā carimakacittanirodhena anavasesato ca pajahissatīti. Arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2164_9: pana patvā thero aññaṃ byākaronto tameva gāthaṃ paccudāhāsīti.
atk-s0508a1:2167_0: Sabbarattiṃ supitvānāti āyasmato nītattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:2167_1: bhagavato kāle sunando nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā anekasate brāhmaṇe mante vācento vājapeyyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2167_2: nāma yaññaṃ yaji, bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ anukampanto yaññaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ākāse caṅkami.
atk-s0508a1:2167_3: Brāhmaṇo satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso sissehi pupphāni āharāpetvā ākāse khipitvā
atk-s0508a1:2167_4: pūjaṃ akāsi. Buddhānubhāvena taṃ ṭhānaṃ sakalañca nagaraṃ pupphapaṭavitānikaṃ viya
atk-s0508a1:2167_5: chāditaṃ ahosi. Mahājano satthari uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedesi. Sunandabrāhmaṇo
atk-s0508a1:2167_6: tena kusalamūlena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa
atk-s0508a1:2167_7: brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, nītotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So viññutaṃ patto “ime samaṇā
atk-s0508a1:2167_8: sakyaputtiyā sukhasīlā sukhasamācārā subhojanāni bhuñjitvā nivātesu senāsanesu viharanti,
atk-s0508a1:2167_9: imesu pabbajitvā sukhena viharituṃ sakkā”ti sukhābhilāsāya pabbajitvāva satthu santike
atk-s0508a1:2167_10: kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā katipāhameva manasikaritvā taṃ chaḍḍetvā yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2167_11: bhuñjitvā divasabhāgaṃ saṅgaṇikārāmo tiracchānakathāya vītināmeti, rattibhāgepi thinamiddhābhibhūto
atk-s0508a1:2167_12: sabbarattiṃ supati. Satthā tassa hetuparipākaṃ oloketvā ovādaṃ dento –
atk-s0508a1:2170: Kudāssu nāma dummedho, dukkhassantaṃ karissatī”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2171_0: Tattha sabbarattinti sakalaṃ rattiṃ. Supitvānāti niddāyitvā, “rattiyā paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2171_1: caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetī”tiādinā vuttaṃ jāgariyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2171_2: ananuyuñjitvā kevalaṃ rattiyā tīsupi yāmesu niddaṃ okkamitvāti attho. Divāti divasaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2171_3: sakalaṃ divasabhāganti attho. Saṅgaṇiketi tiracchānakathikehi kāyadaḷhibahulapuggalehi
atk-s0508a1:2171_4: sannisajjā saṅgaṇiko, tasmiṃ rato abhirato tattha avigatacchando “saṅgaṇike rato”ti
atk-s0508a1:2171_5: vutto “saṅgaṇikārato”tipi pāḷi. Kudāssu nāmāti kudā nāma. Assūti nipātamattaṃ, kasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2171_6: nāma kāleti attho. Dummedhoti nippañño. Dukkhassāti vaṭṭadukkhassa. Antanti pariyosānaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2171_7: Accantameva anuppādaṃ kadā nāma karissati, edisassa dukkhassantakaraṇaṃ natthīti
atk-s0508a1:2172: Evaṃ pana satthārā gāthāya kathitāya thero saṃvegajāto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2188: Arahattaṃ pana patvā thero aññaṃ byākaronto tameva gāthaṃ paccudāhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2191_0: Cittanimittassa kovidoti āyasmato sunāgattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2191_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto ito ekattiṃse
atk-s0508a1:2191_2: kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2191_3: pāragū hutvā araññāyatane assame vasanto tīṇi brāhmaṇasahassāni mante vācesi. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2191_4: tassa satthāraṃ disvā lakkhaṇāni upadhāretvā lakkhaṇamante parivattentassa, “īdisehi
atk-s0508a1:2191_5: lakkhaṇehi samannāgato anantajino anantañāṇo buddho bhavissatī”ti buddhañāṇaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0508a1:2191_6: uḷāro pasādo uppajji. So tena cittappasādena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:2191_7: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde nālakagāme aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2191_8: sunāgotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So dhammasenāpatissa gihisahāyo therassa santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0508a1:2191_9: dhammaṃ sutvā dassanabhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhito pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2205: Arahattaṃ pana patvā bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanāpadesena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:2208: Jhāyaṃ nipako patissato, adhigaccheyya sukhaṃ nirāmisa”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:2210_0: Tattha cittanimittassa kovidoti bhāvanācittassa nimittaggahaṇe kusalo, “imasmiṃ samaye
atk-s0508a1:2210_1: cittaṃ paggahetabbaṃ, imasmiṃ sampahaṃsitabbaṃ, imasmiṃ ajjhupekkhitabba”nti evaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2210_2: paggahaṇādiyogyassa cittanimittassa gahaṇe cheko. Pavivekarasaṃ vijāniyāti kāyavivekasaṃvaḍḍhitassa
atk-s0508a1:2210_3: cittavivekassa rasaṃ sañjānitvā, vivekasukhaṃ anubhavitvāti attho. “Pavivekarasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2210_4: pitvā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Jhāyanti paṭhamaṃ ārammaṇūpanijjhānena pacchā lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena
atk-s0508a1:2210_5: ca jhāyanto. Nipakoti kammaṭṭhānapariharaṇe kusalo. Patissatoti upaṭṭhitassati. Adhigaccheyya
atk-s0508a1:2210_6: sukhaṃ nirāmisanti evaṃ samathanimittādikosallena labbhe cittavivekasukhe patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a1:2210_7: sato sampajāno hutvā vipassanājhāneneva jhāyanto kāmāmisavaṭṭāmisehi asammissatāya
atk-s0508a1:2210_8: nirāmisaṃ nibbānasukhaṃ phalasukhañca adhigaccheyya samupagaccheyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:2213_0: Ito bahiddhā puthuaññavādinanti āyasmato nāgitattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2213_1: kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle nārado nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā ekadivasaṃ māḷake nisinno
atk-s0508a1:2213_2: bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghena purakkhataṃ gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso tīhi gāthāhi
atk-s0508a1:2213_3: abhitthavi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:2213_4: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare sakyarājakule nibbatti, nāgitotissa
atk-s0508a1:2213_5: nāmaṃ ahosi. So bhagavati kapilavatthusmiṃ viharante madhupiṇḍikasuttaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:2213_6: pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2221: Vikappetuṃ na sakkonti, ko disvā nappasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:2229: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthu avitathadesanataṃ dhammassa ca niyyānikataṃ nissāya sañjātapītisomanasso pītivegappavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānento –
atk-s0508a1:2231: “Ito bahiddhā puthuaññavādinaṃ, maggo na nibbānagamo yathā ayaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:2232: Itissu saṅghaṃ bhagavānusāsati, satthā sayaṃ pāṇitaleva dassaya”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:2234_0: Tattha ito bahiddhāti imasmā buddhasāsanā bāhirake samaye, tenāha “puthuaññavādina”nti,
atk-s0508a1:2234_1: nānātitthiyānanti attho. Maggo na nibbānagamo yathā ayanti yathā ayaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko
atk-s0508a1:2234_2: maggo ekaṃsena nibbānaṃ gacchatīti nibbānagamo, nibbānagāmī, evaṃ nibbānagamo maggo
atk-s0508a1:2234_3: titthiyasamaye natthi asammāsambuddhappaveditattā aññatitthiyavādassa. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0508a1:2235: “Idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo, idha dutiyo samaṇo, idha tatiyo samaṇo, idha catuttho samaṇo, suññā parappavādā samaṇebhi aññehī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:2236_0: Itīti evaṃ. Assūti nipātamattaṃ. Saṅghanti bhikkhusaṅghaṃ, ukkaṭṭhaniddesoyaṃ yathā
atk-s0508a1:2236_1: “satthā devamanussāna”nti. Saṅghanti vā samūhaṃ, veneyyajananti adhippāyo. Bhagavāti
atk-s0508a1:2236_2: bhāgyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi bhagavā, ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana paramatthadīpaniyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2236_4: yathārahaṃ anusāsatīti satthā. Sayanti sayameva. Ayañhettha attho – “sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgaho
atk-s0508a1:2236_5: sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena aṭṭhaṅgiko nibbānagāmī ariyamaggo yathā
atk-s0508a1:2236_6: mama sāsane atthi, evaṃ bāhirakasamaye maggo nāma natthī”ti sīhanādaṃ nadanto amhākaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2236_7: satthā bhagavā sayameva sayambhūñāṇena ñātaṃ, sayameva vā mahākaruṇāsañcodito hutvā
atk-s0508a1:2236_8: attano desanāvilāsasampattiyā hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya dassento bhikkhusaṅghaṃ veneyyajanataṃ
atk-s0508a1:2239_0: Khandhā diṭṭhā yathābhūtanti āyasmato paviṭṭhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a1:2239_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ karonto atthadassissa
atk-s0508a1:2239_2: bhagavato kāle kesavo nāma tāpaso hutvā ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2239_3: sutvā pasannamānaso abhivādetvā añjaliṃ paggayha padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi. So tena
atk-s0508a1:2239_4: puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:2239_5: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule uppajjitvā anukkamena viññutaṃ patto
atk-s0508a1:2239_6: nekkhammaninnajjhāsayatāya paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tattha sikkhitabbaṃ sikkhitvā
atk-s0508a1:2239_7: vicaranto upatissakolitānaṃ buddhasāsane pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā “tepi nāma mahāpaññā
atk-s0508a1:2239_8: tattha pabbajitā, tadeva maññe seyyo”ti satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:2239_9: pabbaji. Tassa satthā vipassanaṃ ācikkhi. So vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2240: “Nārado iti me nāmaṃ, kesavo iti maṃ vidū;
atk-s0508a1:2243: Assāsayanto satte so, dhammaṃ deseti cakkhumā.
atk-s0508a1:2252: Vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2253_0: Tattha khandhāti pañcupādānakkhandhā, te hi vipassanupalakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato
atk-s0508a1:2253_1: ca ñātapariññādīhi parijānanavasena vipassitabbā. Diṭṭhā yathābhūtanti vipassanāpaññāsahitāya
atk-s0508a1:2253_2: maggapaññāya “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā aviparītato diṭṭhā. Bhavā sabbe padālitāti kāmabhavādayo
atk-s0508a1:2253_3: sabbe kammabhavā upapattibhavā ca maggañāṇasatthena bhinnā viddhaṃsitā. Kilesapadālaneneva
atk-s0508a1:2253_4: hi kammopapattibhavā padālitā nāma honti. Tenāha “vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, natthi dāni
atk-s0508a1:2256_0: Asakkhiṃ vata attānanti āyasmato ajjunattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2256_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:2256_2: kāle sīhayoniyaṃ nibbatto ekadivasaṃ araññe aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ satthāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:2256_3: disvā “ayaṃ kho imasmiṃ kāle sabbaseṭṭho purisasīho”ti pasannamānaso supupphitasālasākhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2256_4: bhañjitvā satthāraṃ pūjesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2256_5: buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ seṭṭhikule nibbatti. Ajjunotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So viññutaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2256_6: patto nigaṇṭhehi kataparicayo hutvā “evāhaṃ amataṃ adhigamissāmī”ti vivaṭṭajjhāsayatāya
atk-s0508a1:2256_7: daharakāleyeva nigaṇṭhesu pabbajitvā tattha sāraṃ alabhanto satthu yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2256_8: disvā paṭiladdhasaddho sāsane pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:2268: Arahattaṃ pana patvā anuttarasukhādhigamasambhūtena pītivegena udānaṃ udānento –
atk-s0508a1:2271: Vuyhamāno mahogheva, saccāni paṭivijjhaha”nti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2272: Tattha asakkhinti sakkosiṃ. Vatāti vimhaye nipāto. Ativimhayanīyañhetaṃ yadidaṃ saccapaṭivedho. Tenāha –
atk-s0508a1:2273: “Taṃ kiṃmaññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho dukkarataraṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ vā, yaṃ sattadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭivijjheyyā”tiādi ?
atk-s0508a1:2274_0: Attānanti niyakajjhattaṃ sandhāya vadati. Yo hi paro na hoti so attāti. Uddhātunti
atk-s0508a1:2274_1: uddharituṃ, “uddhaṭa”ntipi pāṭho. Udakāti saṃsāramahoghasaṅkhātā udakā. Thalanti
atk-s0508a1:2274_2: nibbānathalaṃ. Vuyhamāno mahoghevāti mahaṇṇave vuyhamāno viya. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti –
atk-s0508a1:2274_3: yathā nāma gambhīravitthate appatiṭṭhe mahati udakoghe vegasā vuyhamāno puriso kenaci
atk-s0508a1:2274_4: atthakāmena upanītaṃ phiyārittasampannaṃ daḷhanāvaṃ labhitvā sukheneva tato attānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2274_5: uddharituṃ sakkuṇeyya pāraṃ pāpuṇeyya, evamevāhaṃ saṃsāramahoghe kilesābhisaṅkhāravegena
atk-s0508a1:2274_6: vuyhamāno satthārā upanītaṃ samathavipassanupetaṃ ariyamagganāvaṃ labhitvā tato attānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2274_7: uddharituṃ nibbānathalaṃ pattuṃ aho asakkhinti. Yathā pana asakkhi, taṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0508a1:2274_8: “saccāni paṭivijjhaha”nti āha. Yasmā ahaṃ dukkhādīni cattāri ariyasaccāni pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāpaṭivedhena
atk-s0508a1:2274_9: paṭivijjhiṃ ariyamaggañāṇena aññāsiṃ, tasmā asakkhiṃ vata attānaṃ uddhātuṃ udakā thalanti yojanā.
atk-s0508a1:2277_0: Uttiṇṇā paṅkapalipāti āyasmato devasabhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Sopi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2277_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:2277_2: kāle pārāvatayoniyaṃ nibbatto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso piyālaphalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2277_3: upanesi. Satthā tassa pasādasaṃvaḍḍhanatthaṃ taṃ paribhuñji. So tena ativiya pasannacitto
atk-s0508a1:2277_4: hutvā kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā cittaṃ pasādeti. So tena puññakammena devaloke
atk-s0508a1:2277_5: nibbatto aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde aññatarassa
atk-s0508a1:2277_6: maṇḍalikarañño putto hutvā nibbatto taruṇakāleyeva rajje patiṭṭhito rajjasukhamanubhavanto
atk-s0508a1:2277_7: vuddho satthāraṃ upasaṅkami, tassa satthā dhammaṃ desesi. So dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:2277_8: saṃvegajāto rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2281: Deyyadhammo ca me natthi, dvipadindassa tādino.
atk-s0508a1:2286: “Ekattiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ ahaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:2291: Arahattaṃ pana patvā pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇavasena uppannasomanasso udānaṃ udānento –
atk-s0508a1:2294: Mutto oghā ca ganthā ca, sabbe mānā visaṃhatā”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2295_0: Tattha uttiṇṇāti uttaritā atikkantā. Paṅkapalipāti paṅkā ca palipā ca. Paṅko vuccati
atk-s0508a1:2295_1: pakatikaddamo. “Palipo”ti gambhīraputhulo mahākaddamo. Idha pana paṅko viyāti paṅko,
atk-s0508a1:2295_2: kāmarāgo asucibhāvāpādanena cittassa makkhanato. Palipo viyāti palipo, puttadārādivisayo
atk-s0508a1:2295_3: bahalo chandarāgo vuttanayena sammakkhanato duruttaraṇato ca. Te mayā anāgāmimaggena
atk-s0508a1:2295_4: sabbaso atikkantāti āha “uttiṇṇā paṅkapalipā”ti. Pātālāti pātāyālanti pātālā, mahāsamudde
atk-s0508a1:2295_5: ninnatarapadesā. Keci pana nāgabhavanaṃ “pātāla”nti vadanti. Idha pana agāhaduravaggāhaduruttaraṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0508a1:2295_6: pātālā viyāti pātālā, diṭṭhiyo. Te ca mayā paṭhamamaggādhigameneva sabbathā vajjitā
atk-s0508a1:2295_7: samucchinnāti āha “pātālā parivajjitā”ti mutto oghā ca ganthā cāti kāmoghādioghato
atk-s0508a1:2295_8: abhijjhākāyaganthādiganthato ca tena tena maggena mutto parimutto, puna anabhikiraṇaaganthanavasena
atk-s0508a1:2295_9: atikkantoti attho. Sabbe mānā visaṃhatāti navavidhāpi mānā aggamaggādhigamena visesato
atk-s0508a1:2295_10: saṅghātaṃ vināsaṃ āpāditā samucchinnā “mānavidhā hatā”ti keci paṭhanti, mānakoṭṭhāsāti
atk-s0508a1:2295_11: attho. “Mānavisā”ti apare, tesaṃ pana mānavisassa dukkhassa phalato mānavisāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0508a1:2298_0: Pañcakkhandhā pariññātāti āyasmato sāmidattattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2298_1: katādhikāro atthadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari
atk-s0508a1:2298_2: parinibbute tassa thūpe pupphehi chattātichattaṃ katvā pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:2298_3: devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:2298_4: rājagahe aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, sāmidattotissa nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:2298_5: So anukkamena viññutaṃ patto buddhānubhāvaṃ sutvā upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gato
atk-s0508a1:2298_6: satthāraṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ disvā pasannamānaso ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2298_7: oloketvā tathā dhammaṃ desesi, yathā saddhaṃ paṭilabhi saṃsāre ca saṃvegaṃ. So paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:2298_8: saṃvegajāto pabbajitvā ñāṇassa aparipakkattā katipayakālaṃ alasabahulī vihāsi. Puna
atk-s0508a1:2298_9: satthārā dhammadesanāya samuttejito vipassanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā tattha yuttappayutto
atk-s0508a1:2298_10: viharanto nacireneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2308: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti.
atk-s0508a1:2309: So aparabhāge bhikkhūhi “kiṃ tayā, āvuso, uttarimanussadhammo adhigato”ti puṭṭho sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ attano ca dhammānudhammappaṭipattiṃ tesaṃ pavedento aññābyākaraṇavasena –
atk-s0508a1:2312: Vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2313_0: Tattha pañcakkhandhā pariññātāti mayā ime pañcupādānakkhandhā “idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ettakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2313_1: dukkhaṃ, na tato bhiyyo”ti tīhi pariññāhi paricchinditvā ñātā viditā paṭividdhā.
atk-s0508a1:2313_2: Tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakāti tathā pariññātattāyeva mūlabhūtassa samudayassa sabbaso
atk-s0508a1:2313_3: pahīnattā te idāni yāva carimakacittanirodho tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā, carimakacittanirodhena
atk-s0508a1:2313_4: pana appaṭisandhikāva nirujjhanti. Tenāha – “vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti.
atk-s0508a1:2318_0: Na tathā mataṃ satarasanti āyasmato paripuṇṇakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a1:2318_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro dhammadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2318_2: patto satthari parinibbute satthu cetiye pupphādīhi uḷāraṃ pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:2318_3: devesu nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:2318_4: kapilavatthusmiṃ sakyarājakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto paripuṇṇavibhavatāya paripuṇṇakoti
atk-s0508a1:2318_5: paññāyittha. So vibhavasampannatāya sabbakālaṃ satarasaṃ nāma āhāraṃ paribhuñjanto
atk-s0508a1:2318_6: satthu missakāhāraparibhogaṃ sutvā “tāva sukhumālopi bhagavā nibbānasukhaṃ apekkhitvā
atk-s0508a1:2318_7: yathā tathā yāpeti, kasmā mayaṃ āhāragiddhā hutvā āhārasuddhikā bhavissāma, nibbānasukhameva
atk-s0508a1:2318_8: pana amhehi pariyesitabba”nti saṃsāre jātasaṃvego gharāvāsaṃ pahāya satthu santike
atk-s0508a1:2318_9: pabbajitvā bhagavatā kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhāne niyojito tattha patiṭṭhāya paṭiladdhajhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2318_10: pādakaṃ katvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2323: “Aho buddho aho dhammo, aho no satthu sampadā;
atk-s0508a1:2328: Arahattaṃ pana patvā dhamme gāravabahumānena pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānento “na tathā mataṃ satarasa”nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2329_0: 91. Tattha na tathā mataṃ satarasaṃ, sudhannaṃ yaṃ mayajja paribhuttanti tathāti
atk-s0508a1:2329_1: tena pakārena. Matanti abhimataṃ. Satarasanti satarasabhojanaṃ “satarasabhojanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2329_2: nāma satapākasappiādīhi abhisaṅkhataṃ bhojana”nti vadanti. Atha vā anekattho satasaddo
atk-s0508a1:2329_3: “sataso sahassaso”tiādīsu viya. Tasmā yaṃ bhojanaṃ anekasūpaṃ anekabyañjanaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0508a1:2329_4: anekarasatāya “satarasa”nti vuccati, nānārasabhojananti attho. Sudhā eva annaṃ sudhābhojanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2329_5: devānaṃ āhāro. Yaṃ mayajja paribhuttanti yaṃ mayā ajja anubhuttaṃ. “Yaṃ mayā paribhutta”nti
atk-s0508a1:2329_6: ca idaṃ “satarasaṃ sudhanna”nti etthāpi yojetabbaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yaṃ mayā ajja
atk-s0508a1:2329_8: santaṃ paṇītaṃ nibbānasukhaṃ paribhuñjiyamānaṃ, taṃ yathā mataṃ abhimataṃ sambhāvitaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2329_9: tathā rājakāle mayā paribhuttaṃ satarasabhojanaṃ devattabhāve paribhuttaṃ sudhannañca
atk-s0508a1:2329_10: na mataṃ nābhimataṃ. Kasmā? Idañhi ariyanisevitaṃ nirāmisaṃ kilesānaṃ avatthubhūtaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2329_11: taṃ pana puthujjanasevitaṃ sāmisaṃ kilesānaṃ vatthubhūtaṃ, taṃ imassa saṅkhampi kalampi
atk-s0508a1:2329_12: kalabhāgampi na upetīti. Idāni “yaṃ mayajja paribhutta”nti vuttadhammaṃ desento aparimitadassinā
atk-s0508a1:2329_13: gotamena, buddhena sudesito dhammo”ti āha. Tassattho – aparimitaṃ aparicchinnaṃ uppādavayābhāvato
atk-s0508a1:2329_14: santaṃ asaṅkhatadhātuṃ sayambhūñāṇena passī, aparimitassa anantāparimeyyassa ñeyyassa
atk-s0508a1:2329_15: dassāvīti tena aparimitadassinā gotamagottena sammāsambuddhena “khayaṃ virāgaṃ amataṃ
atk-s0508a1:2329_16: paṇīta”nti ca “madanimmadano pipāsavinayo” “sabbasaṅkhārasamatho”ti ca ādinā suṭṭhu
atk-s0508a1:2329_17: desito dhammo, nibbānaṃ mayā ajja paribhuttanti yojanā.
atk-s0508a1:2332_0: Yassāsavā parikkhīṇāti āyasmato vijayattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2332_1: katādhikāro piyadassissa bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2332_2: patto satthari parinibbute tassa thūpassa ratanakhacitaṃ vedikaṃ kāretvā tattha uḷāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:2332_3: vedikāmahaṃ kāresi. So tena puññakammena anekasate attabhāve maṇiobhāsena vicari.
atk-s0508a1:2332_4: Evaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2332_5: vijayotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṃ gato tāpasapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2332_6: pabbajitvā araññāyatane jhānalābhī hutvā viharanto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā uppannappasādo
atk-s0508a1:2332_7: satthu santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Tassa satthā dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2332_8: desesi. So dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2336: Vedikāya mahaṃ katvā, tattha kālaṅkato ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2342: Arahattaṃ pana patvā aññaṃ byākaronto “yassāsavā parikkhīṇā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2343_0: 92. Tattha yassāsavā parikkhīṇāti yassa uttamapuggalassa kāmāsavādayo cattāro āsavā
atk-s0508a1:2343_1: sabbaso khīṇā ariyamaggena khepitā. Āhāre ca anissitoti yo ca āhāre taṇhādiṭṭhinissayehi
atk-s0508a1:2343_2: anissito agadhito anajjhāpanno, nidassanamattaṃ, āhārasīsenettha cattāropi paccayā
atk-s0508a1:2343_3: gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paccayapariyāyo vā idha āhāra-saddo veditabbo. “Suññato animitto
atk-s0508a1:2343_4: cā”ti ettha appaṇihitavimokkhopi gahitoyeva, tīṇipi cetāni nibbānasseva nāmāni. Nibbānañhi
atk-s0508a1:2343_5: rāgādīnaṃ abhāvena suññaṃ, tehi vimuttañcāti suññatavimokkho, tathā rāgādinimittābhāvena
atk-s0508a1:2343_6: saṅkhāranimittābhāvena ca animittaṃ, tehi vimuttañcāti animittavimokkho, rāgādipaṇidhīnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2343_7: abhāvena appaṇihitaṃ, tehi vimuttañcāti appaṇihito vimokkhoti vuccati. Phalasamāpattivasena
atk-s0508a1:2343_8: taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā viharantassa ayampi tividho vimokkho yassa gocaro, ākāseva sakuntānaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2343_9: padaṃ tassa durannayanti yathā ākāse gacchantānaṃ sakuṇānaṃ “imasmiṃ ṭhāne pādehi
atk-s0508a1:2343_10: akkamitvā gatā, idaṃ ṭhānaṃ urena paharitvā gatā, idaṃ sīsena, idaṃ pakkhehī”ti na
atk-s0508a1:2343_11: sakkā ñātuṃ, evameva evarūpassa bhikkhuno “nirayapadādīsu iminā nāma padena gato”ti
atk-s0508a1:2346_0: Dukkhā kāmā erakāti āyasmato erakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2346_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:2346_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso satthu kiñci
atk-s0508a1:2346_3: dātabbayuttakaṃ alabhanto “handāhaṃ kāyasāraṃ puññaṃ karissāmī”ti satthu gamanamaggaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2346_4: sodhetvā samaṃ akāsi. Satthā tena tathākataṃ maggaṃ paṭipajji. So tattha bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2346_5: disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha pasannacitto yāva dassanupacārasamatikkamā
atk-s0508a1:2346_6: buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ avijahanto aṭṭhāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2346_7: puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ sambhāvanīyassa
atk-s0508a1:2346_8: kuṭumbiyassa putto hutvā nibbatti, erakotissa nāmaṃ ahosi abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko
atk-s0508a1:2346_9: itikattabbatāsu paramena veyyattiyena samannāgato. Tassa mātāpitaro kulena rūpena
atk-s0508a1:2346_10: ācārena vayena kosallena ca anucchavikaṃ dārikaṃ ānetvā vivāhakammaṃ akaṃsu. So tāya
atk-s0508a1:2346_11: saddhiṃ saṃvāsena gehe vasanto pacchimabhavikattā kenacideva saṃvegavatthunā saṃsāre
atk-s0508a1:2346_12: saṃviggamānaso satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji, tassa
atk-s0508a1:2346_13: satthā kammaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi. So kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā katipayadivasātikkamena ukkaṇṭhābhibhūto
atk-s0508a1:2346_14: vihāsi. Atha satthā tassa cittappavattiṃ ñatvā ovādavasena “dukkhā kāmā erakā”ti
atk-s0508a1:2346_15: gāthaṃ abhāsi. So taṃ sutvā “ayuttaṃ mayā kataṃ, yohaṃ evarūpassa satthu santike
atk-s0508a1:2346_16: kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā taṃ vissajjento micchāvitakkabahulo vihāsi”nti saṃvegajāto vipassanāya
atk-s0508a1:2346_17: yuttappayutto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2358: “Dukkhā kāmā eraka, na sukhā kāmā eraka;
atk-s0508a1:2359: Yo kāme kāmayati, dukkhaṃ so kāmayati eraka;
atk-s0508a1:2360: Yo kāme na kāmayati, dukkhaṃ so na kāmayati erakā”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:2362_0: Tattha dukkhā kāmāti ime vatthukāmakilesakāmā dukkhavatthutāya vipariṇāmadukkhasaṃsāradukkhasabhāvato
atk-s0508a1:2362_1: ca, dukkhā dukkhamā dukkhanibbattikā. Vuttañhetaṃ – “appassādā kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā,
atk-s0508a1:2362_2: ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo”tiādi. Erakāti paṭhamaṃ tāva bhagavā taṃ ālapati, pacchā pana
atk-s0508a1:2362_3: thero attānaṃ nāmena kathesi. Na sukhā kāmāti kāmā nāmete jānantassa sukhā na honti,
atk-s0508a1:2362_4: ajānantassa pana sukhato upaṭṭhahanti. Yathāha – “yo sukhaṃ dukkhato adda, dukkhamaddakkhi
atk-s0508a1:2362_5: sallato”tiādi. Yo kāme kāmayati, dukkhaṃ so kāmayatīti yo satto kilesakāmena vatthukāme
atk-s0508a1:2362_6: kāmayati, tassa taṃ kāmanaṃ sampati sapariḷāhatāya, āyatiṃ apāyadukkhahetutāya ca
atk-s0508a1:2362_7: vaṭṭadukkhahetutāya ca dukkhaṃ. Vatthukāmā pana dukkhassa vatthubhūtā. Iti so dukkhasabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2362_8: dukkhanimittaṃ dukkhavatthuñca kāmayatīti vutto. Itaraṃ paṭipakkhavasena tamevatthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2362_9: ñāpetuṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā tassattho vuttavipariyāyena veditabbo.
atk-s0508a1:2365_0: Namo hi tassa bhagavatoti āyasmato mettajittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira anomadassissa
atk-s0508a1:2365_1: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto sāsane abhippasanno hutvā bodhirukkhassa
atk-s0508a1:2365_2: iṭṭhakāhi vedikaṃ cinitvā sudhāparikammaṃ kāresi. Satthā tassa anumodanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2365_3: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:2365_4: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā
atk-s0508a1:2365_5: nibbatti, mettajītissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2365_6: pabbajitvā araññe viharanto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā pubbahetunā codiyamāno satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2365_7: gantvā pavattinivattiyo ārabbha pañhaṃ pucchitvā satthārā pañhe vissajjite paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:2365_8: pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2369: Bhikkhusaṅghe ṭhito satthā, imā gāthā abhāsatha.
atk-s0508a1:2380: Tenāyaṃ aggappattena, aggadhammo sudesito”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2381_0: Tattha namoti namakkāro. Hīti nipātamattaṃ. Tassāti yo so bhagavā samattiṃsapāramiyo
atk-s0508a1:2381_1: pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho, sakyarājassa
atk-s0508a1:2381_2: puttoti sakyaputto. Anaññasādhāraṇāya puññasampattiyā ca sambhāvito uttamāya rūpakāyasiriyā
atk-s0508a1:2381_3: dhammakāyasiriyā ca samannāgatattā sirīmā, tassa bhagavato sakyaputtassa sirīmato
atk-s0508a1:2381_4: namo atthu, taṃ namāmīti attho. Tenāti tena bhagavatā. Ayanti tassa dhammassa attano
atk-s0508a1:2381_5: paccakkhatāya vadati. Aggappattenāti aggaṃ sabbaññutaṃ, sabbehi vā guṇehi aggabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2381_6: seṭṭhabhāvaṃ pattena. Aggadhammoti aggo uttamo navavidhalokuttaro dhammo suṭṭhu aviparītaṃ desito paveditoti.
atk-s0508a1:2384_0: Andhohaṃ hatanettosmīti āyasmato cakkhupālattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Sopi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2384_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:2384_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bhagavati parinibbute thūpamahe kayiramāne umāpupphaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2384_3: gahetvā thūpaṃ pūjesi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni
atk-s0508a1:2384_4: katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ mahāsuvaṇṇassa nāma
atk-s0508a1:2384_5: kuṭumbikassa putto hutvā nibbatti, tassa pāloti nāmamakaṃsu. Mātā tassa ādhāvitvā
atk-s0508a1:2384_6: paridhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle aññaṃ puttaṃ labhi. Tassa mātāpitaro cūḷapāloti nāmaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a1:2384_7: itaraṃ mahāpāloti vohariṃsu. Atha te vayappatte gharabandhanena bandhiṃsu. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2384_8: samaye satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane. Tattha mahāpālo jetavanaṃ gacchantehi
atk-s0508a1:2384_9: upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho kuṭumbabhāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:2384_10: kaniṭṭhabhātikasseva bhāraṃ katvā sayaṃ pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2384_11: santike pañcavassāni vasitvā vuṭṭhavasso pavāretvā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0508a1:2384_12: saṭṭhimatte sahāyabhikkhū labhitvā tehi saddhiṃ bhāvanānukūlaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pariyesanto
atk-s0508a1:2384_13: aññataraṃ paccantagāmaṃ nissāya gāmavāsikehi upāsakehi kāretvā dinnāya araññāyatane
atk-s0508a1:2384_14: paṇṇasālāya vasanto samaṇadhammaṃ karoti. Tassa akkhirogo uppanno. Vejjo bhesajjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2384_15: sampādetvā adāsi. So vejjena vuttavidhānaṃ na paṭipajji. Tenassa rogo vaḍḍhi. So
atk-s0508a1:2384_17: vipassanāyayeva yuttappayutto ahosi. Tassa bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpentassa apubbaṃ acarimaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2384_18: akkhīni ceva kilesā ca bhijjiṃsu. So sukkhavipassako arahā ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2394_0: Atha there akkhirogena vihāre ohīne gāmaṃ piṇḍāya gate bhikkhū disvā upāsakā “kasmā
atk-s0508a1:2394_1: thero nāgato”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā sokābhibhūtā piṇḍapātaṃ upanetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0508a1:2394_2: kiñci mā cintayittha, idāni mayameva piṇḍapātaṃ ānetvā upaṭṭhahissāmā”ti tathā karonti.
atk-s0508a1:2394_3: Bhikkhū therassa ovāde ṭhatvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā vuṭṭhavassā pavāretvā,
atk-s0508a1:2394_4: “satthāraṃ vandituṃ sāvatthiṃ gamissāma, bhante”ti āhaṃsu. Thero, “ahaṃ dubbalo acakkhuko,
atk-s0508a1:2394_5: maggo ca saupaddavo, mayā saddhiṃ gacchantānaṃ tumhākaṃ parissayo bhavissati, tumhe
atk-s0508a1:2394_6: paṭhamaṃ gacchatha, gantvā satthāraṃ mahāthere ca mama vandanāya vandatha, cūḷapālassa
atk-s0508a1:2394_7: mama pavattiṃ kathetvā kañci purisaṃ peseyyāthā”ti āha. Te punapi yācitvā gamanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2394_8: alabhantā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā upāsake āpucchitvā anukkamena
atk-s0508a1:2394_9: jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ mahāthere ca tassa vandanāya vanditvā dutiyadivase sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2394_10: piṇḍāya caritvā cūḷapālassa taṃ pavattiṃ vatvā tena “ayaṃ, bhante, mayhaṃ bhāgineyyo
atk-s0508a1:2394_11: pālito nāma, imaṃ pesissāmī”ti vutte, “maggo saparissayo, na sakkā ekena gahaṭṭhena
atk-s0508a1:2394_12: gantuṃ, tasmā pabbājetabbo”ti taṃ pabbājetvā pesesuṃ. So anukkamena therassa santikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2394_13: gantvā attānaṃ tassa orocetvā taṃ gahetvā āgacchanto antarāmagge aññatarassa gāmassa
atk-s0508a1:2394_14: sāmantā araññaṭṭhāne ekissā kaṭṭhahāriyā gāyantiyā saddaṃ sutvā paṭibaddhacitto hutvā
atk-s0508a1:2394_15: yaṭṭhikoṭiṃ vissajjetvā “tiṭṭhatha, bhante, muhuttaṃ yāvāhaṃ āgacchāmī”ti vatvā tassā
atk-s0508a1:2394_16: santikaṃ gantvā tattha sīlavipattiṃ pāpuṇi. Thero idānimeva itthiyā gītasaddo suto,
atk-s0508a1:2394_17: sāmaṇero ca cirāyati, nūna sīlavipattiṃ patto bhavissatī”ti cintesi. Sopi āgantvā
atk-s0508a1:2394_18: “gacchāma, bhante”ti āha. Thero “kiṃ pāpo jātosī”ti pucchi. Sāmaṇero tuṇhī hutvā
atk-s0508a1:2394_19: puna pucchitopi na kathesi. Thero “tādisena pāpena mayhaṃ yaṭṭhigahaṇakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0508a1:2394_20: gaccha tva”nti vatvā puna tena “bahuparissayo maggo, tumhe ca andhā, kathaṃ gamissathā”ti
atk-s0508a1:2394_21: vutte “bāla idheva me nipajjitvā marantassāpi aparāparaṃ parivattentassāpi tādisena
atk-s0508a1:2397: Sayamānopi gacchissaṃ, na sahāyena pāpenā”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsittha;
atk-s0508a1:2398_0: Tattha andhoti cakkhuvikalo. Hatanettoti vinaṭṭhacakkhuko, tena “payogavipattivasenāhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2398_1: upahatanettatāya andho, na jaccandhabhāvenā”ti yathāvuttaṃ andhabhāvaṃ viseseti.
atk-s0508a1:2398_2: Atha vā “andho”ti idaṃ “andhe jiṇṇe mātāpitaro posetī”tiādīsu viya maṃsacakkhuvekalladīpanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2398_3: “sabbepime paribbājakā andhā acakkhukā” “andho ekacakkhu dvicakkhū”tiādīsu viya na
atk-s0508a1:2398_4: paññācakkhuvekalladīpananti dassetuṃ “hatanettosmī”ti vuttaṃ, tena mukhyameva andhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2398_5: dasseti. Kantāraddhānapakkhandoti kantāre vivane dīghamaggaṃ anupaviṭṭho, na jātikantārādigahanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2398_6: saṃsāraddhānaṃ paṭipannoti adhippāyo. Tādisañhi kantāraddhānaṃ ayaṃ thero samatikkamitvā
atk-s0508a1:2398_7: ṭhito, sayamānopīti sayantopi, pādesu avahantesu urena jaṇṇukāhi ca bhūmiyaṃ saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:2398_8: parivattentopi gaccheyyaṃ. Na sahāyena pāpenāti tādisena pāpapuggalena sahāyabhūtena
atk-s0508a1:2398_9: saddhiṃ na gacchissanti yojanā. Taṃ sutvā itaro saṃvegajāto “bhāriyaṃ vata mayā sāhasikakammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2398_10: kata”nti bāhā paggayha kandanto vanasaṇḍaṃ pakkhando ca ahosi. Atha therassa sīlatejena
atk-s0508a1:2398_11: paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi. Tena sakko taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā therassa santikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2398_12: gantvā sāvatthigāmipurisaṃ viya attānaṃ ñāpetvā yaṭṭhikoṭiṃ gaṇhanto maggaṃ saṅkhipitvā
atk-s0508a1:2398_13: tadaheva sāyanhe sāvatthiyaṃ theraṃ netvā tattha jetavane cūḷapālitena kāritāya paṇṇasālāya
atk-s0508a1:2398_14: phalake nisīdāpetvā tassa sahāyavaṇṇena therassa āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā pakkāmi; cūḷapālitopi
atk-s0508a1:2401_0: Ekapupphaṃ cajitvānāti āyasmato khaṇḍasumanattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira
atk-s0508a1:2401_1: padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute
atk-s0508a1:2401_2: tassa thūpassa samantato candanavedikāya parikkhipitvā mahantaṃ pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena
atk-s0508a1:2401_3: puññakammena devamanussesu uḷāraṃ sampattiṃ anubhavanto kassapassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a1:2401_4: kuṭumbikakule nibbatto satthari parinibbute kanakathūpaṃ uddissa raññā pupphapūjāya
atk-s0508a1:2401_5: kayiramānāya pupphāni alabhanto ekaṃ khaṇḍasumanapupphaṃ disvā mahatā mūlena taṃ
atk-s0508a1:2401_6: kiṇitvā gaṇhanto cetiye pūjaṃ karonto uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppādesi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:2401_7: devaloke nibbattitvā asīti vassakoṭiyo saggasukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:2401_8: pāvāyaṃ mallarājakule nibbatti. Tassa jātakāle gehe khaṇḍasakkharā sumanapupphāni
atk-s0508a1:2401_9: ca uppannāni ahesuṃ. Tenassa khaṇḍasumanoti nāmamakaṃsu. So viññutaṃ patto bhagavati
atk-s0508a1:2401_10: pāvāyaṃ cundassa ambavane viharante upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:2401_11: pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2409: Omattaṃ me na passāmi, pubbakammassidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2413: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano purimajātiṃ anussaranto tattha attano sumanapupphapariccāgassa saggasampattinimittakaṃ nibbānūpanissayatañca disvā udānavasena tamatthaṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0508a1:2416: Saggesu paricāretvā, sesakenamhi nibbuto”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2417_0: Tattha ekapupphanti ekaṃ kusumaṃ, taṃ pana idha sumanapupphaṃ adhippetaṃ. Cajitvānāti
atk-s0508a1:2417_1: satthu thūpapūjākaraṇavasena pariccajitvā pariccāgahetu. Asīti vassakoṭiyoti manussagaṇanāya
atk-s0508a1:2417_2: vassānaṃ asīti koṭiyo, accantasaṃyoge cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ, idañca chasu kāmasaggesu
atk-s0508a1:2417_3: dutiye aparāparuppattivasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Tasmā saggesūti tāvatiṃsasaṅkhāte
atk-s0508a1:2417_4: saggaloke, punappunaṃ uppajjanavasena hettha bahuvacanaṃ. Paricāretvāti rūpādīsu
atk-s0508a1:2417_5: ārammaṇesu indriyāni paricāretvā sukhaṃ anubhavitvā, devaccharāhi vā attānaṃ paricāretvā
atk-s0508a1:2417_6: upaṭṭhāpetvā. Sesakenamhi nibbutoti pupphapūjāya vasena pavattakusalacetanāsu bhavasampatti
atk-s0508a1:2417_7: dāyakakammato sesena yaṃ tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayabhūtaṃ, taṃ sandhāya vadati. Bahū
atk-s0508a1:2417_8: hi tattha pubbāparavasena pavattā cetanā. Sesakenāti vā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena
atk-s0508a1:2417_9: aparikkhīṇeyeva tasmiṃ kammavipāke nibbuto amhi, kilesaparinibbānena parinibbutosmi.
atk-s0508a1:2417_10: Etena yasmiṃ attabhāve ṭhatvā attanā arahattaṃ sacchikataṃ, sopi carimattabhāvo tassa
atk-s0508a1:2417_11: kammavipākoti dasseti. Yādisaṃ sandhāya aññatthāpi “tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesenā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2420_0: Hitvā satapalaṃ kaṃsanti āyasmato tissattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2420_1: katādhikāro vipassissa bhagavato kāle yānakārakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2420_2: bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso candanakhaṇḍena phalakaṃ katvā bhagavato upanāmesi,
atk-s0508a1:2420_3: tañca bhagavā paribhuñji. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni
atk-s0508a1:2420_4: katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde roruvanagare rājakule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:2420_5: So vayappatto pitari kālaṅkate rajje patiṭṭhito bimbisārarañño adiṭṭhasahāyo hutvā
atk-s0508a1:2420_6: tassa maṇimuttāvatthādīni paṇṇākārāni pesesi. Tassa rājā bimbisāro puññavantataṃ
atk-s0508a1:2420_7: sutvā paṭipābhataṃ pesento cittapaṭe buddhacaritaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭe ca paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2420_8: likhāpetvā pesesi. So taṃ disvā purimabuddhesu katādhikāratāya pacchimabhavikatāya
atk-s0508a1:2420_9: ca cittapaṭe dassentaṃ buddhacaritaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭake likhitaṃ paṭiccasamuppādakkamañca
atk-s0508a1:2420_10: oloketvā pavattinivattiyo sallakkhetvā sāsanakkamaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā sañjātasaṃvego
atk-s0508a1:2420_11: “diṭṭho mayā bhagavato veso, sāsanakkamo ca ekapadesena ñāto, bahudukkhā kāmā bahupāyāsā,
atk-s0508a1:2420_12: kiṃ dāni mayhaṃ gharāvāsenā”ti rajjaṃ pahāya kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni
atk-s0508a1:2420_13: acchādento bhagavantaṃ uddissa pabbajitvā mattikāpattaṃ gahetvā rājā pukkusāti viya
atk-s0508a1:2420_14: mahājanassa paridevantasseva nagarato nikkhamitvā anukkamena rājagahaṃ gantvā tattha
atk-s0508a1:2420_15: sappasoṇḍikapabbhāre viharantaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a1:2420_16: Satthā dhammaṃ desesi. So dhammadesanaṃ sutvā vipassanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā yuttappayutto
atk-s0508a1:2420_17: viharanto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2426: Akkhubbhaṃ ratanaṃ mayhaṃ, phalakassa idaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2432: Arahattaṃ pana patvā udānavasena attano paṭipattiṃ kathento –
atk-s0508a1:2435: Aggahiṃ mattikāpattaṃ, idaṃ dutiyābhisecana”nti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2436_0: Tattha hitvāti pariccajitvā. Satapalanti sataṃ palāni yassa, taṃ satapalaparimāṇaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2436_1: Kaṃsanti thālaṃ. Sovaṇṇanti suvaṇṇamayaṃ. Satarājikanti bhittivicittatāya ca anekarūparājicittatāya
atk-s0508a1:2436_2: ca anekalekhāyuttaṃ. Aggahiṃ mattikāpattanti evarūpe mahārahe bhājane pubbe bhuñjitvā
atk-s0508a1:2436_3: buddhānaṃ ovādaṃ karonto “idānāhaṃ taṃ chaḍḍetvā mattikāmayapattaṃ aggahesiṃ, aho,
atk-s0508a1:2436_4: sādhu, mayā kataṃ ariyavataṃ anuṭhita”nti bhājanakittanāpadesena rajjapariccāgaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2436_5: pabbajjūpagamanañca anumodanto vadati. Tenāha “idaṃ dutiyābhisecana”nti. Paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2436_6: rajjābhisecanaṃ upādāya idaṃ pabbajjūpagamanaṃ mama dutiyaṃ abhisecanaṃ. Tañhi rāgādīhi
atk-s0508a1:2436_7: saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ sāsaṅkaṃ saparisaṅkaṃ kammaṃ anatthasañhitaṃ dukkhapaṭibaddhaṃ nihīnaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2436_8: idaṃ pana taṃvipariyāyato uttamaṃ paṇītanti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:2439_0: Rūpaṃ disvā sati muṭṭhāti āyasmato abhayattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Sopi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2439_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:2439_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ sumedhaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannacitto
atk-s0508a1:2439_3: saḷalapupphehi pūjamakāsi. So tena puññakammena devesu nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni
atk-s0508a1:2439_4: katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:2439_5: abhayoti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto hetusampattiyā codiyamāno ekadivasaṃ vihāraṃ gato
atk-s0508a1:2439_6: satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā katapubbakicco vipassanāya
atk-s0508a1:2439_7: kammaṃ karonto viharati. Athassa ekadivasaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2439_8: mātugāmaṃ disvā ayonisomanasikāravasena tassa rūpaṃ ārabbha chandarāgo uppajji, so
atk-s0508a1:2439_9: vihāraṃ pavisitvā “satiṃ vissajjitvā olokentassa rūpārammaṇe mayhaṃ kileso uppanno,
atk-s0508a1:2439_10: ayuttaṃ mayā kata”nti attano cittaṃ niggaṇhanto tāvadeva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2449: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano kilesuppattinidassanena “kilese anuvattentassa vaṭṭadukkhato nattheva sīsukkhipanaṃ. Ahaṃ pana te nānuvatti”nti dassento –
atk-s0508a1:2451: “Rūpaṃ disvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasikaroto;
atk-s0508a1:2453: Tassa vaḍḍhanti āsavā, bhavamūlopagāmino”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2454_0: Tattha rūpanti rajjanīyaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ, taṃ panettha itthirūpaṃ adhippetaṃ. Disvāti
atk-s0508a1:2454_1: cakkhunā disvā, cakkhudvārānusārena nimittānubyañjanasallakkhaṇavasena taṃ gahetvā,
atk-s0508a1:2454_2: tassa tathāgahaṇahetūti attho. Sati muṭṭhāti asubhasabhāve kāye “asubha”ntveva pavattanasati
atk-s0508a1:2454_3: naṭṭhā. Yathā pana rūpaṃ disvā sati naṭṭhā, taṃ dassento āha “piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasikaroto”ti.
atk-s0508a1:2454_4: Yathāupaṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ “subhaṃ sukha”ntiādinā piyanimittaṃ katvā ayonisomanasikārena
atk-s0508a1:2454_5: manasikaroto sati muṭṭhāti yojanā. Tathā bhūtova sārattacitto vedetīti suṭṭhu rattacitto
atk-s0508a1:2454_6: hutvā taṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ anubhavati abhinandati, abhinandanto pana tañca ajjhosa tiṭṭhati
atk-s0508a1:2454_7: ajjhosāya taṃ ārammaṇaṃ gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā vattati ceva, evaṃbhūtassa ca tassa
atk-s0508a1:2454_8: vaḍḍhanti āsavā bhavamūlopagāminoti bhavassa saṃsārassa mūlabhāvaṃ kāraṇabhāvaṃ upagamanasabhāvā
atk-s0508a1:2454_9: kāmāsavādayo cattāropi āsavā tassa puggalassa uparūpari vaḍḍhantiyeva, na hāyanti.
atk-s0508a1:2454_10: Mayhaṃ pana paṭisaṅkhāne ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saccāni paṭivijjhantassa maggapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0508a1:2454_11: te cattāropi āsavā anavasesato pahīnā parikkhīṇāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:2457_0: Saddaṃ sutvā sati muṭṭhāti āyasmato uttiyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2457_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:2457_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannacitto
atk-s0508a1:2457_3: gonakādiatthataṃ sauttaracchadaṃ buddhārahaṃ pallaṅkaṃ gandhakuṭiyaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2457_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2457_5: sakyarājakule nibbatti, tassa uttiyoti nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto satthu ñātisamāgame
atk-s0508a1:2457_6: buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2457_7: nāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho antarāmagge mātugāmassa gītasaddaṃ sutvā ayonisomanasikāravasena
atk-s0508a1:2457_8: tattha chandarāge uppanne paṭisaṅkhānabalena taṃ vikkhambhetvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0508a1:2457_9: sañjātasaṃvego divāṭṭhāne nisīditvā tāvadeva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2467: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano kilesuppattinidassanena “kilese ajigucchantassa natthi vaṭṭadukkhato sīsukkhipanaṃ, ahaṃ pana te jigucchimevā”ti dassento –
atk-s0508a1:2469: “Saddaṃ sutvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasikaroto;
atk-s0508a1:2471: Tassa vaḍḍhanti āsavā, saṃsāra upagāmino”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2475: Evaṃ vuttasaṃsāravaṭṭakāraṇaṃ hutvā upagamentīti saṃsāraupagāmino, “saṃsārūpagāmino”ti vā pāṭho. Sesaṃ anantaragāthāya vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a1:2478_0: Sammappadhānasampannoti āyasmato devasabhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2478_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:2478_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ sikhiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:2478_3: bandhujīvakapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2478_4: buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ sakyarājakule nibbatti, tassa devasabhoti nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:2478_5: So vayappatto cumbaṭakalahavūpasamanatthaṃ satthari āgate buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:2478_6: saraṇesu patiṭṭhito puna nigrodhārāme satthari viharante satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a1:2478_7: paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā katapubbakicco vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:2490: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attanā adhigataṃ vimuttisukhaṃ nissāya uppannapītisomanasso udānavasena –
atk-s0508a1:2494_1: sampādetvā ṭhitoti attho. Satipaṭṭhānagocaroti kāyānupassanādayo satipaṭṭhānā gocaro
atk-s0508a1:2494_2: pavattiṭṭhānaṃ etassāti satipaṭṭhānagocaro, catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu patiṭṭhitacittoti
atk-s0508a1:2494_3: attho. Guṇasobhena paramasugandhā vimuttiyeva kusumāni, tehi sabbaso sammadeva sañchanno
atk-s0508a1:2494_4: vibhūsito alaṅkatoti vimuttikusumasañchanno. Parinibbissatyanāsavoti evaṃ sammā paṭipajjanto
atk-s0508a1:2494_5: bhikkhu nacirasseva anāsavo hutvā parinibbissati saupādisesāya anupādisesāya ca nibbānadhātuyāti
atk-s0508a1:2494_6: attho. Idameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:2499_0: Hitvā gihittaṃ anavositattotiādikā āyasmato belaṭṭhānikattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti?
atk-s0508a1:2499_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro ito ekatiṃse kappe vessabhussa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a1:2499_2: nibbattitvā vayappatto brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ gantvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2499_3: pabbajitvā isīhi parivuto vicaranto ekadivasaṃ vessabhuṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pītisomanassajāto
atk-s0508a1:2499_4: satthu ñāṇasampattiṃ nissāya pasannamānaso ñāṇaṃ uddissa pupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi. So
atk-s0508a1:2499_5: tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a1:2499_6: nibbattitvā belaṭṭhānikoti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:2499_7: pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā kosalaraṭṭhe araññe viharanto alaso kāyadaḷhibahulo
atk-s0508a1:2499_8: pharusavāco ahosi, samaṇadhamme cittaṃ na uppādesi. Atha naṃ bhagavā ñāṇaparipākaṃ oloketvā –
atk-s0508a1:2503_0: Imāya obhāsagāthāya saṃvejesi. So satthāraṃ purato nisinnaṃ viya disvā tañca gāthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2503_1: sutvā saṃvegajāto ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2505: Obhāsentaṃ disā sabbā, osadhiṃ viya tārakaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2515: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthu ovādaṃ paṭipūjento byatirekamukhena ca aññaṃ byākaronto tameva gāthaṃ paccudāhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2516_0: Tattha hitvā gihittanti gahaṭṭhabhāvaṃ pariccajitvā pabbajitvāti attho. Anavositattoti
atk-s0508a1:2516_1: anurūpaṃ avositatto, yadatthaṃ sāsane pabbajantassa anurūpapariññādīnaṃ atīritattā
atk-s0508a1:2516_2: apariyositabhāvo akatakaraṇīyoti attho. Atha vā anavositattoti anuavositasabhāvo,
atk-s0508a1:2516_3: visuddhīnaṃ maggānañca anupaṭipāṭiyā vasitabbavāsassa akatāvī, dasasu ariyavāsesu
atk-s0508a1:2516_4: avusitavāti attho. Mukhasaṅkhātaṃ naṅgalaṃ imassa atthīti mukhanaṅgalī. Naṅgalena
atk-s0508a1:2516_5: viya pathaviṃ paresu pharusavācappayogena attānaṃ khanantoti attho. Odarikoti udare
atk-s0508a1:2516_6: pasuto udaraposanatapparo. Kusītoti alaso, bhāvanaṃ ananuyuñjanto. Evaṃbhūtassa nipphattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2516_7: dassento āha “mahāvarāhova nivāpapuṭṭho, punappunaṃ gabbhamupeti mando”ti. Tassattho
atk-s0508a1:2516_8: heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Ettha ca yathā pabbajitvā anavositādisabhāvatāya punappunaṃ gabbhamupeti
atk-s0508a1:2516_9: mando, na evaṃ mādiso paṇḍito. Tabbiparītasabhāvatāya pana sammāpaṭipattiyā matthakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2516_10: pāpitattā parinibbāyatīti byatirekamukhena aññaṃ byākāsīti daṭṭhabbanti.
atk-s0508a1:2519_0: Mānena vañcitāseti āyasmato setucchattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2519_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto tissassa sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0508a1:2519_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ tissaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:2519_3: sumadhuraṃ panasaphalaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ nāḷikerasāḷavaṃ adāsi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:2519_4: devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde aññatarassa
atk-s0508a1:2519_5: maṇḍalikarañño putto hutvā nibbatti, setucchotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So pitari mate rajje
atk-s0508a1:2519_6: patiṭṭhito ussāhasattīnaṃ abhāvena rājakiccāni virādhento rajjaṃ parahatthagataṃ
atk-s0508a1:2519_7: katvā dukkhappattiyā saṃvegajāto janapadacārikaṃ carantaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a1:2519_8: dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā parikammaṃ karonto tadaheva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2532: Lābhālābhena mathitā, samādhiṃ nādhigacchantī”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2533_2: cakkhādīsu ceva rūpādīsu ca saṅkhatadhammesu saṃkilissamānā, “etaṃ mama, esohamasmi,
atk-s0508a1:2533_3: eso me attā”ti taṃnimittaṃ taṇhāgāhādivasena saṃkilesaṃ āpajjamānā. Lābhālābhena
atk-s0508a1:2533_4: mathitāti pattacīvarādīnañceva vatthādīnañca lābhena tesaṃyeva ca alābhena taṃnimittaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2533_5: uppannehi anunayapaṭighehi mathitā madditā abhibhūtā. Nidassanamattañcetaṃ avasiṭṭhalokadhammānampettha
atk-s0508a1:2533_6: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Samādhiṃ nādhigacchantīti te evarūpā puggalā samādhiṃ samathavipassanāvasena
atk-s0508a1:2533_7: cittekaggataṃ kadācipi na vindanti na paṭilabhanti na pāpuṇanti samādhisaṃvattanikānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2533_8: dhammānaṃ abhāvato, itaresañca bhāvato. Idhāpi yathā mānādīhi abhibhūtā aviddasuno
atk-s0508a1:2533_9: samādhiṃ nādhigacchanti, na evaṃ viddasuno. Te pana mādisā tehi anabhibhūtā samādhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2536_0: Nāhaṃ etena atthikoti āyasmato bandhurattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2536_1: katādhikāro siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle aññatarassa rañño antepure gopako hutvā
atk-s0508a1:2536_2: ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ saparisaṃ rājaṅgaṇena gacchantaṃ disvā pasannacitto kaṇaverapupphāni
atk-s0508a1:2536_3: gahetvā sasaṅghaṃ lokanāyakaṃ pūjesi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2536_4: sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sīlavatīnagare seṭṭhiputto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2536_5: bandhurotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So viññutaṃ patto kenacideva karaṇīyena sāvatthiyaṃ gato
atk-s0508a1:2536_6: upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gato satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:2536_7: ñāṇassa paripākattā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2542: Buddhassa visuṃ katvāna, tato bhiyyo samokiriṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2548_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā kataññubhāve ṭhatvā attano upakārassa rañño paccupakāraṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0508a1:2548_1: sīlavatīnagaraṃ gantvā rañño dhammaṃ desento saccāni pakāsesi. Rājā saccapariyosāne
atk-s0508a1:2548_2: sotāpanno hutvā attano nagare sudassanaṃ nāma mahantaṃ vihāraṃ kāretvā therassa niyyātesi.
atk-s0508a1:2548_3: Mahālābhasakkāro ahosi. Thero vihāraṃ sabbañca lābhasakkāraṃ saṅghassa niyyātetvā
atk-s0508a1:2548_4: sayaṃ purimaniyāmeneva piṇḍāya caritvā yāpento katipāhaṃ tattha vasitvā sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2548_5: gantukāmo ahosi. Bhikkhū, “bhante, tumhe idheva vasatha, sace paccayehi vekallaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2548_6: mayaṃ taṃ paripūressāmā”ti āhaṃsu. Thero, “na mayhaṃ, āvuso, uḷārehi paccayehi attho
atk-s0508a1:2548_7: atthi, itarītarehi paccayehi yāpemi, dhammarasenevamhi titto”ti dassento –
atk-s0508a1:2551: Pitvā rasaggamuttamaṃ, na ca kāhāmi visena santhava”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:2553_0: Tattha nāhaṃ etena atthikoti yena maṃ tumhe tappetukāmā “paripūressāmā”ti vadatha,
atk-s0508a1:2553_1: etena āmisalābhena paccayāmisarasena nāhaṃ atthiko, mayhaṃ etena attho natthi, santuṭṭhi
atk-s0508a1:2553_2: paramaṃ sukhanti itarītareheva paccayehi yāpemīti attho. Idāni tena anatthikabhāve
atk-s0508a1:2553_3: padhānakāraṇaṃ dassento āha “sukhito dhammarasena tappito”ti. Sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammarasena
atk-s0508a1:2553_4: ceva navavidhalokuttaradhammarasena ca tappito pīṇito sukhito uttamena sukhena suhitoti
atk-s0508a1:2553_5: attho. Pitvā rasaggamuttamanti sabbarasesu aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ tatoyeva uttamaṃ yathāvuttaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2553_6: dhammarasaṃ pivitvā ṭhito, tenāha – “sabbarasaṃ dhammaraso jinātī”ti. Na ca kāhāmi
atk-s0508a1:2553_7: visena santhavanti evarūpaṃ rasuttamaṃ dhammarasaṃ pivitvā ṭhito visena visasadisena
atk-s0508a1:2553_8: visarasena santhavaṃ saṃsaggaṃ na karissāmi, tathākaraṇassa kāraṇaṃ natthīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:2556_0: Lahuko vata me kāyoti āyasmato khitakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2556_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a1:2556_2: yakkhasenāpati hutvā nibbatto ekadivasaṃ yakkhasamāgame nisinno satthāraṃ aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2556_3: rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Tassa
atk-s0508a1:2556_4: satthā dhammaṃ desesi. So dhammaṃ sutvā uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ pavedento apphoṭento
atk-s0508a1:2556_5: uṭṭhahitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:2556_6: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, khitakotissa nāmaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2556_7: ahosi. So viññutaṃ patto mahāmoggallānattherassa mahiddhikabhāvaṃ sutvā “iddhimā
atk-s0508a1:2556_8: bhavissāmī”ti pubbahetunā codiyamāno pabbajitvā bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0508a1:2556_9: samathavipassanāsu kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2568_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā savisesaṃ iddhīsu vasībhāvena anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhonto
atk-s0508a1:2568_1: iddhipāṭihāriyena anusāsanīpāṭihāriyena ca sattānaṃ anuggahaṃ karonto viharati. So
atk-s0508a1:2568_2: bhikkhūhi, “kathaṃ tvaṃ, āvuso, iddhi vaḷañjesī”ti puṭṭho tamatthaṃ ācikkhanto –
atk-s0508a1:2570: “Lahuko vata me kāyo, phuṭṭho ca pītisukhena vipulena;
atk-s0508a1:2571: Tūlamiva eritaṃ mālutena, pilavatīva me kāyo”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:2573_0: Tattha lahuko vata me kāyoti nīvaraṇādivikkhambhanena cuddasavidhena cittaparidamanena
atk-s0508a1:2573_1: caturiddhipādakabhāvanāya suṭṭhu ciṇṇavasībhāvena ca me rūpakāyo sallahuko vata,
atk-s0508a1:2573_2: yena dandhaṃ mahābhūtapaccayampi nāma imaṃ karajakāyaṃ cittavasena pariṇāmemīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:2573_3: Phuṭṭho ca pītisukhena vipulenāti sabbatthakameva pharantena mahatā uḷārena pītisahitena
atk-s0508a1:2573_4: sukhena phuṭṭho ca me kāyoti yojanā. Idañca yathā kāyo lahuko ahosi, taṃ dassanatthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2573_5: vuttaṃ. Sukhasaññokkamanena hi saddhiṃyeva lahusaññokkamanaṃ hoti. Sukhassa pharaṇañcettha
atk-s0508a1:2573_6: taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpavasena daṭṭhabbaṃ kathaṃ pana catutthajjhānasamaṅgino pītisukhapharaṇaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2573_7: samatikkantapītisukhañhi tanti ce? Saccametaṃ, idaṃ pana na catutthajjhānalakkhaṇavasena
atk-s0508a1:2573_8: vuttaṃ, atha kho pubbabhāgavasena. “Pītisukhenā”ti pana pītisahitasadisena sukhena,
atk-s0508a1:2573_9: upekkhā hi idha santasabhāvatāya ñāṇavisesayogato ca sukhanti adhippetaṃ. Tathā hi
atk-s0508a1:2573_11: vā iddhicittena sahajātaṃ sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamati pavisati phusati sampāpuṇātīti
atk-s0508a1:2573_12: ayampi tattha attho. Tathā cāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ – “sukhasaññā nāma upekkhāsampayuttā
atk-s0508a1:2573_13: saññā. Upekkhā hi santaṃ sukhanti vuttaṃ sāyeva saññā nīvaraṇehi ceva vitakkādipaccanīkehi
atk-s0508a1:2573_14: ca vimuttattā lahusaññātipi veditabbā. Taṃ okkantassa panassa karajakāyopi tūlapicu
atk-s0508a1:2573_15: viya sallahuko hoti. So evaṃ vātakkhittatūlapicuno viya sallahukena dissamānena kāyena
atk-s0508a1:2573_16: brahmalokaṃ gacchatī”ti. Tenāha “tūlamiva eritaṃ mālutena, pilavatīva me kāyo”ti.
atk-s0508a1:2573_17: Tassattho – yadāhaṃ brahmalokaṃ aññaṃ vā iddhiyā gantukāmo homi, tadā mālutena vāyunā
atk-s0508a1:2573_18: eritaṃ cittaṃ tūlapicu viya ākāsaṃ laṅghantoyeva me kāyo hotīti.
atk-s0508a1:2576_0: Ukkaṇṭhitoti āyasmato malitavambhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:2576_1: bhagavato kāle himavantato avidūre aññatarasmiṃ jātassare sakuṇo hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2576_2: padumuttaro bhagavā taṃ anuggaṇhanto tattha gantvā jātassaratīre caṅkamati. Sakuṇo
atk-s0508a1:2576_3: bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso sare kumudāni gahetvā bhagavantaṃ pūjesi. So tena
atk-s0508a1:2576_4: puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kurukacchanagare aññatarassa
atk-s0508a1:2576_5: brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, malitavambhotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So viññutaṃ patto
atk-s0508a1:2576_6: pacchābhūmahātheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:2576_7: vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto viharati. Tassa ca ayaṃ sabhāvo, yattha bhojanasappāyo
atk-s0508a1:2576_8: dullabho, itare sulabhā, tato na pakkamati. Yattha pana bhojanasappāyo sulabho, itare
atk-s0508a1:2576_9: dullabhā, tattha na vasati pakkamateva. Evaṃ viharanto ca hetusampannatāya mahāpurisajātikatāya
atk-s0508a1:2576_10: ca nacirasseva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2590: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā udānento –
atk-s0508a1:2593: Na tvevānatthasaṃhitaṃ, vase vāsaṃ vicakkhaṇo”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2594_0: Tattha ukkaṇṭhitopi na vaseti yasmiṃ āvāse vasantassa me bhojanasappāyālābhena adhikusalesu
atk-s0508a1:2594_1: dhammesu ukkaṇṭhā anabhirati uppajjati, tattha ukkaṇṭhitopi vasāmiyeva itarasappāyalābhena
atk-s0508a1:2594_2: na pakkame na pakkamāmi. Na vaseti ettha na-kārenapi pakkametipadaṃ sambandhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2594_3: Ramamānopi pakkameti yasmiṃ pana āvāse vasantassa me paccayavekallābhāvena natthi
atk-s0508a1:2594_4: ukkaṇṭhā, aññadatthu abhiramāmi, evaṃ abhiramamānopi avasesasappāyālābhena tato pakkame,
atk-s0508a1:2594_5: na vaseyyaṃ. Evaṃ paṭipajjantovāhaṃ nacirasseva sakatthaṃ paccupādinti. Ayañcettha
atk-s0508a1:2594_6: attapaṭipattipaccavekkhaṇāyaṃ yojanā. Parassa ovādadāne pana vaseyya na pakkameyyāti
atk-s0508a1:2594_7: vidhānavasena yojetabbaṃ. Na tvevānatthasaṃhitaṃ, vase vāsaṃ vicakkhaṇoti yasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2594_8: āvāse paccayā sulabhā, samaṇadhammo na pāripūriṃ gacchati, yasmiñca āvāse paccayā
atk-s0508a1:2594_9: dullabhā, samaṇadhammopi pāripūriṃ na gacchati, evarūpo āvāso idha anatthasaṃhito
atk-s0508a1:2594_10: nāma avaḍḍhisahitoti katvā. Evarūpaṃ vāsaṃ vicakkhaṇo viññujātiko sakatthaṃ paripūretukāmo
atk-s0508a1:2594_11: natveva vaseyya. Yattha pana pañcaṅgasamannāgato āvāso labbhati, sattapi sappāyā
atk-s0508a1:2597_0: Sataliṅgassa atthassāti āyasmato suhemantattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2597_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito dvānavute
atk-s0508a1:2597_2: kappe tissassa bhagavato kāle vanacaro hutvā vane vasati, taṃ anuggahituṃ bhagavā
atk-s0508a1:2597_3: araññaṃ pavisitvā tassa āsanne ṭhāne aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi. So bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2597_4: disvā pasannacitto sugandhāni punnāgapupphāni ocinitvā bhagavantaṃ pūjesi. So tena
atk-s0508a1:2597_5: puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:2597_6: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde pāriyantadese vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2597_7: suhemantotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So viññutaṃ patto saṅkassanagare migadāye viharantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2597_8: bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā tepiṭako hutvā
atk-s0508a1:2597_9: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño paṭisambhidāpatto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2607_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā evaṃ cintesi – “mayā kho yaṃ sāvakena pattabbaṃ, taṃ anuppattaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2607_1: yaṃnūnāhaṃ idāni bhikkhūnaṃ anuggahaṃ kareyya”nti. Evaṃ cintetvā pabhinnapaṭisambhidatāya
atk-s0508a1:2607_2: akilāsutāya ca attano santikaṃ upagate bhikkhū yathārahaṃ ovadanto anusāsanto kaṅkhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2607_3: chindanto dhammaṃ kathento kammaṭṭhānaṃ niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvā ācikkhanto viharati.
atk-s0508a1:2607_4: Athekadivasaṃ attano santikaṃ upagatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ viññūnañca puggalānaṃ visesaṃ ācikkhanto –
atk-s0508a1:2610: Ekaṅgadassī dummedho, satadassī ca paṇḍito”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2611_0: Tattha sataliṅgassāti līnamatthaṃ gamentīti liṅgāni, atthesu saddassa pavattinimittāni,
atk-s0508a1:2611_1: tāni pana sataṃ anekāni liṅgāni etassāti sataliṅgo. Anekattho hi idha satasaddo,
atk-s0508a1:2611_2: “sataṃ sahassa”ntiādīsu viya na saṅkhyāvisesattho tassa sataliṅgassa. Atthassāti
atk-s0508a1:2611_3: ñeyyassa, ñeyyañhi ñāṇena araṇīyato “attho”ti vuccati. So ca ekopi anekaliṅgo, yathā
atk-s0508a1:2611_4: “sakko purindado maghavā”ti, “paññā vijjā medhā ñāṇa”nti ca. Yena liṅgena pavattinimittena
atk-s0508a1:2611_5: tāvatiṃsādhipatimhi indasaddo pavatto, na tena tattha sakkādisaddā pavattā, atha
atk-s0508a1:2611_6: kho aññena. Tathā yena sammādiṭṭhimhi paññāsaddo pavatto, na tena vijjādisaddā. Tena
atk-s0508a1:2612_0: Satalakkhaṇadhārinoti anekalakkhaṇavato. Lakkhīyati etenāti lakkhaṇaṃ, paccayabhāvino
atk-s0508a1:2612_1: atthassa attano phalaṃ paṭicca paccayabhāvo, tena hi so ayaṃ imassa kāraṇanti lakkhīyati.
atk-s0508a1:2612_2: So ca ekasseva atthassa anekappabhedo upalabbhati, tenāha “satalakkhaṇadhārino”ti.
atk-s0508a1:2612_3: Atha vā lakkhīyantīti lakkhaṇāni, tassa tassa atthassa saṅkhatatādayo pakāravisesā
atk-s0508a1:2612_4: te pana atthato avatthāvisesā veditabbā. Te ca pana tesaṃ aniccatādisāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2612_5: liṅgenti ñāpentīti “liṅgānī”ti ca vuccanti. Tassime ākārā, yasmā ekassāpi atthassa
atk-s0508a1:2612_6: aneke upalabbhanti. Tena vuttaṃ “sataliṅgassa atthassa, satalakkhaṇadhārino”ti. Tenāha
atk-s0508a1:2612_7: āyasmā dhammasenāpati – “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchantī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:2613_0: Ekaṅgadassī dummedhoti evaṃ anekaliṅge anekalakkhaṇe atthe yo tattha ekaṅgadassī
atk-s0508a1:2613_1: aputhupaññatāya ekaliṅgamattaṃ ekalakkhaṇamattañca disvā attanā diṭṭhameva “idameva
atk-s0508a1:2613_2: sacca”nti abhinivissa “moghamañña”nti itaraṃ paṭikkhipati, hatthidassanakaandho viya
atk-s0508a1:2613_3: ekaṅgagāhī dummedho duppañño tattha vijjamānānaṃyeva pakāravisesānaṃ ajānanato micchā
atk-s0508a1:2613_4: abhinivisanato ca. Satadassī ca paṇḍitoti paṇḍito pana tattha vijjamāne anekepi pakāre
atk-s0508a1:2613_5: attano paññācakkhunā sabbaso passati. Yo vā tattha labbhamāne aneke paññācakkhunā
atk-s0508a1:2613_6: attanāpi passati, aññesampi dasseti pakāseti, so paṇḍito vicakkhaṇo atthesu kusalo
atk-s0508a1:2613_7: nāmāti. Evaṃ thero ukkaṃsagataṃ attano paṭisambhidāsampattiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vibhāvesi.
atk-s0508a1:2616_0: Pabbajiṃ tulayitvānāti āyasmato dhammasavattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira
atk-s0508a1:2616_1: padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle suvaccho nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū
atk-s0508a1:2616_2: gharāvāse dosaṃ disvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññāyatane pabbatantare assamaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2616_3: kāretvā bahūhi tāpasehi saddhiṃ vasi. Athassa kusalabījaṃ ropetukāmo padumuttaro
atk-s0508a1:2616_4: bhagavā assamasamīpe ākāse ṭhatvā iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi. So taṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:2616_5: pūjetukāmo nāgapupphāni ocināpesi. Satthā, “alaṃ imassa tāpasassa ettakaṃ kusalabīja”nti
atk-s0508a1:2616_6: pakkāmi. So pupphāni gahetvā satthu gamanamaggaṃ okiritvā cittaṃ pasādento añjaliṃ
atk-s0508a1:2616_7: paggayha aṭṭhāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva
atk-s0508a1:2616_8: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā dhammasavoti
atk-s0508a1:2616_9: laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto hetusampattiyā codiyamāno gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ pabbajjāya
atk-s0508a1:2616_10: ānisaṃsañca disvā dakkhiṇāgirismiṃ viharantaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a1:2616_11: paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2630: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā somanassappatto udānavasena –
atk-s0508a1:2633: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2634_0: Tattha pabbajiṃ tulayitvānāti “sambādho gharāvāso rajāpatho”tiādinā gharāvāse, “appassādā
atk-s0508a1:2634_1: kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā”tiādinā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ tappaṭipakkhato nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2634_2: tulabhūtāya paññāya vicāretvā vīmaṃsitvāti attho. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. Idameva
atk-s0508a1:2637_0: Sa vīsavassasatikoti āyasmato dhammasavapituttherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2637_1: katādhikāro buddhasuññe loke kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bhūtagaṇe nāma pabbate
atk-s0508a1:2637_2: viharantaṃ paccekasambuddhaṃ disvā pasannamānaso tiṇasūlapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi. So
atk-s0508a1:2637_3: tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2637_4: buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto dārapariggahaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2637_5: katvā dhammasavaṃ nāma puttaṃ labhitvā tasmiṃ pabbajite sayampi vīsavassasatiko hutvā,
atk-s0508a1:2637_6: “mama putto tāva taruṇo pabbaji, atha kasmā nāhaṃ pabbajissāmī”ti sañjātasaṃvego
atk-s0508a1:2637_7: satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:2645: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā sañjātasomanasso udānento –
atk-s0508a1:2648: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2649_0: Tattha sa vīsavassasatikoti so vīsaṃvassasatiko, so ahaṃ jātiyā vīsādhikavassasatiko
atk-s0508a1:2649_1: samāno. Pabbajinti pabbajjaṃ upagacchiṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Idameva ca imassa therassa
atk-s0508a1:2652_0: Na nūnāyaṃ paramahitānukampinoti āyasmato saṅgharakkhitattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti?
atk-s0508a1:2652_1: Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito catunavute
atk-s0508a1:2652_2: kappe kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ pabbatapāde vasante satta paccekasambuddhe
atk-s0508a1:2652_3: disvā pasannamānaso kadambapupphāni gahetvā pūjesi. So tena puññakammena devaloke
atk-s0508a1:2652_4: nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:2652_5: sāvatthiyaṃ ibbhakule nibbatti, tassa saṅgharakkhitoti nāmaṃ ahosi. So viññutaṃ patto
atk-s0508a1:2652_6: paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ sahāyaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a1:2652_7: araññe viharati. Therassa vasanaṭṭhānato avidūre vanagumbe ekā migī vijāyitvā taruṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2652_8: chāpaṃ rakkhantī chātajjhattāpi puttasinehena dūre gocarāya na gacchati, āsanne ca
atk-s0508a1:2652_9: tiṇodakassa alābhena kilamati. Taṃ disvā thero, “aho vatāyaṃ loko taṇhābandhanabaddho
atk-s0508a1:2652_10: mahādukkhaṃ anubhavati, na taṃ chindituṃ sakkotī”ti saṃvegajāto tameva aṅkusaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a1:2652_11: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2654: Tamhi pabbatapādamhi, satta buddhā vasanti te.
atk-s0508a1:2656: Ubho hatthehi paggayha, satta buddhe samokiriṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2662: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano dutiyakaṃ bhikkhuṃ micchāvitakkabahulaṃ viharantaṃ ñatvā tameva migiṃ upamaṃ karitvā taṃ ovadanto –
atk-s0508a1:2665: Tathāhayaṃ viharati pākatindriyo, migī yathā taruṇajātikā vane”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:2667_0: Tattha na nūnāyanti na-iti paṭisedhe nipāto. Nūnāti parivitakke. Nūna ayanti padacchedo.
atk-s0508a1:2667_1: Paramahitānukampinoti paramaṃ ativiya, paramena vā anuttarena hitena satte anukampanasīlassa
atk-s0508a1:2667_2: bhagavato. Rahogatoti rahasi gato, suññāgāragato kāyavivekayuttoti attho. Anuvigaṇetīti
atk-s0508a1:2667_3: ettha “na nūnā”ti padadvayaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ “nānuvigaṇeti nūnā”ti, na cintesi
atk-s0508a1:2667_4: maññe, “nānuyuñjatī”ti takkemīti attho. Sāsananti paṭipattisāsanaṃ, catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvananti
atk-s0508a1:2667_5: adhippāyo. Tathā hīti teneva kāraṇena, satthu sāsanassa ananuyuñjanato eva. Ayanti
atk-s0508a1:2667_6: ayaṃ bhikkhu. Pākatindriyoti manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ yathāsakaṃ visayesu vissajjanato
atk-s0508a1:2667_7: sabhāvabhūtaindriyo, asaṃvutacakkhudvārādikoti attho. Yassa taṇhāsaṅgassa acchinnatāya
atk-s0508a1:2667_8: so bhikkhu pākatindriyo viharati, tassa upamaṃ dassento “migī yathā taruṇajātikā
atk-s0508a1:2667_9: vane”ti āha. Yathā ayaṃ taruṇasabhāvā migī puttasnehassa acchinnatāya vane dukkhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2667_10: anubhavati, na taṃ ativattati, evamayampi bhikkhu saṅgassa acchinnatāya pākatindriyo
atk-s0508a1:2667_11: viharanto vaṭṭadukkhaṃ nātivattatīti adhippāyo. “Taruṇavijātikā”ti vā pāṭho. Abhinavappasutā
atk-s0508a1:2667_12: bālavacchāti attho. Taṃ sutvā so bhikkhu sañjātasaṃvego vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:2670_0: Nagā nagaggesu susaṃvirūḷhāti āyasmato usabhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppati? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2670_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni karonto ito ekatiṃse kappe
atk-s0508a1:2670_2: sikhissa bhagavato kāle devaputto hutvā nibbatto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:2670_3: dibbapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi. Sā pupphapūjā sattāhaṃ pupphamaṇḍapākārena aṭṭhāsi. Devamanussānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2670_4: mahāsamāgamo ahosi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:2670_5: kosalaraṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbatti, tassa usabhoti nāmaṃ ahosi. So viññutaṃ patto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe
atk-s0508a1:2670_6: satthari laddhappasādo pabbajitvā katapubbakicco araññe pabbatapāde viharati. Tena
atk-s0508a1:2670_7: ca samayena pāvusakālameghe abhippavuṭṭhe pabbatasikharesu rukkhagacchalatāya ghanapaṇṇasaṇḍino
atk-s0508a1:2670_8: honti. Athekadivasaṃ thero leṇato nikkhamitvā taṃ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṃ pabbatarāmaṇeyyakañca
atk-s0508a1:2670_9: disvā yonisomanasikāravasena “imepi nāma rukkhādayo acetanā utusampattiyā vaḍḍhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2670_10: pāpuṇanti, atha kasmā nāhaṃ utusappāyaṃ labhitvā guṇehi vaḍḍhiṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti cintento –
atk-s0508a1:2673: Vivekakāmassa araññasaññino, janeti bhiyyo usabhassa kalyata”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:2675_0: Tattha nagāti rukkhā, “nāgā”ti keci vadanti, nāgarukkhāti attho. Nagaggesūti pabbatasikharesu.
atk-s0508a1:2675_1: Susaṃvirūḷhāti suṭṭhu samantato virūḷhamūlā hutvā parito upari ca sammadeva sañjātasākhaggapallavappasākhāti
atk-s0508a1:2675_2: attho. Udaggameghena navena sittāti paṭhamuppannena uḷārena mahatā pāvusameghena
atk-s0508a1:2675_3: abhippavuṭṭhā. Vivekakāmassāti kilesavivittaṃ cittavivekaṃ icchantassa, araññavāsena
atk-s0508a1:2675_4: tāva kāyaviveko laddho, idāni upadhivivekādhigamassa nissayabhūto cittaviveko laddhabboti
atk-s0508a1:2675_5: taṃ patthayamānassa, jāgariyaṃ anuyuñjantassāti attho, tenāha “araññasaññino”ti.
atk-s0508a1:2675_6: Araññavāso nāma satthārā vaṇṇito thomito. So ca kho yāvadeva samathavipassanābhāvanāpāripūriyā,
atk-s0508a1:2675_7: tasmā sā mayā hatthagatā kātabbāti evaṃ araññagatasaññino nekkhammasaṅkappabahulassāti
atk-s0508a1:2675_8: attho. Janetīti uppādenti, puthutte hi idaṃ ekavacanaṃ. Keci pana “janentī”ti paṭhanti.
atk-s0508a1:2675_9: Bhiyyoti uparūpari. Usabhassāti attānameva paraṃ viya vadati. Kalyatanti kalyabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2675_10: cittassa kammaññataṃ bhāvanāyogyataṃ. Svāyamattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Evaṃ thero imaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2675_11: gāthaṃ vadantoyeva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2690_0: Duppabbajjaṃ ve duradhivāsā gehāti āyasmato jentattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a1:2690_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto
atk-s0508a1:2690_2: sikhissa bhagavato kāle devaputto hutvā nibbatti. So ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannacitto
atk-s0508a1:2690_3: kiṃkirātapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2690_4: buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe jentagāme ekassa maṇḍalikarājassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2690_5: jentotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So viññutaṃ patto daharakāleyeva hetusampattiyā codiyamāno
atk-s0508a1:2690_6: pabbajjāninnamānaso hutvā puna cintesi – “pabbajjā nāma dukkarā, gharāpi durāvāsā,
atk-s0508a1:2690_7: dhammo ca gambhīro, bhogā ca duradhigamā, kiṃ nu kho kattabba”nti evaṃ pana cintābahulo
atk-s0508a1:2690_8: hutvā vicaranto ekadivasaṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇi. Sutakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a1:2690_9: pabbajjābhirato hutvā satthu santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0508a1:2690_10: sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2695: “Ito ca navame kappe, rājā sattuttamo ahuṃ;
atk-s0508a1:2698_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhanto, “asakkhiṃ vatāhaṃ ādito mayhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2698_1: uppannavitakkaṃ chinditu”nti somanassajāto vitakkassa uppannākāraṃ tassa ca sammadeva
atk-s0508a1:2700: “Duppabbajjaṃ ve duradhivāsā gehā, dhammo gambhīro duradhigamā bhogā;
atk-s0508a1:2701: Kicchā vutti no itarītareneva, yuttaṃ cintetuṃ satatamaniccata”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:2703_0: Tattha duppabbajjanti appaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā bhogakkhandhañceva ñātiparivaṭṭañca pahāya
atk-s0508a1:2703_1: imasmiṃ sāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajanassa dukkarattā dukkhaṃ pabbajanaṃ, dukkarā pabbajjāti
atk-s0508a1:2703_2: duppabbajjaṃ. Veti nipātamattaṃ, daḷhattho vā “pabbajjā dukkhā”ti. Gehañce āvaseyyaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2703_3: duradhivāsā gehā, yasmā gehaṃ adhivasantena raññā rājakiccaṃ, issarena issarakiccaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2703_4: gahapatinā gahapatikiccaṃ kattabbaṃ hoti, parijano ceva samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca saṅgahetabbā,
atk-s0508a1:2703_5: tasmiṃ tasmiñca kattabbe kariyamānepi gharāvāso chiddaghaṭo viya mahāsamuddo viya
atk-s0508a1:2703_6: ca duppūro, tasmā gehā nāmete adhivasituṃ āvasituṃ dukkhā dukkarāti katvā duradhivāsā
atk-s0508a1:2703_7: durāvāsāti. Pabbajjañce anutiṭṭheyyaṃ dhammo gambhīro, yadatthā pabbajjā, so pabbajitena
atk-s0508a1:2703_8: adhigantabbo paṭivedhasaddhammo gambhīro, gambhīrañāṇagocarattā duddaso, duppaṭivijjho
atk-s0508a1:2703_9: dhammassa gambhīrabhāvena duppaṭivijjhattā. Gehañce āvaseyyaṃ, duradhigamā bhogā
atk-s0508a1:2703_10: yehi vinā na sakkā gehaṃ āvasituṃ, te bhogā dukkhena kasirena adhigantabbatāya duradhigamā.
atk-s0508a1:2703_11: Evaṃ sante gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajjaṃyeva anutiṭṭheyyaṃ, evampi kicchā vutti no
atk-s0508a1:2703_12: itarītarena idha imasmiṃ buddhasāsane itarītarena yathāladdhena paccayena amhākaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2703_13: vutti jīvikā kicchā dukkhā, gharāvāsānaṃ duradhivāsatāya bhogānañca duradhigamatāya
atk-s0508a1:2703_14: gehe itarītarena paccayena yāpetabbatāya kicchā kasirā vutti amhākaṃ, tattha kiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2703_15: kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti? Yuttaṃ cintetuṃ satatamaniccataṃ sakalaṃ divasaṃ pubbarattāpararattañca
atk-s0508a1:2703_16: tebhūmakadhammajātaṃ aniccatanti, tato uppādavayavantato ādiantavantato tāvakālikato
atk-s0508a1:2703_17: ca na niccanti “anicca”nti cintetuṃ vipassituṃ yuttaṃ. Aniccānupassanāya siddhāya
atk-s0508a1:2703_18: itarānupassanā sukheneva sijjhantīti aniccānupassanāva ettha vuttā, aniccassa dukkhānattatānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2703_19: abyabhicaraṇato sāsanikassa sukhaggahaṇato ca. Tenāha – “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2703_20: yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti, “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhammaṃ”,
atk-s0508a1:2703_21: “vayadhammā saṅkhārā”ti ca tadaminā evaṃ aññamaññaṃ paṭipakkhavasena aparāparaṃ uppanne
atk-s0508a1:2703_22: vitakke niggahetvā aniccatāmukhena vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā idāni katakicco jātoti dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:2703_23: Tena vuttaṃ “attano paṭipatti”ntiādi. Idameva therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:2706_0: Tevijjohaṃ mahājhāyīti āyasmato vacchagottattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2706_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalabījaṃ ropento vipassissa
atk-s0508a1:2706_2: bhagavato kāle bandhumatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ raññā
atk-s0508a1:2706_3: nāgarehi ca saddhiṃ buddhapūjaṃ katvā tato paraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2706_4: buddhuppāde rājagahe vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, tassa vacchagottatāya
atk-s0508a1:2706_5: vacchagottotveva samaññā ahosi. So viññutaṃ patvā brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṃ gato
atk-s0508a1:2706_6: vimuttiṃ gavesanto tattha sāraṃ adisvā paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā vicaranto
atk-s0508a1:2706_7: satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchitvā tasmiṃ vissajjite pasannamānaso satthu santike
atk-s0508a1:2706_8: pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2718: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā somanassajāto udānavasena –
atk-s0508a1:2721: Sadattho me anuppatto, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2722_0: Tattha tevijjohanti yadipi maṃ pubbe tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāraṃ gatattā “brāhmaṇo tevijjo”ti
atk-s0508a1:2722_1: sañjānanti, taṃ pana samaññāmattaṃ vedesu vijjākiccassa abhāvato. Idāni pana pubbenivāsañāṇādīnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2722_2: tissannaṃ vijjānaṃ adhigatattā paramatthato tevijjo ahaṃ, mahantassa anavasesassa
atk-s0508a1:2722_3: samudayapakkhiyassa kilesagaṇassa jhāpanato, mahantena maggaphalajhānena mahantassa
atk-s0508a1:2722_4: uḷārassa paṇītassa nibbānassa jhāyanato ca mahājhāyī. Cetosamathakovidoti cittasaṅkhobhakarānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2722_5: saṃkilesadhammānaṃ vūpasamanena cetaso samādahane kusalo. Etena tevijjabhāvassa kāraṇamāha.
atk-s0508a1:2722_6: Samādhikosallasahitena hi āsavakkhayena tevijjatā, na kevalena. Sadatthoti sakattho
atk-s0508a1:2722_7: ka-kārassāyaṃ da-kāro kato “anuppattasadattho”tiādīsu viya. “Sadattho”ti ca arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2722_8: veditabbaṃ. Tañhi attapaṭibandhaṭṭhena attānaṃ avijahanaṭṭhena attano paramatthaṭṭhena
atk-s0508a1:2722_9: attano atthattā “sakattho”ti vuccati. Svāyaṃ sadattho me mayā anuppatto adhigato.
atk-s0508a1:2722_10: Etena yathāvuttaṃ mahājhāyibhāvaṃ sikhāpattaṃ katvā dasseti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a1:2725_0: Acchodikā puthusilāti āyasmato vanavacchattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2725_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalabījaṃ ropento vipassissa
atk-s0508a1:2725_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto parassa kammaṃ katvā jīvanto kassaci
atk-s0508a1:2725_3: aparādhaṃ katvā maraṇabhayena tajjito palāyanto antarāmagge bodhirukkhaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
