atk-s0508a1:2725_4: tassa mūlaṃ sammajjitvā piṇḍibandhehi asokapupphehi pūjaṃ katvā vanditvā bodhiṃ abhimukho
atk-s0508a1:2725_5: namassamāno pallaṅkena nisinno māretuṃ āgate paccatthike disvā tesu cittaṃ akopetvā
atk-s0508a1:2725_6: bodhiṃ eva āvajjento sataporise papāte papati. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:2725_7: aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe vibhavasampannassa
atk-s0508a1:2725_8: brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, “vaccho”tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto bimbisārasamāgame
atk-s0508a1:2725_9: paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2733: Te ca disvānahaṃ tattha, āvajjiṃ bodhimuttamaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2738: “Ito ca tatiye kappe, rājā susaññato ahaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:2741_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vivekābhiratiyā vaneyeva vasi, tena vanavacchoti samaññā udapādi.
atk-s0508a1:2741_1: Atha kadāci thero ñātijanānuggahatthaṃ rājagahaṃ gato tattha ñātakehi upaṭṭhiyamāno
atk-s0508a1:2741_2: katipāhaṃ vasitvā gamanākāraṃ sandasseti. Taṃ ñātakā, “bhante, amhākaṃ anuggahatthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2741_3: dhuravihāre vasatha, mayaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmā”ti yāciṃsu. Thero tesaṃ pabbatarāmaṇeyyakittanāpadesena
atk-s0508a1:2744: Ambusevālasañchannā, te selā ramayanti ma”nti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2745_0: Tattha acchodikāti acchaṃ abahalaṃ sukhumaṃ udakaṃ etesūti “acchodakā”ti vattabbe
atk-s0508a1:2745_1: liṅgavipallāsena acchodikā”ti vuttaṃ. Etena tesaṃ udakasampattiṃ dasseti. Puthusilāti
atk-s0508a1:2745_2: puthulā vitthatā mudusukhasamphassā silā etesūti puthusilā. Etena nisajjanaṭṭhānasampattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2745_3: dasseti. Gunnaṃ viya naṅgulaṃ naṅguṭṭhaṃ etesanti gonaṅgulā, kāḷamakkaṭā, “pakatimakkaṭā”tipi
atk-s0508a1:2745_4: vadantiyeva. Gonaṅgulehi ca pasadādikehi migehi ca tahaṃ tahaṃ vicarantehi āyutā
atk-s0508a1:2745_5: missitāti gonaṅgulamigāyutā. Etena tesaṃ amanussūpacāritāya araññalakkhaṇūpetataṃ
atk-s0508a1:2745_6: dasseti. Ambusevālasañchannāti pasavanato satataṃ paggharamānasalilatāya tahaṃ tahaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2745_7: udakasevālasañchāditā. Te selā ramayanti manti yatthāhaṃ vasāmi; te edisā selā pabbatā
atk-s0508a1:2745_8: vivekābhiratiyā maṃ ramayanti, tasmā tatthevāhaṃ gacchāmīti adhippāyo. Idameva ca
atk-s0508a1:2748_0: Kāyaduṭṭhullagarunoti āyasmato adhimuttattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:2748_1: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2748_2: gato kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññe viharanto
atk-s0508a1:2748_3: buddhuppādaṃ sutvā manussūpacāraṃ upagantvā satthāraṃ bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ gacchantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2748_4: disvā pasannamānaso attano vākacīraṃ satthu pādamūle patthari. Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2748_5: ñatvā tasmiṃ aṭṭhāsi. Tattha ṭhitaṃ bhagavantaṃ kāḷānusārena gandhena pūjetvā “samuddharasimaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2748_6: loka”ntiādikāhi dasahi gāthāhi abhitthavi. Taṃ satthā “anāgate ito satasahassakappamatthake
atk-s0508a1:2748_7: gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā chaḷabhiñño bhavissatī”ti byākaritvā
atk-s0508a1:2748_8: pakkāmi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā tato yāvāyaṃ buddhuppādo, tāva
atk-s0508a1:2748_9: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:2748_10: adhimuttoti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṃ gantvā tattha sāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:2748_11: apassanto pacchimabhavikattā nissaraṇaṃ gavesanto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2748_12: disvā paṭiladdhasaddho satthu santike pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:2772: Asamo susamo santo, vasī tādī jitañjayo.
atk-s0508a1:2780: Vanditvā satthuno pāde, tuṇhī aṭṭhāsahaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a1:2782: Bhikkhusaṅghe ṭhito satthā, imā gāthā abhāsatha.
atk-s0508a1:2792: Tatheva tvaṃ mahāvīra, dhammena tappayī mamaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2795: “Aho nūna sa bhagavā, ciraṃ tiṭṭheyya cakkhumā;
atk-s0508a1:2797: “Ayaṃ me pacchimā jāti, bhavā sabbe samūhatā;
atk-s0508a1:2802: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attanā saha vasante kāyadaḷhibahule bhikkhū ovadanto –
atk-s0508a1:2806_0: Tattha kāyaduṭṭhullagarunoti duṭṭhullaṃ asubhayogyatā, kāyassa duṭṭhullaṃ kāyaduṭṭhullaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2806_1: kāyaduṭṭhullaṃ garu sambhāvitaṃ yassa so kāyaduṭṭhullagaru, anissaraṇappañño hutvā
atk-s0508a1:2806_2: kāyaposanappasuto kāyadaḷhibahuloti attho, tassa kāyaduṭṭhullagaruno. Hiyyamānamhi
atk-s0508a1:2806_3: jīviteti kunnadīnaṃ udakaṃ viya jīvitasaṅkhāre lahuso khīyamāne. Sarīrasukhagiddhassāti
atk-s0508a1:2806_4: paṇītāhārādīhi attano kāyassa sukhena gedhaṃ āpannassa. Kuto samaṇasādhutāti evarūpassa
atk-s0508a1:2806_5: puggalassa samaṇabhāvena sādhutā susamaṇatā kuto kena kāraṇena siyā, ekaṃsato pana
atk-s0508a1:2806_6: kāye jīvite ca nirapekkhassa itarītarasantosena santuṭṭhassa āraddhavīriyasseva samaṇasādhutāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:2809_0: Esāvahiyyase pabbatenāti āyasmato mahānāmattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2809_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a1:2809_2: nibbattitvā brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṃ gato gharāvāsaṃ pahāya aññatarāya nadiyā tīre
atk-s0508a1:2809_3: assamaṃ kāretvā sambahule brāhmaṇe mante vācento viharati. Athekadivasaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0508a1:2809_4: taṃ anuggaṇhituṃ tassa asamapadaṃ upagacchi. So bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannacitto āsanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2809_5: paññāpetvā adāsi. Nisinne bhagavati sumadhuraṃ madhuṃ upanāmesi. Taṃ bhagavā paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0508a1:2809_6: heṭṭhā adhimuttattheravatthumhi vuttanayena anāgataṃ byākaritvā pakkāmi. So tena
atk-s0508a1:2809_7: puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva parivattento imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:2809_8: sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā mahānāmoti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:2809_9: santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0508a1:2809_10: nesādake nāma pabbate viharanto kilesapariyuṭṭhānaṃ vikkhambhetuṃ asakkonto “kiṃ
atk-s0508a1:2809_11: me iminā saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa jīvitenā”ti attabhāvaṃ nibbindanto uccaṃ pabbatasikharaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2809_12: abhiruhitvā “ito pātetvā taṃ māressāmī”ti attānaṃ paraṃ viya niddisanto –
atk-s0508a1:2812: Nesādakena girinā, yasassinā paricchadenā”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2813_0: Tattha esāvahiyyaseti eso tvaṃ mahānāma avahiyyase parihāyasi. Pabbatenāti nivāsaṭṭhānabhūtena
atk-s0508a1:2813_1: iminā pabbatena. Bahukuṭajasallakikenāti bahūhi kuṭajehi indasālarukkhehi sallakīhi
atk-s0508a1:2813_2: indasālarukkhehi vā samannāgatena. Nesādakenāti evaṃnāmakena. Girināti selena. Selo
atk-s0508a1:2813_3: hi sandhisaṅkhātehi pabbehi ṭhitattā “pabbato”ti, pasavanādivasena jalassa, sārabhūtānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2813_5: “pabbatenā”ti vatvā “girinā”ti ca vuttaṃ. Yasassināti sabbaguṇehi vissutena pakāsena.
atk-s0508a1:2813_6: Paricchadenāti nānāvidharukkhagacchalatāhi samantato channena, vasanaṭṭhānatāya vā
atk-s0508a1:2813_7: tuyhaṃ paricchadabhūtena. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – mahānāma, yadi kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0508a1:2813_8: vitakkabahulo hosi, evaṃ tvaṃ iminā chāyūdakasampannena sappāyena nivāsanaṭṭhānabhūtena
atk-s0508a1:2813_9: nesādakagirinā parihāyasi, idānihaṃ taṃ ito pātetvā māressāmi, tasmā na labbhā vitakkavasikena
atk-s0508a1:2813_10: bhavitunti. Evaṃ thero attānaṃ santajjentoyeva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2826: “Yo taṃ adāsi madhuṃ me, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi;
atk-s0508a1:2831: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:2842: “Vuṭṭhamhi deve caturaṅgule tiṇe, sampupphite dharaṇīruhe sañchanne;
atk-s0508a1:2843: Suññe ghare maṇḍaparukkhamūlake, vasāmi niccaṃ sukhito anāsavo.
atk-s0508a1:2844: “Majjhe mahante hīne ca, bhave sabbe atikkamiṃ;
atk-s0508a1:2845: Ajja me āsavā khīṇā, natthi dāni punabbhavo.
atk-s0508a1:2852_0: Chaphassāyatane hitvāti āyasmato pārāpariyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2852_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto piyadassissa bhagavato kāle nesādayoniyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2852_2: nibbattitvā tassa viññutaṃ pattassa vicaraṇaṭṭhāne aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe piyadassī
atk-s0508a1:2852_3: bhagavā taṃ anuggaṇhituṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdi. So ca mige pariyesanto
atk-s0508a1:2852_4: taṃ ṭhānaṃ gato satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso bhagavantaṃ anto katvā kataṃ sākhāmaṇḍapaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2852_5: padumapupphehi kūṭāgārākārena sañchādetvā uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedento sattāhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2852_6: namassamāno aṭṭhāsi. Divase divase ca milātamilātāni apanetvā abhinavehi chādesi.
atk-s0508a1:2852_7: Satthā sattāhassa accayena nirodhato vuṭṭhahitvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ anussari. Tāvadeva
atk-s0508a1:2852_9: devatā sannipatiṃsu, mahā samāgamo ahosi. Satthā anumodanaṃ karonto tassa devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:2852_10: bhāviniṃ sampattiṃ imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvakabodhiñca byākaritvā pakkāmi. So tena
atk-s0508a1:2852_11: puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:2852_12: viññutaṃ patto tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū hutvā parāparagottatāya pārāpariyoti laddhasamañño
atk-s0508a1:2852_13: bahū brāhmaṇe mante vācento satthu rājagahagamane buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:2852_14: pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2878: Bhikkhusaṅghe ca sampatte, gāthā pabyāharī jino.
atk-s0508a1:2899: “Cīvare piṇḍapāte ca, cetanā me na vijjati;
atk-s0508a1:2908: Tassa dhammaṃ suṇitvāna, pattomhi acalaṃ padaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2914: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā sañjātasomanasso udānavasena –
atk-s0508a1:2917: Aghamūlaṃ vamitvāna, patto me āsavakkhayo”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2918_0: Tattha chaphassāyatane hitvāti cakkhusamphassādīnaṃ channaṃ samphassānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānatāya
atk-s0508a1:2918_2: pahāya. Guttadvāro susaṃvutoti tato eva cakkhudvārādīnaṃ guttattā, tattha pavattanakānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2918_3: abhijjhādīnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pavesananivāraṇena satikavāṭena suṭṭu pihitattā guttadvāro
atk-s0508a1:2918_4: susaṃvuto. Atha vā manacchaṭṭhānaṃ channaṃ dvārānaṃ vuttanayena rakkhitattā guttadvāro,
atk-s0508a1:2918_5: kāyādīhi suṭṭhu saññatattā susaṃvutoti evamettha attho veditabbo. Aghamūlaṃ vamitvānāti
atk-s0508a1:2918_6: aghassa vaṭṭadukkhassa mūlabhūtaṃ avijjābhavataṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ dosaṃ, sabbaṃ vā kilesadosaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2918_7: ariyamaggasaṅkhātavamanayogapānena uggiritvā santānato bahi katvā, bahikaraṇahetu
atk-s0508a1:2918_8: vā. Patto me āsavakkhayoti kāmāsavādayo āsavā ettha khīyanti, tesaṃ vā khayena pattabboti
atk-s0508a1:2918_9: āsavakkhayo, nibbānaṃ arahattañca. So āsavakkhayo patto adhigatoti udānavasena aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2921_0: Suvilitto suvasanoti āyasmato yasattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2921_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa
atk-s0508a1:2921_2: bhagavato kāle mahānubhāvo nāgarājā hutvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ attano bhavanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2921_3: netvā mahādānaṃ pavattesi. Bhagavantaṃ mahagghena ticīvarena acchādesi, ekamekañca
atk-s0508a1:2921_4: bhikkhuṃ mahaggheneva paccekadussayugena sabbena samaṇaparikkhārena acchādesi. So
atk-s0508a1:2921_5: tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle seṭṭhiputto
atk-s0508a1:2921_6: hutvā mahābodhimaṇḍaṃ sattahi ratanehi pūjesi. Kassapassa bhagavato kāle sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:2921_7: samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi. Evaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a1:2921_8: bārāṇasiyaṃ mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhino putto hutvā nibbatti, yaso nāma nāmena paramasukhumālo.
atk-s0508a1:2921_9: “Tassa tayo pāsādā”ti sabbaṃ khandhake āgatanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2922_0: So pubbahetunā codiyamāno rattibhāge niddābhibhūtassa parijanassa vippakāraṃ disvā
atk-s0508a1:2922_1: sañjātasaṃvego suvaṇṇapādukārūḷhova gehato niggato devatāvivaṭena nagaradvārena nikkhamitvā
atk-s0508a1:2922_2: isipatanasamīpaṃ gato “upaddutaṃ vata, bho, upassaṭṭhaṃ vata, bho”ti āha. Tena samayena
atk-s0508a1:2922_3: bhagavatā isipatane viharantena tasseva anuggaṇhanatthaṃ abbhokāse caṅkamantena “ehi,
atk-s0508a1:2922_4: yasa, idaṃ anupaddutaṃ, idaṃ anupassaṭṭha”nti vutto, “anupaddutaṃ anupassaṭṭhaṃ kira
atk-s0508a1:2922_5: atthī”ti somanassajāto suvaṇṇapādukā oruyha bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ nisinno
atk-s0508a1:2922_6: satthārā anupubbikathaṃ kathetvā saccadesanāya katāya saccapariyosāne sotāpanno hutvā
atk-s0508a1:2922_7: gavesanatthaṃ āgatassa pitu bhagavatā saccadesanāya kariyamānāya arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:2926: Nadī ca sandate tattha, supatitthā manoramā.
atk-s0508a1:2945: “Lābhā amhaṃ suladdhaṃ no, ye vasāma tavantike;
atk-s0508a1:2957: “Yo me annena pānena, sabbe ime ca tappayiṃ;
atk-s0508a1:2964: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:2968: Citake chattaṃ dhārenti, heṭṭhā chattamhi ḍayhatha.
atk-s0508a1:2970: Maṇḍape rukkhamūle vā, santāpo me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a1:2974_0: Atha bhagavā āyasmantaṃ yasaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ bāhuṃ pasāretvā “ehi bhikkhū”ti āha. Vacanasamanantarameva
atk-s0508a1:2974_1: dvaṅgulamattakesamassu aṭṭhaparikkhāradharo vassasaṭṭhikatthero viya ahosi. So attano
atk-s0508a1:2977: Tisso vijjā ajjhagamiṃ, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:2978_0: Tattha suvilittoti sundarena kuṅkumacandanānulepanena vilittagatto. Suvasanoti suṭṭhu
atk-s0508a1:2981_0: Abhisattova nipatatīti āyasmato kimilattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:2981_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto kakusandhassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:2981_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto parinibbute satthari tassa dhātuyo uddissa saḷalamālāhi
atk-s0508a1:2981_3: maṇḍapākārena pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena tāvatiṃse nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2981_4: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare sākiyarājakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:2981_5: kimilotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto bhogasampattiyā sampanno viharati. Tassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2981_6: disvā saṃvegajananatthaṃ anupiyāyaṃ viharanto satthā paṭhamayobbane ṭhitaṃ dassanīyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:2981_7: itthirūpaṃ abhinimminitvā purato dassetvā puna anukkamena yathā jarārogavipattīhi
atk-s0508a1:2981_8: abhibhūtā dissati, tathā akāsi. Taṃ disvā kimilakumāro ativiya saṃvegaṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0508a1:2983: “Abhisattova nipatati vayo, rūpaṃ aññamiva tatheva santaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:2984: Tasseva sato avippavasato, aññasseva sarāmi attāna”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:2986_0: Tattha abhisattovāti “tvaṃ sīghaṃ gaccha mā tiṭṭhā”ti devehi anusiṭṭho āṇatto viya.
atk-s0508a1:2986_1: “Abhisaṭṭho vā”tipi pāṭho, “tvaṃ lahuṃ gacchā”ti kenaci abhilāsāpito viyāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:2986_2: Nipatatīti atipatati abhidhāvati na tiṭṭhati, khaṇe khaṇe khayavayaṃ pāpuṇātīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:2986_3: Vayoti bālyayobbanādiko sarīrassa avatthāviseso. Idha panassa yobbaññaṃ adhippetaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2986_4: taṃ hissa abhipatantaṃ khīyantaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhitaṃ. Rūpanti rūpasampadāti vadati.
atk-s0508a1:2986_5: Rūpanti pana sarīraṃ “aṭṭhiñca paṭicca nhāruñca paṭicca maṃsañca paṭicca ākāso parivārito
atk-s0508a1:2986_6: rūpaṃtveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”tiādīsu viya. Aññamiva tatheva santanti idaṃ rūpaṃ yādisaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:2986_7: sayaṃ tatheva tenevākārena santaṃ vijjamānaṃ aññaṃ viya mayhaṃ upaṭṭhātīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:2986_8: “Tadeva santa”nti ca keci paṭhanti. Tasseva satoti tasseva me anaññassa sato samānassa.
atk-s0508a1:2986_9: Avippavasatoti na vippavasantassa, ciravippavāsena hi sato anaññampi aññaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti
atk-s0508a1:2986_10: idampi idha natthīti adhippāyo. Aññasseva sarāmi attānanti imaṃ mama attabhāvaṃ aññassa
atk-s0508a1:2986_11: sattassa viya sarāmi upadhāremi sañjānāmīti attho. Tassevaṃ aniccataṃ manasi karontassa
atk-s0508a1:2986_12: daḷhataro saṃvego udapādi, so saṃvegajāto satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:2986_13: pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:2988: Gahetvā saḷalaṃ mālaṃ, maṇḍapaṃ kārayiṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:2991: “Divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, caṅkamanto ṭhito cahaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:2996: Arahattaṃ pana patvāpi thero attano purimuppannaṃ aniccatāmanasikāraṃ vibhāvento tameva gāthaṃ paccudāhāsi. Tenetaṃ imassa therassa aññābyākaraṇampi ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:2999_0: Rukkhamūlagahanaṃ pasakkiyāti āyasmato vajjiputtattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a1:2999_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto
atk-s0508a1:2999_2: ito catunavute kappe ekaṃ paccekasambuddhaṃ bhikkhāya gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:2999_3: kadaliphalāni adāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni
atk-s0508a1:2999_4: katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ licchavirājaputto hutvā
atk-s0508a1:2999_5: nibbatti, vajjirājaputtattā vajjiputtotveva cassa samaññā ahosi. So daharo hutvā
atk-s0508a1:2999_7: satthu dhammadesanākāle vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante nisinno dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:2999_8: satthu santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:3007_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā aparabhāge aciraparinibbute satthari dhammaṃ saṅgāyituṃ saṅketaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3007_1: katvā mahātheresu tattha tattha viharantesu ekadivasaṃ āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sekhaṃyeva
atk-s0508a1:3007_2: samānaṃ mahatiyā parisāya parivutaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ disvā tassa uparimaggādhigamāya ussāhaṃ janento –
atk-s0508a1:3010: Jhāya gotama mā ca pamādo, kiṃ te biḷibiḷikā karissatī”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:3012_0: Tattha rukkhamūlagahananti rukkhamūlabhūtaṃ gahanaṃ, gahanañhi atthi, na rukkhamūlaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3012_1: rukkhamūlañca atthi, na gahanaṃ, tesu rukkhamūlaggahaṇena ṭhānassa chāyāsampannatāya
atk-s0508a1:3012_3: janasambādhābhāvañca dasseti, tadubhayena ca bhāvanāyogyataṃ. Pasakkiyāti upagantvā.
atk-s0508a1:3012_4: Nibbānaṃ hadayasmiṃ opiyāti “evaṃ mayā paṭipajjitvā nibbānaṃ adhigantabba”nti nibbutiṃ
atk-s0508a1:3012_5: hadaye ṭhapetvā citte karitvā. Jhāyāti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena jhāya, vipassanābhāvanāsahitaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3012_6: maggabhāvanaṃ bhāvehi. Gotamāti dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ gottena ālapati. Mā ca pamādoti
atk-s0508a1:3012_7: adhikusalesu dhammesu mā pamādaṃ āpajji. Idāni yādiso therassa pamādo, taṃ paṭikkhepavasena
atk-s0508a1:3012_8: dassento “kiṃ te biḷibiḷikā karissatī”ti āha. Tattha biḷibiḷikāti viḷiviḷikiriyā,
atk-s0508a1:3012_9: biḷibiḷīti saddapavatti yathā niratthakā, evaṃ biḷibiḷikāsadisā janapaññatti kiṃ
atk-s0508a1:3012_10: te karissati kīdisaṃ atthaṃ tuyhaṃ sādheti, tasmā janapaññattiṃ pahāya sadatthapasuto
atk-s0508a1:3013_0: Taṃ sutvā aññehi vuttavisagandhavāyanavacanena saṃvegajāto bahudeva rattiṃ caṅkamena
atk-s0508a1:3013_1: vītināmento vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā mañcake nipannamattova arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:3016_0: Pañcakkhandhā pariññātāti āyasmato isidattattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:3016_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:3016_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ rathiyaṃ gacchantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3016_3: disvā pasannamānaso madhuraṃ āmodaphalaṃ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:3016_4: aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde avantiraṭṭhe
atk-s0508a1:3016_5: vaḍḍhagāme aññatarassa satthavāhassa putto hutvā nibbatti, isidattotissa nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:3016_6: So vayappatto macchikāsaṇḍe cittassa gahapatino adiṭṭhasahāyo hutvā tena buddhaguṇe
atk-s0508a1:3016_7: likhitvā pesitasāsanaṃ paṭilabhitvā sāsane sañjātappasādo therassa mahākaccānassa
atk-s0508a1:3016_8: santike pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:3022_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā “buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ gamissāmī”ti theraṃ āpucchitvā anukkamena
atk-s0508a1:3022_1: majjhimadesaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno, “kacci,
atk-s0508a1:3022_2: bhikkhu, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīya”ntiādinā satthārā katapaṭisanthāro paṭivacanamukhena,
atk-s0508a1:3022_3: “bhagavā tumhākaṃ sāsanaṃ upagatakālato paṭṭhāya mayhaṃ sabbadukkhaṃ apagataṃ, sabbo
atk-s0508a1:3025: Dukkhakkhayo anuppatto, patto me āsavakkhayo”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3026_0: Tattha pañcakkhandhā pariññātāti pañcapi me upādānakkhandhā vipassanāpaññāsahitāya
atk-s0508a1:3026_1: maggapaññāya “idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, na ito bhiyyo”ti sabbaso paricchijja
atk-s0508a1:3026_2: ñātā, na tesu kiñcipi pariññātabbaṃ atthīti adhippāyo. Tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakāti sabbaso
atk-s0508a1:3026_3: pariññātattā eva tesaṃ avijjātaṇhādikassa mūlassa samucchinnattā ariyamaggena pahīnattā
atk-s0508a1:3026_4: yāvacarimacittanirodhā te tiṭṭhanti. Dukkhakkhayo anuppattoti chinnamūlakattāyeva
atk-s0508a1:3026_5: ca nesaṃ vaṭṭadukkhassa khayo parikkhayo anuppatto, nibbānaṃ adhigataṃ. Patto me
atk-s0508a1:3026_6: āsavakkhayoti kāmāsavādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ āsavānaṃ khayante abhigantabbatāya “āsavakkhayo”ti
atk-s0508a1:3026_7: laddhanāmaṃ arahattaṃ pattaṃ paṭiladdhanti attho. Keci pana antimāyaṃ samussayo”ti
atk-s0508a1:3026_8: paṭhanti. Nibbānassa adhigatattāyeva ayaṃ mama samussayo attabhāvo antimo sabbapacchimako,
atk-s0508a1:3026_9: natthi dāni punabbhavoti attho. Yaṃ pana tattha tattha avuttaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānaṃyevāti.
atk-s0508a1:3035_0: Dukanipāte natthi koci bhavo niccotiādikā āyasmato uttarattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti?
atk-s0508a1:3035_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto
atk-s0508a1:3035_2: sumedhassa bhagavato kāle vijjādharo hutvā ākāsena vicarati. Tena ca samayena satthā
atk-s0508a1:3035_3: tassa anuggaṇhanatthaṃ vanantare aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi chabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsiyo
atk-s0508a1:3035_4: vissajjento. So antalikkhena gacchanto bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannacitto ākāsato oruyha
atk-s0508a1:3035_5: suvisuddhehi vipulehi kaṇikārapupphehi bhagavantaṃ pūjesi, pupphāni buddhānubhāvena
atk-s0508a1:3035_6: satthu upari chattākārena aṭṭhaṃsu, so tena bhiyyosomattāya pasannacitto hutvā aparabhāge
atk-s0508a1:3035_7: kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃse nibbattitvā uḷāraṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavanto yāvatāyukaṃ tattha
atk-s0508a1:3035_8: ṭhatvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇamahāsālaputto
atk-s0508a1:3035_9: hutvā nibbatti, uttarotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So viññutaṃ patto brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:3035_10: gantvā jātiyā rūpena vijjāya vayena sīlācārena ca lokassa sambhāvanīyo jāto. Tassa
atk-s0508a1:3035_11: taṃ sampattiṃ disvā vassakāro magadhamahāmatto attano dhītaraṃ dātukāmo hutvā attano
atk-s0508a1:3035_12: adhippāyaṃ pavedesi. So nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya taṃ paṭikkhipitvā kālena kālaṃ dhammasenāpatiṃ
atk-s0508a1:3035_13: payirupāsanto tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vattasampanno
atk-s0508a1:3036_0: Tena ca samayena therassa aññataro ābādho uppanno, tassa bhesajjatthāya uttaro sāmaṇero
atk-s0508a1:3036_1: pātova pattacīvaramādāya vihārato nikkhanto antarāmagge taḷākassa tīre pattaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a1:3036_2: udakasamīpaṃ gantvā mukhaṃ dhovati. Atha aññataro umaṅgacoro ārakkhapurisehi anubaddho
atk-s0508a1:3036_3: aggadvāreneva nagarato nikkhamitvā palāyanto attanā gahitaṃ ratanabhaṇḍikaṃ sāmaṇerassa
atk-s0508a1:3036_4: patte pakkhipitvā palāyi. Sāmaṇero pattasamīpaṃ upagato. Coraṃ anubandhantā rājapurisā
atk-s0508a1:3036_5: sāmaṇerassa patte bhaṇḍikaṃ disvā, “ayaṃ coro, iminā coriyaṃ kata”nti sāmaṇeraṃ pacchābāhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3036_6: bandhitvā vassakārassa brāhmaṇassa dassesuṃ. Vassakāro ca tadā rañño vinicchaye niyutto
atk-s0508a1:3036_7: hutvā chejjabhejjaṃ anusāsati. So “pubbe mama vacanaṃ nādiyi, suddhapāsaṇḍiyesu pabbajī”ti
atk-s0508a1:3036_8: ca baddhāghātattā kammaṃ asodhetvāva jīvantameva taṃ sūle uttāsesi.
atk-s0508a1:3037_0: Athassa bhagavā ñāṇaparipākaṃ oloketvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā vipphurantahatthanakhamaṇimayūkhasambhinnasitābhatāya
atk-s0508a1:3037_2: uttarassa sīse ṭhapetvā, “uttara, idaṃ te purimakammassa phalaṃ uppannaṃ, tattha
atk-s0508a1:3037_3: tayā paccavekkhaṇabalena adhivāsanā kātabbā”ti vatvā ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0508a1:3037_5: uḷāraṃ pītipāmojjaṃ paṭilabhitvā yathāparicitaṃ vipassanāmaggaṃ samārūḷho ñāṇassa
atk-s0508a1:3037_6: paripākaṃ gatattā satthu ca desanāvilāsena tāvadeva maggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbakilese khepetvā
atk-s0508a1:3043: Tisūlaṃ sugataṃ gayha, gacchāmi ambare tadā.
atk-s0508a1:3070: “Tattha bhutvā pivitvā ca, modāmi tidase tadā;
atk-s0508a1:3076: Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, buddhapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3078: Aññaṃ gatiṃ na jānāmi, buddhapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3080: Nīce kule na jānāmi, buddhapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3089: “Imaṃ khāda imaṃ bhuñja, imamhi sayane saya;
atk-s0508a1:3094: “Sītaṃ uṇhaṃ na jānāmi, pariḷāho na vijjati;
atk-s0508a1:3095: Atho cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ, hadaye me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a1:3111_0: Chaḷabhiñño puna hutvā sūlato uṭṭhahitvā parānuddayāya ākāse ṭhatvā pāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0508a1:3111_1: Mahājano acchariyabbhutacittajāto ahosi. Tāvadevassa vaṇo saṃrūḷhi, so bhikkhūhi,
atk-s0508a1:3111_2: “āvuso, tādisaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavanto kathaṃ tvaṃ vipassanaṃ anuyuñjituṃ asakkhī”ti
atk-s0508a1:3111_3: puṭṭho, “pageva me, āvuso, saṃsāre ādīnavo, saṅkhārānañca sabhāvo sudiṭṭho, evāhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3111_4: tādisaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavantopi asakkhiṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā visesaṃ adhigantu”nti dassento –
atk-s0508a1:3113: “Natthi koci bhavo nicco, saṅkhārā vāpi sassatā;
atk-s0508a1:3114: Uppajjanti ca te khandhā, cavanti aparāparaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3119_0: Tattha natthi koci bhavo niccoti kammabhavo upapattibhavo kāmabhavo rūpabhavo arūpabhavo
atk-s0508a1:3119_1: saññībhavo asaññībhavo nevasaññīnāsaññībhavo ekavokārabhavo catuvokārabhavo pañcavokārabhavoti
atk-s0508a1:3119_2: evaṃbhedo, tatthāpi hīno majjhimo ukkaṭṭho dīghāyuko sukhabahulo vomissasukhadukkhoti
atk-s0508a1:3119_3: evaṃvibhāgo yokoci nicco dhuvo thiro apalokiyadhammo natthi taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0508a1:3119_4: samuppannattā. Yasmā ca etadevaṃ, tasmā saṅkhārā vāpi sassatā natthīti yojanā. Paccayehi
atk-s0508a1:3119_5: saṅkhatattā “saṅkhārā”ti laddhanāme hi pañcakkhandhe upādāya bhavasamaññāya saṅkhārāva
atk-s0508a1:3119_6: hutvā sambhūtā jarāmaraṇena ca vipariṇamantīti asassatā vipariṇāmadhammā. Tathā hi
atk-s0508a1:3119_7: te “saṅkhārā”ti vuccanti. Tenāha uppajjanti ca te khandhā, cavanti aparāparanti.
atk-s0508a1:3119_8: Te bhavapariyāyena saṅkhārapariyāyena ca vuttā pañcakkhandhā yathāpaccayaṃ aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3119_9: uppajjanti, uppannā ca jarāya paripīḷitā hutvā cavanti paribhijjantīti attho. Etena
atk-s0508a1:3119_10: “bhavo, saṅkhārā”ti ca laddhavohārā pañcakkhandhā udayabbayasabhāvāti dasseti. Yasmā
atk-s0508a1:3119_11: tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasantassa tayopi bhavā ādittaṃ viya saṅkhate ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3119_12: dosaṃ pageva vipassanāpaññāya jānitvā aniccalakkhaṇehi diṭṭhā saṅkhārā dukkhānattā
atk-s0508a1:3119_13: vibhūtatarā upaṭṭhahanti, tenāha bhagavā – “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:3120_0: Yasmā tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasantassa tayopi bhavā ādittaṃ viya agāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:3120_1: sappaṭibhayā upaṭṭhahanti, tasmā āha “bhavenamhi anatthiko”ti. Evaṃ pana sabbaso
atk-s0508a1:3120_2: bhavehi vinivattiyamānassa kāmesu apekkhāya lesopi na sambhavatiyeva, tenāha “nissaṭo
atk-s0508a1:3120_3: sabbakāmehī”ti, amhīti yojanā. Mānusehi viya dibbehipi kāmehi nivattitacittosmīti
atk-s0508a1:3120_4: attho. Patto me āsavakkhayoti yasmā evaṃ suparimajjitasaṅkhāro bhavesu suparidiṭṭhādīnavo
atk-s0508a1:3120_5: kāmesu ca anāsattamānaso tasmā sūlamatthake nisinnenāpi me mayā patto adhigato āsavakkhayo
atk-s0508a1:3120_6: nibbānaṃ arahattañcāti. Aññehi ca sabrahmacārīhi appattamānasehi tadadhigamāya ussāho
atk-s0508a1:3123_0: Nayidaṃ anayenātiādikā āyasmato piṇḍolabhāradvājattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3123_1: kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle sīhayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā pabbataguhāyaṃ viharati.
atk-s0508a1:3123_2: Bhagavā tassa anuggahaṃ kātuṃ gocarāya pakkantakāle sayanaguhaṃ pavisitvā nirodhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3123_3: samāpajjitvā nisīdi. Sīho gocaraṃ gahetvā nivatto guhādvāre bhagavantaṃ disvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho
atk-s0508a1:3123_4: jalajathalajapupphehi pūjaṃ katvā cittaṃ pasādento bhagavato ārakkhatthāya araññe
atk-s0508a1:3123_5: vāḷamige apanetuṃ tīsu velāsu sīhanādaṃ nadanto buddhagatāya satiyā aṭṭhāsi. Yathā
atk-s0508a1:3123_6: paṭhamadivasaṃ, evaṃ sattāhaṃ pūjesi. Bhagavā sattāhaccayena nirodhā vuṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0508a1:3123_7: “vattissati imassa ettako upanissayo”ti tassa passantasseva ākāsaṃ pakkhanditvā vihārameva
atk-s0508a1:3123_8: gato. Sīho pālileyyakahatthī viya buddhaviyogadukkhaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto kālaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3123_9: katvā haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbattitvā vayappatto nagaravāsīhi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:3123_10: gato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3123_11: devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle kosambiyaṃ rañño utenassa purohitaputto
atk-s0508a1:3123_12: hutvā nibbatti bhāradvājo nāma nāmena. So vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā pañca māṇavakasatāni
atk-s0508a1:3123_13: mante vācento mahagghasabhāvena ananurūpācārattā tehi pariccajjanto rājagahaṃ gantvā
atk-s0508a1:3123_14: bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca lābhasakkāraṃ disvā sāsane pabbajitvā bhojane amattaññū
atk-s0508a1:3123_15: hutvā vicaranto satthārā upāyena mattaññutāya patiṭṭhāpito vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a1:3123_16: nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:3128: “Ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:3131_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā “bhagavato sammukhā yaṃ sāvakehi pattabbaṃ, taṃ mayā patta”nti,
atk-s0508a1:3131_1: bhikkhusaṅghe ca “yassa magge vā phale vā kaṅkhā atthi, so maṃ pucchatū”ti sīhanādaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3131_2: nadi. Tena taṃ bhagavā, “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīhanādikānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3131_3: yadidaṃ piṇḍolabhāradvājo”ti etadagge ṭhapesi. So ekadivasaṃ attano santikaṃ upagataṃ
atk-s0508a1:3131_4: gihikāle sahāyabhūtaṃ macchariṃ micchādiṭṭhibrāhmaṇaṃ anukampamāno tassa dānakathaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3131_5: kathetvā tena ca “ayaṃ mama dhanaṃ vināsetukāmo”ti bhakuṭiṃ katvāpi “tuyhaṃ ekabhattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3131_6: demī”ti vutte, “taṃ saṅghassa dehi mā mayha”nti saṅghassa pariṇāmesi. Puna brāhmaṇena
atk-s0508a1:3131_7: “ayaṃ maṃ bahūnaṃ dāpetukāmo”ti appaccaye pakāsite dutiyadivasaṃ dhammasenāpatinā
atk-s0508a1:3131_8: saṅghagatāya dakkhiṇāya mahapphalabhāvappakāsanena taṃ pasādetvā, “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo
atk-s0508a1:3131_9: ‘āhāragedhena maṃ dāne nīyojesī’ti maññati, āhārassa pana mayā sabbaso pariññātabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3134: Āhāraṭṭhitiko samussayo, iti disvāna carāmi esanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3136: “Paṅkoti hi naṃ avedayuṃ, yāyaṃ vandanapūjanā kulesu;
atk-s0508a1:3137: Sukhumaṃ sallaṃ durubbahaṃ, sakkāro kāpurisena dujjaho”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:3139_0: Tattha nayidaṃ anayena jīvitanti idaṃ mama jīvitaṃ anayena añāyena veḷudānapupphadānādianesanāya
atk-s0508a1:3139_1: na hoti jīvitanikantiyā abhāvato. Nāhāro hadayassa santikoti āhāro ca āhariyamāno
atk-s0508a1:3139_2: maggaphalañāṇaṃ viya hadayassa cittassa santikaro na hoti, kevalaṃ pana sajjukaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3139_3: khudāpaṭighātamattaṃ karotīti adhippāyo. Atha vā nāhāro hadayassa santikoti āhāro
atk-s0508a1:3139_4: rasataṇhāvatthu me hadayassa santiko āsatto na hoti rasataṇhāya eva abhāvato. “Santike”tipi
atk-s0508a1:3139_5: paṭhanti. Yo hi āhāragiddho lābhasakkārappasuto vicarati, tassa āhāro hadayassa santike
atk-s0508a1:3139_6: nāma abhiṇhaṃ manasikātabbato. Yo pana pariññātāhāro, so tattha pahīnacchandarāgo,
atk-s0508a1:3139_7: na tassāhāro hadayassa santike nāma – “kathaṃ nu kho labheyya”ntiādimanasikaraṇasseva
atk-s0508a1:3139_8: abhāvato. Yadi hi jīvitanikanti āhārarasataṇhā ca natthi, atha kasmā piṇḍāya carasīti
atk-s0508a1:3139_9: anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha “āhāraṭṭhitiko samussayo, iti disvāna carāmi esana”nti.
atk-s0508a1:3139_10: Āhāro bhojanaṃ ṭhiti ṭhānaṃ paccayo etassāti āhāraṭṭhitiko. “Āhārapaṭibaddhavuttiko
atk-s0508a1:3139_11: samussayo kāyo”iti disvāna evaṃ ñatvā imamatthaṃ buddhiyaṃ ṭhapetvā carāmi esanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3140_0: Paccayanimittaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamanto tattha vandanapūjanāhi lābhasakkārehi ca bajjhatīti
atk-s0508a1:3140_1: evaṃ mādisesu na cintetabbanti dassento “paṅko”tigāthaṃ abhāsi. Tassattho – yā ayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3140_2: paccayanimittaṃ upagatānaṃ pabbajitānaṃ kulesu gehavāsīsu pavattissati guṇasambhāvanā
atk-s0508a1:3140_3: pūjanā ca, yasmā taṃ abhāvitattānaṃ osīdāpanaṭṭhena malīnabhāvakaraṇena ca paṅko
atk-s0508a1:3140_4: kaddamoti buddhādayo avedayuṃ abbhaññāsuṃ pavedesuṃ vā, tasmā sā sappurisānaṃ bandhāya
atk-s0508a1:3140_5: na hoti sakkārāsāya pageva pahīnattā. Asappurisassa pana sakkārāsā duviññeyyasabhāvatāya
atk-s0508a1:3140_6: pīḷājananato anto tudanato uddharituṃ asakkuṇeyyato ca sukhumaṃ sallaṃ durubbahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3140_7: Tato eva tena sakkāro kāpurisena dujjaho durubbaheyyo tassa pahānapaṭipattiyā appaṭipajjanato,
atk-s0508a1:3140_8: sakkārāsāpahānena pahīno hotīti. Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo there abhippasanno ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:3143_0: Makkaṭo pañcadvārāyantiādikā āyasmato valliyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a1:3143_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekatiṃse kappe
atk-s0508a1:3143_2: kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ kenacideva karaṇīyena araññaṃ gato
atk-s0508a1:3143_3: tattha nāradaṃ nāma paccekasambuddhaṃ rukkhamūle vasantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso naḷehi
atk-s0508a1:3143_4: sālaṃ katvā tiṇehi chādetvā adāsi. Caṅkamanaṭṭhānañcassa sodhetvā vālukā okiritvā
atk-s0508a1:3143_5: adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3143_6: brāhmaṇamahāsālassa putto hutvā nibbatti, valliyotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto
atk-s0508a1:3143_7: yobbanamanuppatto indriyavasiko hutvā vicaranto kalyāṇamittasaṃsaggena bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3143_8: upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:3145: Sayambhū nārado nāma, rukkhamūle vasī tadā.
atk-s0508a1:3161: Arahattaṃ pana patvā puthujjanakāle attano cittassa rūpādiārammaṇesu yathākāmappavattiyā, idāni ariyamaggena niggahitabhāvassa ca vibhāvanena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:3166: “Tiṭṭha makkaṭa mā dhāvi, na hi te taṃ yathā pure;
atk-s0508a1:3167: Niggahītosi paññāya, neva dūraṃ gamissasī”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3168_0: Tattha ghaṭṭayantoti attano lolabhāvena rukkhassa aññaṃ sākhaṃ muñcitvā aññassa gahaṇena
atk-s0508a1:3168_1: anekavāraṃ tattha rukkhaṃ cālento phalūpabhogamakkaṭo viya tena tena cakkhādidvārena
atk-s0508a1:3168_2: rūpādiārammaṇesu aññaṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ gaṇhanto cittasantānassa samādānavasena niccalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3168_3: ṭhātuṃ appadānena abhikkhaṇaṃ ghaṭṭayanto cālento tasmiṃyeva rūpādiārammaṇe anuparivattati
atk-s0508a1:3168_4: yathākāmaṃ vicarati. Vattamānasamīpatāya cettha vattamānavacanaṃ. Evaṃ anupariyanto
atk-s0508a1:3168_5: ca tiṭṭha, makkaṭa, mā dhāvi tvaṃ, cittamakkaṭa, idāni tiṭṭha mā dhāvi, ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a1:3168_6: te dhāvituṃ na sakkā, tasmā na hi te taṃ yathā pūre yasmā taṃ attabhāvagehaṃ pubbe
atk-s0508a1:3168_7: viya na te sevitaṃ pihitadvārabhāvato, kiñca niggahītosi paññāya sayañca idāni maggapaññāya
atk-s0508a1:3168_8: kilesābhisaṅkhārasaṅkhātānaṃ pādānaṃ chedanena accantikaṃ niggahaṃ pattosi, tasmā
atk-s0508a1:3168_9: neva dūraṃ gamissasi ito attabhāvato dūraṃ dutiyādiattabhāvaṃ neva gamissasi yāvacarimakacittaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3168_10: eva te gamananti dasseti. “Neto dūra”ntipi pāṭho, so evattho.
atk-s0508a1:3171_0: Tiṇṇaṃ me tālapattānantiādikā āyasmato gaṅgātīriyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3171_1: kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto sāsane abhippasanno
atk-s0508a1:3171_2: hutvā bhikkhusaṅghassa pānīyamadāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3171_3: puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa
atk-s0508a1:3171_4: gahapatissa putto hutvā nibbatti, “datto”tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3171_5: vasanto agamanīyaṭṭhānabhāvaṃ ajānitvā vītikkamaṃ katvā puna agamanīyaṭṭhānabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3171_6: ñatvā saṃvegajāto pabbajitvā taṃ kammaṃ jigucchitvā lūkhapaṭipattiṃ anutiṭṭhanto
atk-s0508a1:3171_7: paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ chavasittasadisaṃ mattikāpattañca gahetvā gaṅgātīre tīhi tālapattehi
atk-s0508a1:3171_8: kuṭikaṃ katvā vihāsi, tenevassa gaṅgātīriyoti samaññā ahosi. So “arahattaṃ appatvā
atk-s0508a1:3171_9: na kenaci sallapissāmī”ti cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāya paṭhamaṃ saṃvaccharaṃ tuṇhībhūto vacībhedaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3171_10: akarontova vihāsi. Dutiye saṃvacchare gocaragāme aññatarāya itthiyā “mūgo nu kho
atk-s0508a1:3171_11: no”ti vīmaṃsitukāmāya patte khīraṃ āsiñcantiyā hatthavihāre katepi okirite, “alaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3171_12: bhaginī”ti vācaṃ nicchari. Tatiye pana saṃvacchare antaravasseva ghaṭayanto vāyamanto
atk-s0508a1:3179: Arahā pana hutvā attano pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyā vibhāvanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:3185: Tatiye antaravassamhi, tamokhandho padālito”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3186_0: Tattha tiṇṇaṃ me tālapattānaṃ, gaṅgātīre kuṭī katāti tālarukkhato pahitehi tīhi tālapaṇṇehi
atk-s0508a1:3186_1: mayhaṃ vassanapariharaṇatthaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre kuṭikā katā. Tena attano senāsanasantosaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3189_0: “Tālapattīna”ntipi pāṭho, so evattho. Chavasittova me pattoti mayhaṃ patto chavasittasadiso,
atk-s0508a1:3189_1: matānaṃ khīrasecanakuṇḍasadisoti attho. Paṃsukūlañca cīvaranti cīvarañca me antaramaggasusānādīsu
atk-s0508a1:3189_2: chaḍḍitanantakehi kataṃ paṃsukūlaṃ. Padadvayena parikkhārasantosaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:3190_0: Dvinnaṃ antaravassānanti dvīsu antaravassesu pabbajitato arahattamappattasaṃvaccharesu.
atk-s0508a1:3190_1: Ekā vācā me bhāsitāti ekā, “alaṃ, bhaginī”ti khīrapaṭikkhepavācā eva mayā vuttā,
atk-s0508a1:3190_2: añño tattha vacībhedo nāhosi. Tena ukkaṃsagataṃ kāyavacīsaṃyamaṃ dasseti. Tatiye
atk-s0508a1:3190_3: antaravassamhīti tatiyassa saṃvaccharassa abbhantare, tasmiṃ aparipuṇṇeyeva. Tamokhandho
atk-s0508a1:3190_4: padālitoti aggamaggena tamokhandho bhinno, avijjānusayo samucchinnoti attho. Tena
atk-s0508a1:3193_0: Api ce hoti tevijjotiādikā āyasmato ajinattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:3193_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto buddhasuññe loke kulagehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:3193_2: viññutaṃ patto kenacideva karaṇīyena araññaṃ gato tattha sucintitaṃ nāma paccekasambuddhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3193_3: ābādhena pīḷitaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā bhesajjatthāya pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:3193_4: ghatamaṇḍaṃ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā
atk-s0508a1:3193_5: sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa daliddabrāhmaṇassa
atk-s0508a1:3193_6: gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Taṃ vijāyanakāle ajinacammena sampaṭicchiṃsu. Tenassa ajinotveva
atk-s0508a1:3193_7: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So bhogasaṃvattaniyassa kammassa akatattā daliddakule nibbatto vayappattopi
atk-s0508a1:3193_8: appannapānabhojano hutvā vicaranto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:3193_9: pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:3197: Katattā ācitattā ca, gaṅgā bhāgīrathī ayaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3209_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvāpi purimakammanissandena appalābhī appaññātova ahosi. Uddesabhattasalākabhattānipi
atk-s0508a1:3209_1: lāmakāneva pāpuṇanti. Kammaphaleneva ca naṃ puthujjanā bhikkhū sāmaṇerā ca “appaññāto”ti
atk-s0508a1:3214: “Yo ca kho annapānassa, lābhī hotīdha puggalo;
atk-s0508a1:3215: Pāpadhammopi ce hoti, so nesaṃ hoti sakkato”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:3217_0: Tattha apīti sambhāvane nipāto. Ceti parikappane. Hotīti bhavati. Tisso vijjā etassāti
atk-s0508a1:3217_1: tevijjo. Maccuṃ pajahatīti maccuhāyī. Kāmāsavādīnaṃ abhāvena anāsavo. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3217_2: hoti – dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇanti imāsaṃ tissannaṃ vijjānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3217_3: adhigatattā tevijjo tato eva sabbaso kāmāsavādīnaṃ parikkhīṇattā anāsavo āyatiṃ punabbhavassa
atk-s0508a1:3217_4: aggahaṇato maraṇābhāvena maccuhāyī yadipi hoti, evaṃ santepi appaññātoti naṃ bālā
atk-s0508a1:3217_5: avajānanti yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, taṃ sadatthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3217_6: anupāpuṇitvā ṭhitampi naṃ uttamaṃ purisaṃ “dhutavādo bahussuto dhammakathiko”ti uppannalābhassa
atk-s0508a1:3217_7: abhāvato “na paññāto na pākaṭo”ti bālā dummedhapuggalā avajānanti, kasmā? Ajānatā
atk-s0508a1:3217_8: ajānanakāraṇā guṇānaṃ ajānanameva tattha kāraṇanti dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:3218_0: Yathā ca guṇānaṃ ajānanato bālā lābhagarutāya sambhāvanīyampi avajānanti, evaṃ guṇānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3218_1: ajānanato lābhagarutāya evaṃ avajānitabbampi sambhāventīti dassento dutiyaṃ gāthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3218_2: āha. Tattha yoti aniyamavacanaṃ. Ca-saddo byatireke, tena yathāvuttapuggalato imassa
atk-s0508a1:3218_3: puggalassa vuccamānaṃyeva visesaṃ janeti. Khoti avadhāraṇe. Annapānassāti nidassanamattaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3218_4: Lābhīti lābhavā. Idhāti imasmiṃ loke. Jarāmaraṇehi tassa tassa sattāvāsassa pūraṇato
atk-s0508a1:3218_5: galanato ca puggalo. Pāpadhammoti lāmakadhammo. Ayañhettha attho – yo pana puggalo
atk-s0508a1:3218_6: cīvarādipaccayamattasseva lābhī hoti, na jhānādīnaṃ, so pāpicchatāya dussīlabhāvena
atk-s0508a1:3218_7: hīnadhammopi samāno idha imasmiṃ loke bālānaṃ lābhagarutāya sakkato garukato hotīti.
atk-s0508a1:3221_0: Yadāhaṃ dhammamassosintiādikā āyasmato meḷajinattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a1:3221_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:3221_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ piṇḍāya gacchantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3221_3: disvā pasannamānaso madhuraṃ āmodaphalaṃ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:3221_4: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bārāṇasiyaṃ khattiyakule nibbattitvā meḷajinoti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a1:3221_5: vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato paṇḍito byatto disāsu pākaṭo ahosi. So bhagavati bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3221_6: isipatane viharante vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:3221_7: pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā tadaheva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:3229: Arahattaṃ pana patvā aparabhāge bhikkhūhi, “āvuso, kiṃ tayā uttarimanussadhammo adhigato”ti puṭṭho sīhanādaṃ nadanto –
atk-s0508a1:3235: Magge paṭipadāyaṃ vā, kaṅkhā mayhaṃ na vijjatī”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3236_0: Tattha yadāti yasmiṃ kāle. Ahanti attānaṃ niddisati. Dhammanti catusaccadhammaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3236_1: Assosinti suṇiṃ. Satthunoti diṭṭhadhammikādiatthehi veneyyānaṃ sāsanaṭṭhena satthuno.
atk-s0508a1:3236_2: Kaṅkhanti saṃsayaṃ. Saṅkhatamasaṅkhatañca anavasesato jānanaṭṭhena sabbaññū. Kutocipi
atk-s0508a1:3236_3: parājitā bhāvena aparājite. Veneyyasattānaṃ saṃsārakantārato nibbānaṃ paṭivāhanaṭṭhena
atk-s0508a1:3236_4: satthavāhe. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yato pabhuti ahaṃ satthuno dhammaṃ desentassa catusaccadhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3236_5: assosiṃ sotadvārānusārena upadhāresiṃ upalabhiṃ, tato paṭṭhāya anavasesasaṅkhatāsaṅkhatasammutidhammānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3236_6: sayambhūñāṇena jānanato sabbaññū anāvaraṇadassāvimhi, pañcannampi mārānaṃ abhibhavanato
atk-s0508a1:3236_7: tehi aparājitattā sadevake loke appaṭihatadhammacakkattā ca aparājite, veneyyasattānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3236_8: lobhakantārādito vāhanaṭṭhena satthavāhe, mahāvikkantatāya mahāvīre, aññehi duddamānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3236_9: purisadammānaṃ saraṇato accantikena damathena damanato sārathīnaṃ pavarabhūte uttame
atk-s0508a1:3236_10: sammāsambuddhe, “buddho nu kho no nu kho”ti kaṅkhaṃ nābhijānāmi aparappaccayabhāvato.
atk-s0508a1:3236_11: Tathārūpe desite ariyamagge tadupādāyabhūtāya ca sīlādipaṭipadāya “niyyāniko nu kho
atk-s0508a1:3236_12: na nu kho”ti kaṅkhā vicikicchā na vijjati natthīti. Ettha ca ariyadhamme saṃsayābhāvakathanena
atk-s0508a1:3236_13: ariyasaṅghepi saṃsayābhāvo kathitoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ tattha patiṭṭhitassa anaññathābhāvatoti.
atk-s0508a1:3239_0: Yathā agāraṃ ducchannantiādikā āyasmato rādhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira
atk-s0508a1:3239_1: padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto
atk-s0508a1:3239_2: vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno satthārā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0508a1:3239_3: paṭibhāneyyakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapiyamānaṃ disvā sayaṃ taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā mahādānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3239_4: pavattesi. Satthu uḷārañca pūjaṃ akāsi. So evaṃ katapaṇidhāno tato cuto tattha tattha
atk-s0508a1:3239_5: bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3239_6: patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ piṇḍāya gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso madhurāni ambaphalānī
atk-s0508a1:3239_7: adāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:3239_8: saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā rādhoti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a1:3239_9: vayappatto hutvā gharāvāsaṃ vasanto mahallakakāle puttadārehi apasādito, “kiṃ me
atk-s0508a1:3239_10: gharāvāsena, pabbajissāmī”ti vihāraṃ gantvā there bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3239_11: yācitvā tehi “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo jiṇṇo na sakkoti vattapaṭivattaṃ pūretu”nti paṭikkhitto
atk-s0508a1:3239_12: satthu santikaṃ gantvā attano ajjhāsayaṃ pavedetvā satthārā upanissayasampattiṃ oloketvā
atk-s0508a1:3239_13: āṇattena dhammasenāpatinā pabbājito vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3245_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthu santikāvacaro hutvā vicaranto satthu dhammadesanāpaṭibhānassa
atk-s0508a1:3245_1: paccayabhūtānaṃ paṭibhānajānanakānaṃ aggo jāto. Therassa hi diṭṭhisamudācārañca āgamma
atk-s0508a1:3245_2: dasabalassa navanavā dhammadesanā paṭibhāti. Tenāha bhagavā – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0508a1:3245_3: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭibhāneyyakānaṃ yadidaṃ rādho”ti. So ekadivasaṃ “ime
atk-s0508a1:3245_4: sattā abhāvanāya rāgena abhibhuyyanti, bhāvanāya sati taṃ natthī”ti bhāvanaṃ thomento
atk-s0508a1:3246_0: 133-4. Tattha agāranti yaṃkiñci gehaṃ. Ducchannanti viraḷacchannaṃ chiddāvachiddaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3246_1: Samativijjhatīti vassavuṭṭhi vinivijjhati. Abhāvitanti taṃ agāraṃ vuṭṭhi viya bhāvanāya
atk-s0508a1:3246_2: rahitattā abhāvitaṃ cittaṃ. Rāgo samativijjhatīti na kevalaṃ rāgova dosamohamānādayopi
atk-s0508a1:3246_3: sabbakilesā tathārūpaṃ cittaṃ ativijjhantiyeva. Subhāvitanti samathavipassanābhāvanāhi
atk-s0508a1:3246_4: suṭṭhu bhāvitaṃ, evarūpaṃ cittaṃ succhannaṃ gehaṃ vuṭṭhi viya rāgādayo kilesā ativijjhituṃ na sakkontīti.
atk-s0508a1:3249_0: Khīṇā hi mayhaṃ jātītiādikā āyasmato surādhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:3249_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:3249_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso mātuluṅgaphalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3249_3: adāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva
atk-s0508a1:3249_4: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde anantaraṃ vuttassa rādhattherassa kaniṭṭho hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:3249_5: surādhotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So jeṭṭhabhātari rādhe pabbajite sayampi pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a1:3249_6: kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:3254: “Ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:3257: Arahattaṃ pana patvā sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvadassanatthaṃ aññaṃ byākaronto “khīṇā hī mayha”ntiādinā gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0508a1:3258_0: 135-6. Tattha khīṇāti khayaṃ pariyosānaṃ gatā. Jātīti bhavo bhavanibbatti vā. Vusitaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3258_1: jinasāsananti jinassa sammāsambuddhassa sāsanaṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ vuṭṭhaṃ parivuṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3258_2: Pahīno jālasaṅkhātoti sattasantānassa ottharaṇato nissarituṃ appadānato ca “jālasaṅkhāto”ti
atk-s0508a1:3258_3: ca laddhanāmā diṭṭhi avijjā ca pahīnā maggena samucchinnā. Bhavanetti samūhatāti
atk-s0508a1:3258_4: kāmabhavādikassa bhavassa nayanato pavattanato bhavanettisaññitā taṇhā samugghāṭitā.
atk-s0508a1:3258_5: Yassatthāya pabbajitoti yassa atthāya yadatthaṃ ahaṃ agārasmā gehato anagāriyaṃ pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3258_6: pabbajito upagato. So sabbesaṃ orambhāgiyuddhambhāgiyappabhedānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ bandhanānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3258_7: khayabhūto attho nibbānasaṅkhāto paramattho arahattasaṅkhāto sadattho ca mayā anuppatto adhigatoti attho.
atk-s0508a1:3261_0: Sukhaṃ supantīti āyasmato gotamattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:3261_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:3261_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:3261_3: āmodaphalamadāsi. Tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā
atk-s0508a1:3261_4: sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā gotamoti
atk-s0508a1:3261_5: laddhanāmo sattavassikakāle upanayanaṃ katvā ratanabhikkhaṃ caritvā sahassaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0508a1:3261_6: taṃ tādise ṭhāne ṭhapetvā vataṃ caranto soḷasasattarasavassuddesikakāle akalyāṇamittehi
atk-s0508a1:3261_7: kāmesu parinīyamāno ekissā rūpūpajīviniyā taṃ sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ datvā brahmacariyavināsaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3261_8: patvā tāya cassa brahmacārirūpaṃ disvā virattākāre dassite ekarattivāseneva nibbinnarūpo
atk-s0508a1:3261_9: attano brahmacariyanivāsaṃ dhanajāniñca saritvā “ayuttaṃ mayā kata”nti vippaṭisārī
atk-s0508a1:3261_10: ahosi. Satthā tassa hetusampattiṃ cittācārañca ñatvā tassa āsannaṭṭhāne attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0508a1:3261_11: So satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso upasaṅkami, tassa bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi. So dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3261_12: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajanto khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:3267_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā jhānasukhena phalasukhena vītināmentaṃ eko gihisahāyo upagantvā,
atk-s0508a1:3267_1: “āvuso, tayā ratanabhikkhāya laddhaṃ pabbajanto kiṃ akāsī”ti pucchi. Taṃ sutvā thero
atk-s0508a1:3267_2: “idaṃ nāma kata”nti anācikkhitvā mātugāme dosaṃ pakāsetvā attano vītarāgabhāvena
atk-s0508a1:3268_0: 137. Tattha sukhaṃ supanti munayo, ye itthīsu na bajjhareti ye itthīsu visayabhūtāsu
atk-s0508a1:3268_1: nimittabhūtāsu vā rāgabandhanena na bajjhanti, te munayo tapassino saṃyatindriyā
atk-s0508a1:3268_2: sukhaṃ supanti sukhaṃ viharanti, natthi tesaṃ dukkhanti adhippāyo. “Supantī”ti hi
atk-s0508a1:3268_3: nidassanamattametaṃ. Sadā ve rakkhitabbāsūti ekaṃsena sabbakālaṃ rakkhitabbāsu. Itthiyo
atk-s0508a1:3268_4: hi sattabhūmike nippurise pāsāde uparibhūmiyaṃ vasāpetvāpi, kucchiyaṃ pakkhipitvāpi
atk-s0508a1:3268_5: na sakkā rakkhituṃ, tasmā tā kiṭṭhādigāviyo viya sabbakālaṃ rakkhaṇīyā honti. Bahucittatāya
atk-s0508a1:3268_6: vā sāmikena vatthālaṅkārānuppadānādinā cittaññathattato sabbakālaṃ rakkhitabbā. Sarīrasabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3268_7: vā mālāgandhādīhi paṭicchādanavasena rakkhitabbacittatāya rakkhitabbāti. Yāsu saccaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3268_8: sudullabhanti yāsu saccavacanaṃ laddhuṃ na sakkā, itthiyo hi aggimpi pavisanti, visampi
atk-s0508a1:3268_9: khādanti, satthampi āharanti, ubbandhitvāpi kālaṃ karonti, na pana sacce ṭhātuṃ sakkonti.
atk-s0508a1:3268_10: Tasmā evarūpā itthiyo vajjetvā ṭhitā munayo sukhitā vatāti dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:3269_0: 138. Idāni yassa appahīnattā evarūpāsu itthīsupi bajjhanti, tassa kāmassa attano
atk-s0508a1:3269_1: suppahīnataṃ accantaniṭṭhitatañca dassento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. Vadhaṃ carimha te kāmāti
atk-s0508a1:3269_2: ambho kāma, tava vadhaṃ accantasamucchedaṃ ariyamaggena carimha, “vadhaṃ carimhase”tipi
atk-s0508a1:3269_3: pāṭho, vadhāya pahānāya maggabrahmacariyaṃ acarimhāti attho. Anaṇā dāni te mayanti
atk-s0508a1:3269_4: idāni aggamaggapattito paṭṭhāya iṇabhāvakarāya pahīnattā kāma te anaṇā mayaṃ, na
atk-s0508a1:3269_5: tuyhaṃ iṇaṃ dhārema. Avītarāgo hi rāgassa vase vattanato tassa iṇaṃ dhārento viya
atk-s0508a1:3269_6: hoti, vītarāgo pana taṃ atikkamitvā paramena cittissariyena samannāgato. Anaṇattā
atk-s0508a1:3269_7: eva gacchāma dāni nibbānaṃ, yattha gantvā na socati yasmiṃ nibbāne gamanahetu sabbaso
atk-s0508a1:3269_8: sokahetūnaṃ abhāvato na socati, taṃ anupādisesanibbānameva idāni gacchāma anupāpuṇāmāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:3272_0: Pubbe hanati attānanti āyasmato vasabhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:3272_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto buddhasuññe loke brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a1:3272_2: nibbattitvā vayappatto brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gantvā nekkhammajjhāsayatāya
atk-s0508a1:3272_3: gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā cuddasasahassatāpasaparivāro himavantassa
atk-s0508a1:3272_4: avidūre samagge nāma pabbate assamaṃ kāretvā vasanto jhānābhiññāyo nibbattetvā tāpasānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3272_5: ovādānusāsaniyo dento ekadivasaṃ evaṃ cintesi – “ahaṃ kho dāni imehi tāpasehi sakkato
atk-s0508a1:3272_6: garukato pūjito viharāmi, mayā pana pūjetabbo na upalabbhati, dukkho kho panāyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3272_7: loke yadidaṃ agaruvāso”ti. Evaṃ pana cintetvā purimabuddhesu katādhikāratāya purimabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3272_8: cetiye attanā kataṃ pūjāsakkāraṃ anussaritvā “yaṃnūnāhaṃ purimabuddhe uddissa pulinacetiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3272_9: katvā pūjaṃ kareyya”nti haṭṭhatuṭṭho iddhiyā pulinathūpaṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ māpetvā suvaṇṇamayādīhi
atk-s0508a1:3272_10: tisahassamattehi pupphehi devasikaṃ pūjaṃ karonto yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni katvā aparihīnajjhāno
atk-s0508a1:3272_11: kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke nibbatto. Tatthapi yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto tāvatiṃse
atk-s0508a1:3272_12: nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ licchavirājakule
atk-s0508a1:3272_13: nibbattitvā vasabhoti laddhanāmo vayappatto bhagavato vesāligamane buddhānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3272_14: disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.

atk-s0508a1:3340_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā dāyakānuggahaṃ karonto tehi upanīte paccaye na paṭikkhipati,
atk-s0508a1:3340_1: yathāladdheyeva paribhuñjati. Taṃ puthujjanā “ayaṃ kāyadaḷhibahulo arakkhitacitto”ti

atk-s0508a1:3340_4: vañcento viharati. Mahājano taṃ arahantaṃ viya sambhāveti. Athassa sakko devānamindo

atk-s0508a1:3346: Yasmiṃ pāpāni kammāni, sa ve kaṇho sujampatī”ti. – gāthādvayamāha;
atk-s0508a1:3347_0: Tattha pubbe hanati attānanti kuhakapuggalo attano kuhakavuttiyā lokaṃ vañcento pāpicchatādīhi
atk-s0508a1:3347_1: pāpadhammehi paṭhamameva attānaṃ hanati, attano kusalakoṭṭhāsaṃ vināseti. Pacchā
atk-s0508a1:3347_2: hanati so pareti so kuhako paṭhamaṃ tāva vuttanayena attānaṃ hantvā pacchā pare yehi
atk-s0508a1:3347_3: “ayaṃ bhikkhu pesalo ariyo”ti vā sambhāventehi kārā katā, te hanati tesaṃ kārāni
atk-s0508a1:3347_4: attani katāni amahapphalāni katvā paccayavināsanena vināseti. Satipi kuhakassa ubhayahanane
atk-s0508a1:3347_5: attahanane pana ayaṃ visesoti dassento āha suhataṃ hanti attānanti. So kuhako attānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3347_6: hananto suhataṃ katvā hanti vināseti, yathā kiṃ? Vītaṃseneva pakkhimāti, vītaṃsoti
atk-s0508a1:3347_7: dīpakasakuṇo, tena. Pakkhimāti sākuṇiko. Yathā tena vītaṃsasakuṇena aññe sakuṇe vañcetvā
atk-s0508a1:3347_8: hananto attānaṃ idha lokepi hanati viññugarahasāvajjasabhāvādinā, samparāyaṃ pana
atk-s0508a1:3347_9: duggatiparikkilesena hanatiyeva, na pana te sakuṇe pacchā hantuṃ sakkoti, evaṃ kuhakopi
atk-s0508a1:3347_10: kohaññena lokaṃ vañcetvā idha lokepi attānaṃ hanati vippaṭisāraviññugarahādīhi, paralokepi
atk-s0508a1:3347_11: duggatiparikkilesehi, na pana te paccayadāyake apāyadukkhaṃ pāpeti. Apica kuhako
atk-s0508a1:3347_12: dakkhiṇāya amahapphalabhāvakaraṇeneva dāyakaṃ hanatīti vutto, na nipphalabhāvakaraṇena.
atk-s0508a1:3347_13: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – “dussīlassa manussabhūtassa dānaṃ datvā sahassaguṇā dakkhiṇā
atk-s0508a1:3348_0: Evaṃ bāhiraparimajjanamatte ṭhitā puggalā suddhā nāma na honti, abbhantarasuddhiyā
atk-s0508a1:3348_1: eva pana suddhā hontīti dassento “na brāhmaṇo”ti dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. Tassattho – iriyāpathasaṇṭhapanādibahisampattimattena
atk-s0508a1:3348_2: brāhmaṇo na hoti. Sampattiattho hi idha vaṇṇa-saddo. Abbhantare pana sīlādisampattiyā
atk-s0508a1:3348_3: brāhmaṇo hoti, “bāhitapāpo brāhmaṇo”ti katvā. Tasmā “yasmiṃ pāpāni lāmakāni kammāni
atk-s0508a1:3348_4: saṃvijjanti, ekaṃsena so kaṇho nihīnapuggalo”ti sujampati, devānaminda, jānāhi. Taṃ
atk-s0508a1:3348_5: sutvā sakko kuhakabhikkhuṃ tajjetvā “dhamme vattāhī”ti ovaditvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0508a1:3353_0: Sussūsāti āyasmato mahācundattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro
atk-s0508a1:3353_1: tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kumbhakārakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:3353_2: viññutaṃ patto kumbhakārakammena jīvanto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:3353_3: ekaṃ mattikāpattaṃ svābhisaṅkhataṃ katvā bhagavato adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:3353_4: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe nālakagāme rūpasāriyā brāhmaṇiyā putto
atk-s0508a1:3353_5: sāriputtattherassa kaniṭṭhabhātā hutvā nibbatti, cundotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto
atk-s0508a1:3353_6: dhammasenāpatiṃ anupabbajitvā taṃ nissāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto
atk-s0508a1:3353_7: nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:3359: Rūpimaye ca sovaṇṇe, taṭṭike ca maṇīmaye.
atk-s0508a1:3366: “Yāvatā khettā vijjanti, saṅghāpi ca gaṇāpi ca;
atk-s0508a1:3373: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā attanā paṭiladdhasampattiyā kāraṇabhūtaṃ garūpanissayaṃ vivekavāsañca kittento –
atk-s0508a1:3376: Paññāya atthaṃ jānāti, ñāto attho sukhāvaho.
atk-s0508a1:3379: Sace ratiṃ nādhigaccheyya tattha, saṅghe vase rakkhitatto satīmā”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:3381_0: Tattha sussūsāti sotabbayuttassa sabbasutassa sotumicchā, garusannivāsopi. Diṭṭhadhammikādibhedañhi
atk-s0508a1:3381_1: atthaṃ sotumicchantena kalyāṇamitte upasaṅkamitvā vattakaraṇena payirupāsitvā yadā
atk-s0508a1:3381_2: te payirupāsanāya ārādhitacittā kañci upanisīditukāmā honti, atha ne upanisīditvā
atk-s0508a1:3381_3: adhigatāya sotumicchāya ohitasotena sotabbaṃ hotīti garusannivāsopi sussūsāhetutāya
atk-s0508a1:3381_4: “sussūsā”ti vuccati. Sā panāyaṃ sussūsā saccapaṭiccasamuppādādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sutaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3381_5: taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa vaḍḍheti brūhetīti sutavaddhanī, bāhusaccakārīti attho. Sutaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3381_6: paññāya vaddhananti yaṃ taṃ “sutadharo sutasannicayo”ti “idhekaccassa bahukaṃ sutaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3381_7: hoti suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇa”nti ca evamādinā nayena vuttaṃ bāhusaccaṃ, taṃ akusalappahānakusalādhigamanahetubhūtaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3381_8: paññaṃ vaddhetīti sutaṃ paññāya vaddhanaṃ, vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0508a1:3382: “Sutāvudho kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāveti, sāvajjaṃ pajahati, anavajjaṃ bhāveti, suddhaṃ attānaṃ pariharatī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:3383_0: Paññāya atthaṃ jānātīti bahussuto sutamayañāṇe ṭhito taṃ paṭipattiṃ paṭipajjanto
atk-s0508a1:3383_1: sutānusārena atthūpaparikkhāya dhammanijjhānena bhāvanāya ca lokiyalokuttarabhedaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3383_2: diṭṭhadhammādivibhāgaṃ dukkhādivibhāgañca atthaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti ca paṭivijjhati
atk-s0508a1:3385_0: “Dhatānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhati, atthaṃ upaparikkhato dhammā nijjhānaṃ khamanti,
atk-s0508a1:3385_1: dhammanijjhānakkhantiyā sati chando jāyati, chandajāto ussahati, ussahitvā tuleti,
atk-s0508a1:3385_2: tulayitvā padahati, pahitatto samāno kāyena ceva paramasaccaṃ sacchikaroti, paññāya
atk-s0508a1:3386: Ñāto attho sukhāvahoti yathāvutto diṭṭhadhammikādiattho ceva dukkhādiattho ca yāthāvato ñāto adhigato lokiyalokuttarabhedaṃ sukhaṃ āvahati nipphādetīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:3387_0: Ṭhitāya bhāvanāpaññāya sutamatteneva na sijjhatīti tassā paṭipajjanavidhiṃ dassento
atk-s0508a1:3387_1: “sevetha…pe…vippamokkha”nti āha. Tattha sevetha pantāni senāsanānīti kāyavivekamāha.
atk-s0508a1:3387_2: Tena saṃyojanappahānassa ca vakkhamānattā vivekārahasseva vivekavāsoti sīlasaṃvarādayo
atk-s0508a1:3387_3: idha avuttasiddhā veditabbā. Careyya saṃyojanavippamokkhanti yathā saṃyojanehi cittaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3387_4: vippamuccati, tathā vipassanābhāvanaṃ maggabhāvanañca careyya paṭipajjeyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:3387_5: Sace ratiṃ nādhigaccheyya tatthāti tesu pantasenāsanesu yathāladdhesu adhikusaladhammesu
atk-s0508a1:3387_6: ca ratiṃ pubbenāparaṃ visesassa alābhato abhiratiṃ na labheyya, saṅghe bhikkhusamūhe
atk-s0508a1:3387_7: rakkhitatto kammaṭṭhānaparigaṇhanato rakkhitacitto chasu dvāresu satiārakkhāya upaṭṭhapanena
atk-s0508a1:3387_8: satimā vaseyya vihareyya, evaṃ viharantassa ca api nāma saṃyojanavippamokkho bhaveyyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:3390_0: Ye kho teti āyasmato jotidāsattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro
atk-s0508a1:3390_1: tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:3390_2: viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ piṇḍāya gacchantaṃ disvā pasannacitto kāsumārikaphalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3390_3: adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde pādiyatthajanapade
atk-s0508a1:3390_4: vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, jotidāsotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So
atk-s0508a1:3390_5: viññutaṃ patvā gharamāvasanto ekadivasaṃ mahākassapattheraṃ attano gāme piṇḍāya carantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3390_6: disvā pasannacitto bhojetvā therassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā attano gāmasamīpe pabbate
atk-s0508a1:3390_7: mahantaṃ vihāraṃ kāretvā theraṃ tattha vāsetvā catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahanto therassa
atk-s0508a1:3390_8: dhammadesanāya paṭiladdhasaṃvego pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:3395: “Ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:3398_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā visesato vinayapiṭake sukusalabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3398_1: patvā dasavassiko parisupaṭṭhāko ca hutvā bahūhi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ vandituṃ
atk-s0508a1:3398_2: sāvatthiṃ gacchanto antarāmagge addhānaparissamavinodanatthaṃ titthiyānaṃ ārāmaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3398_3: pavisitvā ekamantaṃ nisinno ekaṃ pañcatapaṃ tapantaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ disvā, “kiṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0508a1:3398_4: aññasmiṃ tapanīye aññaṃ tapatī”ti āha. Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo kupito, “bho, muṇḍaka,
atk-s0508a1:3398_5: kiṃ aññaṃ tapanīya”nti āha. Thero tassa –
atk-s0508a1:3399: “Kopo ca issā paraheṭhanā ca, māno ca sārambhamado pamādo;
atk-s0508a1:3400: Taṇhā avijjā bhavasaṅgatī ca, te tappanīyā na hi rūpakhandho”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:3401_0: Gāthāya dhammaṃ desesi. Taṃ sutvā so brāhmaṇo tasmiṃ titthiyārāme sabbe aññatitthiyā
atk-s0508a1:3401_1: ca therassa santike pabbajiṃsu. Thero tehi saddhiṃ sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0508a1:3401_2: katipāhaṃ tattha vasitvā attano jātibhūmiṃyeva gato dassanatthaṃ upagatesu ñātakesu
atk-s0508a1:3403: “Ye kho te veṭhamissena, nānattena ca kammunā;
atk-s0508a1:3405: Tepi tattheva kīranti, na hi kammaṃ panassati.
atk-s0508a1:3407: “Yaṃ karoti naro kammaṃ, kalyāṇaṃ yadi pāpakaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:3408: Tassa tasseva dāyādo, yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ pakubbatī”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3409_0: Tattha yeti aniyamuddeso. Teti aniyamato eva paṭiniddeso. Padadvayassāpi “janā”ti
atk-s0508a1:3409_1: iminā sambandho. Khoti nipātamattaṃ. Veṭhamissenāti varattakhaṇḍādinā sīsādīsu veṭhadānena.
atk-s0508a1:3409_2: “Vedhamissenā”tipi pāḷi, so evattho. Nānattena ca kammunāti hananaghātanahatthapādādicchedanena
atk-s0508a1:3409_3: khuddakaseḷadānādinā ca nānāvidhena parūpaghātakammena. Manusseti nidassanamattaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3409_4: tasmā ye keci satteti adhippāyo. Uparundhantīti vibādhenti. Pharusūpakkamāti dāruṇapayogā,
atk-s0508a1:3409_5: kurūrakammantāti attho. Janāti sattā. Tepi tattheva kīrantīti te vuttappakārā puggalā
atk-s0508a1:3409_6: yāhi kammakāraṇāhi aññe bādhiṃsu. Tattheva tāsuyeva kāraṇāsu sayampi kīranti pakkhipīyanti,
atk-s0508a1:3409_7: tathārūpaṃyeva dukkhaṃ anubhavantīti attho. “Tatheva kīrantī”ti ca pāṭho, yathā sayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3409_8: aññesaṃ dukkhaṃ akaṃsu, tatheva aññehi karīyanti, dukkhaṃ pāpīyantīti attho, kasmā?
atk-s0508a1:3409_9: Na hi kammaṃ panassati kammañhi ekantaṃ upacitaṃ vipākaṃ adatvā na vigacchati, avasesapaccayasamavāye
atk-s0508a1:3410_0: Idāni “na hi kammaṃ panassatī”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vibhajitvā sattānaṃ kammassakataṃ
atk-s0508a1:3410_1: vibhāvetuṃ “yaṃ karotī”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi. Tassattho yaṃ kammaṃ kalyāṇaṃ kusalaṃ, yadi
atk-s0508a1:3410_2: vā pāpakaṃ akusalaṃ satto karoti, karonto ca tattha yaṃ kammaṃ yathā phaladānasamatthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3410_3: hoti, tathā pakubbati upacinoti. Tassa tasseva dāyādoti tassa tasseva kammaphalassa
atk-s0508a1:3410_4: gaṇhanato tena tena kammena dātabbavipākassa bhāgī hotīti attho. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0508a1:3410_5: “kammassakā, māṇava, sattā kammadāyādā”tiādi. Imā gāthā sutvā therassa ñātakā kammassakatāyaṃ patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0508a1:3413_0: Accayanti ahorattāti āyasmato heraññakānittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:3413_1: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto paresaṃ bhatako
atk-s0508a1:3413_2: hutvā jīvanto ekadivasaṃ sujātassa nāma satthusāvakassa paṃsukūlaṃ pariyesantassa
atk-s0508a1:3413_3: upaḍḍhadussaṃ pariccaji. So tena puññakammena tāvatiṃsesu nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3413_4: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalarañño gāmabhojakassa coravosāsakassa
atk-s0508a1:3413_5: putto hutvā nibbatti, heraññakānītissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto pitu accayena raññā
atk-s0508a1:3413_6: tasmiṃyeva gāmabhojakaṭṭhāne ṭhapito jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:3413_7: attano kaniṭṭhassa taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ dāpetvā rājānaṃ āpucchitvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3413_8: paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:3429: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano kaniṭṭhabhātaraṃ tato kammato nivattetukāmo tasmiṃyeva kamme abhirataṃ disvā taṃ codento –
atk-s0508a1:3434: “Atha pāpāni kammāni, karaṃ bālo na bujjhati;
atk-s0508a1:3435: Pacchāssa kaṭukaṃ hoti, vipāko hissa pāpako”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:3437_0: Tattha accayantīti atikkamanti, lahuṃ lahuṃ apagacchantīti attho. Ahorattāti rattindivā.
atk-s0508a1:3437_1: Jīvitaṃ uparujjhatīti jīvitindriyañca khaṇikanirodhavasena nirujjhati. Vuttañhi “khaṇe
atk-s0508a1:3437_2: khaṇe, tvaṃ bhikkhu, jāyasi ca jiyyasi ca miyyasi ca cavasi ca upapajjasi cā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:3437_3: Āyu khīyati maccānanti maritabbasabhāvattā maccāti laddhanāmānaṃ imesaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3437_4: āyu “yo ciraṃ jīvati, so vassasataṃ appaṃ vā bhiyyo”ti evaṃ paricchinnakālaparamāyu
atk-s0508a1:3437_5: khīyati khayañca sambhedañca gacchati, yathā kiṃ? Kunnadīnaṃva odakaṃ yathā nāma
atk-s0508a1:3437_6: kunnadīnaṃ pabbateyyānaṃ khuddakanadīnaṃ udakaṃ ciraṃ na tiṭṭhati, lahutaraṃ khīyati,
atk-s0508a1:3437_7: āgatamattaṃyeva vigacchati, evaṃ sattānaṃ āyu lahutaraṃ khīyati khayaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0508a1:3437_8: Ettha ca udakameva “odaka”nti vuttaṃ, yathā manoyeva mānasanti.
atk-s0508a1:3438_0: Atha pāpāni kammāni, karaṃ bālo na bujjhatīti evaṃ saṃsāre aniccepi samāne bālo lobhavasena
atk-s0508a1:3438_1: vā kodhavasena vā pāpāni kammāni karoti, karontopi na bujjhati, pāpaṃ karonto ca
atk-s0508a1:3438_2: “pāpaṃ karomī”ti abujjhanako nāma natthi, “imassa kammassa evarūpo dukkho vipāko”ti
atk-s0508a1:3438_3: pana ajānanato “na bujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Pacchāssa kaṭukaṃ hotīti yadipi pāpassa kammassa
atk-s0508a1:3438_4: āyūhanakkhaṇe “imassa kammassa evarūpo vipāko”ti na bujjhati, tato pacchā pana nirayādīsu
atk-s0508a1:3438_5: nibbattassa assa bālassa kaṭukaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ dukkhameva hoti. Vipāko hissa pāpako yasmā
atk-s0508a1:3438_6: assa pāpakammassa nāma vipāko pāpako nihīno aniṭṭho evāti. Imaṃ pana ovādaṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a1:3438_7: therassa kaniṭṭhabhātā rājānaṃ āpucchitvā pabbajitvā nacirasseva sadatthaṃ nipphādesi.
atk-s0508a1:3441_0: Parittaṃ dārunti āyasmato somamittattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:3441_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:3441_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto buddhaguṇe sutvā pasannamānaso ekadivasaṃ kiṃsukarukkhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3441_3: pupphitaṃ disvā pupphāni gahetvā satthāraṃ uddissa ākāse khipitvā pūjesi. So tena
atk-s0508a1:3441_4: puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bārāṇasiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a1:3441_5: nibbattitvā somamittoti laddhanāmo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū hutvā vimalena nāma therena
atk-s0508a1:3441_6: kataparicayattā abhiṇhaṃ tassa santikaṃ gacchanto dhammaṃ sutvā sāsane laddhappasādo
atk-s0508a1:3441_7: pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado vattapaṭivattaṃ pūrento vicarati. Vimalatthero pana kusīto
atk-s0508a1:3441_8: middhabahulo rattindivaṃ vītināmeti. Somamitto “kusītaṃ nāma nissāya ko guṇo”ti taṃ
atk-s0508a1:3441_9: pahāya mahākassapattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa ovāde ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a1:3441_10: nacirasseva arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:3450: “Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
atk-s0508a1:3451: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti.
atk-s0508a1:3452: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimalattheraṃ ovādena tajjento –
atk-s0508a1:3459: Niccaṃ āraddhavīriyehi, paṇḍitehi sahāvase”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3460_0: Tattha parittaṃ dārumāruyha, yathā sīde mahaṇṇaveti pesalopi kulaputto kusītaṃ alasapuggalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3460_1: nissāya sīdati saṃsāre patati, na tassa pāraṃ nibbānaṃ gacchati. Yasmā etadevaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3460_2: tasmā taṃ adhikusaladhammavasena sīsaṃ anukkhipitvā kucchitaṃ sīdanato kusītaṃ vīriyārambhābhāvato
atk-s0508a1:3460_3: hīnavīriyaṃ puggalaṃ sabbathā vajjeyya, na tassa diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjeyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:3461_0: Evaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya gāthāya kosajje ādīnavaṃ dassetvā idāni vīriyārambhe ānisaṃse
atk-s0508a1:3461_1: dassetuṃ “pavivittehī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tassattho – ye pana kāyavivekasambhavena pavivittā,
atk-s0508a1:3461_2: tato eva kilesehi ārakattā ariyā, nibbānaṃ patipesitattatāya pahitattā ārammaṇūpanijjhānavasena
atk-s0508a1:3461_3: lakkhaṇūpanijjhānavasena ca jhāyino, sabbakālaṃ paggahitavīriyatāya āraddhavīriyā,
atk-s0508a1:3461_4: lokiyalokuttarabhedāya paññāya samannāgatattā paṇḍitā, tehiyeva saha āvaseyya sadatthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3461_5: nipphādetukāmo saṃvaseyyāti. Taṃ sutvā vimalatthero saṃviggamānaso vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a1:3464_0: Jano janamhi sambaddhoti āyasmato sabbamittattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:3464_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito dvānavute kappe tissassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:3464_2: kāle nesādakule nibbattitvā vanacāriko hutvā vane mige vadhitvā maṃsaṃ khādanto jīvati.
atk-s0508a1:3464_3: Athassa bhagavā anuggaṇhanatthaṃ vasanaṭṭhānasamīpe tīṇi padacetiyāni dassetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:3464_4: So atītakāle sammāsambuddhesu kataparicayattā cakkaṅkitāni disvā pasannamānaso koraṇḍapupphehi
atk-s0508a1:3464_5: pūjaṃ katvā tena puññakammena tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva
atk-s0508a1:3464_6: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthinagare brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, sabbamittotissa
atk-s0508a1:3464_7: nāmaṃ ahosi. So viññutaṃ patto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:3464_8: pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe viharanto vassaṃ upagantvā vuṭṭhavasso bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3464_9: vandituṃ sāvatthiṃ gacchanto antarāmagge māgavikehi oḍḍite pāse migapotakaṃ baddhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3464_10: addasa. Mātā panassa migī pāsaṃ appaviṭṭhāpi puttasinehena dūraṃ na gacchati, maraṇabhayena
atk-s0508a1:3464_11: pāsasamīpampi na upagacchati migapotako ca bhīto ito cito ca parivattento karuṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3464_12: vilapati, taṃ disvā thero, “aho sattānaṃ snehahetukaṃ dukkha”nti gacchanto tato paraṃ
atk-s0508a1:3464_13: sambahule core ekaṃ purisaṃ jīvagāhaṃ gahetvā palālaveṇiyā sarīraṃ veṭhetvā jhāpente,
atk-s0508a1:3464_14: tañca mahāviravaṃ viravantaṃ disvā tadubhayaṃ nissāya sañjātasaṃvego tesaṃ corānaṃ suṇantānaṃyeva –
atk-s0508a1:3467: Jano janena heṭhīyati, heṭheti ca jano janaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3469: “Ko hi tassa janenattho, janena janitena vā;
atk-s0508a1:3470: Janaṃ ohāya gacchaṃ taṃ, heṭhayitvā bahuṃ jana”nti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3471_0: Tattha janoti andhabālajano. Janamhīti aññe jane. Sambaddhoti taṇhābandhanena baddho.
atk-s0508a1:3471_1: “Ayaṃ me putto, mātā”tiādinā paṭibaddho. Ayameva vā pāṭho, “ime maṃ posenti, ahaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3471_2: ime nissāya jīvāmī”ti paṭibaddhacittoti attho. Janamevassito janoti “ayaṃ me putto,
atk-s0508a1:3471_3: dhītā”tiādinā aññameva janaṃ añño jano assito taṇhāya allīno pariggayha ṭhito. Jano
atk-s0508a1:3471_4: janena heṭhīyati, heṭheti ca jano jananti kammassakatāya yathābhūtāvabodhassa ca
atk-s0508a1:3471_5: abhāvato ajjhupekkhanaṃ akatvā lobhavasena yathā jano janaṃ assito, evaṃ dosavasena
atk-s0508a1:3471_6: jano janena heṭhīyati vibādhīyati. “Tayidaṃ mayhaṃva upari heṭhanaphalavasena paripatissatī”ti
atk-s0508a1:3472_0: Ko hi tassa janenatthoti tassa aññajanassa aññena janena taṇhāvasena assitena dosavasena
atk-s0508a1:3472_1: heṭhitena vā ko attho. Janena janitena vāti mātāpitā hutvā tena aññena janena janitena
atk-s0508a1:3472_2: vā ko attho. Janaṃ ohāya gacchaṃ taṃ, heṭhayitvā bahuṃ jananti yasmā saṃsāre carato
atk-s0508a1:3472_3: janassa ayamevānurūpā paṭipatti, tasmā taṃ janaṃ, tassa ca bādhikā yā sā taṇhā ca,
atk-s0508a1:3472_4: yo ca so doso eva bahuṃ janaṃ bādhayitvā ṭhito, tañca ohāya sabbaso pahāya pariccajitvā
atk-s0508a1:3472_5: gacchaṃ, tehi anupaddutaṃ ṭhānaṃ gaccheyyaṃ pāpuṇeyyanti attho. Evaṃ pana vatvā thero
atk-s0508a1:3472_6: tāvadeva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattamapāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:3474: Pasumārena jīvāmi, kusalaṃ me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a1:3478: Haṭṭho haṭṭhena cittena, pade cittaṃ pasādayiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3488: Te pana corā therassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā saṃvegajātā pabbajitvā dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjiṃsūti.
atk-s0508a1:3491_0: Kāḷī itthīti āyasmato mahākāḷattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:3491_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe kulagehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:3491_2: viññutaṃ patto kenacideva karaṇīyena araññaṃ gato tattha aññatarassa rukkhassa sākhāya
atk-s0508a1:3491_3: olambamānaṃ paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ disvā “ariyaddhajo olambatī”ti pasannacitto kiṅkaṇipupphāni
atk-s0508a1:3491_4: gahetvā paṃsukūlaṃ pūjesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:3491_5: buddhuppāde setabyanagare satthavāhakule nibbattitvā mahākāḷoti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3491_6: patvā gharāvāsaṃ vasanto pañcahi sakaṭasatehi bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā vāṇijjavasena sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0508a1:3491_7: gato ekamantaṃ sakaṭasatthaṃ nivesetvā addhānaparissamaṃ vinodetvā attano parisāya
atk-s0508a1:3491_8: saddhiṃ nisinno sāyanhasamayaṃ gandhamālādihatthe upāsake jetavanaṃ gacchante disvā
atk-s0508a1:3491_9: sayampi tehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:3491_10: pabbajitvā sosānikaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhāya susāne vasati. Athekadivasaṃ kāḷī nāma ekā itthī
atk-s0508a1:3491_11: chavaḍāhikā therassa kammaṭṭhānatthāya aciramatasarīraṃ ubho satthī bhinditvā ubho
atk-s0508a1:3491_12: ca bāhū bhinditvā sīsañca dadhithālakaṃ viya bhinditvā sabbaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ sambandhameva
atk-s0508a1:3491_13: katvā therassa oloketuṃ yogyaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Thero taṃ disvā attānaṃ ovadanto –
atk-s0508a1:3493: “Kāḷī itthī brahatī dhaṅkarūpā, satthiñca bhetvā aparañca satthiṃ;
atk-s0508a1:3494: Bāhañca bhetvā aparañca bāhaṃ, sīsañca bhetvā dadhithālakaṃva;
atk-s0508a1:3497: “Yo ve avidvā upadhiṃ karoti, punappunaṃ dukkhamupeti mando;
atk-s0508a1:3498: Tasmā pajānaṃ upadhiṃ na kayirā, māhaṃ puna bhinnasiro sayissa”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:3500_0: Tattha kāḷīti tassā nāmaṃ, kāḷavaṇṇattā vā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Brahatīti mahāsarīrā ārohapariṇāhavatī.
atk-s0508a1:3500_1: Dhaṅkarūpāti kāḷavaṇṇattā eva kākasadisarūpā. Satthiñca bhetvāti matasarīrassa satthiṃ
atk-s0508a1:3500_2: jaṇṇubhedanena bhañjitvā. Aparañca satthinti itarañca satthiṃ bhañjitvā. Bāhañca
atk-s0508a1:3500_3: bhetvāti bāhaṭṭhiñca aggabāhaṭṭhāneyeva bhañjitvā. Sīsañca bhetvā dadhithālakaṃvāti
atk-s0508a1:3500_4: matasarīrassa sīsaṃ bhinditvā bhinnattā eva leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paggharantaṃ dadhithālakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3500_5: viya, paggharantaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ katvāti attho. Esā nisinnā abhisandahitvāti chinnabhinnāvayavaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3500_6: matasarīraṃ te avayave yathāṭhāneyeva ṭhapanena sandahitvā sahitaṃ katvā maṃsāpaṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3501_0: Yo ve avidvā upadhiṃ karotīti yo imāya upaṭṭhāpitaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ disvāpi avidvā akusalo
atk-s0508a1:3501_1: kammaṭṭhānaṃ chaḍḍetvā ayonisomanasikārena kilesūpadhiṃ uppādeti, so mando mandapañño
atk-s0508a1:3501_2: saṃsārassa anativattanato punappunaṃ aparāparaṃ nirayādīsu dukkhaṃ upeti. Tasmā pajānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3501_3: upadhiṃ na kayirāti tasmāti yasmā cetadevaṃ, tasmā. Pajānaṃ upadhinti “idha yaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3501_4: sambhotī”ti pajānanto yoniso manasikaronto kilesūpadhiṃ na kayirā na uppādeyya. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a1:3501_5: Māhaṃ puna bhinnasiro sayissanti yathayidaṃ matasarīraṃ bhinnasarīraṃ sayati, evaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3501_6: kilesūpadhīhi saṃsāre punappunaṃ uppattiyā kaṭasivaḍḍhako hutvā bhinnasiro ahaṃ mā
atk-s0508a1:3501_7: sayissanti. Evaṃ vadanto eva thero vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:3513_0: Bahū sapatte labhatīti āyasmato tissattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:3513_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto piyadassissa
atk-s0508a1:3513_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto sippesu nipphattiṃ gantvā
atk-s0508a1:3513_3: kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññāyatane sālavane
atk-s0508a1:3513_4: assamaṃ kāretvā vasati. Bhagavā tassa anuggaṇhanatthaṃ assamassa avidūre sālavane
atk-s0508a1:3513_5: nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdi. So assamato nikkhamitvā phalāphalatthāya gacchanto
atk-s0508a1:3513_6: bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso cattāro daṇḍe ṭhapetvā bhagavato upari pupphitāhi
atk-s0508a1:3513_7: sālasākhāhi sākhāmaṇḍapaṃ katvā sattāhaṃ navanavehi sālapupphehi bhagavantaṃ pūjento
atk-s0508a1:3513_8: aṭṭhāsi buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ avijahanto. Satthā sattāhassa accayena nirodhato vuṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0508a1:3513_9: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ cintesi. Tāvadeva satasahassamattā khīṇāsavā satthāraṃ parivāresuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3513_10: Bhagavā tassa bhāviniṃ sampattiṃ vibhāvento anumodanaṃ vatvā pakkāmi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:3513_11: devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe
atk-s0508a1:3513_12: brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā tissoti laddhanāmo vayappatto tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū hutvā
atk-s0508a1:3513_13: pañcamattāni māṇavakasatāni mante vācento lābhaggayasaggappatto hutvā satthu rājagahagamane
atk-s0508a1:3513_14: buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:3534: “Ko nu kho bhagavā hetu, sitakammassa satthuno;
atk-s0508a1:3537: Tassa kammaṃ saritvāna, sitaṃ pātukariṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3539: Devaloke manusse vā, okāsova na sammati.
atk-s0508a1:3553: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:3571_0: So arahattaṃ pana patvā visesato lābhaggayasaggappatto ahosi. Tattha keci puthujjanabhikkhū
atk-s0508a1:3571_1: therassa lābhasakkāraṃ disvā bālabhāvena asahanākāraṃ pavedesuṃ. Thero taṃ ñatvā
atk-s0508a1:3571_2: lābhasakkāre ādīnavaṃ tattha attano alaggabhāvañca pakāsento –
atk-s0508a1:3574: Lābhī annassa pānassa, vatthassa sayanassa ca.
atk-s0508a1:3579_0: Tassattho – sikhampi asesetvā muṇḍitakesatāya muṇḍo, chinditvā saṅghāṭitakāsāvadhāritāya
atk-s0508a1:3579_1: saṅghāṭipāruto, evaṃ vevaṇṇiyaṃ ajjhupagato parāyattavuttiko pabbajito sace annapānādīnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3579_2: lābhī hoti, sopi bahū sapatte labhati, tassa usūyantā bahū sambhavanti. Tasmā etaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3579_3: evarūpaṃ lābhasakkāresu mahabbhayaṃ vipulabhayaṃ ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ viditvā appicchataṃ
atk-s0508a1:3579_4: santosañca hadaye ṭhapetvā anavajjuppādassāpi uppannassa lābhassa parivajjanena appalābho,
