atk-s0508a1:4446_5: khandhādipaṭipāṭisaññito saṃsāro idāni āyatiṃ punabbhavābhāvato punabbhavo natthi,
atk-s0508a1:4449_0: Yo have daharo bhikkhūti āyasmato dhammapālattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:4449_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4449_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto kenacideva karaṇīyena vanantaṃ upagato satthāraṃ disvā
atk-s0508a1:4449_3: pasannamānaso pilakkhaphalamadāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:4449_4: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde satthari parinibbute avantiraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā dhammapāloti
atk-s0508a1:4449_5: laddhanāmo vayappatto takkasilaṃ gantvā sippaṃ uggahetvā paṭinivattento antarāmagge
atk-s0508a1:4449_6: ekasmiṃ vihāre aññataraṃ theraṃ disvā tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:4449_7: pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4455_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā samāpattisukhena vītināmento ekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ vihāre dve
atk-s0508a1:4455_1: sāmaṇere rukkhagge pupphāni ocinante ārūḷhasākhāya bhaggāya patante disvā thero iddhānubhāvena
atk-s0508a1:4455_2: hatthena gahetvā arogeyeva bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā tesaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ dhammaṃ desento –
atk-s0508a1:4458: Jāgaro sa hi suttesu, amoghaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4461: Anuyuñjetha medhāvī, saraṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti. – imā dve gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4462_0: Tattha yoti aniyamavacanaṃ. Haveti daḷhatthe nipāto. Daharoti taruṇo. Bhikkhatīti
atk-s0508a1:4462_1: bhikkhu. Yuñjatīti ghaṭati vāyamati. Jāgaroti jāgaraṇadhammasamannāgato. Suttesūti
atk-s0508a1:4462_2: supantesu. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti yo bhikkhu daharova samāno taruṇo “tathāhaṃ pacchā vuḍḍhakāle
atk-s0508a1:4462_3: jānissāmī”ti acintetvā buddhānaṃ sāsane appamādapaṭipattiyaṃ yuñjati samathavipassanābhāvanāya
atk-s0508a1:4462_4: yogaṃ karoti, so suttesu avijjāniddāya suttesu pamattesu saddhādijāgaradhammasamannāgamena
atk-s0508a1:4462_5: jāgaro, tato eva attahitaparahitapāripūriyā amoghaṃ avañjhaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ, yasmā
atk-s0508a1:4462_6: ca etadevaṃ, tasmā saddhañca “atthi kammaṃ atthi kammavipāko”tiādinayappavattaṃ kammaphalasaddhañca,
atk-s0508a1:4462_8: bhagavā, svākhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti evaṃ pavattaratanattayappasādañca,
atk-s0508a1:4462_10: dhammojapaññāya samannāgato bhikkhu buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ ovādaṃ anusiṭṭhiṃ anussaranto
atk-s0508a1:4462_11: ādittampi attano sīsaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā anuyuñjetha, tattha anuyogaṃ ātappaṃ kareyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:4465_0: Kassindriyāni samathaṅgatānīti āyasmato brahmālittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a1:4465_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto
atk-s0508a1:4465_2: vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:4465_3: piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā pādaphalaṃ adāsi. Satthā anumodanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4465_4: vatvā pakkāmi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:4465_5: kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brahmālīti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto hetusampattiyā
atk-s0508a1:4465_6: codiyamāno saṃsāre sañjātasaṃvego tādisena kalyāṇamittasannissayena buddhasāsane
atk-s0508a1:4465_7: pabbajitvā patirūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe viharanto ñāṇassa paripākagatattā
atk-s0508a1:4465_8: nacirasseva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4471: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā maggasukhena phalasukhena vītināmento ekadivasaṃ padhānapariggāhakena therena tasmiṃ araññāyatane bhikkhū uddissa vuttaṃ padhānānuyogaṃ pariggaṇhanto –
atk-s0508a1:4474: Pahīnamānassa anāsavassa, devāpi kassa pihayanti tādino.
atk-s0508a1:4477: Pahīnamānassa anāsavassa, devāpi mayhaṃ pihayanti tādino”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:4479_0: Tassattho – imasmiṃ araññāyatane vasantesu bhikkhūsu kassa bhikkhuno therassa vā
atk-s0508a1:4479_1: navassa vā majjhimassa vā chekena sārathinā sudantā assā viya manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni
atk-s0508a1:4479_2: samathaṃ dantabhāvaṃ nibbisevanabhāvaṃ gatāni. Kassa navavidhampi mānaṃ pahāya ṭhitattā
atk-s0508a1:4479_3: pahīnamānassa catunnampi āsavānaṃ abhāvena anāsavassa iṭṭhādīsu tādilakkhaṇappattiyā
atk-s0508a1:4479_4: tādino devāpi pihayanti manussāpi sammāpaṭipattidassanādinā ca ādarena patthentīti.
atk-s0508a1:4480_0: Tattha ca gāthāyaṃ purimaḍḍhena anāgāmimaggādhigamo puṭṭho, anāgāminopi hi indriyāni
atk-s0508a1:4480_1: pahīnakāmarāgabyāpādatāya samathaṃ nibbisevanataṃ gatāni honti. Itarena arahattamaggapaṭilābho,
atk-s0508a1:4480_2: arahā hi “pahīnamāno anāsavo tādī”ti ca vuccati.
atk-s0508a1:4481_0: Athāyasmā brahmāli padhānapariggāhakena vuttaṃ “kassindriyānī”ti gāthaṃ paccanubhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4481_2: byākāsi, tattha mayhindriyānīti mama cakkhādīni indriyāni. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a1:4484_0: Chavipāpaka cittabhaddakāti āyasmato mogharājattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a1:4484_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4484_2: patto ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ lūkhacīvaradharānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4484_3: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ ākaṅkhanto paṇidhānaṃ katvā tattha tattha
atk-s0508a1:4484_4: bhave puññāni karonto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brāhmaṇānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4484_5: vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato brāhmaṇamāṇave vijjāsippāni sikkhāpento ekadivasaṃ atthadassiṃ
atk-s0508a1:4484_6: bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0508a1:4484_7: vanditvā sirasi añjaliṃ katvā “yāvatā rūpino sattā”tiādinā chahi gāthāhi abhitthavitvā
atk-s0508a1:4484_8: bhājanaṃ pūretvā madhuṃ upanāmesi. Satthā madhuṃ paṭiggahetvā anumodanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4485_0: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle kaṭṭhavāhanassa
atk-s0508a1:4485_1: nāma rañño amacco hutvā tena satthu ānayanatthaṃ purisasahassena pesito satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4485_2: gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vīsativassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4485_3: katvā tato cuto ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ sugatīsuyeva parivattento imasmiṃ buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a1:4485_4: nibbattitvā mogharājāti laddhanāmo bāvarībrāhmaṇassa santike uggahitasippo saṃvegajāto
atk-s0508a1:4485_5: tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tāpasasahassaparivāro ajitādīhi saddhiṃ satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4485_6: pesito tesaṃ pannarasamo hutvā pañhe pucchitvā pañhavissajjanapariyosāne arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4493: Sabbe te tava ñāṇamhi, anto honti samogadhā.
atk-s0508a1:4495: Ye keci udake pāṇā, antojāle bhavanti te.
atk-s0508a1:4497: Sabbe te tava ñāṇamhi, anto honti samogadhā.
atk-s0508a1:4499: Tava dhammaṃ suṇitvāna, kaṅkhāsotaṃ taranti te.
atk-s0508a1:4509: Mama cittaṃ pasādento, imā gāthā abhāsatha.
atk-s0508a1:4511: Tena cittappasādena, duggatiṃ so na gacchati.
atk-s0508a1:4525_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthalūkhaṃ suttalūkhaṃ rajanalūkhanti visesena tividhenapi
atk-s0508a1:4525_1: lūkhena samannāgataṃ paṃsukūlaṃ dhāresi. Tena naṃ satthā lūkhacīvaradharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a1:4525_2: ṭhapesi. Aparabhāge purimakammappaccayā parihārassa akaraṇato therassa sarīre daddupīḷakādīni
atk-s0508a1:4525_3: uppajjitvā vaḍḍhiṃsu. So “senāsanaṃ dussatī”ti hemantepi magadhakkhettesu palālasanthārāni
atk-s0508a1:4525_4: attharitvā seti. Taṃ ekadivasaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4526_0: 207. Tattha chavipāpakāti daddukacchupīḷakāhi bhinnacchavibhāvato hīnacchavika duṭṭhacchavika.
atk-s0508a1:4526_1: Cittabhaddakāti anavasesakilesappahānena brahmavihārasevanāya ca bhaddacitta sundaracitta.
atk-s0508a1:4526_2: Mogharājāti tassa ālapanaṃ. Satataṃ samāhitoti aggaphalasamādhinā niccakālaṃ abhiṇhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4526_4: cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. “Hemantikā sītakālarattiyo”tipi pāḷi. Tattha hemantikāti hemantogadhā
atk-s0508a1:4526_5: hemantapariyāpannāti attho. Bhikkhu tvaṃ sīti bhikkhu ko tvaṃ asi, evaṃbhūto paresu
atk-s0508a1:4526_6: tava senāsanaṃ katvā adentesu saṅghikañca senāsanaṃ apavisanto. Kathaṃ karissasīti
atk-s0508a1:4526_7: yathāvutte sītakāle kathaṃ attabhāvaṃ pavattesīti satthā pucchi. Evaṃ pana puṭṭho
atk-s0508a1:4530_0: Tattha sampannasassāti nipphannasassā. Magadhāti magadharaṭṭhaṃ vadati. Magadhā nāma
atk-s0508a1:4530_1: jānapadino rājakumārā, tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīvasena “magadhā”tveva bahuvacanena
atk-s0508a1:4530_2: vuccati. Kevalāti anavasesā. Iti me sutanti evaṃ mayā sutaṃ. Tattha yo adiṭṭho padeso,
atk-s0508a1:4530_3: tassa vasena sutanti vuttaṃ. Tena edise kāle magadhesu yattha katthaci mayā vasituṃ
atk-s0508a1:4530_4: sakkāti dasseti. Palālacchannako seyyaṃ, yathaññe sukhajīvinoti yathā aññe sukhajīvino
atk-s0508a1:4530_5: bhikkhū senāsanasappāyaṃ laddhā sundarehi attharaṇapāvuraṇehi sukhena sayanti, evaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4530_6: ahampi palālasanthārameva heṭṭhā santharitvā upari tiriyañca palālacchadaneneva chāditasarīratāya
atk-s0508a1:4530_7: palālacchannako seyyaṃ sayiṃ, seyyaṃ kappesinti attano yathālābhasantosaṃ vibhāveti.
atk-s0508a1:4533_0: Na ukkhipe no ca parikkhipe pareti āyasmato visākhassa pañcālaputtassa gāthā. Kā
atk-s0508a1:4533_1: uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4533_2: puññaṃ upacinanto ito cuddase kappe paccantagāme daliddakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4533_3: patto ekadivasaṃ phalapariyesanaṃ carantehi tasmiṃ gāme manussehi saddhiṃ araññaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4533_4: gato tattha ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ disvā pasannamānaso valliphalaṃ adāsi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:4533_5: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe maṇḍalikarājakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:4533_6: visākhoti laddhanāmo pañcālarājadhītuyā puttabhāvato pacchā pañcālaputtoti paññāyittha.
atk-s0508a1:4533_7: So pitari mate rajjaṃ kārento satthari attano gāmasamīpagate satthu santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0508a1:4533_8: dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā satthārā saddhiṃ sāvatthiṃ gato vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4533_9: paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4541_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā thero ñātīnaṃ anukampāya jātibhūmiṃ agamāsi. Tattha manussā
atk-s0508a1:4541_1: theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā kālena kālaṃ dhammaṃ suṇantā ekadivasaṃ “katihi nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0508a1:4541_2: aṅgehi samannāgato dhammakathiko hotī”ti dhammakathikalakkhaṇaṃ pucchiṃsu. Thero
atk-s0508a1:4543: “Na ukkhipe no ca parikkhipe pare, na okkhipe pāragataṃ na eraye;
atk-s0508a1:4544: Na cattavaṇṇaṃ parisāsu byāhare, anuddhato sammitabhāṇi subbato.
atk-s0508a1:4547: Saṃsevitabuddhasīlinā, nibbānaṃ na hi tena dullabha”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:4549_0: Tattha na ukkhipeti attānaṃ na ukkhipeyya, jātiādīhi bāhusaccādīhi ca attukkaṃsanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4549_1: na kareyya. No ca parikkhipe pareti pare parapuggale teheva jātiādīhi no parikkhipe
atk-s0508a1:4549_2: paricchinditvā na khipeyya guṇaparidhaṃsanavasena vā na khipeyya. Na okkhipe pare
atk-s0508a1:4549_3: iccevaṃ sambandho. Pare ojjhāpanavasena na okkhipe heṭṭhato katvā pare na olokāpeyya,
atk-s0508a1:4549_4: na ojjhāpeyyāti attho. “Na ukkhipe”ti keci paṭhanti, so evattho. Pāragatanti saṃsārapāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:4549_5: viya vijjāya pāraṃ gataṃ khīṇāsavaṃ tevijjaṃ chaḷabhiññaṃ vā na eraye na ghaṭṭaye
atk-s0508a1:4549_6: na āsādeyya. Na cattavaṇṇaṃ parisāsu byāhareti attano vaṇṇaṃ guṇaṃ lābhasakkārasilokaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4549_7: nikāmayamāno khattiyaparisādīsu na bhāseyya. Anuddhatoti uddhaccarahito. Uddhatassa
atk-s0508a1:4549_8: hi vacanaṃ nādiyanti. Sammitabhāṇīti sammadeva mitabhāṇī, kālena sāpadesaṃ pariyantavatiṃ
atk-s0508a1:4549_9: atthasañhitameva vācaṃ bhāsanasīloti attho. Ito aññathā vadantassa vacanaṃ agahaṇīyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4549_10: hoti. Subbatoti sundaravato sīlasampanno. “Siyā”ti kiriyāpadaṃ ānetvā yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4550_0: Evaṃ thero saṅkhepeneva dhammakathikalakkhaṇaṃ vatvā tesaṃ guṇānaṃ attani labbhamānataṃ
atk-s0508a1:4550_1: adhimuccitvā bhiyyosomattāya abhippasannaṃ mahājanaṃ ñatvā “evaṃvidhassa dhammakathikassa
atk-s0508a1:4550_2: vimuttāyatanasannissitassa na nibbānaṃ dullabhaṃ, atha kho sulabhamevā”ti dassento
atk-s0508a1:4553_0: Nadanti morā susikhā supekhuṇāti āyasmato cūḷakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a1:4553_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto
atk-s0508a1:4553_2: ito ekatiṃse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4553_3: satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso chattapaṇṇiphalaṃ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:4553_4: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā cūḷakoti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a1:4553_5: vayappatto dhanapāladamane satthari laddhappasādo pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto
atk-s0508a1:4553_6: indasālaguhāyaṃ vasati, so ekadivasaṃ guhādvāre nisinno magadhakkhettaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0508a1:4553_7: Tasmiṃ khaṇe pāvusakālamegho gambhīramadhuranigghoso satapaṭalasahassapaṭalo añjana
atk-s0508a1:4553_8: sikharasannikāso nabhaṃ pūretvā pavassati, mayūrasaṅghā ca meghagajjitaṃ sutvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā
atk-s0508a1:4553_9: kekāsaddaṃ muñcitvā tattha tattha padese naccantā vicaranti. Therassapi āvāsagabbhe
atk-s0508a1:4553_10: meghavātaphassehi apagatadhammattā passaddhakarajakāye kallataṃ patte utusappāyalābhena
atk-s0508a1:4553_11: cittaṃ ekaggaṃ ahosi, kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ otari, so taṃ ñatvā kālasampadādikittanamukhena
atk-s0508a1:4555: “Nadanti morā susikhā supekhuṇā, sunīlagīvā sumukhā sugajjino;
atk-s0508a1:4556: Susaddalā cāpi mahāmahī ayaṃ, subyāpitambu suvalāhakaṃ nabhaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4559: Susukkasukkaṃ nipuṇaṃ sududdasaṃ, phusāhi taṃ uttamamaccutaṃ pada”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:4561_0: Tattha nadanti morā susikhā supekhuṇā, sunīlagīvā sumukhā sugajjinoti ete matthake
atk-s0508a1:4561_1: uṭṭhitāhi sundarāhi sikhāhi samannāgatattā susikhā, nānāvaṇṇehi anekehi sobhanehi
atk-s0508a1:4561_2: bhaddakapiñchehi samannāgatattā supekhuṇā, rājīvavaṇṇasaṅkāsāya sundarāya nīlavaṇṇāya
atk-s0508a1:4561_3: gīvāya samannāgatattā sunīlagīvā, sundaramukhatāya sumukhā, manuññavāditāya sugajjino,
atk-s0508a1:4561_4: morā sikhaṇḍino chajjasaṃvādī kekāsaddaṃ muñcantā nadanti ravanti. Susaddalā cāpi
atk-s0508a1:4561_5: mahāmahī ayanti ayañca mahāpathavī susaddalā sundaraharitatiṇā. Subyāpitambūti abhinavavuṭṭhiyā
atk-s0508a1:4561_6: tahaṃ tahaṃ vissandamānasalilatāya suṭṭhu byāpitajalā vitatajalā. “Susukkatambū”tipi
atk-s0508a1:4561_7: pāṭho, suvisuddhajalāti attho. Suvalāhakaṃ nabhanti idañca nabhaṃ ākāsaṃ nīluppaladalasannibhehi
atk-s0508a1:4561_8: samantato pūretvā ṭhitehi sundarehi valāhakehi meghehi suvalāhakaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4562_0: Sukallarūpo sumanassa jhāyatanti idāni utusappāyalābhena suṭṭhu kallarūpo kammaniyasabhāvo
atk-s0508a1:4562_1: tvaṃ, nīvaraṇehi anajjhārūḷhacittatāya sundaramanassa yogāvacarassa yaṃ ārammaṇūpanijjhānavasena
atk-s0508a1:4562_2: lakkhaṇūpanijjhānavasena ca jhāyataṃ. Sunikkamo…pe… accutaṃ padanti evaṃ jhāyanto
atk-s0508a1:4562_3: ca sādhu subuddhassa sammāsambuddhassa sāsane sundaranikkamo hutvā suparisuddhasīlatāya
atk-s0508a1:4562_4: susukkaṃ, visuddhasabhāvatāya sabbassapi saṃkilesassa gocarabhāvānupagamanato sukkaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4562_5: nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya nipuṇaṃ, paramagambhīratāya sududdasaṃ, paṇītabhāvena seṭṭhabhāvena
atk-s0508a1:4562_6: ca uttamaṃ, niccasabhāvatāya accutaṃ padaṃ taṃ nibbānaṃ phusāhi attapaccakkhakaraṇena
atk-s0508a1:4563: Evaṃ thero attānaṃ ovadantova utusappāyalābhena samāhitacitto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4571: Arahattaṃ pana patvā thero attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā pītisomanassajāto “nadanti morā”tiādinā tāyeva gāthā paccudāhāsi. Tenassa idameva aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0508a1:4574_0: Nandamānāgataṃ cittāti āyasmato anūpamattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:4574_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito ekatiṃse
atk-s0508a1:4574_2: kappe kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ padumaṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4574_3: piṇḍāya carantaṃ rathiyaṃ disvā pasannamānaso aṅkolapupphehi pūjesi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:4574_4: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbattitvā rūpasampattiyā
atk-s0508a1:4574_5: anūpamoti laddhanāmo vayappatto upanissayasampannatāya kāme pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a1:4574_6: kammaṃ karonto araññe viharati. Tassa cittaṃ bahiddhā rūpādiārammaṇesu vidhāvati.
atk-s0508a1:4574_7: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ parivaṭṭati. Thero vidhāvantaṃ cittaṃ niggaṇhanto –
atk-s0508a1:4577: Tena teneva vajasi, yena sūlaṃ kaliṅgaraṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4580: Satthā te dullabho laddho, mānatthe maṃ niyojayī”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:4582_0: Tattha nandamānāgataṃ cittāti nandamāna abhinandamāna citta abhinandamānaṃ āgataṃ
atk-s0508a1:4582_1: uppannaṃ. Sūlamāropamānakanti dukkhuppattiṭṭhānatāya sūlasadisattā sūlaṃ taṃ taṃ
atk-s0508a1:4582_2: bhavaṃ kammakilesehi ettakaṃ kālaṃ āropiyamānaṃ. Tena teneva vajasi, yena sūlaṃ kaliṅgaranti
atk-s0508a1:4582_3: yattha yattha sūlasaṅkhātā bhavā kaliṅgarasaṅkhātā adhikuṭṭanakā kāmaguṇā ca tena
atk-s0508a1:4582_4: teneva, pāpacitta, vajasi, taṃ tadeva ṭhānaṃ upagacchasi, attano anatthaṃ na sallakkhesi.
atk-s0508a1:4583_0: Tāhaṃ cittakaliṃ brūmīti taṃ tasmā pamattabhāvato cittakaliṃ cittakālakaṇṇiṃ ahaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4583_1: kathayāmi. Punapi taṃ brūmi kathemi cittadubbhakaṃ cittasaṅkhātassa attano bahūpakārassa
atk-s0508a1:4583_3: attho. Kinti brūhīti ce? Āha “satthā te dullabho laddho, mānatthe maṃ niyojayī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:4583_4: Kappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyampi nāma buddhasuñño loko hoti, satthari uppannepi manussattasaddhāpaṭilābhādayo
atk-s0508a1:4583_5: dullabhā eva, laddhesu ca tesu satthāpi dullabhoyeva hoti. Evaṃ dullabho satthā idāni
atk-s0508a1:4583_6: tayā laddho, tasmiṃ laddhe sampatipi anatthe ahite āyatiñca anatthāvahe dukkhāvahe
atk-s0508a1:4583_7: akusale maṃ mā niyojesīti. Evaṃ thero attano cittaṃ ovadanto eva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0508a1:4585: Disvāna taṃ ahaṃ buddhaṃ, sayambhuṃ aparājitaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4593_0: Saṃsaraṃ dīghamaddhānanti āyasmato vajjitattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:4593_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito pañcasaṭṭhime kappe ekasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:4593_2: paccantagāme nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto vanacarako hutvā vicaranto ekadivasaṃ upasantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4593_3: nāma paccekabuddhaṃ pabbataguhāyaṃ viharantaṃ addasa. So tassa upasamaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:4593_4: campakapupphena pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:4593_5: buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbatto jātadivasato paṭṭhāya mātugāmahatthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4593_6: gato rodati. Brahmalokato kira cavitvā idhāgato yasmā mātugāmasamphassaṃ na sahati,
atk-s0508a1:4593_7: tasmā mātugāmasamphassavajjanato vajjitotveva nāmaṃ jātaṃ. So vayappatto satthu yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4593_8: disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā tadaheva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:4601: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā attano pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā dhammasaṃvegena –
atk-s0508a1:4607: Sabbā gatī samucchinnā, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. – dve gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4608_0: Tattha saṃsaranti saṃsaranto, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave ādānanikkhepavasena aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4608_1: sandhāvanto. Dīghamaddhānanti cirakālaṃ anādimati saṃsāre aparimāṇakālaṃ. Gatīsūti
atk-s0508a1:4608_2: sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ vasena sugatiduggatīsu. Parivattisanti ghaṭīyantaṃ viya
atk-s0508a1:4608_3: paribbhamanto cavanupapajjanavasena aparāparaṃ parivattiṃ. Tassa pana parivattanassa
atk-s0508a1:4608_4: kāraṇamāha “apassaṃ ariyasaccāni, andhabhūto puthujjano”ti. Dukkhādīni cattāri ariyasaccāni
atk-s0508a1:4608_5: ñāṇacakkhunā apassanto appaṭivijjhanto, tato eva avijjandhatāya andhabhūto puthūnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4608_6: jananādīhi kāraṇehi puthujjano honto gatīsu parivattisanti yojanā, tenevāha bhagavā –
atk-s0508a1:4609: “Catunnaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasaccānaṃ ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva tumhākañcā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:4610_0: Tassa mayhaṃ vuttanayena pubbe puthujjanasseva sato idāni satthārā dinnanayena appamattassa
atk-s0508a1:4610_1: appamādapaṭipattiyā samathavipassanābhāvanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā ṭhitassa. Saṃsārā
atk-s0508a1:4610_2: vinaḷīkatāti saṃsaranti sattā etehīti “saṃsārā”ti laddhanāmā kammakilesā aggamaggena
atk-s0508a1:4610_3: samucchinnattā vigatanaḷā nimmūlā katā. Sabbā gatī samucchinnāti evaṃ kammakilesavaṭṭānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4610_4: vinaḷīkatattā nirayādikā sabbāpi gatiyo sammadeva ucchinnā viddhaṃsitā, tato eva
atk-s0508a1:4610_5: natthi dāni āyatiṃ punabbhavoti idameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0508a1:4613_0: Assatthe haritobhāseti āyasmato sandhitattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:4613_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekatiṃse kappe sikhissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:4613_2: kāle eko gopālako ahosi. So satthari parinibbute aññataraṃ theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa
atk-s0508a1:4613_3: santike buddhaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso “kuhiṃ bhagavā”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0508a1:4613_4: parinibbutabhāvaṃ sutvā “evaṃ mahānubhāvā buddhāpi nāma aniccatāvasaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0508a1:4613_5: aho saṅkhārā addhuvā”ti aniccasaññaṃ paṭilabhi. Taṃ thero bodhipūjāya ussāhesi. So
atk-s0508a1:4613_6: kālena kālaṃ bodhirukkhasamīpaṃ gantvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā buddhaguṇe anussaranto
atk-s0508a1:4613_7: bodhiṃ vandati. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:4613_8: kosalaraṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbattitvā sandhitoti laddhanāmo vayappatto aniccatāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4613_9: dhammakathaṃ sutvā saṃvegajāto pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ñāṇassa paripākaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4613_10: gatattā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. So attano pubbenivāsaṃ anussaranto sikhissa
atk-s0508a1:4613_11: bhagavato kāle bodhivandanaṃ buddhānussatiṃ aniccasaññāpaṭilābhañca anussaritvā tadupanissayena
atk-s0508a1:4619: Tassā saññāya vāhasā, patto me āsavakkhayo”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:4621_0: Tattha assattheti assatthaṭṭhānīye, yvāyaṃ etarahi amhākaṃ bhagavato bodhirukkho
atk-s0508a1:4621_1: assattho, etassa ṭhāne tadā sikhissa bhagavato bodhirukkho puṇḍarīko ṭhitoti so assatthaṭṭhānīyatāya
atk-s0508a1:4621_2: “assatthe”ti vuttaṃ. Sattānaṃ assāsajananato vā. Apare pana “assattharukkhamūle nisīditvā
atk-s0508a1:4621_3: tadā buddhānussatiyā bhāvitattā thero ‘assatthe’ti avocā”ti vadanti. Haritobhāseti
atk-s0508a1:4621_4: haritehi sāramaṇivaṇṇehi obhāsamāne. Saṃvirūḷhamhīti suṭṭhu virūḷhe suppatiṭṭhite,
atk-s0508a1:4621_5: sughananicitapattapalāsapallavehi virūḷhasañchanneti ca vadanti. Pādapeti rukkhe.
atk-s0508a1:4621_6: Ekaṃ buddhagataṃ saññaṃ, alabhitthaṃ patissatoti buddhārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇassa ekajātiyattā
atk-s0508a1:4621_7: ekaṃ “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinayappavattaṃ buddhānussatisahagataṃ saññaṃ buddhaguṇānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4622_0: Kadā pana sā saññā laddhā, kīvatāya siddhāti āha “ekatiṃse ito kappe”tiādi. Ito bhaddakappato
atk-s0508a1:4622_1: uddhaṃ ārohanavasena ekatiṃse kappe. Yaṃ saññanti yaṃ buddhānussatisahagataṃ saññaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4622_2: yaṃ vā buddhānaṃ aniccataṃ disvā tadanusārena sabbāsaṅkhāresu tadā aniccasaññaṃ alabhiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4622_3: Tassā saññāya vāhasāti tassā yathāvuttāya saññāya kāraṇabhāvena taṃ upanissayaṃ katvā.
atk-s0508a1:4622_4: Patto me āsavakkhayoti idāni mayā āsavānaṃ khayo nirodho adhigatoti imāyeva ca imassa
atk-s0508a1:4632_0: Tikanipāte ayoni suddhimanvesanti āyasmato aṅgaṇikabhāradvājattherassa gāthā. Kā
atk-s0508a1:4632_1: uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4632_2: puññaṃ upacinanto ito ekatiṃse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:4632_3: viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0508a1:4632_4: vanditvā añjaliṃ paggaṇhi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:4632_5: buddhuppāde himavantasamīpe ukkaṭṭhe nāma nagare vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa gehe
atk-s0508a1:4632_6: nibbattitvā aṅgaṇikabhāradvājoti laddhanāmo vayappatto vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato
atk-s0508a1:4632_7: nekkhammajjhāsayatāya paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā amaraṃ tapaṃ caranto tattha
atk-s0508a1:4632_8: tattha vicaranto sammāsambuddhaṃ janapadacārikaṃ carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso satthu
atk-s0508a1:4632_9: santike dhammaṃ sutvā taṃ micchātapaṃ pahāya sāsane pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4632_10: karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4640_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā vimuttisukhena viharanto ñātīnaṃ anukampāya attano jātibhūmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:4640_1: gantvā bahū ñātake saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetvā tato nivattitvā kururaṭṭhe
atk-s0508a1:4640_2: kuṇḍiyassa nāma nigamassa avidūre araññe vasanto kenacideva karaṇīyena uggārāmaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4640_3: gato uttarāpathato āgatehi sandiṭṭhehi brāhmaṇehi samāgato tehi, “bho bhāradvāja,
atk-s0508a1:4640_4: kiṃ disvā brāhmaṇānaṃ samayaṃ pahāya imaṃ samayaṃ gaṇhī”ti pucchito tesaṃ ito buddhasāsanato
atk-s0508a1:4643: Suddhimaggaṃ ajānanto, akāsiṃ amaraṃ tapa”nti. – paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a1:4644_0: Tattha ayonīti ayoniso anupāyena. Suddhinti saṃsārasuddhiṃ bhavanissaraṇaṃ. Anvesanti
atk-s0508a1:4644_1: gavesanto. Aggiṃ paricariṃ vaneti “ayaṃ suddhimaggo”ti adhippāyena araññāyatane aggihutasālāyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4644_2: agyāgāraṃ katvā āhutiṃ paggaṇhanto aggidevaṃ paricariṃ vede vuttavidhinā pūjesiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4644_3: Suddhimaggaṃ ajānanto, akāsiṃ amaraṃ tapanti suddhiyā nibbānassa maggaṃ ajānanto
atk-s0508a1:4645_0: Evaṃ thero assamato assamaṃ gacchanto viya vede vuttavidhinā aggiparicaraṇādinā anuṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a1:4645_1: suddhiyā appattabhāvena bahiddhā suddhiyā abhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni imasmiṃyeva sāsane
atk-s0508a1:4648: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. – dutiyagāthamāha;
atk-s0508a1:4649_0: Tattha tanti yassatthāya suddhiṃ anvesanto tassa maggaṃ ajānanto aggiṃ paricariṃ
atk-s0508a1:4649_1: amaraṃ tapaṃ acariṃ, taṃ nibbānasukhaṃ sukhena samathavipassanāya sukhāya paṭipadāya
atk-s0508a1:4649_2: attakilamathānuyogaṃ anupagamma mayā laddhaṃ pattaṃ adhigataṃ. Passa dhammasudhammatanti
atk-s0508a1:4649_3: satthu sāsanadhammassa sudhammataṃ aviparītaniyyānikadhammasabhāvaṃ passa jānāhīti
atk-s0508a1:4649_4: dhammālapanavasena vadati, attānaṃ vā ālapati. Tassa laddhabhāvaṃ pana dassento –
atk-s0508a1:4651: Āha, taṃ vuttatthameva. Evaṃ suddhiyā adhigatattā “ito paṭṭhāyāhaṃ paramatthato brāhmaṇo”ti dassento –
atk-s0508a1:4654: Tevijjo nhātakocamhi, sottiyo camhi vedagū”ti. – tatiyaṃ gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a1:4655_0: Tassattho – ito pubbe jātimattena brāhmaṇabhāvato brāhmaṇānaṃ samaññāya brahmabandhu
atk-s0508a1:4655_1: nāma āsiṃ. Bāhitapāpattā pana idāni kho arahattādhigamena paramatthato brāhmaṇo ca
atk-s0508a1:4655_2: amhi. Ito pubbe bhavasañcayakarānaṃ tissannaṃ vedasaṅkhātānaṃ vijjānaṃ ajjhayanena
atk-s0508a1:4655_3: samaññāmattena tevijjo nāma hutvā idāni bhavakkhayakarāya vijjāya vasena tissannaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4655_4: vijjānaṃ adhigatattā paramatthato tevijjo ca amhi. Tathā ito pubbe bhavassādagadhitāya
atk-s0508a1:4655_5: nhātakavatanipphattiyā samaññāmattena nhātako nāma hutvā idāni aṭṭhaṅgikamaggajalena
atk-s0508a1:4655_6: suvikkhālitakilesamalatāya paramatthato nhātako camhi. Ito pubbe avimuttabhavassādamantajjhānena
atk-s0508a1:4655_7: vohāramattato sottiyo nāma hutvā idāni suvimuttabhavassādadhammajjhānena paramatthato
atk-s0508a1:4655_8: sottiyo camhi. Ito pubbe appaṭinissaṭṭhapāpadhammānaṃ vedānaṃ gatamattena vedagū
atk-s0508a1:4655_9: nāma hutvā idāni vedasaṅkhātena maggañāṇena saṃsāramahoghassa vedassa catusaccassa
atk-s0508a1:4655_10: ca pāraṃ gatattā adhigatattā ñātattā paramatthato vedagū jātoti. Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇā
atk-s0508a1:4658_0: Pañcāhāhaṃ pabbajitoti āyasmato paccayattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:4658_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa
atk-s0508a1:4658_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ vinatāya
atk-s0508a1:4658_3: nāma nadiyā tīre gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso manuññadassanāni mahantāni udumbaraphalāni
atk-s0508a1:4658_4: ocinitvā upanāmesi. So tena puññakammena sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ bhaddakappe
atk-s0508a1:4658_5: kassape bhagavati loke uppajjitvā pavattavaradhammacakke veneyyajanānuggahaṃ karonte
atk-s0508a1:4658_6: tassa sāsane pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā bhāvanamanuyuñjanto ekadivasaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ cintetvā
atk-s0508a1:4659_0: Ativiya sañjātasaṃvego vihāre nisinno “arahattaṃ appatvā ito na nikkhamissāmī”ti
atk-s0508a1:4659_1: cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāya vāyamanto ñāṇassa aparipakkattā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0508a1:4659_2: So kālaṅkatvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rohitanagare khattiyakule
atk-s0508a1:4659_3: nibbattitvā paccayoti laddhanāmo vayappatto pitu accayena rajje patiṭṭhito ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4659_4: mahārājabaliṃ kātuṃ ārabhi. Tattha mahājano sannipati. Tasmiṃ samāgame tassa pasādañjananatthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4659_5: satthā mahājanassa pekkhantasseva ākāse vessavaṇena nimmite ratanamayakūṭāgāre ratanamayasīhāsane
atk-s0508a1:4659_6: nisīditvā dhammaṃ desesi. Mahato janakāyassa dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a1:4659_7: paccayarājāpi rajjaṃ pahāya purimahetusañcodito pabbaji. So yathā kassapassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:4659_8: kāle paṭiññaṃ akāsi, evaṃ paṭiññaṃ katvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento ñāṇassa
atk-s0508a1:4659_9: paripākaṃ gatattā tāvadeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4669: Na vihārā nikkhamissaṃ, iti katvāna mānasaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4672: Pattomhi acalaṃ ṭhānaṃ, phusitvā accutaṃ padaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4674: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattikittanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:4677: Vihāraṃ me paviṭṭhassa, cetaso paṇidhī ahu.
atk-s0508a1:4683: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:4685_0: Tattha pañcāhāhaṃ pabbajitoti pañcāho ahaṃ, pabbajito hutvā pañcāho, pabbajitadivasato
atk-s0508a1:4685_1: pañcamo aho niṭṭhitoti attho. Sekho appattamānasoti adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ sikkhanato
atk-s0508a1:4685_2: sekho. Anavasesato mānaṃ siyati samucchindatīti mānaso, aggamaggo, taṃnibbattito
atk-s0508a1:4685_3: mānasato āgataṃ mānasaṃ, arahattaṃ, taṃ, so vā appatto etenāti appattamānaso. Vihāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:4685_4: me paviṭṭhassa, cetaso paṇidhī ahūti evaṃ sekhassa me vasanakavihāraṃ ovarakaṃ paviṭṭhassa
atk-s0508a1:4685_5: sato evarūpo idāni vuccamānākāro cetopaṇidhi ahosi, evaṃ mayā cittaṃ paṇihitanti attho.
atk-s0508a1:4686_0: Nāsissantiādinā cittapaṇidhiṃ dasseti. Tattha nāsissanti yaṃkiñci bhojanaṃ na bhuñjissaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4686_1: na bhuñjissāmi taṇhāsalle mama hadayagate anūhate anuddhateti evaṃ sabbapadesu yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4686_2: Na pivissāmīti yaṃkiñci pātabbaṃ na pivissāmi. Vihārato na nikkhameti imasmā idāni
atk-s0508a1:4686_3: mayā nisinnagabbhato na nikkhameyyaṃ. Napi passaṃ nipātessanti mama sarīrassa dvīsu
atk-s0508a1:4686_4: passesu ekampi passaṃ kāyakilamathavinodanatthaṃ na nipātessaṃ, ekapassenapi na nipajjissāmīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:4687_0: Tassa mevaṃ viharatoti tassa me evaṃ cittaṃ paṇidhāya daḷhavīriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a1:4687_1: vipassanānuyogavasena viharato. Passa vīriyaparakkamanti vidhinā īrayitabbato “vīriyaṃ”
atk-s0508a1:4687_2: paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato “parakkamo”ti ca laddhanāmaṃ ussoḷhībhūtaṃ vāyāmaṃ passa
atk-s0508a1:4687_3: jānāhi. Yassa panānubhāvena mayā tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsananti vuttatthameva.
atk-s0508a1:4690_0: Yo pubbe karaṇīyānīti āyasmato bākulattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi kira atīte
atk-s0508a1:4690_1: ito kappasatasahassādhikassa asaṅkhyeyyassa matthake anomadassissa bhagavato uppattito
atk-s0508a1:4690_2: puretarameva brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā tattha sāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:4690_3: apassanto “samparāyikatthaṃ gavesissāmī”ti isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pabbatapāde viharanto
atk-s0508a1:4690_4: pañcābhiññāaṭṭhasamāpattilābhī hutvā viharanto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4690_5: gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhito satthu udarābādhe uppanne araññato bhesajjāni
atk-s0508a1:4690_6: āharitvā taṃ vūpasametvā tattha puññaṃ ārogyatthāya pariṇāmetvā tato cuto brahmaloke
atk-s0508a1:4690_7: nibbattitvā ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare
atk-s0508a1:4690_8: kulagehe nibbatto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ appābādhānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā
atk-s0508a1:4690_9: sayaṃ taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ ākaṅkhanto paṇidhānaṃ katvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā sugatīsuyeva
atk-s0508a1:4690_10: saṃsaranto vipassissa bhagavato nibbattito puretarameva bandhumatīnagare brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a1:4690_11: nibbatto purimanayeneva isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā jhānābhiññālābhī hutvā pabbatapāde
atk-s0508a1:4690_12: vasanto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhito
atk-s0508a1:4690_13: bhikkhūnaṃ tiṇapupphakaroge uppanne taṃ vūpasametvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato
atk-s0508a1:4690_14: cuto brahmaloke nibbattitvā ekanavutikappe devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:4690_15: kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekaṃ jiṇṇaṃ vinassamānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4690_16: mahāvihāraṃ disvā tattha uposathāgārādikaṃ sabbaṃ āvasathaṃ kāretvā tattha bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0508a1:4690_17: sabbaṃ bhesajjaṃ paṭiyādetvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:4690_18: saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato uppattito puretarameva kosambiyaṃ seṭṭhigehe nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:4690_19: So arogabhāvāya mahāyamunāya nhāpiyamāno dhātiyā hatthato macchena gilito macche
atk-s0508a1:4690_20: kevaṭṭahatthagate bārāṇasiseṭṭhibhariyāya vikkiṇitvā gahite phāliyamānepi puññabalena
atk-s0508a1:4690_21: arogoyeva hutvā tāya puttoti gahetvā posiyamāno taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā janakehi mātāpitūhi
atk-s0508a1:4690_22: “ayaṃ amhākaṃ putto, detha no putta”nti anuyoge kate raññā “ubhayesampi sādhāraṇo
atk-s0508a1:4690_23: hotū”ti dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ dāyādabhāvena vinicchayaṃ katvā ṭhapitattā bākuloti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a1:4690_24: vayappatto hutvā mahatiṃ sampattiṃ anubhavanto āsītiko hutvā satthu santike dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4690_25: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā sattāhameva puthujjano ahosi, aṭṭhame aruṇe saha
atk-s0508a1:4690_26: paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4694: Kapitthā ca bahū tattha, pupphitā jīvajīvakā.
atk-s0508a1:4696: Phārusakā alābū ca, puṇḍarīkā ca pupphitā.
atk-s0508a1:4698: Mahānāmā bahū tattha, ajjunā ca piyaṅgukā.
atk-s0508a1:4700: Ediso assamo mayhaṃ, sasissohaṃ tahiṃ vasiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4719: “Yo me pādāsi bhesajjaṃ, byādhiñca samayī mama;
atk-s0508a1:4722: Vādite tūriye tattha, modissati sadā ayaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4732: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:4736: Bākulo nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a1:4744: Khepetuṃ neva sakkomi, tadā hi sukataṃ mama.
atk-s0508a1:4745: “Lābhā mama suladdhaṃ me, yohaṃ addakkhi nāyakaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:4752_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā ekadivasaṃ satthārā attano sāvake paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantare ṭhapentena
atk-s0508a1:4752_1: appābādhānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito so parinibbānasamaye saṅghamajjhe bhikkhūnaṃ ovādamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:4755: Sukhā so dhaṃsate ṭhānā, pacchā ca manutappati.
atk-s0508a1:4757: “Yañhi kayirā tañhi vade, yaṃ na kayirā na taṃ vade;
atk-s0508a1:4761: Asokaṃ virajaṃ khemaṃ, yattha dukkhaṃ nirujjhatī”ti. – gāthāttayamabhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4762_0: Tattha yo pubbe karaṇīyāni, pacchā so kātumicchatīti yo puggalo pubbe puretaraṃ jarārogādīhi
atk-s0508a1:4762_1: anabhibhūtakāleyeva kātabbāni attano hitasukhāvahāni kammāni pamādavasena akatvā
atk-s0508a1:4762_2: pacchā so kātabbakālaṃ atikkamitvā kātuṃ icchati. Soti ca nipātamattaṃ. Tadā pana
atk-s0508a1:4762_3: jarārogādīhi abhibhūtattā kātuṃ na sakkoti, asakkonto ca sukhā so dhaṃsate ṭhānā,
atk-s0508a1:4762_4: pacchā ca manutappatīti so puggalo sukhā ṭhānā saggato nibbānato ca tadupāyassa anuppāditattā
atk-s0508a1:4762_5: parihāyanto “akataṃ me kalyāṇa”ntiādinā pacchā ca anutappati vippaṭisāraṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0508a1:4762_6: Ma-kāro padasandhikaro. Ahaṃ pana karaṇīyaṃ katvā eva tumhe evaṃ vadāmīti dassento
atk-s0508a1:4763_0: Tattha parijānantīti “ettako aya”nti paricchijja jānanti na bahuṃ maññantīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:4763_1: Sammāpaṭipattivasena hi yathāvādī tathākārī eva sobhati, na tato aññathā. Karaṇīyapariyāyena
atk-s0508a1:4763_2: sādhāraṇato vuttamatthaṃ idāni sarūpato dassetuṃ “susukhaṃ vatā”tiādinā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:4763_3: Tassattho – sammā sāmaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddhena bhagavatā desitaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4763_4: sabbaso sokahetūnaṃ abhāvato asokaṃ vigatarāgādirajattā virajaṃ catūhi yogehi anupaddutattā
atk-s0508a1:4763_5: khemaṃ nibbānaṃ suṭṭhu sukhaṃ vata, kasmā? Yattha yasmiṃ nibbāne sakalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4766_0: Sukhañce jīvituṃ iccheti āyasmato dhaniyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:4766_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4766_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso naḷamālāya pūjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4766_3: akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe
atk-s0508a1:4766_4: kumbhakārakule nibbattitvā dhaniyoti laddhanāmo vayappatto kumbhakārakammena jīvati.
atk-s0508a1:4766_5: Tena ca samayena satthā dhaniyassa kumbhakārassa sālāyaṃ nisīditvā pukkusātissa kulaputtassa
atk-s0508a1:4766_6: chadhātuvibhaṅgasuttaṃ desesi. So taṃ sutvā katakicco ahosi. Dhaniyo tassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4766_7: sutvā “niyyānikaṃ vata buddhasāsanaṃ, yattha ekarattiparicayenāpi vaṭṭadukkhato muñcituṃ
atk-s0508a1:4766_8: sakkā”ti paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kuṭimaṇḍanānuyutto viharanto kuṭikaraṇaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0508a1:4766_9: bhagavatā garahito saṅghike senāsane vasanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:4776: Arahattaṃ pana patvā ye bhikkhū dhutaṅgasamādhānena attānaṃ ukkaṃsetvā saṅghabhattādiṃ sādiyante aññe bhikkhū avajānanti, tesaṃ ovādadānamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:4785: Itarītarena tusseyya, ekadhammañca bhāvaye”ti. – tisso gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4786_0: Tattha sukhañce jīvituṃ icche, sāmaññasmiṃ apekkhavāti sāmaññasmiṃ samaṇabhāve apekkhavā
atk-s0508a1:4786_1: sikkhāya tibbagāravo hutvā sukhaṃ jīvituṃ iccheyya ce, anesanaṃ pahāya sāmaññasukhena
atk-s0508a1:4786_2: sace jīvitukāmoti attho. Saṅghikaṃ nātimaññeyya, cīvaraṃ pānabhojananti saṅghato
atk-s0508a1:4786_3: ābhataṃ cīvaraṃ āhāraṃ na avamaññeyya, saṅghassa uppajjanakalābho nāma parisuddhuppādo
atk-s0508a1:4786_4: hotīti taṃ paribhuñjantassa ājīvapārisuddhisambhavena sāmaññasukhaṃ hatthagatamevāti
atk-s0508a1:4786_5: adhippāyo. Ahi mūsikasobbhaṃvāti ahi viya mūsikāya khatabilaṃ sevetha seveyya senāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4786_6: Yathā nāma sappo sayamattano āsayaṃ akatvā mūsikāya aññena vā kate āsaye vasitvā
atk-s0508a1:4786_7: yena kāmaṃ pakkamati, evamevaṃ bhikkhu sayaṃ senāsanakaraṇā saṃkilesaṃ anāpajjitvā
atk-s0508a1:4787_0: Idāni vutte avutte ca paccaye yathālābhasantoseneva sāmaññasukhaṃ hoti, na aññathāti
atk-s0508a1:4787_1: dassento āha “itarītarena tusseyyā”ti, yena kenaci hīnena vā paṇītena vā yathāladdhena
atk-s0508a1:4787_2: paccayena santosaṃ āpajjeyyāti attho. Ekadhammanti appamādabhāvaṃ, tañhi anuyuñjantassa
atk-s0508a1:4787_3: anavajjaṃ sabbaṃ lokiyasukhaṃ lokuttarasukhañca hatthagatameva hoti. Tenāha bhagavā
atk-s0508a1:4790_0: Atisītanti āyasmato mātaṅgaputtattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:4790_1: bhagavato kāle himavantasamīpe mahato jātassarassa heṭṭhā mahati nāgabhavane mahānubhāvo
atk-s0508a1:4790_2: nāgarājā hutvā nibbatto ekadivasaṃ nāgabhavanato nikkhamitvā vicaranto satthāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:4790_3: ākāsena gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso attano sīsamaṇinā pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:4790_4: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe mātaṅgassa nāma kuṭumbikassa
atk-s0508a1:4790_5: putto hutvā nibbatto mātaṅgaputtotveva paññāyittha. So viññutaṃ patto alasajātiko
atk-s0508a1:4790_6: hutvā kiñci kammaṃ akaronto ñātakehi aññehi ca garahito “sukhajīvino ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā”ti
atk-s0508a1:4790_7: sukhajīvitaṃ ākaṅkhanto bhikkhūhi kataparicayo hutvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4790_8: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā aññe bhikkhū iddhimante disvā iddhibalaṃ patthetvā
atk-s0508a1:4790_9: satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4794: Tattha me bhavanaṃ āsi, puññakammena saṃyutaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4798: Sakaṃ cittaṃ pasādetvā, avandiṃ satthuno ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4802: Antalikkhe ṭhito satthā, imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsatha.
atk-s0508a1:4803: “So te ijjhatu saṅkappo, labhassu vipulaṃ sukhaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:4816: Bhaṇḍā me sukatā honti, yadicchasi piḷandhanā.
atk-s0508a1:4824: Divasañceva rattiñca, āloko hoti me sadā.
atk-s0508a1:4826: Ñāṇāloko mayā diṭṭho, pattomhi acalaṃ padaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4830: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā puggalādhiṭṭhānavasena kosajjaṃ garahanto attano ca vīriyārambhaṃ kittento –
atk-s0508a1:4835: “Yo ca sītañca uṇhañca, tiṇā bhiyyo na maññati;
atk-s0508a1:4836: Karaṃ purisakiccāni, so sukhā na vihāyati.
atk-s0508a1:4840_0: Tattha atisītanti himapātavaddalādinā ativiya sītaṃ, idaṃ ahūti ānetvā sambandho.
atk-s0508a1:4840_1: Atiuṇhanti dhammaparitāpādinā ativiya uṇhaṃ, ubhayenapi utuvasena kosajjavatthumāha.
atk-s0508a1:4840_2: Atisāyanti divasassa pariṇatiyā atisāyaṃ, sāyaggahaṇeneva cettha pātopi saṅgayhati,
atk-s0508a1:4840_3: tadubhayena kālavasena kosajjavatthumāha. Itīti iminā pakārena. Etena “idha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0508a1:4840_4: bhikkhunā kammaṃ kattabbaṃ hotī”tiādinā vuttaṃ kosajjavatthuṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Vissaṭṭhakammanteti
atk-s0508a1:4840_5: pariccattayogakammante. Khaṇāti buddhuppādādayo brahmacariyavāsassa okāsā. Accentīti
atk-s0508a1:4840_6: atikkamanti. Māṇaveti satte. Tiṇā bhiyyo na maññatīti tiṇato upari na maññati, tiṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4840_7: viya maññati, sītuṇhāni abhibhavitvā attanā kattabbaṃ karoti. Karanti karonto. Purisakiccānīti
atk-s0508a1:4840_8: vīrapurisena kattabbāni attahitaparahitāni. Sukhāti sukhato, nibbānasukhatoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:4843_0: Ye cittakathī bahussutāti āyasmato khujjasobhitattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4843_1: kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4843_2: bhagavantaṃ mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso dasahi
atk-s0508a1:4843_3: gāthāhi abhitthavi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:4843_4: pāṭaliputtanagare brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, “sobhito”tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. Thokaṃ khujjadhātukatāya
atk-s0508a1:4843_5: pana khujjasobhitotveva paññāyittha. So vayappatto satthari parinibbute ānandattherassa
atk-s0508a1:4843_6: santike pabbajitvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4845: Rathiyaṃ paṭipajjantaṃ, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:4847: Ñāṇālokena jotantaṃ, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:4849: Uddharantaṃ bahū satte, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:4851: Sīhanādaṃ vinadantaṃ, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:4853: Pucchanti nipuṇe pañhe, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:4855: Tena puññaṃ anubhonti, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:4857: Na vikampati ajjhiṭṭho, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:4859: Vinadanti gajā mattā, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:4861: Abbhunnatā samā honti, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:4863: Sabbe satte viññāpeti, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a1:4867_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle rājagahe sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṃ sannipatitena
atk-s0508a1:4867_1: saṅghena “āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantehī”ti āṇatto pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā therassa purato
atk-s0508a1:4867_2: uṭṭhahitvā saṅghassa sāsanaṃ ārocetvā sayaṃ puretaraṃ ākāsena gantvā sattapaṇṇiguhādvāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:4867_3: sampāpuṇi. Tena ca samayena mārassa mārakāyikānañca paṭisedhanatthaṃ devasaṅghena
atk-s0508a1:4867_4: pesitā aññatarā devatā sattapaṇṇiguhādvāre ṭhitā hoti, tassā khujjasobhito thero
atk-s0508a1:4870: Tesaññataroyamāyuvā, dvāre tiṭṭhati khujjasobhito”ti. – paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a1:4871_0: Tattha cittakathīti vicittadhammakathikā, saṅkhipanaṃ, vitthāraṇaṃ gambhīrakaraṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4871_1: uttānīkaraṇaṃ kaṅkhāvinodanaṃ dhammapatiṭṭhāpananti evamādīhi nānānayehi paresaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4871_2: ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammassa kathanasīlāti attho. Bahussutāti pariyattipaṭivedhabāhusaccapāripūriyā
atk-s0508a1:4871_3: bahussutā. Sabbaso samitapāpatāya samaṇā. Pāṭaliputtavāsino, tesaññataroti pāṭaliputtanagaravāsitāya
atk-s0508a1:4871_4: pāṭaliputtavāsino, tesaṃ aññataro, ayaṃ āyuvā dīghāyu āyasmā. Dvāre tiṭṭhatīti sattapaṇṇiguhāya
atk-s0508a1:4871_5: dvāre tiṭṭhati, saṅghassa anumatiyā pavisitunti attho. Taṃ sutvā sā devatā therassa
atk-s0508a1:4873: “Ye cittakathī…pe… dvāre tiṭṭhati māluterito”ti. – dutiyaṃ gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a1:4874: Tattha māluteritoti iddhicittajanitena vāyunā erito, iddhibalena āgatoti attho.
atk-s0508a1:4875: Evaṃ tāya devatāya niveditena saṅghena katokāso thero saṅghassa santikaṃ gacchanto –
atk-s0508a1:4880_0: Tattha suyuddhenāti pubbabhāge tadaṅgavikkhambhanappahānavasena kilesehi suṭṭhu yujjhanena.
atk-s0508a1:4880_3: ca. Brahmacariyānuciṇṇenāti anuciṇṇena aggamaggabrahmacariyena. Evāyaṃ sukhamedhatīti
atk-s0508a1:4880_4: evaṃ vuttappakārena ayaṃ khujjasobhito nibbānasukhaṃ phalasamāpattisukhañca edhati, anubhavatīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:4883_0: Yodha koci manussesūti āyasmato vāraṇattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:4883_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto ito dvānavute kappe tissassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:4883_2: uppattito puretarameva brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu pāragū hutvā
atk-s0508a1:4883_3: isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā catupaṇṇāsasahassānaṃ antevāsikānaṃ mante vācento vasati.
atk-s0508a1:4883_4: Tena ca samayena tissassa bhagavato bodhisattabhūtassa tusitā kāyā cavitvā carimabhave
atk-s0508a1:4883_5: mātukucchiṃ okkamanena mahāpathavikampo ahosi. Taṃ disvā mahājano bhīto saṃviggo
atk-s0508a1:4883_6: naṃ isiṃ upasaṅkamitvā pathavikampanakāraṇaṃ pucchi. So “mahābodhisatto mātukucchiṃ
atk-s0508a1:4883_7: okkami, tenāyaṃ pathavikampo, tasmā mā bhāyathā”ti buddhuppādassa pubbanimittabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4883_8: kathetvā samassāsesi, buddhārammaṇañca pītiṃ paṭivedesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:4883_9: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vāraṇoti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a1:4883_10: vayappatto aññatarassa āraññakassa therassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā laddhappasādo pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:4883_11: samaṇadhammaṃ karoti. So ekadivasaṃ buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge ahinakule
atk-s0508a1:4883_12: aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ katvā kālaṅkate disvā “ime sattā aññamaññavirodhena jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4883_13: pattā”ti saṃviggamānaso hutvā bhagavato santikaṃ gato, tassa bhagavā cittācāraṃ ñatvā
atk-s0508a1:4886: Asmā lokā paramhā ca, ubhayā dhaṃsate naro.
atk-s0508a1:4889: Bahuñhi so pasavati, puññaṃ tādisako naro.
atk-s0508a1:4892: Ekāsanassa ca raho, cittavūpasamassā cā”ti. – tisso gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4893_0: Tattha yodha koci manussesūti idha manussesu yo koci khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vesso
atk-s0508a1:4893_1: vā suddo vā gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā. Manussaggahaṇañcettha ukkaṭṭhasattanidassananti
atk-s0508a1:4893_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Parapāṇāni hiṃsatīti parasatte māreti vibādhati ca. Asmā lokāti idha
atk-s0508a1:4893_3: lokato. Paramhāti paralokato. Ubhayā dhaṃsateti ubhayato dhaṃsati, ubhayalokapariyāpannahitasukhato
atk-s0508a1:4894_0: Evaṃ parapīḷālakkhaṇaṃ pāpadhammaṃ dassetvā idāni parapīḷānivattilakkhaṇaṃ kusalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4894_1: dhammaṃ dassento “yo ca mettenā”tiādinā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha mettena cittenāti
atk-s0508a1:4894_2: mettāsampayuttena cittena appanāpattena itarītarena vā. Sabbapāṇānukampatīti sabbe
atk-s0508a1:4894_3: pāṇe attano orasaputte viya mettāyati. Bahuñhi so pasavati, puññaṃ tādisako naroti
atk-s0508a1:4894_4: so tathārūpo mettāvihārī puggalo bahuṃ mahantaṃ anappakaṃ kusalaṃ pasavati paṭilabhati adhigacchati.
atk-s0508a1:4895_0: Idāni taṃ sasambhāre samathavipassanādhamme niyojento “subhāsitassā”tiādinā tatiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4895_1: gāthamāha. Tattha subhāsitassa sikkhethāti appicchakathādibhedaṃ subhāsitaṃ pariyattidhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4895_2: savanadhāraṇaparipucchādivasena sikkheyya. Samaṇūpāsanassa cāti samitapāpānaṃ samaṇānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4895_3: kalyāṇamittānaṃ upāsakānaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsanañceva paṭipattiyā
atk-s0508a1:4895_4: tesaṃ samīpacariyañca sikkheyya. Ekāsanassa ca raho cittavūpasamassa cāti ekassa
atk-s0508a1:4895_5: asahāyassa kāyavivekaṃ anubrūhantassa raho kammaṭṭhānānuyogavasena āsanaṃ nisajjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4895_6: sikkheyya. Evaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto bhāvanañca matthakaṃ pāpento samucchedavasena
atk-s0508a1:4895_7: kilesānaṃ cittassa vūpasamañca sikkheyya. Yāhi adhisīlasikkhādīhi kilesā accantameva
atk-s0508a1:4895_8: vūpasantā pahīnā honti, tā maggaphalasikkhā sikkhantassa accantameva cittaṃ vūpasantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4895_9: nāma hotīti. Gāthāpariyosāne vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4908: “Avacāsiṃ tadā tesaṃ, mā bhetha natthi vo bhayaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:4911: Tathā nimittā dissanti, obhāso vipulo mahā.
atk-s0508a1:4921_0: Ekopi saddho medhāvīti āyasmato vassikattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:4921_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4921_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannacitto pilakkhaphalāni
atk-s0508a1:4921_3: adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe
atk-s0508a1:4921_4: brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vassikoti laddhanāmo vayappatto satthu yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4921_5: disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto ābādhiko ahosi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0508a1:4921_6: ñātakā vejjaparidiṭṭhena bhesajjavidhinā upaṭṭhahitvā arogamakaṃsu. So tamhā ābādhā
atk-s0508a1:4921_7: vuṭṭhito saṃvegajāto bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4927_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā ākāsena ñātakānaṃ santike gantvā ākāse ṭhito dhammaṃ desetvā
atk-s0508a1:4927_1: te saraṇesu sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpesi. Tesu keci kālaṅkatā saraṇesu sīlesu ca patiṭṭhitattā
atk-s0508a1:4927_2: sagge nibbattiṃsu. Atha naṃ satthā buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ upagataṃ “kiṃ te, vassika, ñātīnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4927_3: ārogya”nti pucchi. So ñātīnaṃ attanā kataṃ upakāraṃ satthu kathento –
atk-s0508a1:4935: “Te abbhatītā kālaṅkatā, pattā te tidivaṃ sukhaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:4936: Bhātaro mayhaṃ mātā ca, modanti kāmakāmino”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:4938_0: Tatthāyaṃ paṭhamagāthāya attho – yo kammaphalasaddhāya ca ratanattayasaddhāya ca
atk-s0508a1:4938_1: vasena saddho, tato eva kammassakatañāṇādiyogato medhāvī, satthu ovādadhamme navalokuttaradhamme
atk-s0508a1:4938_2: ca ṭhitattā dhammaṭṭho, ācārasīlassa maggasīlassa phalasīlassa ca vasena sīlasampanno,
atk-s0508a1:4938_3: so ekopi yathāvuttāya saddhāya abhāvena assaddhānaṃ idha imasmiṃ loke “amhākaṃ ime”ti
atk-s0508a1:4938_4: ñātabbaṭṭhena ñātīnaṃ, tathā pemabandhanena bandhanaṭṭhena “bandhū”ti ca laddhanāmānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4939_0: Evaṃ sādhāraṇato vuttamatthaṃ attūpanāyikaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “niggayhā”tiādinā itaragāthā
atk-s0508a1:4939_1: vuttā. Tattha niggayha anukampāya, coditā ñātayo mayāti idānipi duggatā kusalaṃ akatvā
atk-s0508a1:4939_2: āyatiṃ parikkilesaṃ puna mānubhavitthāti niggahetvā ñātayo mayā ovaditā. Ñātibandhavapemena
atk-s0508a1:4939_3: “amhākaṃ ayaṃ bandhavo”ti evaṃ pavattena pemena mama ovādaṃ atikkamituṃ asakkontā
atk-s0508a1:4939_4: kāraṃ katvāna bhikkhūsu pasannacittā hutvā cīvarādipaccayadānena ceva upaṭṭhānena
atk-s0508a1:4939_5: ca bhikkhūsu sakkārasammānaṃ katvā te abbhatītā kālaṅkatā hutvā imaṃ lokaṃ atikkantā.
atk-s0508a1:4939_6: Puna teti nipātamattaṃ. Tidivaṃ sukhanti devalokapariyāpannasukhaṃ, sukhaṃ vā iṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4939_7: tidivaṃ adhigatā. “Ke pana te”ti āha. “Bhātaro mayhaṃ mātā ca, modanti kāmakāmino”ti.
atk-s0508a1:4942_0: Kālapabbaṅgasaṅkāsoti āyasmato yasojattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:4942_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle ārāmagopakakule
atk-s0508a1:4942_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ ākāsena gacchantaṃ disvā
atk-s0508a1:4943_0: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthinagaradvāre
atk-s0508a1:4943_1: kevaṭṭagāme pañcakulasatajeṭṭhakassa kevaṭṭassa putto hutvā nibbatti, yasojotissa
atk-s0508a1:4943_2: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto attano sahāyehi kevaṭṭaputtehi saddhiṃ macchagahaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4943_3: aciravatiyaṃ nadiyaṃ jālaṃ khipi. Tattheko suvaṇṇavaṇṇo mahāmaccho antojālaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0508a1:4943_4: Taṃ te rañño pasenadissa dassesuṃ. Rājā “imassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇassa macchassa vaṇṇakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4943_5: bhagavā jānātī”ti macchaṃ gāhāpetvā bhagavato dassesi. Bhagavā “ayaṃ kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0508a1:4943_6: sāsane osakkamāne pabbajitvā micchā paṭipajjanto sāsanaṃ osakkāpetvā niraye nibbatto
atk-s0508a1:4943_7: ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ niraye paccitvā tato cuto aciravatiyaṃ maccho hutvā nibbatto”ti
atk-s0508a1:4943_8: vatvā tassa bhaginīnañca niraye nibbattabhāvaṃ, tassa bhātikattherassa parinibbutabhāvañca
atk-s0508a1:4943_9: teneva kathāpetvā imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā kapilasuttaṃ desesi.
atk-s0508a1:4944_0: Satthu desanaṃ sutvā yasojo saṃvegajāto saddhiṃ attano sahāyehi bhagavato santike
atk-s0508a1:4944_1: pabbajitvā patirūpe ṭhāne vasanto ekadivasaṃ sapariso bhagavantaṃ vandituṃ jetavanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4944_2: agamāsi. Tassa āgamane senāsanapaññāpanādinā vihāre uccāsaddamahāsaddo ahosi. Taṃ
atk-s0508a1:4944_3: sutvā “bhagavā saparisaṃ yasojaṃ paṇāmesī”ti sabbaṃ udāne āgatanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4944_4: Paṇāmito pana āyasmā yasojo kasābhihato bhaddo assājānīyo viya saṃviggamānaso saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:4944_5: parisāya vaggumudāya nadiyā tīre vasanto ghaṭento vāyamanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0508a1:4944_6: antovasseyeva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4956_0: Chaḷabhiññaṃ pana samānaṃ saparisaṃ āyasmantaṃ yasojaṃ satthā pakkositvā āneñjasamāpattinā
atk-s0508a1:4956_1: paṭisanthāramakāsi. So sabbepi dhutaṅgadhamme samādāya vattati. Tenassa sarīraṃ kisaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4956_2: ahosi lūkhaṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ, taṃ bhagavā paramappicchatāya pasaṃsanto –
atk-s0508a1:4959: Mattaññū annapānamhi, adīnamānaso naro”ti. – paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a1:4960_1: tenāha “kiso dhamanisanthato”ti. Kisoti moneyyapaṭipadāpūraṇena kisasarīro. Dhamanisanthatoti
atk-s0508a1:4960_2: dhamanīhi santhatagatto appamaṃsalohitatāya pākaṭīhi kaṇḍarasirāhi vitatasarīro.
atk-s0508a1:4960_4: anabhibhūtattā alīnacitto akusītavutti. Naroti puriso, porisassa dhurassa vahanato
atk-s0508a1:4961: Evaṃ thero satthārā pasaṭṭho pasaṭṭhabhāvānurūpaṃ attano adhivāsanakhantivīriyārambhavivekābhiratikittanamukhena bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ kathento –
atk-s0508a1:4966: “Yathā brahmā tathā eko, yathā devo tathā duve;
atk-s0508a1:4967: Yathā gāmo tathā tayo, kolāhalaṃ tatuttari”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:4969_0: Tattha nāgo saṅgāmasīsevāti yathā nāma ājāneyyo hatthināgo yuddhamaṇḍale asisattitomarādippahāre
atk-s0508a1:4969_1: adhivāsetvā parasenaṃ viddhaṃseti, evaṃ bhikkhu araññasmiṃ brahāvane araññāniyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4969_2: ḍaṃsādiparissaye sato sampajāno adhivāseyya, adhivāsetvā ca bhāvanābalena mārabalaṃ vidhameyya.
atk-s0508a1:4970_0: Yathā brahmāti yathā brahmā ekako cittappakoparahito jhānasukhena niccameva sukhito
atk-s0508a1:4970_1: viharati tathā ekoti bhikkhupi eko adutiyo vivekasukhamanubrūhento sukhaṃ viharati.
atk-s0508a1:4970_2: Ekassa sāmaññasukhaṃ paṇītanti hi vuttaṃ. Etena ekavihārī bhikkhu “brahmasamo”ti
atk-s0508a1:4970_3: ovādaṃ deti. Yathā devo tathā duveti yathā devānaṃ antarantarā cittappakopopi siyā,
atk-s0508a1:4970_4: tathā dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sahavāse ghaṭṭanāpi bhaveyyāti sadutiyavāsena bhikkhu “devasamo”ti
atk-s0508a1:4970_5: vutto. Yathā gāmo tathā tayoti asmimeva pāṭhe tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sahavāso gāmavāsasadiso
atk-s0508a1:4970_6: vivekavāso na hotīti adhippāyo. Kolāhalaṃ tatuttarinti tato tayato upari ca bahūnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4970_7: saṃvāso kolāhalaṃ uccāsaddamahāsaddamahājanasannipātasadiso, tasmā ekavihārinā bhavitabbanti adhippāyoti.
atk-s0508a1:4973_0: Ahu tuyhaṃ pure saddhāti āyasmato sāṭimattiyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a1:4973_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:4973_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:4973_3: tālavaṇṭaṃ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:4973_4: magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā sāṭimattiyoti laddhanāmo vayappatto hetusampannatāya
atk-s0508a1:4973_5: āraññakabhikkhūnaṃ santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:4979_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā bhikkhū ovadati anusāsati bahū ca satte dhammaṃ kathetvā saraṇesu
atk-s0508a1:4979_1: ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpesi. Aññatarañca kulaṃ assaddhaṃ appasannaṃ saddhaṃ pasannaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4979_2: akāsi. Tena tasmiṃ kule manussā there abhippasannā ahesuṃ. Tatthekā dārikā abhirūpā
atk-s0508a1:4979_3: dassanīyā theraṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ sakkaccaṃ bhojanena parivisati. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4979_4: māro “evaṃ imassa ayaso vaḍḍhissati, appatiṭṭho bhavissatī”ti cintetvā therassa rūpena
atk-s0508a1:4979_5: gantvā taṃ dārikaṃ hatthe aggahesi. Dārikā “nāyaṃ manussasamphasso”ti ca aññāsi,
atk-s0508a1:4979_6: hatthañca muñcāpesi. Taṃ disvā gharajano there appasādaṃ janesi. Punadivase thero
atk-s0508a1:4979_7: taṃ kāraṇaṃ anāvajjento taṃ gharaṃ agamāsi. Tattha manussā anādaraṃ akaṃsu. Thero
atk-s0508a1:4979_8: taṃ kāraṇaṃ āvajjento mārassa kiriyaṃ disvā “tassa gīvāyaṃ kukkurakuṇapaṃ paṭimuñcatū”ti
atk-s0508a1:4979_9: adhiṭṭhahitvā tassa mocanatthaṃ upagatena mārena atītadivase katakiriyaṃ kathāpetvā
atk-s0508a1:4979_10: taṃ tajjetvā vissajjesi. Taṃ disvā gharasāmiko “khamatha, bhante, accaya”nti khamāpetvā
atk-s0508a1:4979_11: “ajjatagge ahameva, bhante, tumhe upaṭṭhahāmī”ti āha. Thero tassa dhammaṃ kathento –
atk-s0508a1:4981: “Ahu tuyhaṃ pure saddhā, sā te ajja na vijjati;
atk-s0508a1:4982: Yaṃ tuyhaṃ tuyhamevetaṃ, natthi duccaritaṃ mama.
atk-s0508a1:4984: “Aniccā hi calā saddhā, evaṃ diṭṭhā hi sā mayā;
atk-s0508a1:4985: Rajjantipi virajjanti, tattha kiṃ jiyyate muni.
atk-s0508a1:4987: “Paccati munino bhattaṃ, thokaṃ thokaṃ kule kule;
atk-s0508a1:4990_0: Tattha ahu tuyhaṃ pure saddhā, sā te ajja na vijjatīti, upāsaka, ito pubbe tava mayi
atk-s0508a1:4990_1: “ayyo dhammacārī samacārī”tiādinā saddhā ahosi, sā saddhā te tava ajja idāni na upalabbhati.
atk-s0508a1:4990_2: Tasmā yaṃ tuyhaṃ tuyhamevetanti catupaccayadānaṃ, tuyhameva etaṃ hotu, na tena mayhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4990_3: attho, sammā pasannacittena hi dānaṃ nāma dātabbanti adhippāyo. Atha vā yaṃ tuyhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4990_4: tuyhamevetanti yaṃ tava mayi ajja agāravaṃ pavattaṃ, taṃ tuyhameva, tassa phalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4990_5: tayā eva paccanubhavitabbaṃ, na mayāti attho. Natthi duccaritaṃ mamāti mama pana
atk-s0508a1:4990_6: duccaritaṃ nāma natthi maggeneva duccaritahetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā.
atk-s0508a1:4991_0: Aniccā hi calā saddhāti yasmā pothujjanikā saddhā aniccā ekantikā na hoti, tato eva
atk-s0508a1:4991_1: calā assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍaṃ viya, thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇukaṃ viya ca anavaṭṭhitā.
atk-s0508a1:4991_2: Evaṃ diṭṭhā hi sā mayāti evaṃ bhūtā ca sā saddhā mayā tayi diṭṭhā paccakkhato viditā.
atk-s0508a1:4991_3: Rajjantipi virajjantīti evaṃ tassā anavaṭṭhitattā eva ime sattā kadāci katthaci mittasanthavavasena
atk-s0508a1:4991_4: rajjanti sinehampi karonti, kadāci virajjanti virattacittā honti. Tattha kiṃ jiyyate
atk-s0508a1:4991_5: munīti tasmiṃ puthujjanānaṃ rajjane virajjane ca muni pabbajito kiṃ jiyyati, kā tassa hānīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:4992_0: “Sace mama paccaye na gaṇhatha, kathaṃ tumhe yāpethā”ti evaṃ mā cintayīti dassento
atk-s0508a1:4992_1: “paccatī”ti gāthamāha. Tassattho munino pabbajitassa bhattaṃ nāma kule kule anugharaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4992_2: divase divase thokaṃ thokaṃ paccate, na ca tuyhaṃ eva gehe. Piṇḍikāya carissāmi,
atk-s0508a1:4992_3: atthi jaṅghabalaṃ mamāti atthi me jaṅghabalaṃ, nāhaṃ obhaggajaṅgho na khañjo na ca
atk-s0508a1:4992_4: pādarogī, tasmā piṇḍikāya missakabhikkhāya carissāmi, “yathāpi bhamaro puppha”ntiādinā
atk-s0508a1:4992_5: satthārā vuttanayena piṇḍāya caritvā yāpessāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:4995_0: Saddhāya abhinikkhammāti āyasmato upālittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:4995_1: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulaghare nibbatto ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0508a1:4995_2: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ vinayadharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4995_3: katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:4995_4: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kappakagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, upālītissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto
atk-s0508a1:4995_5: anuruddhādīnaṃ channaṃ khattiyānaṃ pasādako hutvā tathāgate anupiyambavane viharante
atk-s0508a1:4995_6: pabbajanatthāya nikkhamantehi chahi khattiyehi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji. Tassa
atk-s0508a1:4996_0: So pabbajitvā upasampanno satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā “mayhaṃ, bhante, araññavāsaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4996_1: anujānāthā”ti āha. Bhikkhu tava araññe vasantassa ekameva dhuraṃ vaḍḍhissati, amhākaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4996_2: pana santike vasantassa ganthadhurañca vipassanādhurañca paripūressatīti. Thero satthu
atk-s0508a1:4996_3: vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:5000: Lakkhaṇe itihāse ca, sadhamme pāramiṃ gato.
atk-s0508a1:5002: Carakā tāpasā ceva, caranti mahiyā tadā.
atk-s0508a1:5004: Bahujjano maṃ pūjeti, nāhaṃ pūjemi kiñcanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5006: Buddhoti vacanaṃ natthi, tāva nuppajjate jino.
atk-s0508a1:5008: Sabbaṃ tamaṃ vinodetvā, loke uppajji cakkhumā.
atk-s0508a1:5011: “Pitu atthāya so buddho, dhammaṃ desesi cakkhumā;
atk-s0508a1:5012: Tena kālena parisā, samantā yojanaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a1:5018: Aṭṭhame divase patte, sunandaṃ kittayī jino.
atk-s0508a1:5022: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:5026: Hāsayanto janaṃ sabbaṃ, dassayanto sakaṃ balaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5029: “Tattha me ahu saṅkappo, sutvāna munino vacaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:5030: Ahampi kāraṃ kassāmi, yathā passāmi gotamaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5034: Vinaye agganikkhitto, taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthaye ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5036: Tena bhogena buddhassa, ārāmaṃ māpaye ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5046: Mā naṃ koci viheṭhesi, santacittāna tādinaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5060: Sobhano nāma ārāmo, sampaṭiccha tuvaṃ muni.
atk-s0508a1:5067: “Hatthī assā rathā pattī, senā ca caturaṅginī;
atk-s0508a1:5082: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:5084: Upāli nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a1:5095: “Bhave sātaṃ na vindāmi, ḍayhanto tīhi aggibhi;
atk-s0508a1:5100: Taṃ pivitvā sukhī assa, visamhā parimuttiyā.
atk-s0508a1:5110: Tassa so vihane bhūtaṃ, samūlañca vināsaye.
atk-s0508a1:5114: So me tamaṃ vinodesi, bhūtavejjova bhūtakaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5128: Devānaṃ sā piyā evaṃ, āsāvatī latuttamā.
atk-s0508a1:5130: Sāyaṃ pātaṃ namassāmi, devā āsāvatiṃ yathā.
atk-s0508a1:5132: Dūrāgatampi maṃ santaṃ, khaṇoyaṃ na virādhayi.
atk-s0508a1:5138: Meghesu gajjamānesu, gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti tā sadā.
atk-s0508a1:5139: “Cirampi gabbhaṃ dhārenti, yāva megho na gajjati;
atk-s0508a1:5148: Caturo ca phale sabbe, dhammevaṃ vijanayiṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5152: Na me samasamo atthi, dhāremi sāsanaṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5154: Ettha me vimati natthi, akkhare byañjanepi vā.
atk-s0508a1:5160: Anaññātaṃ mayā natthi, ekaggo satthu sāsane.
atk-s0508a1:5168: Aṭṭālake ca vividhe, kāraye nagare bahū.
atk-s0508a1:5174: Mā me bhaṇḍaṃ vinassīti, bhaṇḍarakkhaṃ ṭhapeti so.
atk-s0508a1:5175: “Mamatto hoti yo rañño, vuddhiṃ yassa ca icchati;
atk-s0508a1:5186: Saddhā te esikā vīra, dvārapālo ca saṃvaro.
atk-s0508a1:5192: Āneñjañca nirodho ca, esā dhammakuṭī tava.
atk-s0508a1:5196: Kolito nāma nāmena, porohicco tavaṃ mune.
atk-s0508a1:5200: Ānando nāma nāmena, dhammārakkho tavaṃ mune.
atk-s0508a1:5204: Tattha me cintanā natthi, taññevatthaṃ kathemahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5206: Vinaye mādiso natthi, kuto bhiyyo bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:5208: Upālissa samo natthi, vinaye khandhakesu ca.
atk-s0508a1:5214: So me attho anuppatto, vinaye pāramiṃ gato.
atk-s0508a1:5216: Vijahitvāna taṃ jātiṃ, putto jāto mahesino.
atk-s0508a1:5219: “Tassa rañño ahaṃ putto, candano nāma khattiyo;
atk-s0508a1:5224: Āruyha sirikaṃ nāgaṃ, nagarā nikkhamiṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a1:5226: Devalo nāma sambuddho, āgacchi purato mama.
atk-s0508a1:5228: Tato sañjātakopo so, nāgo nuddharate padaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5231: “Sātaṃ tattha na vindāmi, siro pajjalito yathā;
atk-s0508a1:5238: Purā sabbe vinassāma, khamāpessāma taṃ muniṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5250: Pariḷāhaṃ vinodehi, mā no raṭṭhaṃ vināsaya.
atk-s0508a1:5252: Ayomayena kūṭena, siraṃ bhindeyyu me sadā.
atk-s0508a1:5253: “Dake aggi na saṇṭhāti, bījaṃ sele na rūhati;
atk-s0508a1:5254: Agade kimi na saṇṭhāti, kopo buddhe na jāyati.
atk-s0508a1:5255: “Yathā ca bhūmi acalā, appameyyo ca sāgaro;
atk-s0508a1:5256: Anantako ca ākāso, evaṃ buddhā akhobhiyā.
atk-s0508a1:5258: Khantānaṃ khamitānañca, gamanaṃ taṃ na vijjati.
atk-s0508a1:5262: Samatikkamma taṃ jātiṃ, pāvisiṃ abhayaṃ puraṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5268: Atthaṃ tuyhaṃ pavakkhāmi, yathā diṭṭhaṃ padaṃ mama.
atk-s0508a1:5271: “Mā vo khaṇaṃ virādhetha, khaṇātītā hi socare;
atk-s0508a1:5278: Āsīviso diṭṭhaviso, evaṃ jhāpeti taṃ naraṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5282: Sadevakaṃ so tāreti, tasmā te avirādhiyā.
atk-s0508a1:5284: Pathavīsadisā buddhā, tasmā te na virādhiyā.
atk-s0508a1:5286: Rāhule dhanapāle ca, sabbesaṃ samako muni.
atk-s0508a1:5296: Kappemi vinaye vāsaṃ, vinayo mama gocaro.
atk-s0508a1:5298: Upāli taṃ mahāvīra, pāde vandati satthuno.
atk-s0508a1:5299: “So ahaṃ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ;
atk-s0508a1:5302_0: Tattha hi naṃ satthā sayameva sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ uggaṇhāpesi. So aparabhāge bhārukacchakavatthuṃ
atk-s0508a1:5302_1: ajjukavatthuṃ kumārakassapavatthunti imāni tīṇi vatthūni vinicchayi. Satthā ekekasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:5302_2: vinicchite sādhukāraṃ datvā tayopi vinicchaye aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ vinayadharānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5302_3: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. So aparabhāge ekasmiṃ uposathadivase pātimokkhuddesasamaye bhikkhū ovadanto –
atk-s0508a1:5308: Saṅghasmiṃ viharaṃ bhikkhu, sikkhetha vinayaṃ budho.
atk-s0508a1:5311: Kappākappesu kusalo, careyya apurakkhato”ti. – tisso gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:5312_0: Tattha saddhāyāti saddhānimittaṃ, na jīvikatthanti attho. Saddhāyāti vā kammaphalāni
atk-s0508a1:5312_1: ratanattayaguṇañca saddahitvā. Abhinikkhammāti gharāvāsato nikkhamitvā. Navapabbajitoti
atk-s0508a1:5312_2: navo hutvā pabbajito, paṭhamavaye eva pabbajito. Navoti sāsane sikkhāya abhinavo
atk-s0508a1:5312_3: daharo. Mitte bhajeyya kalyāṇe suddhājīve atanditeti “piyo garu bhāvanīyo”tiādinā
atk-s0508a1:5312_4: vuttalakkhaṇe kalyāṇamitte, micchājīvavivajjanena suddhājīve, āraddhavīriyatāya atandite
atk-s0508a1:5312_5: bhajeyya upasaṅkameyya, tesaṃ ovādānusāsanīpaṭiggahaṇavasena seveyya. Saṅghasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:5312_6: viharanti saṅghe bhikkhusamūhe vattapaṭivattapūraṇavasena viharanto. Sikkhetha vinayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5312_7: budhoti bodhañāṇatāsukusalo hutvā vinayapariyattiṃ sikkheyya. Vinayo hi sāsanassa
atk-s0508a1:5312_8: āyu, tasmiṃ ṭhite sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ hoti. “Buddho”ti ca paṭhanti, so evattho. Kappākappesūti
atk-s0508a1:5312_9: kappiyākappiyesu kusalo suttavasena suttānulomavasena ca nipuṇo cheko. Apurakkhatoti
atk-s0508a1:5312_10: na purakkhato taṇhādīhi kutoci purekkhāraṃ apaccāsīsanto hutvā vihareyya.
atk-s0508a1:5315_0: Paṇḍitaṃ vata maṃ santanti āyasmato uttarapālattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a1:5315_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:5315_2: gamanamagge setuṃ kārāpesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:5315_3: buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā uttarapāloti laddhanāmo vayappatto
atk-s0508a1:5315_4: yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti. Tassa ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5315_5: ayonisomanasikāravasena anubhūtārammaṇaṃ anussarantassa kāmarāgo uppajji. So tāvadeva
atk-s0508a1:5315_6: sahoḍḍhaṃ coraṃ gaṇhanto viya attano cittaṃ niggahetvā saṃvegajāto paṭipakkhamanasikārena
atk-s0508a1:5315_7: kilese vikkhambhetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:5321: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā sīhanādaṃ nadanto –
atk-s0508a1:5324: Pañca kāmaguṇā loke, sammohā pātayiṃsu maṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5329: “Sabbe kāmā pahīnā me, bhavā sabbe padālitā;
atk-s0508a1:5332_0: Tattha paṇḍitaṃ vata maṃ santanti sutacintāmayāya paññāya vasena paññāsampannampi
atk-s0508a1:5332_1: nāma maṃ samānaṃ. Alamatthavicintakanti attano ca paresañca atthaṃ hitaṃ vicintetuṃ
atk-s0508a1:5332_2: samatthaṃ, alaṃ vā pariyattaṃ atthassa vicintakaṃ, kilesaviddhaṃsanasamatthaṃ atthadassinaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5332_3: vā, sabbametaṃ attano antimabhavikatāya thero vadati. Pañca kāmaguṇāti rūpādayo pañca
atk-s0508a1:5332_4: kāmakoṭṭhāsā. Loketi tesaṃ pavattiṭṭhānadassanaṃ. Sammohāti sammohanimittaṃ ayonisomanasikārahetu.
atk-s0508a1:5332_5: Sammohāti vā sammohanā sammohakarā. Pātayiṃsūti dhīrabhāvato pātesuṃ, lokato vā uttaritukāmaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5333_0: Pakkhandoti anupaviṭṭho. Māravisayeti kilesavisaye kilesamārassa pavattiṭṭhāne, tassa
atk-s0508a1:5333_1: vasaṃ gatoti adhippāyo. Devaputtamārassa vā issariyaṭṭhāne taṃ anupavisitvā ṭhito.
atk-s0508a1:5333_2: Daḷhasallasamappitoti daḷhaṃ thiraṃ, daḷhena vā sallena samappito, rāgasallena hadayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5333_3: āhacca viddho. Asakkhiṃ maccurājassa, ahaṃ pāsā pamuccitunti aggamaggasaṇḍāsena rāgādisallaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5333_4: anavasesato uddharantoyeva rāgabandhanasaṅkhātā maccurājassa pāsā ahaṃ parimuccituṃ
atk-s0508a1:5334_0: Tato eva ca sabbe kāmā pahīnā me, bhavā sabbe padālitāti vatthārammaṇādibhedena anekabhedabhinnā
atk-s0508a1:5334_1: sabbe kilesakāmā ariyamaggena samucchedavasena mayā pahīnā. Kilesakāmesu hi pahīnesu
atk-s0508a1:5334_2: vatthukāmāpi pahīnā eva honti. Tathā kāmabhavakammabhavādayo bhavā sabbe maggañāṇāsinā
atk-s0508a1:5334_3: padālitā viddhaṃsitā. Kammabhavesu hi padālitesu upapattibhavā padālitā eva honti.
atk-s0508a1:5334_4: Evaṃ kammabhavānaṃ padālitattā eva vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavoti.
atk-s0508a1:5334_5: Tassattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Idameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:5337_0: Suṇātha ñātayo sabbeti āyasmato abhibhūtattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:5337_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vessabhussa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:5337_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto tādisena kalyāṇamittasannissayena sāsane abhippasanno
atk-s0508a1:5337_3: ahosi. So satthari parinibbute tassa dhātuṃ gahetuṃ mahājane ussāhaṃ karonte sayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5337_4: sabbapaṭhamaṃ gandhodakena citakaṃ nibbāpesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:5337_5: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde veṭhapuranagare rājakule nibbattitvā abhibhūtoti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a1:5337_6: pitu accayena rajjaṃ kāreti. Tasmiñca samaye bhagavā janapadacārikaṃ caranto anupubbena
atk-s0508a1:5337_7: taṃ nagaraṃ pāpuṇi. Tato so rājā “bhagavā kira mama nagaraṃ anuppatto”ti sutvā satthu
atk-s0508a1:5337_8: santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā dutiyadivase mahādānaṃ pavattesi. Bhagavā bhuttāvī
atk-s0508a1:5337_9: tassa rañño ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ anumodanaṃ karontoyeva vitthārato dhammaṃ desesi. So
atk-s0508a1:5337_10: dhammaṃ sutvā laddhappasādo rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:5343_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhena viharante tasmiṃ tassa ñātakā amaccā pārisajjā
atk-s0508a1:5343_1: nāgarā jānapadāti sabbe samāgantvā, “bhante, kasmā tvaṃ amhe anāthe katvā pabbajito”ti
atk-s0508a1:5343_2: parideviṃsu. Thero te ñātipamukhe manusse paridevante disvā tesaṃ attano pabbajjakāraṇavibhāvanamukhena dhammaṃ kathento –
atk-s0508a1:5346: Dhammaṃ vo desayissāmi, dukkhā jāti punappunaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5352: Pahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ, dukkhassantaṃ karissatī”ti. – tisso gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:5353_0: Tattha suṇāthāti nisāmetha, idāni mayā vuccamānaṃ ohitasotā sotadvārānusārena upadhārethāti
atk-s0508a1:5353_1: attho. Ñātayoti ñātī pamukhe katvā tesaṃ sabbesaṃ ālapanaṃ, tenāha “sabbe yāvantettha
atk-s0508a1:5353_2: samāgatā”ti, yāvanto yattakā ettha samāgame, etissaṃ vā mama pabbajjāya samāgatāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:5354_0: Idāni yaṃ sandhāya “suṇāthā”ti savanāṇattikavacanaṃ kataṃ, taṃ “dhammaṃ vo desayissāmī”ti
atk-s0508a1:5354_1: paṭijānitvā “dukkhā jāti punappuna”ntiādinā desetuṃ ārabhi. Tattha dukkhā jāti punappunanti
atk-s0508a1:5354_2: jāti nāmesā gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedassa jarādibhedassa ca anekavihitassa dukkhassa
atk-s0508a1:5354_3: adhiṭṭhānabhāvato dukkhā. Sā punappunaṃ pavattamānā ativiya dukkhā.
atk-s0508a1:5355_0: Tassā pana jātiyā samatikkamanatthaṃ ussāho karaṇīyoti dassento āha “ārambhathā”tiādi.
atk-s0508a1:5355_1: Tattha ārambhathāti ārambhadhātusaṅkhātaṃ vīriyaṃ karotha. Nikkamathāti kosajjapakkhato
atk-s0508a1:5355_2: nikkhantattā nikkamadhātusaṅkhātaṃ taduttariṃ vīriyaṃ karotha. Yuñjatha buddhasāsaneti
atk-s0508a1:5355_3: yasmā sīlasaṃvaro indriyesu guttadvāratā bhojane mattaññutā satisampajaññanti imesu
atk-s0508a1:5355_4: dhammesu patiṭṭhitānaṃ jāgariyānuyogavasena ārambhanikkamadhātuyo sampajjanti, tasmā
atk-s0508a1:5355_5: tathābhūtā samathavipassanāsaṅkhāte adhisīlasikkhādisaṅkhāte vā bhagavato sāsane
atk-s0508a1:5355_6: yuttappayuttā hotha. Dhunātha maccuno senaṃ, naḷāgāraṃva kuñjaroti evaṃ paṭipajjantā
atk-s0508a1:5355_7: ca tedhātuissarassa maccurājassa vasaṃ satte netīti tassa senāsaṅkhātaṃ abalaṃ dubbalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5355_8: yathā nāma thāmabalūpapanno kuñjaro naḷehi kataṃ agāraṃ khaṇeneva viddhaṃseti, evameva
atk-s0508a1:5356: Evaṃ pana buddhasāsane ussāhaṃ karontassa ekaṃsiko jātidukkhassa samatikkamoti dassento “yo imasmi”ntiādinā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha. Taṃ suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0508a1:5359_0: Saṃsaranti āyasmato gotamattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro
atk-s0508a1:5359_1: tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto sikhimhi bhagavati parinibbute tassa citakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5359_2: devamanussesu pūjentesu aṭṭhahi campakapupphehi citakaṃ pūjesi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:5359_3: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sakyarājakule nibbattitvā gotamoti gottavaseneva
atk-s0508a1:5359_4: abhilakkhitanāmo vayappatto satthu ñātisamāgame paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a1:5359_5: kammaṃ karonto chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:5365_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā vimuttisukhena viharanto ekadivasaṃ ñātakehi “kasmā, bhante,
atk-s0508a1:5365_1: amhe pahāya pabbajito”ti puṭṭho saṃsāre attanā anubhūtadukkhañceva idāni adhigataṃ
atk-s0508a1:5368: Dukkhamamhipi tiracchānayoniyaṃ, nekadhā hi vusitaṃ ciraṃ mayā.
atk-s0508a1:5374: Taṃ viditvā mahamahattasambhavaṃ, santimeva satimā samajjhaga”nti. –
atk-s0508a1:5376_0: Tattha saṃsaranti anādimati saṃsāre saṃsaranto kammakilesehi pañcasu gatīsu cavanupapātavasena
atk-s0508a1:5376_1: aparāparaṃ saṃsarantoti attho. Hīti nipātamattaṃ. Nirayaṃ agacchissanti sañjīvādikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5376_2: aṭṭhavidhaṃ mahānirayaṃ, kukkuḷādikaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ ussadanirayañca paṭisandhivasena
atk-s0508a1:5376_3: upagacchiṃ. “Punappuna”nti idaṃ idhāpi ānetabbaṃ. Petalokanti pettivisayaṃ, khuppipāsādibhedaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5376_4: petattabhāvanti attho. Agamanti paṭisandhivasena upagacchiṃ upapajjiṃ. Punappunanti
atk-s0508a1:5376_7: tiracchānayoniyaṃ. Nekadhā hīti oṭṭhagoṇagadrabhādivasena ceva kākabalākakulalādivasena
atk-s0508a1:5376_8: ca anekappakāraṃ anekavārañca ciraṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ mayā vusitaṃ niccaṃ utrastamānasatādivasena
atk-s0508a1:5376_9: dukkhaṃ anubhūtaṃ. Tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattasatto mahāmūḷhatāya cirataraṃ tattheva
atk-s0508a1:5377_0: Mānusopi ca bhavobhirādhitoti manussattabhāvopi mayā tādisena kusalakammunā samavāyena
atk-s0508a1:5377_1: abhirādhito sādhito adhigato. Kāṇakacchapopamasuttamettha udāharitabbaṃ. Saggakāyamagamaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5377_2: sakiṃ sakinti saggagatisaṅkhātaṃ kāmāvacaradevakāyaṃ sakiṃ sakiṃ kadāci kadāci upapajjanavasena
atk-s0508a1:5377_4: arūpabhavesu. Nevasaññisu asaññisuṭṭhitanti rūpārūpadhātūsu ca na kevalaṃ saññīsu
atk-s0508a1:5377_5: eva, atha kho nevasaññīnāsaññīsu asaññīsu ca upapajja ṭhitaṃ mayāti ānetvā yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5377_6: Nevasaññiggahaṇena hettha nevasaññīnāsaññībhavo gahito. Yadipime dve bhavā rūpārūpadhātuggahaṇeneva
atk-s0508a1:5377_7: gayhanti, ye pana ito bāhirakā tattha niccasaññino bhavavimokkhasaññino ca, tesaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5377_8: tassā saññāya micchābhāvadassanatthaṃ visuṃ gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5378_0: Evaṃ dvīhi gāthāhi bhavamūlassa anupacchinnattā anādimati saṃsāre attano vaṭṭadukkhānubhavaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5378_1: dassetvā idāni tadupacchedena vivaṭṭasukhānubhavaṃ dassento “sambhavā”tiādinā tatiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5378_2: gāthamāha. Tattha sambhavāti bhavā. Kāmabhavādayo eva hi hetupaccayasamavāyena bhavantīti
atk-s0508a1:5378_3: idha sambhavāti vuttā. Suviditāti vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya suṭṭhu viditā.
atk-s0508a1:5378_4: Asārakātiādi tesaṃ viditākāradassanaṃ. Tattha asārakāti niccasārādisārarahitā. Saṅkhatāti
atk-s0508a1:5378_5: samecca sambhuyya paccayehi katā. Pacalitāti saṅkhatattā eva uppādajarādīhi pakārato
atk-s0508a1:5378_6: calitā anavaṭṭhitā. Saderitāti sadā sabbakālaṃ bhaṅgena eritā, ittarā bhaṅgagāmino
atk-s0508a1:5378_7: pabhaṅgunoti attho. Taṃ viditvā mahamattasambhavanti taṃ yathāvuttaṃ saṅkhatasabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5378_8: attasambhavaṃ attani sambhūtaṃ attāyattaṃ issarādivasena aparāyattaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena
atk-s0508a1:5378_9: ahaṃ viditvā tappaṭipakkhabhūtaṃ santimeva nibbānameva maggapaññāsatiyā satimā hutvā
atk-s0508a1:5378_10: samajjhagaṃ adhigacchiṃ ariyamaggabhāvanāya anuppattoti. Evaṃ thero ñātakānaṃ dhammadesanāmukhena aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:5381_0: Yo pubbe karaṇīyānīti āyasmato hāritattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:5381_1: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute tassa citakapūjāya
atk-s0508a1:5381_2: kayiramānāya gandhena pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:5381_3: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā hāritoti laddhanāmo vayappatto
atk-s0508a1:5381_4: jātimānaṃ nissāya aññe vasalavādena samudācarati. So bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5381_5: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitopi ciraparicitattā vasalasamudācāraṃ na vissajji.
atk-s0508a1:5381_6: Athekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā sañjātasaṃvego vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a1:5381_7: attano cittappavattiṃ upaparikkhanto mānuddhaccaviggahitataṃ disvā taṃ pahāya vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5381_8: ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:5387: Arahā pana hutvā vimuttisukhaṃ anubhavanto “yo pubbe karaṇīyānī”tiādinā tīhi gāthāhi bhikkhūnaṃ ovādadānamukhena aññaṃ byākāsi. Tāsaṃ attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-s0508a1:5390_0: Pāpamitteti āyasmato vimalattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro
atk-s0508a1:5390_1: tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:5390_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute sādhukīḷanadivasesu
atk-s0508a1:5390_3: vītivattesu satthu sarīraṃ gahetvā upāsakesu jhāpanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantesu satthu guṇe
atk-s0508a1:5390_4: āvajjitvā pasannamānaso sumanapupphehi pūjamakāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:5390_5: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bārāṇasiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vimaloti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a1:5390_6: vayappatto somamittattheraṃ nissāya sāsane pabbajitvā teneva ussāhito vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5390_7: paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:5396: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano sahāyassa bhikkhussa ovādaṃ dento –
atk-s0508a1:5399: Ovāde cassa tiṭṭheyya, patthento acalaṃ sukhaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:5408_0: Tattha pāpamitteti akalyāṇamitte asappurise hīnavīriye. Vivajjetvāti taṃ abhajanavasena
atk-s0508a1:5408_1: dūrato vajjetvā. Bhajeyyuttamapuggalanti sappurisaṃ paṇḍitaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ ovādānusāsanīgahaṇavasena
atk-s0508a1:5408_2: seveyya. Ovāde cassa tiṭṭheyyāti assa kalyāṇamittassa ovāde anusiṭṭhiyaṃ yathānusiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5408_3: paṭipajjanavasena tiṭṭheyya. Patthentoti ākaṅkhanto. Acalaṃ sukhanti nibbānasukhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:5408_4: phalasukhañca. Tampi hi akuppabhāvato “acala”nti vuccati. Sesaṃ vuttatthameva.
